Now the two unlikely companions must blast their way through four monstrous generals and their wicked domains to lift the demon's curse and exact their revenge.

name: Desperados III: Money for the Vultures - Part 1: Late to the Party
summary: In the first part of "Money for the Vultures", the gang reunites once again to hunt down Vincent DeVitt's hidden riches. Help them uncover a mysterious vault, avoid bloodthirsty looters, and find out if the enigmatic Rosie from Baton Rouge can really be trusted, or if she has her own interests in mind.

name: Desperados III: Money for the Vultures - Part 2: Five Steps Ahead
summary: In the second part of "Money for the Vultures", the gang return to Louisiana to challenge a new member of the DeVitt family. Explore a brand new location in the Bayou State, reunite with Isabelle for more Voodoo shenanigans and face off against a mastermind worthy of your talents.

name: Desperados III: Money for the Vultures - Part 3: Once More With Feeling
summary: In the third and final part of "Money for the Vultures", the journey concludes in a fan favorite location. Brave the walls of a mighty fortress with cunning and guile, carry out Hector's plan in all its crazy glory and find out if Rosie will keep her word, or if she still has an ace up her sleeve.

name: Deathrun TV
summary: The greatest gameshow on earth is here with breakneck speed, bullet dodging action and lots of guns. Put it all on the line for the (rogue)likes. And remember, the run is all that matters.

name: Defend the Rook
summary: Defend the Rook is a roguelike tactics board combat combined with tower defense elements. Defeat the invading hoards to stay alive and save the land! Enjoy more tactics than a normal TD game, combined with the added challenge of building towers and fighting off waves of enemies!

name: Dead by Daylight: Resident Evil Chapter
summary: Resident Evil is a new Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a Killer, Nemesis; two Survivors, Leon S. Kennedy and Jill Valentine; and a new map. Purchasing the add-on unlocks the new Killer, both Survivors, and an exclusive universal Charm.

name: Detective Story: Reporter
summary: Detective Story: Reporter - is an exciting 2D quest game with horror elements. It is about a reporter girl called Emma.

name: Demonlore
summary: Call on the elements and evolve mighty creatures as you unleash an arsenal of spells to defend against waves of enemies, all on your epic journey to seal the rift and crush the undead invaders. Choose your spells & upgrades - it's time to go elemental!

name: Devileader
summary: Devileader, a fearsome space demon who once have destroyed countless planets of the solar system is about to be resurrected by his minions and fanatics, who want to bring chaos to the universe. Pilot the agile space interceptor Deviship and survive the terror of this demon lord.

name: Demon Cycle
summary: Demon Cycle is a casual strategy game, where luck favors the prepared. You have limited turns to make enough coins to pass the floor. Your choices will determine the outcome.

name: Defense Tower Simulator
summary: Welcome to Tower Defense Simulator and prepare yourself to protect your kingdom from different monsters! Join this game and prepare to many exciting missions with this great game!

name: Decision: Red Daze
summary: Decision: Red Daze is an action RPG with a unique mix of survival and tower defense mechanics. Explore an apocalyptic wasteland and experience the dread of a deadly new disease. The only way to save humanity from this danger is to fight back against hordes of horrifying enemies.

name: Depths of Horror: Mushroom Day
summary: This is a 3D first-person adventure and horror game that lets you plunge deep into your fears. A unique cave system, enemies and screamers. While picking mushrooms in a clearing, you stumble upon an abandoned hut. Exploring it, you find yourself in a cave full of unexpected inhabitants and surprises

name: Dev Inc
summary: An in depth game development simulation game

name: Destinies
summary: A companion app for the Destinies board game from Lucky Duck Games. Destinies is a competitive, story-driven, game of adventure and exploration, mixing an app and a board game.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles
summary:
Become the blade that destroys demons!

In Solo Mode, follow Tanjiro through the story from the Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba anime as he faces demons in order to turn his sister Nezuko, who has become a demon, back into a human.

In Versus Mode, characters from the anime, including Tanjiro and Nezuko, can be freely matched against each another in a one-versus-one setting with up to two players online or offline! Enjoy this simple but exhilarating battle system, and become the greatest demon slayer you can!

name: Dexter Stardust: Adventures in Outer Space
summary: A spacey classic adventure for all! Dexter Stardust: Adventures in Outer Space is a classic point and click adventure; you can walk, talk, and interact with everything in your surroundings. Use and pick up inventory items to solve puzzles in over 100 unique scenes. Playing Dexter Stardust is like watching back to back episodes of a Saturday morning cartoon! With 5 total episodes, feel free to jump to or replay any episode you’d like, at any time.

name: Delivery Guy
summary: In this game you will come a long way turning from a fat sluggard into a VIP delivery guy who rushes along roofs like a parkourer. And that all takes place during the time of pandemics.

name: Desktop Dinosaurs
summary: Enjoy watching cute hand animated dinosaurs inspired by 90's Tamagotchi live directly on your desktop. Manage your environment, resources to raise and evolve your dinosaurs during their entire life. But don't forget to show them love! Dinosaurs need love!

name: Descent Vector: Space Runner
summary: Race your space pod through a procedurally generated gauntlet of space stations, asteroids, and debris in this single-player sci-fi endless runner. Test your limits, experience wild crashes, improve your distance, visit unique solar systems and unlock new space pods to pilot.

name: Defend the Village From Goblins
summary: Survive against hordes of goblins in this casual survival rpg.

name: Demon's Gate: Teito Shinshin Taisen - Tokyo Mokushiroku-hen
summary: Mobile RPG set in the prewar Imperial City in 1945

name: Devil Girl
summary: "Devil Girl" is a game that combines love building with the Cthulhu weird style. One day, you wake up and find a beautiful girl with whom you can live happily and do all kinds of H things or explore the truths of the world……..

name: Detours
summary: It’s time to move across the country, and the only person with a car is your ex-partner. Suck up your pride and play through your trip and relationship’s road bumps, obstacles, and detours. Witty dialogue and moments of quiet, human connection are interspersed on a trip that reflect the oddities and struggles of Midwestern drives.

name: Deadly Broadcast
summary: Camera is ready. Batteries are full. So let the broadcast begin! Deadly Broadcast is a co-op Horror game that can be played with 1-4 player. As a Live Broadcast phenomenon, your goal is to both survive and reach the maximum number of instant views by broadcasting in abandoned and dangerous places.

name: Destruction Time!
summary: It's destruction time! Build, blow up, and destroy! In this world of realistic physics, you can smash castles with catapults, blow up buildings, shoot slingshots and throw objects, and watch buildings fall apart beautifully.

name: Death Becomes You
summary: Death Becomes You is a whodunit mystery set in a magical school. You find your best friend dead, and four suspicious students lingering around the scene. Who is the one that did it? Who is lying about their intentions on that night?

name: Dead Box
summary: Henry explores the depths of Purgatory to pass onto the other side after dying.

name: Despair: Blood Curse
summary: A third-person survival horror game featuring non-linear gameplay, puzzles, and enemies from the depths of hell. After the arrival of an unexpected guest back home, Anna's in a race against time to uncover the mystery of the events that took place. Will she save her sister before it's too late?

name: Deep Rune
summary: A side-scrolling adventure game that seamlessly blends RPG mechanics and puzzle solving, all set in a mysterious world rooted in Norse mythology. Inspired by games like Tower of the Sorcerer and DROD RPG.

name: Dead Survival
summary:
Dead Survival is a tactical survival FPS, in a post-apocalyptic world!
In an Open World overrun by Zombies, Militias, you and over 300 online players will have to survive.

name: Death Realm
summary: Once you enter the Death Realm, you are bound to abandon hope. Do you think you can take on the most powerful?

name: Depersonated
summary: An interactive steampunk-inspired adventure filled with a noir atmosphere. Сhoose your path as a young girl named Molly and unravel the mysteries of RainWood town.

name: DeepStates VR
summary: DeepStates [VR] - Experiences designed to calm your mind and drift away. Wind down in compelling natural sceneries with dense atmospheres.

name: DeHexTD
summary: Defend your ever growing platform against an ever rising amount creeps

name: Dead by Daylight: Chains of Hate Chapter
summary: Chains of Hate is a new Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a Killer, The Deathslinger, a Survivor, Zarina Kassir and a Map. Purchasing the add-on will unlock its new Killer, new Survivor, and an exclusive item for the survivor.

name: Dead by Daylight: Descend Beyond Chapter
summary: Descend Beyond is a new Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a Killer, The Blight, and a Survivor, Felix Richter. Purchasing the add-on will unlock its new Killer, new Survivor, and an exclusive item for the survivor: Felix's The World Class jacket.

name: Dead by Daylight: All-Kill Chapter
summary: All-Kill is a new Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a Killer, The Trickster, and a Survivor, Yun-Jin Lee. Purchasing the add-on will unlock its new Killer, new Survivor, and an exclusive item for the survivor: Yun-Jin's Polka Dotted Blouse.

name: Delares
summary: Action-RPG-Roguelike with procedural generation and a little economic component. Take orders for the supply of various goods to cities or individual points of the world and overcome the difficulties on your way!

name: Deep Sky Derelicts: Station Life
summary: Station Life, the second expansion to Deep Sky Derelicts, turns the station, your scavenger home and safe haven, into a lively hub! With new bounty contracts, random encounters, station dweller interactions, and the Inventor recruit introduced, players will have plenty to do between raids.

name: DeadFright
summary: DeadFright is a survival horror audio game with a first-person perspective and no visuals, that will immerse you in a 3D audio environment using dynamic and spatial sound to generate a binaural horror experience... Are you brave enough?

name: Deep Diving Simulator: Adventure Pack
summary: The Adventure Pack includes two additional, brand new locations for your adventurous soul! Visit the Dead Mines and Sons of Horus to unravel an ancient mystery!

name: Defend the Kingdom
summary: Defend the kingdom is a classic tower defense game where you build up towers and upgrade them to defend one end point from evil creatures approaching from one or more lanes. Different towers have different pro s and cons and it is always a trade off which tower suits the best for each situation. Explore three biomes and 35 levels each have three difficulties. Earn stars by completing each difficulty to upgrade your stats and earn gems to buy skills and power ups. A fun tower defense game for every tower defense game fan.

name: Dead Cells: The Fatal Seed Bundle
summary: Dead Cells base game plus our two paid DLCs. The definitive “for now” version of Dead Cells…

name: Dead in Vinland: Endless Mode - Battle of the Heodenings
summary: Named after the tale of an endless battle from Norse mythology, this second DLC for Dead In Vinland unlocks a new Endless, sandboxy, survival mode!

name: Death Dream
summary: You find yourself in a galaxy with maps, on maps you can survive, build cities, extract resources, trade, defend against enemies, maps can be opened in a dream, when you make your bed and fall asleep, then you may dream of a quest, for example, a battle with a dragon, or dialogue with AI

name: Death Rattle: Hell Unleashed
summary: A first person shooter set in a medieval world ravaged by the ungodly forces of the hellion. You are the Death Rattle - humanity's last hope against the forces of hell. Use your special gifts and divine powers to challenge the marches of hell and turn the tide against these devils and demons.

name: Destined to Die
summary: Destined to Die is a task managing game about depression, containing over 1000+ pieces of physical and digital art. What's the point in life, if all paths lead to death. Choose your actions, and learn how to live. All paths lead to death, but how long can you live?

name: Dead or Alive 6: Tamaki & Debut Costume Set
summary: This set includes Tamaki and the set of 5 debut costumes for her.

name: Dead or Alive 6: Mai Shiranui
summary: Download this to use Mai Shiranui in DEAD OR ALIVE 6 and DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters.

name: Dead or Alive 6: Tina
summary: Download this to use Tina in DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters. Note: This content is only for the holders of the DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters version of the game.

name: Dead or Alive 6: Rachel & Debut Costume Set
summary: This set includes Rachel and the set of 5 debut costumes for her.

summary: Download this to use Kula Diamond in DEAD OR ALIVE 6 and DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters.

summary: Download this to use Christie in DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters. Note: This content is only for the holders of the DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters version of the game.

summary: Download this to use Momiji in DEAD OR ALIVE 6 and DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters.

summary: Download this to use Hayate in DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters. Note: This content is only for the holders of the DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters version of the game.

summary: Download this to use Bayman in DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters. Note: This content is only for the holders of the DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters version of the game.

summary: Download this to use Rachel in DEAD OR ALIVE 6 and DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters.

name: Dead or Alive 6: Tamaki
summary: Download this to use Tamaki in DEAD OR ALIVE 6 and DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters.

name: Demonicute
summary: Hardcore platformer.

name: Dere Exe: Rebirth of Horror
summary: Experience the terrifying first chapter in a series of platformer horror games.

name: Desert Mystery
summary: A hardcore tactical shooter, where your main mission is to eliminate any threat blocking your way and escape the enemy lines

name: Dead Hospital
summary: Horror. The action takes place in a hospital where people are dying. You're the only survivor... in addition... you need to solve the mystery of the hospital, but be careful, because something unimaginable and very scary may be hiding around the corner.

name: Detour Bus
summary: Snap together inconvenient road pieces to build ridiculously convoluted highways, and guide the dysfunctional Flowers family on a psychedelic road trip across post-infrastructure America.

name: Denki Bounce
summary: Denki Bounce is the worlds first trampoline-based "Bounce 'Em Up!" Blast, Reflect, Evade and Electrify your way to victory! A high-paced, addictive, VS battle-sport game with rich cartoon visuals awaits!

name: Death Taxi 3000
summary: Retro arcade racer inspired by the MS-DOS era

name: Destructive Contraptions
summary: Destructive Contraptions is a physics based sandbox simulator where you can create huge contraptions with dominos, balls, canons, pivot etc. and watch them fall apart and destroy giant structures, cities, buildings without having to worry about the legal and life threatening issues.

name: Defense Grid: The Awakening - Resurgence Map Pack 3
summary: This third (of four) map pack in the Resurgence series features new maps, new strategies, new experiences, and new achievements from the creators of Defense Grid.

name: Destroy the Hexons
summary: Destroy the Hexons is a minimalist puzzle game that mixes cannons, balls, hexons and strategy. Position the cannons in the right place within the hexagonal grid so that they throw the balls into the hexons and destroy them all at once.

name: Destroy the Cubes
summary: Destroy the Cubes is a minimalist puzzle game that combines balls, cubes and physical intuition. You need to throw the balls in the right direction and position to destroy all the cubes at once. You move to the next level when enough balls fall into the hole.

name: Deadeye Deepfake Simulacrum
summary: Embody the ultimate cybernetic corporate agent. Master deadly gunplay, time manipulation, and supernatural abilities. Hack computers, people, even the individual bullets flying at you. Confront the future in this story rich immersive sim.

name: Dead by Daylight: Silent Hill Chapter
summary:
Silent Hill is a new Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a Killer, The Executioner; a Survivor, Cheryl Mason; and a map. Purchasing the add-on will unlock its new Killer, new Survivor, and an exclusive universal Charm.

The Silent Hill Chapter includes a new map, Midwich Elementary School: the childhood trauma that once took place in its halls has since manifested itself into a twisted, nightmarish design. The new Killer is The Executioner: take control of Pyramid Head and wield his great knife to unleash his twisted brand of punishment on all who cross him. The new Survivor is Cheryl Mason, a courageous, outspoken woman who survived the hellish Otherworld of Silent Hill, and exacted revenge on the Order that killed her father. With experience beyond her years, she's prepared to once again stand against any evil that confronts her.

name: Desohunter
summary: "Desonia", the land of wealth and mystery, has been ravaged by invading monster armies. Years later, it is now an unforgiving destination sought by treasure hunters from around the world.

name: Demon Killer VR
summary: Use swords to slash through demons in this exciting VR action adventure!

name: Dead Hearts
summary: What would you do if all the people you knew were murdered before your eyes? What would you do if the scenery repeated itself over and over again? What would you do if you knew you were about to die in front of your friends? There is only one solution - change your destiny and take revenge.

name: Dextrissimi
summary: With multiple character archetypes to choose from, beautifully crafted 2D art, and a simplified attack system, Dextrissimi allows beginners to face-off against veteran fighters on an even playing field in a true test of instinct and skill!

name: Deadly Maze
summary: Just an old school arcade shooter that isn't made to be taken seriously... Just have fun with friends or by yourself. This game is just here for enjoyment and not a hardcore grind. I hope you have fun with Deadly Maze

name: Demon Strikes Back
summary: Demon strikes back is a rogue-lite action game, across the abyssal fissure and beat all your foes! Seize their weapons, snatch their equipment, retrieve their relics, and reave their soul! The demon grows stronger than ever!

name: Death Ski
summary: A retro skiing adventure. Slalom courses, time trials and more. Avalanches, charging deer, packs of wolves, grizzly bears, chainsaw-wielding maniacs and psychotic goats await you on the deadly slopes.

name: Death Moon
summary: Action Adventure single player platformr with puzzles..

name: Death of the Rising Sun
summary: Welcome to an Indian Jones meets Stargate epic action adventure! In this third-person shooter, the intense fighting will keep your lust for action satiated, the exotic locations will keep you guessing with massive puzzles, and the cinematic visuals will tickle your senses.

name: Dead Hope
summary: Dead Hope is a zombie post-apocalyptic open world sandbox loot shooter with a single player / co-op survival mode and an online PvP mode with global inventory.

name: Destroy It
summary: Hit the robot against objects to destroy them

name: Desert Pirates
summary: Lead a post-apocalyptic war convoy through the wasteland filled with ruthless foes, destroy them and take whatever you can to keep going. Fight, get resources and survive. How far can you ride?

name: Deadlokk
summary: Deadlokk is a 5v5 Space-MOBA. Gather resources from objectives to upgrade your ships and carrier. Find new weapons and upgrades for the perfect build. Mount a final assault on the enemy carrier and achieve victory.

name: Desecration
summary: Desecration is a turn based strategy roguelike, where you have just sold your soul to conquer the kingdom. Build a small army, learn spells, and find artifacts through a randomly generated map. Each play through will provide the player a unique and challenging experience filled with glory or defeat!

name: Dead Letter Dept.
summary: Dead Letter Dept. is a short horror game mystery experience, where you use your computer keyboard to type in various prompts, and attempt to decipher damaged images as oddities begin to appear.

name: Decamped
summary: Decamped is a first-person puzzle adventure game that finds the character waking up to an overgrown desolate world. They must face their past in order to move forward and unravel the mystery of what happened in Deckner.

name: Devoul: Curse of the Soulless
summary: Devoul: Curse of the Soulless is a metroidvania style game set in a dark and corrupted world. Follow the adventures of Gebriel, a demon hunter, and Lani his ghost sidekick, while they explore the cursed castle Cambriala seeking the infamous vampire lord Raizer.

name: Demon Purge Saga
summary: A tale of revenge and intolerance guided by faith. Father Emmet starts his quest on the city of Parabollam to purge all the evil. An unique game mixing exorcism elements with match-3 battles.

name: Denari
summary: Denari twists the hack and slasher genre with the power of telekinesis, allowing players to redirect enemy projectiles. The story follows a young warrior gifted with the power of a goddess to fight the invading Denari empire.

name: Demian: The Ritual
summary: There was a forest front of a girl who awake from a dream. The girl couldn’t remember anything and she didn’t know where to go. She wandered in forest to get out of there, and she met strange family. The family's destination was a house that spirits who had a grudge lived.

name: Deadzoned: A Credits Bounty
summary: Deadzoned is a low-tech sci-fi traditional Roguelike. Blast your way through the lawless sectors battling dangerous creatures, outlaws, and the environment itself. But you'll need your wits to make best use of the variety of resources you stumble upon to survive and claim the head of your bounty!

name: Deep Space Gardening
summary: In Deep Space Gardening, up to 4 players work hand in hand to grow plants, which are then sent to planets who need help to recover their ecological system. Unique gardens and game elements, a singleplayer and an online mode guarantee fun for casual and ambitious players of all ages.

name: Deadly Daycare VR
summary: Deadly Daycare is a VR experience where you must take care of a cast of chaotic creatures before they destroy you and your daycare!

name: Decently Bad Tower Defense
summary: This is a bad short Tower Defense game made from scratch as a new game developer. This game does all the basic things you expect from a tower defense. We have 3 types of enemies and 3 types of tower to destroy them with. Strategic placement of the towers will make your victory certain.

name: Despatch: Entity Astray
summary: Imagine waking up in an unknown environment. It’s dark. You have no idea where and who you are. Only a small alarm light flashes somewhere in the room. Something seems off. The room is filled with a strange soundscape. Start your adventure now and bring light into the unknown darkness.

name: Dear Mom
summary: A short narrative adventure about mom, which will leave you with unforgettable incredible emotions about your mom.

name: DeadOS
summary: DeadOS is an early access zombie outbreak simulator by Benn Powell that focuses on city-wide scenarios where you have access to fully customize your apocalypse experience from beginning to end. Simulation. Sandbox. Survival!

name: Dear Brother
summary: Audrey is a young woman returning to her childhood home. Upon arriving, however, she begins to notice strange happenings around the house. Is this a dream or reality? Whatever it is, it seems so oddly… familiar. Explore with Audrey as she tries to work out the mysteries of her missing memories.

name: Demon Heart
summary: Take a sit on a cosy coach in the woods. Have a conversation with a beings older than a world itself. In Demon heart you will know where demons live, what a human can do to them and the most important: how their hearts taste.

name: Detective Solitaire Inspector Magic and the Man Without Face
summary: Visit a magical world right now! 200 magical layouts - find all the evidence!

name: Destroy the Dummies
summary: Destroy the Dummies is a simple yet difficult, third person, action, arcade style, series of challenges, with an interesting dark plot twist mid-game. An homage to the games of the early days of 3D graphics.

name: Destiny Island
summary: Destiny Island is a very short computer game. You play a man who visits his memories. You can walk and talk to mannequins about 7 sins. Associate essence with anything comes to your mind.

name: DeadPoly
summary: DeadPoly is a polygon zombie survival looter shooter with base building and crafting. Your only goal is survival, everything else is optional.

name: Defend Till Sunshine
summary: Defend Till Sunshine is a exploration-survival game which you will experience with your puppy. You need to survive againts multiple situations. Discover across the land, find villages, learn craft techniques, interact with villagers and learn tips from them, build your own house and more!

name: Deep Therapy
summary: Be a psychologist, explore patients minds and search for lost memories in their subconscious. Then make a diagnosis according to your experience and the memories you have collected.

name: Demon Slayer Akagi
summary: Battle against mythos inspired characters from around the world in this Arcade styled breakout game!

name: Detective S
summary:
The Harmony of Webtoons and Find the differences Games!
“P, Please. You know how important this case is to S”
'S' lost one and only family in a button murder case.
There was only one reason she became a detective, to solve that case.
Investigate the crime scene with S and arrest the criminal!
Find the evidence in the crime scene that differences in the scenes, and try to guess the criminal with the information you have acquired!

“Detective S,” the guessing game using Find the Differences
Escape from the cliché!

name: Dead Space
summary: The sci-fi survival-horror classic Dead Space returns, completely rebuilt from the ground up to offer a deeper, more immersive experience. This remake brings jaw-dropping visual fidelity, suspenseful atmospheric audio, and improvements to gameplay while staying faithful to the original game’s thrilling vision.

name: Deflection
summary: Lasers, portals, mirrors... what could be more awesome? Destroy the enemy's king with your laser by moving and rotating mirrors and by strategically using the special abilities some pieces possess. Play against friends (local and online) or against the AI and create levels!

name: Dead Herring VR
summary: Dead Herring is a VR-Experience in which you solve a murder case.

name: Defender of Kuiper Belt
summary: Fight against alien invaders with your powerful spaceship. This is a bullet hell game which puts your dodging skills to a true test.

name: Death Wish
summary: Embark on an adventure as a villain who just wants to follow the script ... Die in the end for the Hero of History. Use your telekinetic powers to control elements of the scenario and defeat unworthy enemies. Do you think you can do it?

name: Degenerate Souls
summary: It's a tactical shooting survival game,

name: Detective From the Crypt
summary: Jane wakes up in a crypt as a ghost. You are investigating the death of her family together. Seeking and researching evidences. Building an accusation based on them. You have a laboratory to research evidences. Play and get the feeling of being a true Victorian detective.

name: Deadluck
summary: It is a colorful and fast war game where you shoot the enemy spaceships coming on you with your plane.

name: Dead Era
summary: A Top-Down Zombie Action RPG

name: Destiny's Divide
summary: Free PvP Fantasy Card Game that assigns real world value to in-game cards. But are you good enough to unlock them? Become a grand master of war strategy by dominating the ancient battles of Destiny's Divide. Conquer competitive game modes and receive one of a kind unique cards you can trade or sell.

name: Death Box
summary: Death Box is a labyrinth horror game where the goal is to escape the death box and manage to survive. You have to find the exit of a huge maze of secret rooms and doors without getting caught by zombies and traps. There are 2 types of enemies: fast and slow zombies.

name: Delivery Simulator
summary: This is a game that simulates delivery. The player is a rider, and the job is to deliver the delivery from the merchant to the customer.

name: Deadbait
summary: Deadbait is a VR Horror multiplayer (3vs1) game where one Player becomes a terrifying Murderer/MISV Subject, and 3 Players are Survivors/MISV Agents who need to play as a team to escape or overcome the gruesome Nightmare.

name: Delta Light
summary: Delta Light is a retro Arcade strategy/puzzle game where you draw lines to remove parts of the field while enemies try to stop you. Combine your speed and insight to out maneuver and puzzle your way around the enemies to complete the many levels! Pick it up and have a go!

name: Devil, It's me
summary: Devil, It’s me is a game where you can build your own castle to defend against the waves of heroes set forth to defeat Magrandes.

name: Deskmate Girl
summary: Can you become a perfect boyfriend and let your girlfriend open her heart to you?

name: Deathtrap Dungeon: The Golden Room
summary: Deathtrap Dungeon: The Golden Room is an interactive movie based on Ian Livingstone's multi-million selling classic gamebook. Starring Georgia Hirst (Five Dates, Vikings) and Marcus Fraser (Transformers: The Last Knight)

name: Devil, It's Me
summary: Devil, It’s Me is a game where you can build your own castle to defend against the waves of heroes set forth to defeat Magrandes. You play from the perspective of Magrandes to manage your castle. Fend off the endless hordes of heroes, overcome the odds and uncover the truth!

name: Detective Nakamura: The Azure Case
summary:
Detective Nakamura: The Azure Case is a visual novel focused on the investigation and dialogue. You play as detective Nakamura and you will explore the streets of Saitama and Tokyo to discover the true identity of a serial killer who always leaves a cut with the form of an X under the wrist of their victims.

Action, mistery and jazz in a melancholy 80's Japan dyed of blue, inspired by the likes of Hotel Dusk: Room 215 and Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney.

name: Descend into Madness
summary: Offline dark fantasy turn-based strategy game. Brave the depths to encounter many different monsters and earn rewards. Upgrade and customize a small party to progress further against the increasing difficulty.

name: Descent: Legends of the Dark
summary: To play the Descent: Legends of the Dark board game, one player must download the free Descent: Legends of the Dark app on a compatible device. This companion app determines the setup of each quest, tracks your party’s inventory, skills, progress, and resolves combat while telling a narrative story.

name: Destined to Love: Ikemen Samurai Romances
summary: You, the heroine, finds yourself snatched from your snatched from your peaceful modern life suddendly and thrown into a different time (Along with your best friend, Kyo). Caught in the center of a revolution in Japan, which side will you choose? Even momentarily, whose arms will you find sanctuary in? Your romance awaits you in the past. Do you believe in destiny?

name: Dead Grid
summary: Dead Grid is a single player game with tactical card combat, level-based progression and loot set in a post-apocalyptic dynamically scaling world. Manage a squad of elite mercenaries, discover and upgrade hundreds of cards ranging from weapons to consumable items.

name: Desert attack
summary: It's a first-person shooter, and you're in a military base full of enemies,Players are free to explore the surrounding area,Players can kill enemies or evade enemy attacks,Survive as long as possible.

name: Dead TD
summary: Dead TD is a tower defense game that was inspired by the old school original maps from WC3. It features a wide range of towers that upgrade into more powerful types and features a range of different abilities that can be used to create the ultimate defense.

name: Death Tale Pandora's Box
summary: In this action roguelike you will found a almost infinite arnesal of randomly procedural genereted weapons, with giant bosses, bullets and death, you are in the pandoras box its your choice what will you do peace or chaos?

name: Defence Your Organism
summary: Defence Your Organism is a game in the Tower Defence genre, where the player is fighting back from the enemies in the form of microbes, each of which is unique in their behavior, puts the fighting vehicles to fight back from them.

name: Destroyer: The U-Boat Hunter
summary: Destroyer: the U-Boat Hunter is an interactive war thriller which seamlessly blends tactical WW2 anti-submarine warfare simulation with a gripping storyline. Take command of a meticulously reconstructed Fletcher-class destroyer and lead your crew against nazi U-boats in the Battle of the Atlantic!

name: Dead Ink
summary: Dead Ink is a souls-like game with a 3D printing twist, set at dizzying height atop a perilous vertical world. Discover printers and use harvested ink from your enemies to print weapons, inventory items and your corporeal form.

name: Demon's Residence
summary: You've been called in to value the residence before it gets put in sale. Explore & Unsolve the mysteries of the Residence while being watched from many angles. Sometimes it's better to stay quiet..

name: Defense Grid: The Awakening - Resurgence Map Pack 2
summary: New Maps, New Strategies, New Experiences, and New Achievements From the Creators of Defense Grid Defense Grid: Resurgence Map Pack 2 Risk Exposure and Roundabout - Don’t miss out on the next two maps in the Resurgence series. Risk Exposure will allow you to discover your ability to defend two independent power core housings!

name: Defense Grid: The Awakening - Resurgence Map Pack 1
summary: New Maps, New Strategies, New Experiences, and New Achievements From the Creators of Defense Grid Defense Grid: Resurgence Map Pack 1 Service Interruption and Height of Confusion - Two new challenging Defense Grid environments are the first two released in the Resurgence DLC.

name: Defense Grid: The Awakening - Resurgence Map Pack 4
summary: New Maps, New Strategies, New Experiences, and New Achievements From the Creators of Defense Grid Defense Grid: Resurgence Map Pack 4 Kill Zone and Overflow - The final installment of the Resurgence series includes two more environments sure to challenge your tactical planning.

name: Defense Grid: The Awakening - Containment
summary: Defense Grid: Containment is the all-new expansion to the award-winning tower defense game: Defense Grid: The Awakening. Built from a successful Kickstarter campaign with thousands of backers, Defense Grid: Containment provides players with many hours of new content including 8 new maps, a new story, two new characters (voiced by...

name: Defense Grid: The Awakening - You Monster DLC
summary: In this first full-story expansion to the award-winning Defense Grid, GLaDOS, the menacing AI from Valve’s awesome Portal franchise, guest stars and shakes up the Defense Grid world.

name: Death's Door: Deluxe Edition
summary: Death's Door: Digital Deluxe Edition is a special digital edition of the base game. It includes the full game along with additional digital extras such as a digital artbook and the original soundtrack.

name: Dead by Daylight: Ultimate Edition
summary: The Ultimate Edition gives you access to the base game of Dead by Daylight as well as 34 original Killers and Survivors from previously released chapters.

name: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
The year is now 2029, and the golden era of augmentations is over. Mechanically augmented humans have been deemed outcasts and segregated from the rest of society. Crime and acts of terror serve as a thin veil to cover up an overarching conspiracy aimed at controlling the future of mankind…

This edition includes the game itself, along with all of the items listed below:
- Season Pass
- Extra in-game Mission
- Covert Agent Pack

name: Dead by Daylight: Stranger Things Edition
summary:
The Stranger Things Edition of Dead by Daylight includes all the content of the Special Edition, three original chapters (Curtain Call, Shattered Bloodline, Darkness Among Us), and the Stranger Things chapter. This edition gives you access to a roster of 11 Killers and 14 Survivors.

This edition of the game was delisted on November 17th 2021, along with the related DLC. The DLC's map, The Underground Complex, was removed from the game and additional costumes related to Stranger Things were removed from the in-game store.

name: Dead-End Detective: The Sixpence Strangler
summary: Become a detective in this comedic/thrilling visual novel set in the 1950s as you try to track down a serial strangler that stalks the streets of London.

name: Deadly Fight
summary: Deadly Fight is unique fighting game that take you back to arcade style 90's game but with modern graphics.

name: Dear Mom: My Letter to You
summary: Follow the emotional story of Ayame Kawasaki, who disappears from the public eye following her mother's suicide. One year later, she's ready to start her life again. Build and develop meaningful connections with those you cherish in this slice-of-life/social simulation game.

name: Detective Tycoon
summary: Travel 70 years back in time to the days of noir detectives and lead your own 1-bit detective agency! Solve the most difficult cases. Hire new detectives. Expand your office.

name: Detonation Racing
summary: Drive a selection of wonderful cars you really don't deserve and blow up your enemies on our extremely safe exploding racetracks. Customise your car to make sure it looks as good as possible after it's been completely destroyed! Please note: Racetracks are not extremely safe.

name: Destiny 2: Beyond Light - Season of the Lost
summary: In Season of the Lost, players will blur the line between technology and magic to find Mara Sov's lost Awoken as they search for answers.

name: Destiny 2: The Witch Queen - Deluxe Edition
summary: Destiny 2: The Witch Queen - Deluxe Edition is an expansion for Destiny 2, a first-person shooter game. The Deluxe Edition includes Seasons 16-19, two Year-5 Dungeons, an Exotic SMG, catalyst, ornament, and an Exotic Sparrow.

name: Destiny 2: The Witch Queen - Collector’s Edition
summary: Destiny 2: The Witch Queen - Collector’s Edition is an expansion for Destiny 2, a first-person shooter game. The Collector's Edition includes The Witch Queen Deluxe + Bungie 30th Anniversary Bundle game code, digital preorder pack, Destiny 2: The Witch Queen digital soundtrack, The Psychometer Replica with lights and sounds, Lucent Hive Ghost Replica with stand, The Hidden ID Badge, Lenticular Reveal Card, The Hidden Dossier, plus exclusive Collector's Edition emblems.

name: Dekaron M
summary: Dekaron M is a mobile MMORPG adaptation of Ubifun Studio’s classic title Dekaron Online. Originally for the PC, the Dekaron IP (Intellectual Property Rights) is known for its brutal action gameplay and dark fantasy worldview.

name: Deep Night Detective
summary:
Deep Night Detective - Hurry & Solve The Mystery Before Someone Else Goes Missing

Deep Night Detective is a horror noir mystery metroidvania game where you must solve a spooky mystery.

name: Deep Madness

name: Decent Into Sector 32
summary: Descent into Sector 32 is a 3rd persons flying mystery game. You are dispatched on a search and rescue mission to Sector 32, a giant asteroid field with many mysteries. Make the right choices or your squadron might need rescuing yourself, and the truth is, nobody is going to come for you.

name: Destiny 2: Legendary Edition
summary: Experience Destiny 2 and all of its expansions with Destiny 2: Legendary Edition. This edition includes the Forsaken, Shadowkeep, and Beyond Light expansions, plus access to the current season content.

The Deluxe Edition includes the full game plus additional content.

Please check your previous purchases to avoid duplication.

summary: The Delve is an adventure for 2-4 heroes in which you must explore and survive the realm of the Caretaker. Collect loot and gain skills as you advance through a collection of randomly selected stages. As you expand your Descent 2nd Edition collection, you unlock new maps, monsters, and boss fights.

name: Destiny 2: The Witch Queen Deluxe + Bungie 30th Anniversary Bundle
summary:
Delve into Savathûn’s Throne World to uncover the mystery of how she stole the Light.

The Deluxe Edition includes Seasons 16-19, two Year-5 Dungeons, an Exotic SMG, catalyst, ornament, and an Exotic Sparrow.

The 30th Anniversary Pack includes a new Dungeon, Gjallarhorn Exotic Rocket Launcher, new weapons, armor, and much more.

name: Devil's Gold
summary: Jeremy have signed contract with the devil. For whatever reason it might be, now he gotta pay the price. And we all know how expensive a devil loan's interest can be.

name: Destiny 2: Bungie 30th Anniversary Pack
summary: The 30th Anniversary Pack includes a new Dungeon, Gjallarhorn Exotic Rocket Launcher, new weapons, armor, and much more.

name: DeadLock
summary: In DeadLock, the player must connect the processor and the resources it needs in the appropriate order to prevent 'DeadLock' from occurring. More and more targets need to be scheduled, and new kinds of resources emerge. It's up to the player to efficiently schedule without generating 'Deadlock'.

name: Deliver us the Moon: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Deliver Us the Moon is a sci-fi adventure game developed by KeokeN Interactive and released in 2019. Set in a near future where Earth's resources are nearly depleted, the game follows a lone astronaut on a mission to the Moon to restore energy to the planet. Players explore abandoned lunar bases and use tools to solve environmental puzzles while uncovering the fate of the people who once lived there. The game combines narrative-driven exploration with light puzzle-solving elements and offers a mix of first-person and third-person perspectives.

Deliver Us the Moon: Digital Deluxe is a special edition of Deliver Us the Moon. It includes the base game along with additional content, such as a digital artbook and the official soundtrack.

name: Devicereign
summary:
Devicereign is a mix between a first person perspective adventure game and a third person perspective tactical RPG in the battle parts. The game was released for Playstation and Saturn.

Kumono Seishiro Hiigari and Toya are students who spend their time during drying. Nothing unusual so far, except that their girlfriend Kasumi, daughter of a scholar of German origin who died in unclear circumstances, has a power that she is not aware and that will lead her and her two companions, supernatural in a struggle against an international firm called Dice. But what kind of research (on behalf of that company) was therefore his deceased father?

This game features mostly dark and disturbing themes and has a rather unusual soundtrack, consisting of metal and trance tracks in contrast to calm piano music. It stars a girl with messy hair named Inahoozuki and a silver haired child named Ginmokusei.

Like most traditional fangames, the objective is to explore dream worlds and collect effects. There are six endings to find, three for each character.

Those who have the death seals are suddenly called to a certain villa. The protagonist is one of them, and is greeted by a beautiful talking doll that welcomes him to “Kujou Mansion.” The doll warns him that he will die if he doesn’t manage to do something about it.

Jakob is a hacker for Sector H, a new branch of Black Sun, a crypto-anarchistic organisation that looks after its own.

Funded by mysterious benefactors, Jakob and the rest of Sector H break open ractives to ensure that everyone can play them. It's a dog-eat-dog political minefield that Jakob wants no part of.

All Jakob wants to do is play ractives, watch the new Ripsaw Bloodgore concert, and have fun. He has no place in this war - but fate conspire against him, dragging him into the very core of this matter. He will never forget the day

DEATH WORE ENDLESS FEATHERS.

name: Derelict
summary:
Derelict is a first person shooter and a tactical action game inspired by Space Hulk: Vengeance of the Blood Angels. The player controls a group of 5 space marines in two ways: directly in first person view (with the keyboard and mouse) or by giving them orders via map view (primarily with the mouse). Each marine has its own skills and abilities:
Communications: the communications specialist can see enemies in the map screen.
Heavy Assault: carries a belt fed Gatlin Cannon which doesn't need to be reloaded.
Demolition: the demolition expert carries a modified rifle with a grenade launcher attached, which power can rip apart obstacles and temporarily disrupt teleportation systems.
Engineer: carries automated tools to repair doors and can hack security system faster than the other marines.
Medic: can heal the other team members and has a hazard suit which allows him to walk through dangerous areas.
The player can switch among the marines any time by pressing the proper hot keys or using the mouse wheel. While controlling a marine, the others will be AI controlled.

The game has a total of 20 levels and five difficulty ranks, from private to general, and the harder the rank, the more frequently enemies respawn, the quicker they move and the slower the medic heals.

Solve the mystery of seven inhabitants of the Church. Try the Ultimate Challenge with great classical music. It is made by one person!

name: Death Blade
summary:
Your name is Corwin Ironfist. You are part of the city guard, trapped in an underground complex of a city in grave danger. Due to a mishap very early in the morning, you have no sword and no armor. You have reason to believe that whatever is plaguing the city, is located in this complex. You take a deep breath and move forward, to whatever awaits.

Death Blade is a role playing game designed for the Macintosh. It's interface has been designed to be easy to use and quick to access. This is especially important since combat is real-time (well sorta).

Death Blade is not overly complex as some roleplaying games are. It has been designed to allow even younger adventurers to take part in the quest. While the interface is simple enough for younger users, the graphics and game play should be a challenge for experienced players as well.

There are sixteen levels to Death Blade. Each level poses a different problem that you have to solve. Some levels require a strong sword, while others require a systematic mind.

Research with the game and see if you can discover ways of being more effective. For example, the creatures always attack immediately following their movement phase. It is impossible for you to land an attack before a creature when the creature has just moved forward. However, if you time your movements, you can move forward and attack him before he can advance. It takes practice.

Good luck.

name: Defender of the Crown: Digitally Remastered Edition

This edition is the first release of Defender of the Crown for Windows / Macintosh and it is a remake of the original game. This digitally remastered edition features enhanced graphics and sound, and additional material.

Years later, an original version of the game with original graphics and sounds was also released for Windows, which makes this a remake and a separate game to the regular port of the original MS-DOS version to Windows.

Players with no save data will be able to start right at Chapter 2. “As long as you generally remember what happened story-wise, you’ll be fine,” the developers said in an FAQ.

In this game, players take on the role of Crypto, navigating through diverse global locations such as England, Russia, and the United States. The objective is to complete various missions and overcome human adversaries. The gameplay incorporates a range of weapons and abilities, allowing players to defeat enemies by employing tactics such as mind-controlling humans and utilizing advanced alien technology.

name: Dead by Daylight: 5th Anniversary Edition
summary:
Dead by Daylight is an asymmetrical multiplayer (4vs1) horror game where one player takes on the role of the savage Killer, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to escape the Killer and avoid being caught and killed.

The Dead by Daylight: 5th Anniversary Edition includes:

- The Last Breath Chapter
- A Lullaby for the Dark Chapter
- Of Flesh and Mud Chapter
- Spark of Madness Chapter

Additional Contents
- Biohazard Chapter
- Shattered Bloodline Chapter
- Curtain Call Chapter

name: Death Crown: Era of Human
summary: Learn the King’s story, clear the primitive lands of evil and unite humanity in a new campaign of the Death Crown.

name: Deity Quest: Extended
summary: The extended edition adds many interesting features on top of the base game, most notably an epilogue to the story and the ability to design custom follower types.

name: Destroy Geometric Shapes
summary: Imagine yourself throwing balls to destroy geometric shapes like cubes, triangles, lozenges and hexagons. The big problem is, you need to find the perfect trajectory of the balls for them destroy everything at once. But you are persistent and this is your challenge from now on, can you do it?

name: DemonCrawl: Arena Plus
summary: Upgrade your DemonCrawl Arena experience with a permanent AP boost, extra mastery and homeland slots, emotes, and customizable sign messages!

name: Detective Notes: Lighthouse Mystery Solitaire
summary: Solve a baffling case! Experience the story together with the characters!

name: De-Exit: Eternal Matters
summary: Embark onto a surrealistic afterlife journey to discover the secrets of the broken and mysterious Plane of Memory in this atmospheric light puzzle-platformer with a hint of stealth. Explore a warm voxel world with an intense cinematic approach. Dive into this deep reflexive experience, meet its inhabitants and save the day!

name: Deep Despair 2
summary: Deep Despair 2 is an open world survival adventure action game with procedural generation and complete freedom of action: building, crafting, hunting, farming, livestock, brewing, cooking, traveling, fight, and more.

name: Detective AI
summary: Become a detective and confront an assassin controlled by an artificial intelligence that evolves with each case you investigate.

name: Detective Gman
summary: Detective simulation. Top down open world exploration.

name: Demolition Game
summary: This is a simple game

name: Defect Process
summary: Hack n' slash through increasingly dangerous arenas with a high action free-form combat system

name: Decide 4 God
summary: Six of them wanted out. Six of them wanted in. Now, all twelve of them are trapped in a prison where a fate worse than death awaits them. Can they survive the wiles of Empathy Systems? What dark secrets lurk behind that institution? It is for the future when none may tread.

name: Dear Agony Aunt
summary: Congratulations! You're on your way to becoming a professional agony aunt! All you have to do now is get through the trial period. Respond to messages using a retro 2006 email client. The replies you send will determine whether you are hired or fired at the end of the week. Good luck!

name: Deluge: Threnody of Crashing Waves
summary: In the not so distant past, the Isle of Abbot underwent a mysterious evacuation event. Delve into the secrets of this unsettling place and elicit the girls' tragic fate. An interactive visual novel with psychological and lovecraftian undertones.

name: Defend the Fort
summary: 2D topdown zombie survival shooter, build defences, survive the waves of zombies

name: Delicious Fruitworld
summary: Delicious Fruitworld is a classic jump 'n' run platformer where the goal is to complete each level with as many points as possible.Points are awarded for fruits distributed in the world and for a good time in which the level was passed. Share your score!

name: Demon's Sword Snakes: Sweet Dreams of the Cursed Snake
summary: This is a simple fantasy RPG game where you go on a journey with a few girls to break the curse of succubus.

name: Deep Space Salvage Crew VR
summary: A first-person procedural VR roguelike shooter, set in deep space. Find old wrecks adrift in space, board them and fight your way to the bridge to claim the salvage rights.

name: Death off the Cuff: Remastered
summary: No criminal has ever been a match for you, and everybody is looking forward to a description of your brilliant deductions. There is just one small problem. One tiny detail that makes it different this time. A mere trifle, really. This time you have no idea who did it.

name: Depthqvr Aqua
summary: DepthQVR_AQUA is a fun, engaging, immersive ride & casual gaming experience. Also configurable for out-of-home PC Café, Entertainment Attractions, Brand Experiences, and Educational Attractions.

name: Detective Mimo
summary: Detective Mimo contains many puzzles that need you to think outside the box and explore solutions beyond your mobile screen. When you find those solutions, you will experience incredibly satisfying “Aha!” moments. It tells a story that breaks the “fourth wall”. As you play Detective Mimo, you will find yourself not only a player, but also part of a larger story. You also need to find clues in the real world.

name: Death Lap
summary:
Death Lap is a VR combat racing game that challenges you to drive to survive. Just point and shoot to destroy everything in your path. Hit the road, perform drifts and stunts, navigate traps, unleash your weapons and special abilities, and enjoy the chaos of its battlefields.

A darkly comic, combat racing game that will leave you howling with laughter as you put your life on the line. Captured by Nitro Saint Payne — a maniacal yet tragic man, you are thrown into his deadly TV show where you must race and battle other drivers to win your freedom.

name: Deiland
summary:
Live the adventures of Prince Arco on the smallest of all planets, Deiland.
"At the beginning, when the universe was young, four princes were sent to the minor planets. Their mission was to find the mysterious crystal that existed inside each planet. When the Crystal was found, it would wake up the ancient powers of magic, which would extend to every place in the universe, giving rise the origin of the worlds.
This is the story of Arco, the youngest of the princes who inhabited the smallest of the minor planets: Deiland, the Tiny."
Deiland is a completely offline game, where we control the prince Arco to develop his daily life on a very small planet.
CREATE A HOME We start from scratch, on an empty little planet but full of surprises. The first step is to create the tools, which you work with: a hoe to till the fields, an axe for get firewood, a hammer to build, etc. Soon we discover the pleasures of life in Deiland: collect fruits, get the first harvest or watch a meteor fall.

MAKE OBJECTS Little by little we will be bringing a lot of objects and materials that can be combined into the workshop to get new tools, materials derivatives (such as fabric, glass bottles or forged metal), dishes or even magic potions. Our home will be transformed from a tent to a big house, capable of forging, kitchen and laboratory. How many objects will we be able to create?
TRADE WITH YOUR PRODUCTS As we develop the planet, it will be more attractive for merchants, who will come to us for materials to buy or sell. Meet Brram, the chef who creates dishes of high stellar cuisine; Mun, a brave hunter of bugs and the sorcerer Lock, a very nice old man obsessed with potions and spells.
DISCOVER THE MAGIC AND DEFEAT YOUR ENEMIES But all is not peaceful in Deiland. Often, enemies appear to steal your booty. You'll fight limos, giant spiders, bats, poisonous flowers, and even giant trolls. Learn magic spells to defeat them and, with the power of Cristal, keep safe the planet Deiland.
ENJOY NATURE Life on the planet Deiland is wonderful. You will be in direct contact with nature: - Develop beautiful forests of oaks, pines and wild shrubs. - Enjoy the rainwater, which is a treasure that must be used well. - Contemplate the passage of time, with morning, sunsets and nights in the space. - Get good time to go fishing in the lake. You can catch large fish for your dishes and recipes.
Deiland is a great adventure game in which we should take decisions and develop the magic ecosystem of a tiny planet.

name: Devil May Cry: Peak of Combat
summary: Devil May Cry: Peak of Combat is a mobile action RPG spin-off of the Devil May Cry series.

name: Deep Insanity Asylum
summary: Set in the near future where humans have to struggle against a sleeping sickness called the Randolph Syndrome. The RPG comes as part of the company’s Deep Insanity Project, which includes an anime titled Deep Insanity THE LOST CHILD and an ongoing manga series.

name: Deep Deep Dungeon
summary:
Deep Deep Dungeon is a casual dungeon crawl with a style.
You are a funky warrior of choice, in a funky deep dungeon. And you fight with expert timing!
The game will be so addictive that you can try to check out anytime you like, but you can never leave!
Step into a randomly generated dungeon, filled with monsters and gold!

name: Defend the Cake Tower Defense
summary: From a team of Blizzard & Riot alumni comes the most delicious tower defense game! Help Eggperor Shellemane and the Eggbirds keep their cakes safe from an onslaught of persistent insects. The game begins when you place your tasty cake castle on the map. Choose carefully, there are armies of ants on their way to steal a slice! After that, it’s time to plan your strategy. Build your maze to outsmart the mischievous ants and protect your prized cake. Use watermelon slingshots and frosting guns to thwart the onslaught of bees, rocket snails, and ants on scooters!

name: Detective Deep
summary:
Detective Deep is a challenging slow paced underwater adventure filled with hidden objects. In this methodical game, you’re a top tier secret detective in a submarine with a mighty beam of light in the deep dark ocean. You’re there to shed some light on different cases by retrieving three unique pieces of evidence per case. Finish the case to receive 1 star and unlock the next case or challenge yourself to finish under 4 minutes for 2 stars or under 2 minutes for 3 stars!
You can also try to memorize the location of the evidence and replay a level to obtain the items quicker to gain more stars if you haven't received the max of 3.

name: Demolition Master 3D HD
summary:
With Demolition Master 3D you will fill like the real bomb expert capable of tackling even the most complicated tasks. Travel to various countries and continents, take part in ambitious construction projects and demolish, demolish, demolish!
Demolition Master 3D is a sequel of popular game Demolition Master that already has hundreds of thousands fans worldwide.

name: Demon Runner: The Forsaken
summary: Demon Runner: The Forsaken is a 2D side scrolling, platformer, metroidvania style game. It features 30 levels, 5 different difficulty settings, and 2 different endings. This game will challenge even some of the best speed runners and is a must have for those who seek a challenging game.

name: Desert Magic Adventures
summary: Play as a brave battle mage who passes through the desert catacombs and searches for his way to freedom. Break through the crowds of dangerous enemies and improve your magic skills.

name: Devil Tears
summary: Devil Tears is a 2D platformer in which the player jumps over the cells, heading for the exit, blocks fall from above that can crush him, spikes are placed on the levels. You must overcome all levels using your reaction and logical thinking.

name: Depths of Betrayal
summary: Stop a mechanical monster before it destroys an entire town in Depths of Betrayal! Uncover the truth and stop the terrifying machine in this incredible Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game. Protect the people of the town and figure out why the machine turned its back on its creator and went berserk. Search amazing locations and find important clues to solve the mystery and save the town in Depths of Betrayal!

name: Destroyer
summary: Destroyer is Konami's second video game. Like their first game, Block Yard, and its sequel, Super Destroyer, it is a Breakout clone.

name: Densetsu no Starfy
summary: Densetsu no Starfy for the Game Boy, and later for the Game Boy Color was a tentative Starfy title which was eventually canceled, though it was eventually released in the form of Densetsu no Starfy for the Game Boy Advance on September 6, 2002. Any initial plans of releasing Densetsu no Starfy for the Game Boy Color were abandoned in anticipation of the release of the Game Boy Advance.

name: Despot's Game: Dystopian Army Builder
summary: Despot’s Game is rogue-like tactics with turbo-charged battles. Build a team and sacrifice the heck out of them to rush through enemies... and other players!

name: Deep Rift 9
summary: Multiplayer strategy gaming on the alien world of Deep Rift 9

name: Death Stare
summary: A FPS without weapons where you defeat your ennemies with the raw power of your eyes!

name: Deep Cut
summary: An arcade-style gauntlet where you slash your way through hoards of enemy zombies.

name: Deep Space Airships
summary: Multiplayer ship construction and combat.

name: Dead Blood
summary: A dark adventure game about intervention

name: DeadEye
summary: Wild West Multiplayer Survival

name: Deep Dweller
summary: long way from home

name: Dead Men Tell No Tales
summary: The last pirate standing wins

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Become the blade that destroys demons!

In solo play mode, walk the path of Tanjiro Kamado and experience the story depicted in the anime ""Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba"" as Tanjiro fights to restore his sister Nezuko's humanity and battle the demon threat!

Play Versus mode, which allows up to 2 players to battle in offline or online 2v2 battles with any combination of characters! With simple controls and exhilarating gameplay, rise up to become the strongest of the Demon Slayers!

name: Delicious Letters
summary: Keep the flame alive by sending the right love letters to your jealous and demanding lovers

name: Definitely Real Football
summary: The Beautiful Game

name: Dead Event
summary: Dead Event is a multiplayer open world class based survival game in which the player grows up as a creature. The creature will get bigger overtime and grow with interactions in-game and lose some growth on death. Become part of a player-created ecosystem. Objective is to survive, eat or be eaten..

name: Defense Grid Gold
summary: Defense Grid Gold is a special compilation of the highly acclaimed tower defense game, Defense Grid: The Awakening, and extra packs Borderlands and Resurgence.

name: Delicious: Emily's Childhood Memories
summary: Join Emily and her loved ones on an emotional stroll down memory lane!

name: Deep Madness
summary: Deep Madness is a casual game where your task is to jump as deep as possible. Will you become the best player in the leaderboard?

name: Delicious 2
summary: Bring along a recipe for success, because someone needs to turn around Emily's family's restaurant!

name: Deepdive
summary: A short procedurally generated diving roguelike about going ever deeper into the ocean

name: Deliver At All Costs
summary: Deliver At All Costs is a thrilling action game where destruction, absurdity and intrigue collide! Step into the shoes of Winston Green — a down-on-his-luck courier with a fiery temper and a mysterious past — as he delivers highly unconventional cargo, leaving a trail of havoc and chaos behind him.

name: Death Metro
summary: A grim side scrolling rogue lite about sacrifice

name: Deadbeats Encore
summary:
Here's a hololive fangame, inspired by Calliope Mori and the Deadbeats.

Play through her songs while trying not to die, y'know, again.

name: Dental Recviem
summary: Lurum Dare 47 Game | Stuck In A DENTAL LOOP !

name: Deadlocked
summary: Deadlocked is a old school fps set in a futuristic environment where zombies in astronaut costumes roam around (zombinauts?) some of them on fire!

name: Decline's Drops
summary: Grab your punching gloves, put your clogs on and smash your way in the world of Decline's Drops, a fully hand-drawn platform-brawler full of weird frogs, bizarre chickens and odd hydras! Avenge your destroyed garden and defeat the 6 heads of the Eternal Corp.! If you can, that is.

name: Delphine's Discovery
summary: Venture into an abandoned orphanage, solve a mystery, and fall in love.

name: Desktop Garden
summary: Windows-based gardening

name: Dear Genny
summary: I have something to tell you...

name: Descend
summary: Descend is a faithful depiction of SCP-087.

name: Dead sticks
summary: Minimalistic physics cleaning

name: Demon's Nightmare: Ar Ek-Qua Er Seta
summary: A game with no focus, only dreams and ideas. A mashup of pre-existing visual assets, new musical work, and nearly anything I want to prototype and play with. The lack of theme is the strongest theme of all. A lightly and abstractly story-driven single player STG-platformer hybrid focusing on weird scoring systems, inconsistent and cryptic rules for those scoring systems, and difficulty that will only push you as hard as you push it - except the boss encounters. They always push, and if you don't put in the effort leading up to them, you won't get far.

name: Density Experiment
summary: Rotate your way through a labyrinth, solving puzzles & avoiding traps! Find three treasures & escape!

name: DeliveryGuy
summary: A simple game that kinda sorta simulates a delivery guy's life

name: Deep Dungeon
summary: A roguelike for the Gameboy, built in GB Studio. GBCOMPO21 Entry.

name: Delunky: Endless Descent
summary: Enter the caves and try to find as much gold as you can before you perish to the dangers of the depth. Use your trusty whip in combination with bombs, ropes, and whatever you scavenge to get as far as you can.

name: Devil Express
summary:
A narrative-focused 2D adventure game set in an unreal world of monsters, managers, and magic most foul.

A mysterious new delivery app, Devil Express, has sent Worf to an apartment block that should not exist. With a can-do mindset it’s up to Worf to uncover the secrets of this cursed building and maybe make a few friends along the way.

name: Devil Express: Soulstice
summary: festive fan service.

name: Deep
summary: DEEP is a classic style FPS game heavily inspired by works such as DOOM, Quake, Dusk and the original Half Life. The game takes place in the not-so-distant future at a top-secret military research base, deep in the Atlantic Ocean. After Lovecraftian horrors are unleashed, you're the only one capable of cleaning up the mess.

name: Deep Root
summary: Protect an alien tree as it grows a sun for a planet.

name: Deluge
summary: DELUGE (by riggy2k3) is the story of a village under siege. As the village of Figaro begins a dangerous tradition, an evil entity arrives to mark their own momentous occasion. When one of their minions goes rogue, he finds himself the key to Figaro's survival. Will you protect the people of Figaro, or join in on the chaos?

name: Deathmaze 5000
summary: This is a first-person view adventure game that takes place in a five story building, each floor with numerous rooms. You start off in the top floor and your only goal is to get out alive.

name: Dead Dating
summary:
A romantic summer date party gone wild! A sweet party becomes a murder scene...
you have to find a way to survive in an isolated mansion on an isolated island with ten guys! Can you rescue your lover and catch the killer?

name: Demon Doif
summary: The demon Doif requires your assistance minion. He is hungry. Find the items he wants from amongst the pile. Do not get them wrong. Feed Doif the correct items! If a particular item isn't available, stun him and pull the lever to give him memory loss and request a new item!

name: Deathverse: Let It Die
summary: Players take the stage in the world’s most popular survival reality TV show, set hundreds of years after the events of Let it Die. Armed with a robotic combat tool equipped with many deadly features, each player can use a variety of weapons, protective shields, and skills to create a character who can outlive the competition. They’ll also have to fend off monsters and assassins to stay alive in this gloriously gory arena.

name: Devotionalia
summary:
The high priest of an obscure cult is preparing a ritual. Don the priest’s sacred mantle, for these holy labors are yours to direct. You may carve a votive, lead a prayer, or make a sacrifice — but you must see to the task with care. Unearthly eyes gaze down upon you from the sea above. Will your devotion reach them?

Does it matter?

name: Deliver Us From Evil
summary: Romance supernatural bachelors and investigate humanity’s dark wishes!

name: Defaction
summary: A narrative game about societal expectations and (not) fitting in

name: Delusion Gallery
summary: A key... A wish... A horrible nightmare.

name: Death Star Prison Break
summary: The Falcon's not coming. Time for Leia to bust herself out of the Death Star. A gameboy-style FPS.

name: Ded Guy
summary: You are dead.

name: Descension
summary: Procedurally-generated FPS inspired by Quake.

name: Deficit
summary: An Interactive Semi-Fictional Experiential ADHD Story

name: Deflector
summary: The table tennis balls are mad! Get out!

name: Death of the Diseased
summary:
Fight trough tons of zombies in different maps, upgrading your statistics with the aquisition of Exploration Tokens and Upgrades. Try to get a great score, getting points by getting kills.
Play solo or with a friend in local multiplayer!

name: Dead Sector
summary: Dead Sector is an immersive souls-like where you fight against mysterious creatures and use their life energy to charge your own equipment. Try out the Demo and find out why the sector lost contact with the surface.

name: Developer Showdown
summary: See Popular Game Developer Kill Each Other!!!

name: DeRailed
summary: Addictively hard train jumping platformer.

name: Defenders of the Atlantic
summary: Strategy minigame - Hunt for the Bismarck

name: Deep Inside
summary: Nobody talks about the fire incident at Estmour mansion. As the new servant, you're bound to keep silence... will you?

name: Death Alley
summary: Bowl for your life

name: Dead Function
summary:
Gonner Hills Cemetery has been overrun with evil spirits, zombies and the weird locals! The only hope for ridding the cemetery of this spooky threat is some random kid with psychic powers!

Join Lil Brick as he clobbers ghouls, helps out the locals, and comes face-to-face with the forces behind the mayhem!

name: Detective Corgi and the Mysterious Mansion
summary: a spooky twine of unprecedented spooks

name: Dearest You
summary: You've received an unexpected love letter!

name: Death Slayer V
summary: A virus has escaped a secret lab ran by the Eibmoz Corporation. Everyone is infected... including yourself. You have minutes before you die from the fast acting virus and turn into a "Zombie". There may be a way to stay alive... but it wont be easy!

name: Detective Time
summary:
Detective Time is a game in the genre of "short interactive cinema".

The story takes place in an American town. A detective named Randy arrived at the crime scene, where the fishermen found the body of an unknown man in the lake. You need to look for clues, interview witnesses, interrogate suspects, break door locks and safes to figure out who the murderer is. The game has 4 different endings and the outcome will depend on your correct choice.

name: Deer Survivors
summary: Build a herd of deer to explore and discover with

name: Deck RX
summary: DeckRX is a deckbuilding racing game. Race and card-battle your way for immortality as you unlock new cards, cars, pilots, and hand-crafted race tracks on different planets. Design your racing strategy, build up your deck, combo your cards, and survive to the finish line!

name: Deviant
summary: A reverse-horror game made for Ludum Dare

name: DeFacto
summary: Build a big automated factory on an isolated asteroid, sell your products and send rockets into space.

name: Descent
summary: Struggle to the depths of the underground city while unravelling its transcendental mysteries..

name: Destructivator SE
summary: The year is 2145. Earth still burns. Zallagor and his army have been vanquished, but at great cost: the once great cities of Earth lie in ruin, its population hungry for revenge. Zallagor’s home planet of Zerkl has been located. Zallagor has gone, but somebody will rise to replace him. Maybe they already have. The Destructivator is ready – it is time to strike! Take on the role of a tiny super-solider decked out in lime green spandex! Blast and melee your way through hordes of alien soldiers, robots, spaceships, traps, bosses – and more! Fight on foot or commandeer an enemy ship to take out Zerkl’s defenses and ensure that the alien menace won't threaten Earth ever again.

name: Dead Way
summary: A multiplayer zombie horde style game to play with your friends!

name: Deep Dreams
summary: Deep Dreams is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Mariana, exploring her dream world and collecting Alters.

name: Depth Charge
summary: Depth Charge is a simplified variant of Gremlin's arcade game Depthcharge. Like in the arcade game the objective is to sink as many submarines as possible by dropping depth charges from a boat on the surface. What's difference is that the boat automatically moves from right to the left and all the player has to do is to press a single button to drop the depth charges. The boat makes three passes along the surface and the objective of the game is simply to score as many points as possible. More points are earned by hitting submarines at higher depths and upon reaching 600 and 900 points additional passes are given.

name: Destiny
summary: Destiny is a fantasy-themed graphic adventure game with RPG elements. The game is played via game cursor, and all available commands are on the right hand side of the screen. The player moves by selecting north, south, east, or west. The player must select individual areas of the screen in order to search or look at objects. Graphical display of the player's location appears on the main screen.

name: Desespejos
summary: Demo available! A reverse spot-the-differences game. Find the ~10 similarities between 2 completely different images.

name: Detox
summary: A LD42Compo Submission

name: Devour
summary: Bite the hand that feeds you.

name: Dead Face
summary: A bullet hell/hacking roguelike

name: Dezaemon DD
summary: Dezaemon DD is an unreleased expansion for Dezaemon 3D, developed for the Nintendo 64 Disk Drive.

name: Deltatraveler
summary: A Deltarune fangame. Kris and Susie suddenly wake up on a flower bed in the world of Undertale. They, along with Noelle, must travel between different worlds to make their way back home.

name: Destiny's Plan
summary: Finn is the protagonist of this story, by a ridiculous coincidence, gets to the hospital, but contrary to fate - rejoicing in this, begins to live in a new way. And falling in love with his new friend, unfortunately, cannot remember one important thing. Will you understand what you have forgotten?

name: Defender II
summary:
Defender II, the ultimate tower defense is coming with many new features!
Waves of monsters are attacking your castle. They move fast, strike hard, and never give up. However, Defender is more powerful than ever before! What's more, Lava moat, Magic Towers will fight together with Defender!

name: Deathball
summary:
DeathBall is a top class First Person Sport Game that combines elements of Football, Rugby and Handball. It's a mod for UT2004, but it has nothing to do with a shooter (a pure sports game).

So you got these football pitches, and you have to get the ball into the enemy goal. You have a hammer tool. With that one you can kick other players around, kill the enemy ballowner with 2 hits and also kick the ball away (volley).
In your own penalty zone you can kill all enemy players with one hit. With the ball launcher you can charge up a shot, the longer you hold it the harder it will be and you can even add spin to the ball, so it will curl in the air.
Just like in football you should have a keeper in your goal. He has some special abilities like he's 30% faster than others,he can dodge and jump higher.
Death Ball should be played with 6-10 players
The gameplay is very easy too learn, but it's hard to master. At first it seems to be pretty simple, but the more you play the more you realise how complex it is and how many possibilities your team has. The ways to score are infinite.

name: Dead or Alive 3++
summary: Dead or Alive 3++ was released as a rebalanced version of Dead or Alive 3 for the original Xbox game system. It features various system and character balances from the previous three versions of Dead or Alive 3. Some minor tweaks have been added to the game system in the form of a four-way hold system, unrestricted 3D-axis movement, and less emphasis on the critical stun system. Some attack commands for characters are updated. The tag team system, introduced in the previous game, was also updated. Tag Battle was made available during the game's Time Attack and Survival modes. A new feature called Attack Change was added, allowing the character tagging in to attack while switching in. The Tag Throws command was made a bit easier to activate. By default, the game utilizes the Xbox controller's analog face buttons, making the controls lenient to allow players new to the series to adapt to gameplay, players have the option to turn the analog buttons on or off. As with previous entries in the series, it took advantage of the Xbox system's power to push the range of the graphics and stage sizes farther than Dead or Alive 2.

name: Deathroned
summary: Deathroned is a hectic first-person shooter in which the player takes on the role of a powerful sorceress making her way within an enchanted palace inspired by One Thousand and One Nights.
