The random generation of its levels every time the game is played and the freedom to modify the combat style in real time make every playthrough a unique experience.

name: Death Deserves Holidays
summary: Can people just stop dying?

name: Deft
summary: A competitive tactics game with no "attack button"

name: Deabirth: Real
summary: What's the difference between a Game and a Nightmare anyway?

name: Death Strike
summary: Death Strike is an old school horizontal shoot em up with four levels packed with action, made to look like a potential arcade release in the late eighties.

name: Deep Cover
summary: Craft a clever cover stories while playing as the world's most charismatic super spy!

name: Dethrone
summary: A minimilistic, hardcore platformer with lots of DEATH.

name: Devil of the Mirror
summary: Striving to escape her futile existence, a lonely and sick girl is performing a spell upon a mirror, wishing for friends and for a better life... But she didn't know that the mirror she used was holding a demonic entity in it. Will that spell be a blessing for the girl... or a curse?

name: Deep in the Forest
summary: A medieval fantasy BL Visual Novel in English and Spanish, Demo available

name: Defying Heaven's Will
summary: A BL murder mystery in xianxia setting!

name: Detect Occult
summary: A side-scrolling horror investigation game.

name: Deosurge
summary: Live out Luna Blood's last moments and shoot your way through a Philadelphia crack den!

name: Dead Cells: The Queen and the Sea
summary: Dead Cells: The Queen & the Sea will conclude the DLC trilogy that began with The Bad Seed in 2020 and continued with Fatal Falls in 2021. The new expansion will introduce two new biomes, called "The Infested Shipwreck" and "The Lighthouse"), new weapons, and of course a magnificent boss, which once you will be allowed to finish an alternate ending.

name: Dementia
summary: Psychological horror in the body of a dementia sufferer

name: Desolation Seed
summary: Society is a decay system you are imprisoned as the reveled flesh that feeds the cybernetic wire, through a cryptic email chain Oceancide Systematics a mysterious corporation pays you to perform seemingly random acts of debasement against society on their behalf. they seethe within the darkened vomitoriums of computational networks. do these debased acts of destruction hold any meaning? can you break from out the hollow shell of pleasure systems? how far will they push you? how far will you go? Nothing can prepare you for the apex of human understanding.

name: Delta Chase
summary: A parkour game set in a sci-fi city.

name: Delirious
summary: a short 3D horror game

name: Dead Man Shooting
summary: Wild and fast roguelite run & gun western action. X to Shoot, Z to Jump

name: Deep Down
summary:
Firmly sticking to the Half Life 2 formula, Deep Down is a new entry in the story of Alyx and Gordon as they continue the hunt for Combine Advisors in the area surrounding White Forest.

Combine Forces, Zombies and Antlions lay between them and the brooding menace deep below the earth that will test both their skills further than ever before.

If you miss the Half Life 2 formula and are tired of waiting patiently for Episode 3 then this mod is for you. Featuring new gameplay elements, fiendish puzzles and blistering action, Deep Down will provide your Half Life 2 fix (well some of it at least).

name: Decipher Quest
summary: Decipher Quest is a puzzle game based on a simple geometric substitution cipher.

name: Detonate
summary: Save the sewers to save the day

name: Deify
summary: "In another time, in another place, I Will Ascend."

name: Death Tennis
summary: Smack each other with rackets and different balls

name: Dedede Daggers
summary: devil daggers but it's a png of king dedede

name: Delvedown
summary: A 2D Platformer Roguelike! Boss fights, Items, Achievements, Ranks and Loot!

name: Descendants of the Hellbeast
summary: A Dark fast paced top down roguelite shooter.

name: Demolition Derby 3
summary: Demolition Derby 3 is a racing game. Choose your car and hop in the driver's seat! Choose from 90+ cars! 3 different game modes: Race, Derby, and Freeplay. You can also do Tournaments to show off your skills! Race with AI or players from all over the world!

name: DejaVu
summary: A cute puzzle game playing with multiple parallel levels, looking a lot like each others. But there is more to meet the eyes...

name: De-capite
summary: Roll the dice. Score. Survive!

name: Defagra
summary: Pursuit for the power of the universe

name: Dementia
summary: How deep are you willing to go?

name: Deep
summary:
navigate abandoned environments and locate artefacts

it's only you and your sonar out there

or is it

name: Detective GUI
summary: Detective GUI is a puzzle platformer, played with mouse and keyboard.

name: Detective S. Harkins
summary: Solve a murder using your deductive skills as a rocket-powered mechashark.

name: Desert Comets
summary: A cute yuri tale of friendship, romance, and space piloting.

name: Death Gaze
summary: A cosmic stealth survival horror

name: Depth Gun
summary: Ludum Dare 38

name: Debug Quest
summary: The ancient machine that provides for your people stopped working. You must repair it and bring it back online.

name: Deadline of the Dead
summary: Balance work and not being eaten by zombies

name: Death Again
summary: Jump off of your corpse to... win! :D

name: Deep Sleep
summary: Traverse through challenging levels with the help of your Dream Pillow

name: Deep Relics
summary: Deep underwater you drive a submarine to find relics.

name: Deluded
summary: Deluded is the latest live action crime thriller game by New IDEA Games, it's an experimental fusion of narrative FMV (Full Motion Video), point and click investigation and quick time event (QTE) based interactive games. You play as a detective and try to solve a case with your the assistance of Susan.

name: Deadly Dog-Dating Dungeon
summary: Slay foes, solve puzzles, and flirt to dispel a really weird curse

name: Dead Air
summary: Safety in Radio Silence

name: Defi Kingdoms
summary: DeFi Kingdoms is a cross-chain, play-to-earn game built on a strong DeFi protocol with plans to become a fully-fledged MMORPG in later phases of the Roadmap. The game features DEXs, liquidity pool opportunities, and a market of rare, utility-driven NFTs, which all together create a beautiful, immersive online world in the incredibly nostalgic form of fantasy pixel art. DeFi Kingdoms currently lives on the Harmony and DFK Chain blockchains

name: Deadline
summary: Welcome to the subway

name: Deep in hell
summary: Find out who is the real killer in hell.

name: Deathsmashers 4
summary: Deathsmashers 4 is a physics FPS.

name: Dear Agent
summary: Dear Agent is an action game with some thinking involved. It plays similarly to a typical platform game. As an agent, your job is to complete several missions, all of which involve killing all enemies (both humans that walk around randomly, and beasts that breathe fire when up close) and destroying all objects on a level, then getting to the teleporter.

name: Delusion
summary:
Delusion is a short horror game inspired by Granny for mobile devices Android.

Short Description about Delusion:

Someday you driving to your new job late at night.
After a long road, your car is out of gas but you find in the forest an old abandoned house. When you reach a door something hits your back.
Then you wake up in this house and you are not alone here.

name: Dexter's Laser Lab
summary: Dee Dee just used Dexter's lab for her birthday party. Now it's time to clean up. Place mirrors and use Dex's TidyTron 4000 laser to blast the party balloons in Laser Lab.

name: Deadly Traps Premium
summary: Deadly Traps is a fast-paced platformer where the levels are filled with many dangerous traps and tricky jumps that stand in your way. Your goal is to reach the portal to complete the level. The game is full of traps and very much challenging. If you get stuck in the game, you can skip the level by using 200 gems that you collect in levels. Each level requires skill, death and practice. Deadly traps is a hardcore platformer in the vein of games like super meat boy.

name: Death by Flower Arrangement
summary: A 2D top-down shooter where you frolic among the flowers as a florist named Flanigan, keeping them at bay with your AK-47, and scattering their petals on the grassy floor in an arrangement of vibrant color.

name: Destruction Rocks
summary: Game in which players control rocks that can destroy physics objects.

name: Decommissioner
summary: You are the Decommissioner - tasked with defeating the rogue AI MurderBot by gathering the tools/weapons you need while the MurderBot and it's minions are out to destroy you. Weapons and Equipment are OSP (On Site Procurement), but this is no sneaking mission. If you fail, try again, and the more enemies you defeat, the more equipment will be unlocked to find in the field.

name: Dezlooca Anthology
summary: Full length over 8 hours of story! Explore 4 different themed worlds and help Dezlooca, Archaic, Savage & Meeka save the earth from total annihilation at the hands of Malik.

name: Dead Cells: Road to the Sea
summary: This bundle contains the base game and all of the DLCs that have been released for Dead Cells so far: Rise of the Giant, The Bad Seed, Fatal Falls & The Queen and the Sea. So you will get 8 new levels and 5 new bosses with all their associated enemies, weapons & outfits on top of the original Dead Cells.

name: Depict1
summary:
This commentary isn't a lie. Promise.

A voice is trying to guide you to safety but can you trust it?
Things may not be what they seem to be.

Journey through 30 levels and escape from the cage.

name: Defend from Candyland!
summary: Step into the world of Defend from Candyland! where retro tower defense meets strategic depth. Plant and upgrade trees, use powerful buffs, and reveal enemy paths to shield Eden from waves of candy invaders. Master the challenge now!

name: Death End Re;Quest 2: Complete Deluxe Edition
Dead End Aegis
summary: Extraterrestrial invaders have come to take over Earth, and only an elite force of "magical girls" that have been infused with alien superpowers can stop them.

name: Devious Dungeon: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Devious Dungeon Collector’s Box
- Devious Dungeon Game (region free)
- Devious Dungeon Original Soundtrack
- Devious Dungeon Numbered Certificate

name: Debugger 4406
summary: Deck-building cyberpunk adventure game

name: Dead No-Head
summary: Dead No-Head is a third person action adventure story rich game in which Norix is brought back from the dead, with... No head! This headless hero will have quite the unexpected journey ahead of him.

name: Deliria
summary: Sad? Lonely? Come to DELIRIA, a special bar where EVERYONE is welcome! If you're lost... You might even find your true self! Choose a drink and get ready for revelations! Make friends with peculiar characters, from all colors of the rainbow! And stay for the show of a lifetime!

name: Devil Spire
summary: Devil Spire is a hardcore first-person pseudo-3D roguelite action RPG dungeon crawler stylized after retro PC games, developed by a guy and his bros while locked in quarantine. Inspired by classics like King's Field and Heretic.

name: Detectives United II: The Darkest Shrine
Deep Rock Galactic: Deluxe Edition
summary: Get the Deluxe Edition to unlock the base game as well as both Launch Day DLCs: The awesome Megacorp and Dark Future Packs!

name: Demon Hunter Bundle
summary:
This bundle includes:
- Demon Hunter: Revelation
- Demon Hunter: Riddles of Light

name: Deep Fishing
summary: Deep Fishing is a free casual shooting game, catch fish and sea monsters and hunt treasures in the deep sea to build your empire on the sea.

name: Defenders of Annadale
summary: PvP focused 4v4 gameplay. Choose your profession, equip skills, and engage in intense fast paced combat

name: Deliricard
summary:
It is a collectible card game. It is a game with simple mechanics, in fact all the cards have 1 to 3 keywords to describe their skills. The game consists of resetting the life points of the opposing characters (Heroes) to earn VPs (Victory Points) with each kill.
Within the game there are different types of cards, permanent and temporary.
The game is all written in HTML, PHP and JavaScript so it can work on any type of browser.

name: Destroy Simulator
summary: Destroy houses and relieve stress. It is also possible to compete with everyone in the score challenge

name: Detective Agency
summary: Exciting adventure game with a stylish comic graphics and lots of puzzles, riddles and mini games. Fun for the whole family.

name: Deflector
summary: Deflector is a high-octane bullet hell roguelite set in a deadly world. Upgrade your characters with the DNA you find, evolve them further during your runs and explore the farthest reaches of this microcosm… or die trying.

name: Dead Earth Zombies
summary: Dead Earth is an open world survival game, choose what you want to do in this world, build a small base, hunt for food, survive and explore the open world, play the game your way, ohh... and try to stay off the menu.

name: Dead Gun
summary: DEAD GUN is a 2D platformer with roguelike elements. Take control of a soldier of the elite squad Z-800 and go on an operation to clear friendly worlds from enemies in order to save them.

name: Defensive War: Sealed Golem
summary: Human VS monsters. Protect the castle! Wave-based real-time strategy (RTS). Protect your castle from attacking enemy monsters with warriors, magic, traps and turrets. The Hero and the golem, along with his companions, go looking for the cause of the appearance of monsters in the world.

name: Deadly Racing Duel
summary: Deadly Racing Duel - in the role of a racer who conquers circuit auto racing, you accept challenge after challenge in order to prove how good a racer you are.

name: Deep Russian Depression
summary: “Deep Russian Depression” is a visual novel about people whose fate is a miserable, dreary and hopeless existence somewhere in post-Soviet Russia.

name: Devorian: Left Behind
summary: Episodic adventure set in a post apocalyptic steampunk world. Explore shattered mechanical islands as Amber, a young engineer, with Monty, her animal companion - struggling to survive in the harsh air filled with soot and smoke, while their village is the only place where life lives on. For now.

name: Destructure: Among Debris
summary: DESTRUCTURE: Among Debris is an intense mix of brick breaker, air hockey and bullet hell set in a post apocalyptic world. Destroy structures, dodge bullets, fire guns and buy perks to lay even more waste!

name: DeathOmen
summary: DeathOmen is a psychological horror game in first person, in which you'll have to spend a few nights in a house that hides mysteries and fears that you didn't know, or didn't remember they existed!

name: Demons Roots
summary:
The demons, sealed away in the realm of darkness for a thousand years, now face extinction.
Their final battle with the humans is set to begin on a cursed ground of tragedy and slavery...

name: Death in the Family
summary: "Death in the family" is a horror game about how the dead can confuse, frighten and even kill those they don't like.

name: Deep Fog
summary: "Deep Fog" is a single-player 2D horizontal pixel horror adventure game. Explore the strange events that occurred in the fog city, 5 chapters will be phased release.

name: Delta Zero
summary: A fast-paced action platformer with non-linear world progression and level design! Challenging gameplay with 3 difficulty modes, 2 playable characters and local co-op! Fight bosses in any order and experience the world change with each victory, enemies become harder, faster and smarter!

name: Determina
summary: Command great challengers in strategic online card battles, where there is absolutely no randomness: you control your fate.

name: Devil's Eyes
summary: Mike arrives at university and is ready to have a time of his life, but something is not quite right. Follow the story and unveil the mysteries behind the tragic events.

name: Deformity
summary: Deformity is a turn-based fantasy strategy about a world dominated by sins.

name: Deflector: Specimen Zero
summary: Deflector: Specimen Zero is a high-octane bullet hell roguelite set in a deadly world. Upgrade your character with the DNA you find, evolve him further during your runs and explore the farthest reaches of this microcosm… or die trying.

name: Decay
summary: Decay, a real time interactive experience.

name: Deviation from Way
summary: You are a program, an Android of the RA model, which is being tested in an unknown laboratory. You will be presented with a test to check the functionality of this model. Your fate and the fate of others depends on how you pass this test.

name: Dead Transmission
summary: Play an experimental asymmetric co-op multiplayer with your friend! Have one person move through a FPS horror level while the other be the eye in the sky. Can you and your friend communicate well enough to make it through all the difficulty levels?

name: Devil's Dungeon
summary: Heroes and girls come to the Devil Lord's Dungeon. Can they defeat the Devil Lord or be captured and become slaves? Devil's Dungeon is a real-time strategy game. The game centers on creating mazes and monsters to help defend the Devil Lord from heroes seeking to destroy him.

name: Deadly Nightmare
summary: Deadly Nightmare is an exciting and engaging Horror/Survival game where you play the role of a boy living in a big manor. You need to use all the tools at your disposal in order to explore the world, find mysteries and explore a variety of challenging, scary and supernatural locations.

name: Debug
summary: Solving a puzzle made up of trauma of the commissioning robot, inferring the doctor's evaporated memory with the pieces he found, Take advantage of jumping, wall climbing, and running to challenge the adventure of breaking through obstacles.

name: Deadwater Saloon
summary: Dive into the wild west as a saloon owner in a volatile frontier town. Customize your character and face the consequences of your choices as you forge friendships and enemies of townsfolk, travellers, outlaws and lawmen. Build the most famous saloon in the territory, or be overrun and destroyed.

name: Deadly Infestation
summary: Collect resources, hunt, mine, build your base, weapons and objects to help you survive. Are you able to discover the real reason for your journey?

name: Delivery Boy
summary: Become the best courier in Crystal City and create your own delivery business. Explore the big city, complete tasks, collect resources and build your own delivery services.

name: Deep Cave
summary: Deep Cave is a roguelike game about the adventures of a brave dwarf in search of great riches.

name: Destroy the Cubes 2
summary: Destroy the Cubes 2 is a casual puzzle game where you need to find the right trajectory of the balls to destroy all number cubes at once. Various mechanics will challenge your physical intuition and accuracy. Use the level editor to create levels and challenge yourself in your own way.

name: Demon Spore
summary: Blast your way out of tentacle hell as a failed lab experiment gives birth to a rapidly growing viral horror in this intense action rogue-lite inspired by 80s Monster movies. Use the lab to your advantage and improvise an escape plan before this constantly evolving life form spreads out of control.

name: Deep Base
summary: Deep Base is a world were you place towers to defend against waves of enemies.

name: Death in sands
summary: Death in sands is a shooter that will make you rush around the arena at breakneck speed! More than 25 types of unique firearms. Crowds of skeletons and fountains of bones. Magic abilities that give a tangible advantage. A powerful intellect that the undead obey.

name: Destruction Dummies
summary: Bone crunching, head exploding, limb tearing ragdoll dismemberment action in 3D.

name: Deep Space Expedition 47
summary: You've been sent ahead to establish a foothold economy for a future colony in deep space. Establish trade routes, buy supplies, and get the gears of industry turning before making landfall. The future of the colony is yours to decide.

name: Devil Should Die
summary: Third person shooter game very exciting Includes all enemies in one game and weapons build system arena so you can fight them all at once so have fun

name: Detective Agency 2
summary: A colourful Hidden Object Game with a thrilling storyline! Solve the puzzles and find the banker's wife!

name: Derelicts
summary: After crashing on Earth with a space shuttle, you and your friends have to start from scratch. Explore and build a base, then defend it against mutated animals and humans. Find the origin of the defense mechanism that triggered a wave of radiations on Earth, forcing the most privileged part of mankind to go and live on space stations.

name: Dead Town: Zombie Survival
summary: Dead Town: Zombie Survival is a hardcore zombie shooting survival game where you have to survive in the dead town. You can craft, cook, and make your own base. Survive as long as you can.

name: Deicide
summary: Deicide is a psychological and atmospheric visual novel about an egg and a teenager.

name: Delia's Adventure
summary:
A Story where nothing goes wrong.

This is a game made with the criteria of only having 3 colors and 3 buttons (left, right, jump).

name: Destiny 2: The Witch Queen - Season of the Risen
summary:
The Witch Queen has stolen the Light. Her Hive army charges across the battlefield, gnashing at your armor before succumbing to the power of your fireteam. The Ghosts of your vanquished foes hover silently, an ominous portent of a battle with no end. In a matter of moments too short to catch your breath, the horde rises before you and charges again.

Eyes up, Guardian.

name: Deadoxer
summary: This is a small horror game in which you have to escape.

name: Dememorize
summary: Dememorize is a 2.5D exploration horror game about N9, a degenerative, neurological disease that eats away at memory and spreads through eye contact. The gameplay is under an hour and mostly involves talking to other ward residents during the day in 3rd person, and then exploring the greater hospital by night in 1st person.

name: Death Damnation
summary: Death Damnation is a Twitch connected game developed for streamers. You and your community are in charge of controlling the paranormal events and dreadful monsters. Be sure that your viewers are on your side to escape death, otherwise you will have a bad time.

name: Dead Profit
summary: A war rages between hell and what's above, your job is to supply magical weapons to the war effort. Orders come in and you must Mine, Craft and Enchant the weapons in time. Your production can be ENDLESSLY upgraded and optimized, paired with randomly generated orders to fill!

name: Deliver Us From Evil: Cadenza
summary: Deliver Us From Evil: Cadenza includes the man you wanted to date but couldn't — the elusive and striking Lord Keldran. His route comes as a polygamous romance option with bad boy, Ace. Capture the hearts of two hot men through a whirlwind of passion and mystery.

name: Destiny 2: Legacy Collection
summary: Create your Guardian and embark on a cinematic story in an evolving universe filled with a variety of co-op missions and PvP modes.

name: Demonic Bundle
summary:
This bundle includes:

- Demon Hunter: Ascendance

- The Secret Order: Return to the Buried Kingdom

- Endless Fables: Dark Moor

name: Deep Space Outpost
summary: Deep Space Outpost is a space station building & survival game, involving resource and base management. Build your space station tile by tile, mine asteroids, refine materials and keep your station operational.

name: Detritus
summary:
Wander through a museum of images scattered across your computer, curated by friendly ghosts.

Let the ghosts lift up whats left to rot on your computer. The messier the computer the better.

name: Dear Monster
summary: Allen thought he had his life all figured out. He just graduated university and was headed off to med school. Then a strange letter arrives from a grandfather he never new. He's pulled onto a new path toward a strange mansion filled with even stranger and alluring creatures.

name: Devil Bartender
summary: The Gentle Night Tavern of Monster Girl is a story-rich bartender simulation game. In this different world of medieval fantasy and magic atmosphere, you will play the role of the boss and bartender, and work hard for the bar business together with the unique monster girl waiters.

name: Destructor Tanks
summary: Outplay your rivals by speeding, drifting, shooting and blocking them with environmental hazards as you fight your way to first place. Play against your friends in intense four-player online multiplayer matches and aim for the top of the leaderboard.

name: Dead Tunnel
summary: Dead Tunnel is 2D Shooter Platformer Roguelite game.

name: Decimal
summary: PROJECT TARS is a fast-paced 1st person parkour shooter in space. Experiment with gravity aboard a stranded spaceship. Play a protagonist who has to rebuild his memories of what happened and who he is.

name: Demon King
summary: Demon King is a multiplayer king-of-the-hill game where you become a powerful demon. Devour other demons to grow, evolve and become the King of hell.

name: Dead End Aegis: Gaiden
summary: A squad of magical girls are the Earth's only defense against an alien invasion.

name: Deranged
summary: Deranged is a single player puzzle and psychological horror video game. Find a way to escape the O'Connor mansion before things get tough. Remember that in order to escape you must complete challenging puzzles against the clock ... Will you be able?

name: Debt
summary: Owen finds himself immersed in fear and tension, unaware that the adventure that began with the quest for cursed gold in the mine he entered because of his debt could end up ruining his life.

name: Deep Night Runner
summary: Deep night runner is a game for fans of the runner genre that will allow you to enjoy the gameplay endlessly! Run through the night plains, dodge ghosts and collect coins on your way

name: Demons Rise Up!
summary: Demons Rise Up! is a kinetic futanari visual novel about a pro-gamer named Suzy who summons a succubus through a cursed video game created by developers from the pits of hell.

name: Deadly Flare
summary: A solar flare has struck and every living soul is turning into a rotting and aggressive ghoul.

name: Demolition Race
summary: Rally style racing with a choice of different cars and tracks. Overtake or push the racers out of the way for victory and advancing! Destruction, collisions, road dust and rock music will accompany you!

name: Deliver or Die!
summary: Deliver or Die! is an arcade game based on many classic ideas put together. With a bomb strapped to your car, time is of the essence. Collect deliveries, collect powerups, drop off the deliveries, and make sure they are on time... or you DIE!

name: Destruction of Planets
summary: Destruction of Planets is a 2D mix of arkanoid and bullet-hell genres. The main goal is to destroy all balls in form of planets with different properties.

name: Dead by Daylight: Portrait of a Murder Chapter
summary: The latest chapter for Dead by Daylight includes a new Killer – The Artist – and a new Survivor, Jonah Vasquez. A new Realm, the surreal Forsaken Boneyard, will be opened for all players. Purchasing this add-on also unlocks an exclusive cosmetic for Jonah: The Crimson Shirt.

name: Deflector: Specimen One
summary: Deflector: Specimen One is a high-octane bullet hell roguelite set in a deadly world. Upgrade your character with the DNA you find, evolve him further during your runs and explore the farthest reaches of this microcosm… or die trying.

name: Deadburg
summary: Deadburg is a co-op survival game set in a procedurally generated city with thousands of buildings to explore and zombies to kill. Every building you see can be explored, exploited and destroyed one block at a time. Play alone or with friends and discover the secrets of the city.

name: Detectives United: Deadly Debt - Collector's Edition
summary: United against evil once again!

name: Dead Fury
summary: Descend into hell in Dead Fury! - A fast-paced action-adventure title set amongst the rugged mountains of a post-apocalyptic New Zealand, a native blossom is the last hope for humanity after a virus brought back from Mars triggered a zombie apocalypse.

name: Death's Gambit: Afterlife - Ashes of Vados
summary: Ashes of Vados is an epilogue to the Death's Gambit: Afterlife story, and comes packed with a new dual-staged boss fight, platforming challenge level, combat arena, new rewards and a variety of added game modes.

name: Deadly Dozen Reloaded
summary: Deadly Dozen Reloaded is a complete remake of the original squad-based 3rd person shooter. Made in a new engine with upgraded maps, graphics and missions, Reloaded takes this classic franchise and brings it to modern audiences with a bang.

name: Dead by Daylight: Hour of the Witch Chapter
summary: Hour of the Witch is a new Chapter in Dead by Daylight. It includes a new Survivor, Mikaela Reid. Purchasing the add-on unlocks both the new Survivor and her exclusive item: Mikaela’s Crescent Camisole.

name: Dead Against Us
summary: Dead Against Us is an unforgiving top-down zombie shooter where you must complete tasks around the map in order to advance to the next level until you reach your escape.

name: Deck Adventurers: Origins
summary: Hard game of tactical combat with cards, in which you customize the cards themselves, not just the deck. No grinding or random encounters, only combats designed for you to find the right strategy.

name: Dead Shell
summary:
You're commanding a die-hard assault squad. Destination: Plutonia, a settlement on a Doom-4 class planet. Shuttle cargo: a range of lethal weapons, from axes and chainsaws to blasters and BFGs. Anything might come in handy in Plutonia, the Federation's most remote colony.
Scientists, miners, guards – all sorts of civilian personnel worked there until recently. A week ago, the Center received a mayday signal from the settlement. Demonic roars and screams of terror filled the comm channel, and then it fell dead silent.
It's time to descend into the infernal abyss and show the demons who's the boss here. Fight your way through all the circles of hell to reach the very bottom. Look cosmic evil in the face and emerge victorious.

name: Death Dungeon
summary:
The Great Demon who had disappeared during the war with the Demon Realm returned and the Human Realm and the Nephalem are on the brink of annihilation!
When all hope seemed lost, one of the Nephalem miraculously survives.

name: Demetrios: The BIG Cynical Adventure Replastered
summary:
Demetrios is a quirky point and click adventure game inspired by classics like Broken Sword, packed with tons of humor, now in 4k!

Bjorn Thonen, a slob of an antique dealer living in Paris, is robbed one night after coming home drunk. Forced to conduct his own investigation with the help of his neighbor Sandra, he ends up involved in a murky, mysterious affair. Will these unlikely heroes be able to rise up and discover ancient secrets?

The game offers situations and puzzles for beginners and experts alike, with a high degree of interactivity. Explore ridiculous item combinations, just to see what happens!

name: Detective in the Pirate's Cove
summary: Solve the mystery in the Pirate's Cove and uncover your lost memories in this hidden object game. After waking up on a deserted beach with no memory of who you are, you set out to find the one person who can help you. But when you arrive at the nearest seaside town, you learn that memory loss isn't your only problem. The seaside village is buzzing with reports of strange events. Hold your breath and dive into this thrilling adventure in "Hidden Object - Detective in the Pirate's Cove".

name: Dead Synchronicity: Tomorrow Comes Today
summary:
"Dead Synchronicity: Tomorrow Comes Today" is the first part of the "Dead Synchronicity" series: help Michael face a dying reality, a universe that’s fading away. Face a merciless world that gets sick and vanishes. Face no past, no present, no future. Face the impending moment of “dead synchronicity”. And you’d better hurry. Because, otherwise... what will you do when Time dissolves itself?
A terrible pandemic is turning all of humanity into “the dissolved” - the sick whose deliria provide them with supernatural cognitive powers... but also steer them towards a gruesome death.

name: Detective Inspector: Mysterious Clues
summary: Step into the shoes of a great detective and solve crimes!

name: Dead to Rights
summary: Dead to Rights is a top-down shooter video game for the Game Boy Advance. It is loosely based on the original Dead to Rights console game.

name: Deadland 4000
summary: A post-apocalyptic roguelike set in the year 4000. Traverse a gauntlet of randomly generated biomes collecting loot and special powers along the way.

name: Deg-Deg the Ravenous
summary: An SRPG inspired by Fire Emblem/Tactics Ogre about Goblins.

name: Destiny Star Girlfriend
summary: A surprise kerfuffle with unhinged space demons sees campus nobody Seiji “tied by fate” to Yuuri, the undercover magical girl who’s also his covert classroom crush! With both their secrets out of the bag, can Seiji still shoot his shot? Or will the evil Majin’s minions invade Earth first?

name: Death Forest
summary: Death Forest is a horror game created by Kazz. It was made in Unity. The game takes place in Aokigahara (the Suicide Forest). The aim of the game is to collect all the four Items to restart your Motorbike and escape the forest. All while surviving the four spirits that will try to kill you and conserving your flashlight's battery power.

name: Demeo: PC Edition
summary: It’s dangerous to go alone! Grab your friends and assemble a party, because plumbing the depths of Demeo requires strategy, cunning, and teamwork. An award-winning cooperative tabletop adventure for up to four players.

name: Deliver Us Mars
summary: Deliver Us Mars is a sci-fi adventure game developed by KeokeN Interactive and released in 2023. It is a sequel to Deliver Us the Moon and follows the story of astronaut Kathy Johanson as she embarks on a mission to Mars to recover powerful colony ships known as the ARKs, which were stolen by a group called the Outward. The game combines exploration, puzzle-solving, and platforming elements as players navigate the harsh Martian environment and uncover the mysteries surrounding the disappearance of the ARKs.

name: Dead Man's Diary
summary:
You're on your own in a world full of danger! You can drink only if you discover water, survive the night only if you have a safe place to sleep - eat only what you have found or hunted. Explore a destroyed world and experience a dark story.

Dead Man's Diary is a unique blend of elements from several genres. The gameplay adopts typical survival game mechanics such as crafting items or exploring a hostile world along with the need to find places to sleep or food. And enriches it with a gripping story and realistic puzzles.

name: Demon World Survival
summary: Demon World Survival is a survival game, monsters will take the initiative to attack you, it is a casual, female protagonist, barrage shooting, cute style game

name: Deliverance
summary: Deliverance is a story of mystery, thrill and discovery. A choice-based adult visual novel allows you to explore the detective’s both sides. The hero, fighting to save his loved ones, or the villain willing to abandon all morality for power.

name: Demonophobia
summary:
Demonophobia is a Guro Survival Horror game where the emphasis is primarily on horror rather than survival.

The game is about a 14-year-old Japanese schoolgirl, Sakuri Kunikai. After trying a demon summoning ritual, she wakes up in a terrifying realm of demons and tries to escape from this hell she ensnared herself into.

name: Dead Zone
summary: Gathering Storm Studio proudly present Dead Zone. Inspired by Retro Top-Down Arcade Shooters : Dead Zone offers a unique gaming experience within the modern zombie apocalypse genre. Where you have to loot, trade, craft and shoot your way to survival.

name: Desaturation Point
summary: A Strategic Squad-Based Horror Game in which players navigate across arctic labyrinths overrun by freakishly colorful monstrosities in this 'Lovecraft-on-LSD' experience.

name: Dead Ice
summary: In the future, humans conquered the stars and colonized other planets. In the bowels of the icy planet, scientists have discovered a natural and safe source of energy. But at the same time, they awakened an ancient alien life form. There is a conflict on the planet. Volunteers come to the rescue.

name: Defenders Glory
summary: Defenders Glory is a Fantasy Tower Defense game with simple but deep gameplay elements: Simple mechanics that allow for near-infinite ways to be applied, allowing it to be suitable to anyone, beginners can just sit down and play, while Veterans can constantly improve themselves and their tactics.

name: Desire Ninja
summary: Desire Ninja is a classic like fruit ninja game. The succubus turns into a beautiful woman and tries to confuse you. Don't be fooled and cut their clothes. Listen to her breathing, can you not lose control?

name: Deathgrip
summary:
Deathgrip invites the player to the jump in the pilot's seat of some of the fastest and most lethal hovercrafts ever seen and dominate the tracks they compete on. Navigate natural environments through split paths, twists, turns, jumps, shortcuts, and narrow corridors in an intense race to the finish.

Deathgrip introduces a depth to its racing controls that challenges the player to explore the skill ceiling. From afterburner allowed at any time to pitching, rolling, drifting, repairing, managing heat, and firing weapons, one should take pride in their ability to master a racer.

It is an experience meant to be visceral, brutal, exciting, and intense, centered on offering players instant enjoyment without gimmicks and an extended sense of achievement for those competitive and dedicated enough to get the most out of the game.

name: Dead by Daylight: Sadako Rising Chapter
summary: Sadako Rising features a new Killer – The Onryō – and a new Survivor, Yoichi Asakawa. Purchasing this add-on also unlocks an exclusive charm: Cursed Videotape.

name: Demolish & Build VR
summary: Demolish, construct and grow your business! You can purchase new land properties, earn orders and have fun at the same time. It's up to you whether you use a hammer or one of the newest tools and machines. Will you be able to build a strong empire? Get to work!

name: Death or Glory
summary: Death or Glory is a dueling card game where fighters compete in an arena. Defeat your opponent with ANY character imaginable with a unique deck embodying that fighting style. Unlock more and more cards to customize your deck on your journey to become the ultimate champion!

name: Death Code
summary: Death Code is a battle royale genre. It tells the story of Lin Mohuai, a female protagonist with amnesia, who wakes up to find herself involved in an eight-person battle royale game. Everyone is given a code, and the way to win is to kill the player whose number is plus one.

name: Destroying the Asteroids: Along With Unfair Hurdles
summary: I have Created this Game For those who likes to go through the Challenges in the Games. Just Destroy the 2 Asteroids in this Game and that's it. But it is not easy. Unfair Hurdles will not allow to do it easily.

name: Deeeer Simulator: The Final Evolution of Deeeer
summary: This is DLC for players who just couldn't get enough average, everyday DEEEER with the main game. Everyone's favorite DEEEER is about to achieve his final evolutionary form.

name: Degraman: Act I - Vincent, Cassel & Loner
summary: The DLC contains a Prologue, MC customization, + 2 additional routes: Cassel and Loner. And also +15 hours of additional gameplay.

name: Degraman: Act I - Vincent
summary: An otome visual novel - play a powerless victim of a terrifying, unfair world. 200+ choices, 50+ endings, 20+ hours of play - and only one way to escape.

name: Dead Ahead
summary: Dead Ahead is an endless side-scrolling game. Gameplay requires driving a vehicle down a never-ending road while avoiding obstacles in front and zombies from behind. Leap off ramps to avoid debris, use your weapon to shoot enemies, and survive to achieve high scores. Players can use coins to purchase better rides and guns, upgrade existing ones, or customize their appearance.

name: Devil Kiss
summary: Romance-interactive game from LucyDream about dating angels and devils.

name: Departure.
summary: Close your eyes, explore your imagination, and make your own fun using the toys scattered around your room. Find solutions and secrets that can help you on your quest to crack the door's five locks and be free of your confinement in this unorthodox adventure, puzzle solver.

name: DefenceOrder
summary: When monster troops flocked to the kingdom, which was troubled by the king's tyranny, the king, who had been tyranny, abandoned the kingdom and left. May you be our king and guardian and protect the kingdom. Hire archers, artillery, wizards, and develop their abilities, and save the kingdom

name: Delta Particles
summary:
Delta Particles is a single-player, story-driven, total conversion modification for Half-Life 1.

Features include a new single-player campaign consisting of 4 chapters, total conversion, a lot of new content, the atmosphere of the new scientific complex "Delta Base", new weapons, a new Dark Ambient soundtrack and a BlueShift-style XEN level.

name: Deck of Ashes: Complete Edition
summary: Roguelite Adventure With Tactical Card Combat

name: Desktop Football
summary: The desk is your field!

name: Death Trading Card Game
summary: Enter the vast world of The Death Trading Card Game where you can immerse yourself in a fantasy world where patience and strategy are your strongest tools.

name: Delusions of a Lost Soul
summary: Return to Lansinet castle to free your partner’s trapped soul. Solve puzzles, avoid traps, and unravel the many paranormal mysteries that await you.

name: Destinesia
summary: Destinesia is a sci-fi metroidvania which you are looking for a new home for humanity. Parkour your way through most dangerous jungles and explore the ancient dungeons. Upgrade your suit with the remains of your ancestors. Reveal the oldest secrets of Homo Sapiens.

name: DeepStorm Online
summary: Deep-Storm Online the Action and Exploration MMO underwater game! Dive into this world of alien flora & fauna, Explore caves, Beat Bosses, And build your very own class & ship from a huge tech tree featuring over a thousand Nodes & Upgrades!

name: Dead End City
summary: A post-apocalyptic arcade shooter. Collect fuel and dodge enemy fire as you fight back against the evil Scorpio gang. Mixes cars, shmups and themes that would have been right at home in 80's anime and arcades..

name: Defenders of Kingdom
summary: Once upon a time Asgardia is a peaceful kingdom, but that all changed after Shadom nation’s attack and plundering all of Asgardian resources, 2 years later senator of Asgardia began to create various tower to defend the kingdom and finally success to hold shadom nation’s cruelty.

name: Death Duel VR
summary: Death Duel VR is a physics-based PVP only game in medieval background. Meet with other players online by hosting or joining a match. Level up your warrior to gain access to more weapons and armors, and unlock more maps and play mode.

name: Deadly Rain
summary: Deadly Rain is a survival horror FPS game that puts you in a terrifying fight for survival against hordes of scary mutants in a rainy, abandoned village. Find and manage resources to stay alive in the worst and most unexpected situations.

name: Deicider
summary: Win back your freedom through gladiatorial combat and discover the secrets of the arena and its creator. Arm yourself with the strongest equipment you can find and face this crooked, 2D, roguelike, dungeon crawler.

name: Deliverance
summary: Hunt...Craft,,, and survive the wild west. A survival PVP extravaganza! Hunt Others, Craft your own custom bullets and bombs, Search for bosses and level up your outfit to survive the Wild west in this unique western survival game!!

name: Deck of Ashes: Tome of Dimensions
summary: Tome of Dimensions adds new playable character with unique storyline, 100+ new cards to experiment with, and, of course, a variety of new deadly enemies.

name: Destiny Fantasia
summary:
Save the Earth from its end!
The main character, Lidim, works in a weapon shop in the capital of Alfria. He accidentally overhears secret negotiations between two countries. As Alfria doesn't agree to become a colony of the powerful Epsilom Empire, an envoy of Epsilom, who is also a witch, uses an unknown weapon to destroy Lidim's home village as a demonstration of power. Witnessing the tragedy, Lidim loses his temper and assaults an important figure from the Empire...

name: Death Drive
summary: Death Drive is a deck-building open world survival RPG set in a zombie apocalypse. Combining in-depth turn based combat of card battlers and deck building, open world exploration, skills and character abilities, loot, trading, crafting, managing your caravan and survival all together!

name: Deadlocked
summary:
Welcome to Darkvale, you arrive at the outskirts amidst the endless hordes of undead.
It would be better to leave this place and you'd be wise to heed this advice.
Run through distinct biomes while avoiding environmental hazards and obstacles. Defeat undead hordes and gruesome bosses. Select your weapon and upgrade it to suit your playstyle. Acquire new skills and best your enemies.

name: Demon Party
summary:
Demon Party is a retro-inspired RPG style.
And it's the begining story of Andromeda Galaxy epic tale.
There is one sacred realm that goddess created , Tautarus...
At the begining, Tartarus realm has none a single soul exist.
Until the Goddess of life and Death came to the realm and created different kinds of life-form.Years and centuries has passed. They live peacefully and happily. One day, Goddess has not answer the call so the time of chaos began..
Mysterious invader overrun without any sight. Darkness has dominate Tartarus.
Help Asha to find her sister together with companions and fight the horde of monster.

name: Deadman Diaries
summary: Readers can choose between trying to save the character or sending him to the largest imaginable number of deaths. Using the form of a personal diary, readers are immersed in the life of John Riggs, a bank worker who has to pay off a gambling debt that will lead him to different illegal, and often lethal, situations. Readers are given different options and can choose between trying to save the character or killing him off in as many ways as possible.

name: Detective Barbie 2: The Vacation Mystery
summary: Detective Barbie 2 is primarily an adventure game where Barbie explores the inn and surrounding areas, such as the greenhouse and the lighthouse. Further, the inn was constructed by an eccentric inventor who built all kinds of secret passages and other surprises into the location. Find and use items, leverage your high-tech gadgets, interview the people who work at the inn, and solve the mystery.

name: Demon Turf: Neon Splash
summary: Demon Turf is back and better than ever! Join Beebz in this neon lit adventure where speedy platforming reigns supreme!

name: Definitely Poker
summary: A followup to 'Probably Poker'. This game plays like a normal round of video Poker with a twist. Play against the dealer for a highscore but have control over what they can't get via trump cards. Can you stack the deck in your favor?

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Season 1 - Rival Incursion
summary: A competitor has made its way to Hoxxes! Miners, let's show them what Deep Rock Galactic is all about!

name: Defender
summary: A keychain port of Defender.

name: Dennis the Menace
summary: A handheld game based on the movie adaptation of Dennis the Menace.

name: Demon's Sperm
summary: An action game featuring a voluptuous warrior woman and her sperm collecting dungeon delving adventure.

name: Death Cube
summary: "Death Cube" is a 2D platformer where you need to cross a room full of obstacles to get to the exit.

name: Derby Racing: Xtreme Driver
summary: Feel the action of real derby in the survival race!

name: Deadcraft
summary: Farm the dead to stay alive in Deadcraft, a new twist on the zombie survival-action genre! As a half-zombie, grow an army of loyal undead followers and build an arsenal to equip them to take revenge on the rulers of humanity's last city.

name: Deep/Wing/Break
summary: Deep/Wing/Break is a vertically scrolling shooter game where the player controls a grey, winged creature, carrying a tiny dot it must protect from waves of enemies, all of which shoot bullets in specific formations.

name: Decontrologic
summary: Decontrologic is a very short adventure game. You play as an unnamed man who just started the first day at his new job. Soon, it becomes apparent that it's annoyingly hot in the building, and you have to fix it.

name: Death Ring
summary: Death Ring is a casual action roguelike in which you will have to force your way through hordes of undead in search of the human world’s main artefact. Numerous scenarios of each character’s development based on random dropping items will make your runs unique.

name: Devil on Your Shoulder
summary: See your name in lights on Broadway! Find fame, fortune, and true love! All it costs is your immortal soul.

name: Decorporation
summary: Decorporation is a fast-paced violent FPS that combines roguelike mechanics (random procedural level generation and permadeath) with skill-based style scoring.

name: Derpy God
summary: Derpy God is a 2D side-scrolling real-time strategy game, with chaotic physics-driven battles, set in a fantasy world of gods and mortals. Gather resources, build defenses and send forth your armies in campaign mode, or get creative and craft crazy scenarios in the sandbox.

name: Devexus
summary: An unsettling descent down the demoniacal pages of the occult tome, the Sacramentum Devexus.

name: Defensive Measures
summary: Defensive Measures is a FPS/Tower Defense Hybrid game. Deal with your enemies first hand or let your turrets do the talking while you sit back and enjoy the show.

name: Dedalium
summary:
Dedalium is an innovative RPG game which can be played on any website installing the browser extension, but there is a lot to do on the app as well!

The first steps of the game consists on selecting your initial gear, this gear will get experience when you fight and complete missions and will become more powerful. You will be able to find new gear on mystery boxes.

name: Dere-chat
summary: An Interactive Visual Novel with 35 story branches, 150 unique lines of dialogue, unlockable skins and many wholesome vibes! Dere-chan is always kind, happy, and energetic so whatever happens she'll always be there with kindness and support!

name: Deck Adventurers: Heroes of the Valley
summary: Save the Valley from the hordes of monsters that ravage it in this turn-based tactical combat and deck-building RPG game.

name: Delete After Reading
summary: "Delete After Reading" is a game you can read or a book you can play, An adventure game that mixes puzzles and reading to immerse you in a story about friendship and ruling your own destiny.

name: Defense Witches
summary: Defense Witches was a strategy game by Newgate. It featured a variety of female witches with different powers and personalities, fighting monsters to protect the world. There were many types of levels with different settings and contain fun, entertaining manga to read as well as hints to assist you.

name: Death Dungeon
summary: "Death dungeon" is a strategic barrage shooting game. You need to reasonably select and use dual weapons and dual skills to fight the randomly generated enemies in the dungeon and kill all the enemies in the room with the least loss of life.

name: Decisive Strike
summary: A sci-fi team-based Third Person Shooter where strategy is as important as your reflexes.

name: Demon Gaze Extra: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: A deluxe edition of Demon Gaze Extra with tons of bonus DLCs!

name: Deadcraft: It Came From the Junkyard
summary:
A hulking behemoth named Revenant arrives with an undead army in tow to try and take over the Ark. It’s up to you to foil his plans and save the city!

Contains all-new missions and an original story featuring a truly fearsome foe.

name: Deadcraft: Jessie's Wasteland Wares
summary: Gather materials and craft items to sell at your shop in order to raise funds for Jessie’s beloved Miss Duna. Fend off thieves and picky customers alike to strike it rich! Features new missions and an original story featuring Jessie as the protagonist.

name: Deadcraft: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Deluxe Edition Contents:
- The game
- DLC Packs
- “It Came From the Junkyard” DLC
- “Jessie's Wasteland Wares” DLC
- Costume
- Resource Pack

name: Desolate Shores
summary: Desolate Shores is a single player shooter game based in a Mars of the future. Terraforming has transformed the planet, melted the ice and cities were built. But flooding has meant unwanted creatures that dragged their eggs to dry land. You must follow instructions and escape from this island

name: Desolatium: Prologue
summary: Desolatium: Prologue is a first-person point & click Graphic Adventure based on Lovecraft Mythos. Live this horror story where you will have to visit mysterious locations, face lovecraftian creatures, find clues and combine objects to solve puzzles.

name: Deep Space: Lost Battleship
summary:
After accident during training course you passed black hole and came out to the different side of the galaxy far away from the Solar System!
You must find way home through the alien space systems, anomalies and hordes of enemies!

name: Defense of Fortune 2
summary: Defense of Fortune 2 is the official follow-up piece and the 7th story of the Fortune Chronicles Episode.

name: Dear My Cat
summary: Join the journey of virtual pet sim! Every cats from Dear My Cat embarks on a journey on the beautiful Sky Island.

name: Delivery in Space
summary: Delivery in Space is a relaxing puzzle game where you'll travel across the galaxy making deliveries to different planets. Black Hole, Nebula, Solar Storm and other wonders of outer space won't stop you on this journey! Prepare your spaceship and navigate using a card-based movement system.

name: Deios I: Director's Cut
summary: Deios I is an arena shooter set in a surreal pixel art landscape. Players traverse through strange areas, challenging a series of arenas. Set in an alternative Internet world. The players uncover a mystery of what is the Deios BBS system invented by a strange interfaith cyber author. Themes of God.

name: December 24th
summary: From the creators of Gazmatera: Return of the Generals! December 24th is a fast-paced classic FPS, inspired by the Quake 2 and Team Fortress. Collect crates to earn bonuses, destroy your enemies with 9 types of weapons and play with your friends with support up to 18 players on one map!

name: Deep Abyss
summary:
Control the newest submarine the Deep Abyss, please collect the radioactive waste dumped in the deep sea!

Searching for radioactive waste dumped in the deep sea using sonar and torpedoes and your senses.
Various obstacles will interfere with your search.

It consists of a 50 normal missions, 50 hard missions and more challenge missions.
Use a mission rewards, you can upgrade the Deep Abyss.
Please try to get a clean sea!
Some of the profits will be donated for the clean sea

name: Death Mark: Limited Edition
summary: A strange rumor is spreading in Tokyo’s H City: those who possess the “mark” will die. Unexpectedly appearing on the body, like a chewed up birthmark, the “mark” is said to result in an unknown death. Now, having lost your memory, you stand before a mysterious house said to protect those who possess the “mark” As the doors swing open, the countdown to death has already begun.

name: Delta Force: Black Hawk Down
summary: In late 1993, the United States launched dual military operations in Mogadishu Somalia. Delta Force Operatives and Army Rangers were sent in to capture Somali warlords and restore order. Experience the intense combat of Operation Restore Hope in this ground breaking first person shooter. As a Delta Force operative participate in a number of daring and intense raids against the oppressive Somali warlords in and around Mogadishu.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Hinokami Keppuutan
- Original figure multi-stand
- Digital content DLC

name: Defender of the Favicon
summary: The menace come from above! Protect the humanoid population from the waves of aliens coming to abduct them. Thankfully the shield of your Defender can take a few hit.

name: Descent
summary: You have been drafted to investigate the disappearance of the crew of the research vessel VALIS XI. Explore the abandoned spacecraft to uncover the mystery of their fate, and the discovery that led to their demise.

name: Demise Sanctuary
summary: Fight hordes of otherworldly monsters and explore procedurally generated dungeons in this addicting twin-stick action roguelike with beautiful pixelart. Mastering risk/reward mechanics and creating powerful Artefact synergies will be key to survive and escape the Demise Sanctuary!

name: Deathbed Lullabye
summary:
Deathbed Lullabye is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 5. It differs from traditional fangames due to how the player only has 7 opportunities to enter the dream world before they are forced to trigger an ending. The dream world changes across 7 nights, with events, NPCs and locations becoming accessible and inaccessible depending on what night it is.

In the year 2004 within a hospital in Mexico City, you play as “Teicuh Maria Yayauhqui Calli,” age 37, a widow and musician. She's also terminally ill and is full of regrets about the questionable life she lived. She only has 7 days to live before she succumbs to her illness. If she either passes on peacefully or ends up in purgatory depends on the player's actions.

name: Desert Blossom
summary: -The game is a Japanese style roleplaying game with a substantial amount of yuri content, minimal amount of yaoi and Furry content. -This is a single plot. The favorability options of some characters affect the ending of the main thread. -Each character in the game has its own graphics, CG.

name: Delta Manifold
summary: Explore a strange interconnected world, find weapons to shoot those that stand in your way, and discover hidden upgrades and abilities to discover even greater secrets in an action adventure first person metroidvania.

name: Dear Delusion
summary: A little girl goes missing, you breaks into the forest restricted area to find her. However, as you explore deeper into the forest, the line between reality and fantasy fades away. Can the you piece together the whole picture, find the little girl and leave the forest?

name: Dead-End Dungeons
summary: Dead-End Dungeons is a randomly generated dungeon crawler featuring turn-based combat. Dungeons are completely random and feature various encounters, treasures, and unlockables.

name: Den Yttersta Gåtan
summary: Adolescence is a difficult time: parents don't understand and classmates bully. The main character of Den Yttersta Gåtan sits on the window sill and looks sadly out the window with the rain pouring down. Just as she is about to run away, a mysterious messenger from Asgard itself appears, and outside the window a Bivröst appears on which Heimdall is trumpeting Gjallarhorn and announcing the beginning of Ragnarök.

name: Detana!! TwinBee
summary: The PC-Engine port of Bells & Whistles originally released only in Japan before coming to the West through the Wii Virtual Console service, under its original Japanese title.

name: Detana!! TwinBee
summary: The X68000 port of Bells & Whistles.

name: Detana!! TwinBee
summary: The mobile port of Bells & Whistles, released only in Japan for EZweb, i-mode and Yahoo Mobile models.

name: Deer & Boy
summary: A Cinematic Platformer who you follow the journey of a boy who, during his flight will meet an unexpected companion. Together they will overcome many obstacles that will change their lives forever.

name: Dennou Taisen: DroneZ
summary:
a single-player futuristic shooter. The player is guiding a female avatar through a virtual reality, representing the future world for humans living in suspended animation vats while their bodies are being cared for by insects and their minds are prevented from leaving the virtual world by its dominant AI.
The task is for the character to jump/travel on discs representing memory bits in an organic computer, while avoiding wall mounted cannons, electrical fields and various aliens trying to stop you from escaping the virtual reality into the real world. The graphics are reminiscent of the movie TRON with a bright, neon style.

name: Desert Lost
summary: This is a third person action game. Players are surrounded by monsters and are free to explore the surrounding area. Players must avoid monster attacks or kill them to survive.

name: Demencia
summary: Demencia is a Yume Nikki fangame. You play as a girl named Miko, and enter a dream world through reading books on a pillow.

name: Demons Crusher
summary: Demons crusher is a side-scrolling platform slasher.

name: Democracy 4: Voting Systems
summary: Frustrated that your voters seem too influenced by corporate donations? Eager to lower the minimum voting age? Perhaps you would like to ban election robo-calls, or maybe go the other direction and make corporate donations unlimited? All your voting and campaign problems are solved with this DLC!

name: Demonoire
summary: Demonoire - A heroic 2D shooter, Rescue Senvil from the forces of evil.

name: Demons Happened
summary: Demons Happened is a top down shooter with action/platforming elements. Play as a ghost as dead on the inside as he is on the outside, fighting demons with demons on a journey to fix your tv.

name: Destiny 2: The Witch Queen - Season of the Haunted
summary: Power, depravity, vengeance. The object of Calus’s desire has taken many shapes over the years. His once-opulent ship, now derelict and corrupted, has returned to our galaxy—its sights set on the Pyramid ship lying dormant on the Moon.

name: Delete Virus;
summary: Let's become a computer vaccine 'CCAV' to fight computer viruses and aim for A+! Rhythm action game DELETE VIRUS; for passing the virus practical test.

name: Deliria
summary: Deliria is a multiplayer 5v1 horror/social deception game where a player is chosen at random to take on the role of a Hunter. The other remaining Players must work to survive and eventually escape the Hunter.

name: Dead Rising 4: Capcom Heroes
summary: Capcom Heroes allows players to dress up like characters from other Capcom video games. Each character has their own unique set of abilities or weapons.

name: Destructo 2
summary: Destructo 2 is a simple color-matching puzzle game similar to Mr. Driller, originally released as part of a budget series in Japan. The main objective is to guide a cartoon character moving through an ascending pile of multicolored tiles, pushing the available blocks to create clusters of the same color. Groups of four or more tiles of matching colors can be removed by punching one of the connected blocks, with the vacant space being occupied by the falling stacks on top. The descending tiles that end up rearranged in new color clusters are automatically eliminated and give combo points.

name: Dexter's Lab: Dee Dee's Moon Squad
summary: To prevent anymore trouble, Dexter has transported Dee-Dee, Mee-Mee and Lee-Lee to the moon. The three girls are forced to use a moon buggy to find a rocket ship that will take them back home. The player must traverse the moon buggy across ten levels, avoiding pitfalls and battling aliens along the way. The buggy can jump, fire photon projectiles and launch tracking missiles.

name: Death Connection Portable
summary: Death Connection Portable is a port of Death Connection for PlayStation Portable.

name: Death of a Wish
summary:
Death of a Wish is a vicious action-RPG set in a nightmare filled with horrifying monsters and terrifying people.

Play as Christian, a Marked child raised by a cult and struggling to escape indoctrination, as he bands with others to challenge their oppressors. By taking down the four Sanctum Faiths: Father, Sister, Cardinal, and Priest, they will upend the order of the world.

Rend your foes asunder with magical combos called Arias in a demanding combat system that emphasizes tactical aggression. Enhance your abilities with powerful perks that significantly alter your approach to battle and the rhythm of combat. With a limitless array of ways to fight stylishly, build your character your way to destroy your foes.

Christian’s Corruption will constantly rise throughout his journey, pulling him towards a tragic end. He can hold back the Corruption by achieving high ranks in combat and performing long, graceful combos. Only by mastering battle and fighting with true elegance will he stand a chance against the Nightmares.

Explore a bleak dreamworld filled with surreal new characters, encounters, and stories. The theocratic city of Neo-Sanctum sets the stage for a struggle to determine the shape of society, and the fates of Christian and his companions. Delve into the secret underworld of the esoteric and abandoned to meet new allies who will aid you on your journey.

Christian’s world is rendered with a visual style like no other. Battles come to life in an animated spectacle of blood, light, and motion. Nicolo Telesca’s chilling score mixes electronic sounds with live instrumentation to unite the game with tense anxiety and crackling catharsis.

name: Destroy All Humans!: Clone Carnage
summary: Wreak havoc in Clone Carnage! This standalone DLC comes with 4 modes, 6 maps, and up to 4-player multiplayer. Split-screen lets you double the damage in local 2-player multiplayer. Unleash your wild side in Rampage, Armageddon, Race, and Abduction modes!

name: Deal or No Deal
summary: A simple web browser edition of the game show Deal or No Deal.

name: Deathtrap
summary:
Sonic & Mario are in Hell but they have no intention to stay here and they want to escape! Plus, they have infinite lives too…
Don’t let them go!

name: Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed - Second Coming Edition
summary:
Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed is a video game in the open-world action-adventure genre, serving as a remake of the original 2006 game. It is the sequel to the remade Destroy All Humans! and marks the sixth instalment in the franchise.

In this game, players take on the role of Crypto, navigating through diverse global locations such as England, Russia, and the United States. The objective is to complete various missions and overcome human adversaries. The gameplay incorporates a range of weapons and abilities, allowing players to defeat enemies by employing tactics such as mind-controlling humans and utilizing advanced alien technology.

The Second Coming Edition includes the following content:

- Crypto Statue – 70cm/27.6 inch
- Arkwobbler Statue
- Embossed metal plate
- Artbook
- Orchestral score (CD)
- Reprobed: Challenge Accepted DLC (digital)
- Reprobed: Skin Pack (digital)
- Destroy All Humans! – Clone Carnage (digital)

name: Dead Zone
summary: Dead Zone is a multiplayer first and third person survival shooter. Your task is to survive within a closed area filled with many enemies.

name: Defrag Memories
summary: The Networked Empathy Bank (tm) is a space where they upload and de-fragment the world's jumbled consciousness. Remna-Bot-2k finds and collates remnants and fragments of memory from across TNEBs archive zones, recreating person specific empathy archives. Its subject today is AG1970TQQ+. What does AG1970TQQ+ have to say about the different spaces and communities they occupy in their life and why are other Remna-bots trying to subvert this project?

name: Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed - Dressed to Skill Edition
summary:
Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed is a video game in the open-world action-adventure genre, serving as a remake of the original 2006 game. It is the sequel to the remade Destroy All Humans! and marks the sixth instalment in the franchise.

In this game, players take on the role of Crypto, navigating through diverse global locations such as England, Russia, and the United States. The objective is to complete various missions and overcome human adversaries. The gameplay incorporates a range of weapons and abilities, allowing players to defeat enemies by employing tactics such as mind-controlling humans and utilizing advanced alien technology.

The "Dressed to Skill" edition includes the base game as well as the following extra items: Reprobed: Skin Pack, Reprobed: Challenge Accepted DLC (post-launch release), Reprobed: Official Orchestral Score, Reprobed: Digital Art Book.

name: Demon Turf: Bundle
summary: Demon Turf: The Demon World is inhabited by all kinds of nasties... Most of them lumped into gangs battling for dominion, each led by its own head honcho. Yet even these bad dudes are no match for the Demon King himself!

name: Deathwish Enforcers
summary: It’s the 1970’s and crime is running rampant! Join the Deathwish Enforcers squad and take crime down a notch! One to four-player single screen cooperative action! Meet happy hookers, flashers and drug dealers! Invade porn shoots, satanic rituals and volcanic evil lairs! Stop the evil syndicate at all costs!

name: Dejar Ir: A Pandemic Soulful Tale
summary: An intimate and sentimental game where the story is told through different works of art that evoke what we felt during the pandemic, culminating with one of the most beautiful feelings. What will it be? An adventure filled with emotions we experienced during the pandemic.

name: Detective: The Mountain City
summary: You are a detective who newly arrived in the mountain city, helping the local police to solve the crime. You need to be able to use your powers of deduction to find the killers and bring them to justice. Enjoy your trip to the mountain city.

name: Despectum Drakone
summary: Despectum Drakone is a turn-based RPG game about rejection and obsession. Equipment can be upgraded with Glyphs and bordures. Humans and agrestes can be recruited as allies during the adventure. The music and artwork are original, created exclusively for Despectum.

name: Desktop Hacker
summary: A narrative driven hacking game that takes you on a journey around murky hacking circles. You will be using the console and graphical tools to hack systems in order to profit and advance the storyline.

name: Desert Things
summary: Desert Things is a 3D find and click puzzle game in which you have to find some items on the desert location within a certain time.

name: Demon Sword: Incubus
summary: Use sword and spell combos to slash and blast through hordes of attacking enemies! Guard break a bosses defenses, find an opening, then obliterate them for good with a well placed super deadly attack! Satisfying 3D side scrolling action with game-play elements inspired by fighting games!

name: Delegati Genesis
summary: A cyberpunk fantasy RPG.

name: Defend the Bits TD
summary: An awesome 3D tower defence game created to give you days and days of the most fun TD game in town. Defend from hordes of Blocks with your mighty BIT heroes! armed with bows, axes, cannons and even frying pans.

name: Deathsmiles I & II: Gothic wa Mahou Otome 5 Characters
summary: Deathsmiles meets Gothic wa Mahou Otome

name: Dead by Daylight: Roots of Dread
summary: When the dusk turns full dark, it comes. Dead by Daylight’s Roots of Dread Chapter features a new Killer – The Dredge – and a new Survivor, Haddie Kaur. A new map, the disturbing Garden of Joy, is available for all players.

name: Deadlink
summary: Deadlink is a cyberpunk FPS with roguelite elements. You're the first operative to be recruited to the experimental Deadlink project. Pilot an autonomous combat shell, fighting your way through cramped slums, twisted labs, grimy warehouses, and sleek office buildings on a mission to thwart the schemes of the most powerful corporations in the world. Wield a deadly arsenal, upgrade your skills and tech, devastate destructible environments, and slash corporate profit margins — all at the same time.

name: Desta: The Memories Between
summary: Desta: The Memories Between is a character-driven rogue-like, featuring an immersive story, strategic turn-based tactics and… a metaphorical ball-game?

name: Deliver Us Mars: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Deliver Us Mars is a sci-fi adventure game developed by KeokeN Interactive and released in 2023. It is a sequel to Deliver Us the Moon. It follows the story of astronaut Kathy Johanson as she embarks on a mission to Mars to recover powerful colony ships known as the ARKs, which the Outward group stole. The game combines exploration, puzzle-solving, and platforming elements as players navigate the harsh Martian environment and uncover the mysteries surrounding the disappearance of the ARKs.

The Deliver Us Mars: Deluxe Edition includes the base game and the original soundtrack, featuring tracks composed by Sander van Zanten.

name: Dear Girl: Stories Hibiki - Hibiki Tokkun Daisakusen!
summary: Dear Girl: Stories Hibiki - Hibiki Tokkun Daisakusen! is an visual novel game, developed by HuneX and published by ASCII Media Works, which was released in Japan in 2009.

name: Demonschool
summary: Demonschool is a new-style tactics RPG where motion equals action. Defeat big weirdos in between the human and demon worlds as Faye and her misfit companions, while navigating university life on a mysterious island.

name: Desert Revenant
summary: Desert Revenant is a strategic Roguelike Deck Building RPG packing a huge variety of cards to do battle with. Think about your every move and make careful decisions in hand-crafted encounters as you cut deals with Jinn and humans alike in your adventures amongst the dunes of Elmyr.

name: Decline
summary: A story-driven horror game for Game Boy. Investigate a teacher's murder and deal with the effects of old age. The game features multiple endings based on decisions you make along the way.

name: DeepFriedCraft, the Worst Modpack Ever
summary:
There are no rules. It is up to you regarding how to survive this finely polished grease chunk.

This modpack was the sole source of the Enlightenment through ear trauma, unintended jumpscares, and heartburn. Those who embark this journey are accompanied by The DeepFriedCraft Album, written by Biggie Cheese and edited by Dick Cheney.

name: Depersonalization
summary:
Depersonalization is an COC like RPG game. TRPG! Dice! Cthulhu! Bad End! Multi-branch! A different world starting from zero!
The game consists of multiple modules, each of which has multiple endings and branch routes, striving to build a diverse, themed world.

name: Defying Fate
summary: A top-down bullet hell space shooter where ALL items are obtainable. Blast and shoot your way through hordes of asteroids, enemy ships and whatever (and whoever) else you'll run into on your journey! Supports local co-op multiplayer over your local network.

name: Detective Max: Double Clues
summary: Get ready to solve dozens of puzzles, use your sharp mind, explore mysterious locations and find evidence to find the killer. Can you become a true detective?

name: Dear My God
summary:
You're excited for the first overseas trip. Then you get into a plane crash and…pass away! Waking up to a village on the border between life and death, realizing that you’ve lost all your memories, and can’t even remember your name…?

"Follow the path given to you now. I'll record everything till the end of you...” You will end up staying there forever if you fail to recall your name! The ending you will be facing is… A new life? Or…. Death?

"To live...I must keep in touch with the Gods?"

The choices for survival, and romance that bloom in them,
Experience it with Dear My God

name: Dead or Alive: Code Chronos
summary: Dead or Alive: Code Chronos is a cancelled game from the Dead or Alive series. During a interview with Play Magazine in July, 2006, Tomonobu Itagaki stated that Code Chronos would be a prequel to the Dead or Alive series, and would relay the story of Ayane and Kasumi before the first tournament.

name: Death Game
summary:
While attending a mysterious party with your best friend, you find yourselves knocked out and kidnapped. When you wake up, you find yourself in an unfamiliar room with several other people captured the same way.

A masked man introduces himself as the Game Master and says you’ve all been chosen to play a game. The rules are simple.

There is a killer among you. Every three days, you will need to vote for someone to be executed. If the winner of the vote is the killer, you can go free. The game will continue until the killer is found—or until all of you die.

Who is the Game Master? Why has he brought you here? And most importantly of all…

Can you survive the game?

Is one of the eight people trapped in the game with you really a murderer? Is one of them working with the Game Master? As paranoia and suspicion threaten to drive you apart, you must search for every clue… and although you might fall in love along the way, never forget that in this game, one mistake could mean your death.

name: Deer Hunter
summary: Based on "Paintball Deer Hunter", Episode 9 of the first season of the show, you have to hunt the characters dressed as deers with a paintball gun.

name: Decimated
summary: Decimated is a 3rd person multiplayer online survival RPG. Fight against or team up with other players, scavenge loot, transport cargo or VIPs to other locations, collect legal or illegal resources and trade them, hunt legendary creatures, capture territory and build safehouses for their gang.

name: Death's Door: Ultimate Edition
summary: The Ultimate Edition of Death's Door includes a physical version of the game, an exclusive artbook, the official soundtrack CD in a carton sleeve, and a collectable tuck-in box housing all the contents.

name: Desperate: Vladivostok
summary: Desperate: Vladivostok is a Bullet Hell VR action filled game with furious fights and adrenaline shootouts accompanied by dynamic music. Dive into the criminal history of a hired killer in the post-Soviet cyberpunk era and fight with him 'til the bitter end.

name: Derelikt
summary: DERELIKT is a short narrative FPS inspired by Alien Resurrection (PS1, 2000) and Doom 3 (PC, 2004), with a dash of cosmic horror. It aims to recreate the PS1 aesthetic as faithfully as possible.

name: Dee's Nuts
summary: Dee is a squirrel, who lives in a tree. Like any squirrel, Dee must collect nuts for the winter. Dee needs your help to collect as many nuts as possible and store them in the tree. Along the way, you will have to dodge threats from above and collect power-ups to aid you.

name: De Blob 2
