summary: de Blob 2 is a platformer/puzzle game. Despite it having the same name as the Wii, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 versions, it has a completely different story and landmarks. It is set just after de Blob but before the home consoles version of de Blob 2.

name: DEPO: Death Epileptic Pixel Origins
summary: DEPO is a first person 3D platformer where you control a rebel pixel inside a computer with an evil Operating System governing everything. You'll find final bosses, cinematic scenes, arcade mini-games, 50 huge levels full of surprises, ¡and big stories to discover!

name: Death Noodle Delivery
summary:
It's your first day of work for Death Noodle Delivery Inc. Ride your hoverboard and try to survive in a cyberpunk world on the brink of collapse. Deliver the noodles, hack the hoverboard and build cat bombs. You may find that this world hides a filthy secret.

Upgrade your old hoverboard from a rusty ironing board to a perfected killing machine. Jailbreak AI paywalls and unlock new power-ups that let you manipulate time and launch explosive cats!

Talk to your neighbours and find out their dirty stories. Browse the web for hacks and pleasure. Survive long enough, and you may discover that this world hides a terrible secret.

name: Devil's Deck: Astray Destiny
summary: This content requires the base game Devil's Deck on Steam in order to play.

name: Deadly Night
summary: Carol is down on her luck, hitchhiking across the country. She arrives at a small roadside motel but there's something strange about the owner. As the secrets unravel, she finds herself entangled in a long, DEADLY NIGHT! Can she escape from hellish nightmare or will she die trying?

name: Deep Alchemy Dungeon
summary: D.A.D. is a dungeon crawling game were alchemy skills play crucial role. Young witch ominous plans were destroyed when she was put in a jail. But she founds ancient laboratory full of secrets and new shining perspectives behind the broken wall.

name: Desstroke
summary: Desstroke - is a masterpiece of game industry, цруку you can damage everything you see, and have fun. You can blow everything up, or even jump from the balcony, that's on you. Oh, and SOON you will play with your buddies in a battle royale with cars, many guns and unforgettable community.

name: Defenders of Asteria
summary: The time has come to defend your lands from the hordes invading forces. Build up your defenses and summon mighty heroes to aid you as you become one of the Defenders of Asteria!

name: Detective Fantasia DX
summary: A corpse has been found on the beach! Explore a summery island to gather clues and uncover the truth in this mystery game, Detective Fantasia DX!

name: Deer Journey
summary: Deer Journey is a third person walking simulator game. Outcasted by the other deers, an albino fawn is forced to go deep into the forest to find a place to live. Join him on his journey through a world too big for which he may not be yet ready.

name: Deadnaut: Signal Lost
summary: Deadnaut: Signal Lost is a sci-fi horror turn-based roguelike where loyalty isn't earned - it's installed. Scavenge derelict ships and abandoned moons filled with hellish creatures, brutal AI and insanity storms. Gather gear and upgrades to fight or evade the hi-tech supersoldiers hunting you down.

name: De'Vine: Heavenly Acres
summary: Welcome to your farm on Heavenly Acres! Farmland that presents many opportunities. Harvest trees & plants. Grow Crops. Romance with other misfits. Collect up to 200 unique monsters and compete with monster battles! Indulge in the underground for buried treasure and dangerous monsters!

name: Death Bind
summary: Slay zombies in this topdown solo/coop shooter. Both characters are always back to back, try to synchronize with your partner.

name: Destoria: The Withering
summary: Destoria: The Withering is a mini top down shooter game with a sole objective to survive as many waves as possible.

name: Demon's Residence
summary: You've been called in to value the residence before it gets put in sale. Explore & Solve the mysteries of the Residence while being watched from many angles. Sometimes it's better to stay quiet...

name: Deep Sea Fishing Mania
summary:
Can you find secret treasures buried under the sea?
Catch as many fishes as you can!
Improve your fishing line to go deeper and catch more fish!
Now go and explore the ocean and all it's hidden treasures! You'll get hooked before you know it!

name: Devils 'n Dragons Arcade
summary: Devils 'n Dragons is a 2D run and fight platformer turned on arcade action in a medieval fantasy world.

name: Delivery Quest
summary: Deliver the package and escape the cursed sword.

name: Dead Train
summary: A zombie survival game that takes place in a post-apocalyptic wasteland. You must manage your food and water carefully because resources are limited. You need to make your way to the end of the railway and back to civilization.

name: Descension
summary: Descension is a Horror themed FPS That features FREE episodic releases, and large open-world environments.

name: Dead Oculus
summary: Dead Oculus is a lethal fast-paced bullet-hell where you can brutalize your foes by wielding custom weapons with cataclysmic attachments

name: Death Bowl
summary: Death Bowl is a 2D precision platformer where you race through a deadly obstacle course to compete for the fastest time. The odds are against you, but with the help of experimental drugs, you just might live to see another day.

name: Death's Playground
summary: Enjoy scaring your friends or other players so much they might get a heart attack or try to survive from the horrors of the haunted locations in this Asymmetrical Multiplayer Psychological Horror Game! Death's Playground brings the single-player horror games experience into the multiplayer world.

name: Death Leak
summary: Death Leak is a 2d twin-stick shooter/platformer with an emphasis on exploration. Use the gamepad to fire throwing knives while avoiding enemy projectiles. Explore the world and figure out what caused the massacre of your village.

name: Demons and Altar
summary: Demons and Altar is a challenging strategy game. Players will carry out an expedition in the magical world. On the way, players can choose their own route, recruit their own heroes, defeat the emerging enemies, and finally defeat the great demon king.

name: Deepening Fire
summary: Deepening Fire is a soulslike horizontal scroll action single-player game. You'll take a solo adventure in the Rhost Kingdom to challenge the powerful enemies, choose a variety of weapons, put on strong armor, and defeat the most terrifying enemies with precise blocking. Explore hidden levels, collect story pieces, and reveal ancient secrets of the Rhost Kingdom.

name: Deal or No Deal: Secret Vault Games
Def Jam Fight for NY Mobile
Decisive Battles of WWII: Ardennes Offensive
summary:
Decisive Battles of WWII: Ardennes Offensive is a computer wargame developed by the Strategic Studies Group. The game depicts the historic World War II battle known as the Battle of the Bulge.

Ardennes Offensive is the first game in the Decisive Battles of World War II series.

name: Dead District: Survival
summary: Dead District is a multiplayer and single-player survival sandbox game in an open world where the player has a wide range of options.

name: Detective Conan: Kiganshima Hihou Densetsu
summary: Legend of the Treasure of Strange Rock Island is a game for the Game Boy Color, and the second Game Boy Color game in the series. In this game, Conan, Ran, Kogoro, Sonoko, and the Detective Boys all visit an island where a murder as occurred.

name: Demon Go!
summary: A little demon determined to escape from a terrible hell! Jump and dash to the last gate of hell to avoid enemies and obstacles. The terrible demons will try to stop us from escaping, If you rescue the cute cat and clear the challenge, you will definitely escape! Just remember jump and dash!

name: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles: Tengen Uzui Character Pack
summary: Tengen Uzui will become a playable character. Additional contents such as quotes and profile photos will also be included.

name: Death Slave
summary: Death Slave is a 2D puzzle-platformer where the player must intelligently kill their character in different ways to gain new powers to solve platforming challenges.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Season 2 - Rival Escalation
summary: Rivals are setting up new communications equipment, which must be shut down! In the all-new rival signal Season Event, you must interrupt the operation of the Rival Communications Router, hack its Antenna Nodes and shut it down before the timer runs out and the entire thing discharges a lethal energy blast! Timing and precision will be of the essence if you want to obtain the Data Cell stored inside the Router!

name: Death School
summary:
Your life in high school seemed pretty normal. You go to class, study, hang out with friends and generally just do what every other high school student does. But one day, a mysterious and beautiful transfer student joins your class and she says that there's something evil lurking in your school. You and the others pass it off as just her overactive imagination.

The day ends and you're about to head home when you come to a terrifying discovery… You're trapped in the school by a mysterious force! Luckily, you're not alone. Your childhood friend, the head of the literature club you're a part of and the transfer student have also been trapped in the school. However, you quickly discover that the evil force that is in the school wants you dead…

Will you be able to evade deadly traps and escape the curse of a vengeful ghost?

name: Dekabès Domino
summary: This game is about double six domino, a very old board game played all over the world with different rules. The rules in this mobile app is based on the way the game is played in Haiti. Also it is played the same way in most of the Caribbean.

name: Demon Hunter High School
summary:
Fifty years ago, the first demon appeared. Now, they're everywhere.

Roaming the streets and threatening the lives of anyone they encounter, the demonic terror has taken over.

As a commander-in-training at the National School of Exorcists, your job is to not only hunt down demons, but to train others as well. Your latest assignment is to tutor a new unit of strong, beautiful women with clashing personalities.

Will you be able to get your group working together, or will you fall apart in the face of overwhelming odds?

name: Dead or Alive
summary: Cowboy game for the c64.

name: Deadrop
summary: Deadrop is a vertical extraction shooter (VES). With a focus on Arena style combat, battle royale sized lobbies and vertical extraction. A unique first person shooter where one must climb to the tippy top if they want to be the best and find the best loot. Shooting other players and other ai at the same time.

name: Dead or Alive 5: Collector's Edition
summary:
In western territories the Collectors Edition includes:
- A copy of Dead or Alive 5 (PlayStation 3 or Xbox 360)
- A premium embossed steel case for packaging
- A exclusive 92-page hardcover art book, with character renders, costume concept art and screenshots of stages.
- A 20-track CD of the official game soundtrack.
- A full-color wall poster, featuring most of the playable cast.
- A code for the "Premium Swimsuit" Costume DLC for the full cast of playable female characters in the game.

The Japanese Collectors Edition is slightly different, it includes:
- A copy of Dead or Alive 5 (PlayStation 3 or Xbox 360)
- A Premium embossed steel case for packaging
- A exclusive hardcover art book
- A CD of the official game soundtrack
- 10 character postcards
- 10 metal "character plates"
- A code for "Premium Swimsuit Costumes" DLC for the full cast of playable female characters in the game.

name: Dee Dee Planet
summary: Dee Dee Planet was intended to follow ChuChu Rocket! as part of a series of Dreamcast network games, but was cancelled last minute. Lost for two decades, the final beta has been found and dumped online for you all to enjoy!

name: Demolish & Build 3
summary: In Demolish & Build 3 you play as the owner of a demolition company. Accept contracts and complete them yourself or delegate them to your workers. Use powerful equipment, from sledgehammers to giant cranes. Manage your company by hiring workers and buying new vehicles and properties.

name: Deer Nightmare
summary: Deer Nightmare - A 2D runner in which the player dodges approaching deer that can run over the girl, and the player who takes control tries to prevent this by collecting medicines and accumulating distance points. Game Features:

name: Delusional
summary: When Kevin, the burglar, gets lost in the woods, he comes across an old abandoned mansion nearby. Later on, he'd decided to rob this mansion. However, he later discovers that the mansion he is attempting to rob is owned by an ex-doctor who is now known as a wanted Psychopathic Murderer.

name: Deneb: Across the Stars
summary: “Deneb: Across the Stars” is a mouse only, top-down, hardcore-platformer. Astronaut Vega crosses the stars to find her lost colleague Altair and save the dogs. Move carefully. A single mistake can lead to an endless fall.

name: Descentium
summary: Whilst researching the mysterious new element Descentium, A remote facility in Southeast Asia has gone radio silent. Alina, an elite operative who works for Descent Laboratories has been sent to investigate. Will Alina discover the secrets of the temple or fall into madness?

name: Deepfield
summary: Deepfield is a sandbox RTS set in the tiny world of microbiology. Deepfield's microverse is alive and contains many biomes, each with their own mix of environmental mechanics and unique enemy types. Find and exploit resources, multiply in number and expand your territory to fend off extinction.

name: Delicious Dungeon
summary: Delicious Dungeon is a combination of action-adventure and simulation game. The player is the owner of a local restaurant in a fantasy world. But to run the restaurant they have to explore dungeons full of dangers and enemies to get the ingredients needed to cook delicious meals for their guests.

name: Deus Novum
summary: Deus Novum is the god game you've been waiting for. Cast miracles with the power of your villager's prayer, train your creature to behave or misbehave, build elaborate villages, and fight back against the forces of evil.

name: Devi: A light in the Dark
summary: Uncover hidden truths in a remote Indian village where a teenage girl has vanished without a trace. Step into the shoes of Devi, an amateur sleuth with a passion for detective novels, as she defies her parents' wishes to embark on a perilous journey to find her missing friend.

name: Demolish & Build 3: Excavator Playground
summary: Demolish & Build 3: Excavator Playground is a playable sneak peek at the driving and demolition physics from the upcoming Demolition & Build 3. In the game, you take control of a modern excavator and drive around a small test track or demolish structures.

name: Debugger Recoded
summary: The Developer messed it up, his games are full of errors and bugs and nobody will buy it! Take control of Debugger 3.16 and find and delete all bugs the Developer produced. Explore with up to 3 friends different game worlds, meet the inhabitants and bring their games back to life!

name: DeckBuilder Village
summary: DeckBuilder Village is a deck-village builder where you play your cards to fight, explore, survive, defend and expand your village. Fight creatures, collect resources, build structures, explore dungeons, unlock secrets, craft and much more!

name: Delivery INC
summary: Delivery INC is a fast-paced time management game where you’ll be challenged with quick decision making and planning. Build a fleet of vehicles and drivers. Pick up deliveries and drop them off as quickly as possible. Put your logic and delivery skills to the test in any real-world city.

name: Demonheart: The Ice Demon
summary: Play as the young witch Shar, as she moves in with a famous witch who keeps demonic prisoners in her basement. Will Shar find romance or doom?

name: Demon Tomb
summary: A first-person survival horror game, solve puzzles and search for supplies to arm yourself with as you explore to uncover the secrets of an old mansion. Fight, run or hide from all sorts of twisted horrors.

name: Devil Girl Ivlin
summary: The story stars Ivlin, an iteration of Ivlis who has been transformed into a girl by Sataneko-chan, as the protagonist. It revolves around Ivlin and her misfortunate encounters with Evil Devil S.T.N., the enigmatic Salty Licorice Mask, and the mysterious Devil Girl Satanica-chan.

name: Dead by Daylight: Resident Evil - Project W
summary:
Experience true evolution in Dead by Daylight: Resident Evil - Project W.

This Chapter features a new Killer – Albert Wesker, The Mastermind – and 2 new Survivors, Ada Wong and Rebecca Chambers. The Raccoon City Police Department Map has also been reworked.

name: Desktopia: A Desktop Village Simulator
summary: Desktopia: A Desktop Village Simulator is a city-builder game which simulates an evolving, medieval-esque village along the bottom of your desktop, allowing you to work, watch, or browse something else while you play.

name: Death Below
summary: Death Below - is a third-person action adventure with elements of survival horror. The plot of the game is based on the legend of the Soviet experiment of the 1940s.You will plunge into a dark world, and begin an exciting investigation, fighting on your way with thousands of distraught people

name: Deck of Life
summary: No turns, individual card permadeath. Construct defenses while launching projectiles to destroy your opponent's cards. Beat enemies and events to win cards from unique card pools. If all your cards are destroyed, you die.

name: DeFi Land
summary: DeFi Land is the place to enjoy a farming, fishing, gardening and other relaxing activities. Users can build their villages, interact with other players and NPCs to craft the most precious items, compete for the leaderboards and revive the inner farmers in them.

name: Dead By Daylight: Resident Evil Collaboration Bundle
summary: All characters from Resident Evil, in a single affordable DLC for Dead By Daylight!

name: Der Blaue Diamant: Additional mission
summary: In this additional mission, you're able to do a very little mission in which you have to find a boy's Smartphone and bring it back to him.

name: Defiled
summary: Slay the night creatures and save the church, you are the last hope! Defiled is a time survival medieval game with rogue-lite elements, where you choose your character's path and slay hundreds of enemies on your way.

name: Deus Ex: Nihilum
summary: DXN - Deus Ex: Nihilum is a 2013 total conversion mod for Deus Ex. Set in an Alternate Universe of Deus Ex in the year 2049, it follows the first nano-augmented UNATCO agent Mad Ingram as he heads to Hong Kong in order to solve the mystery of a terrorist attack committed in Shenzhen, and stumbles upon a conspiracy in the process.

name: Devil Beauty & Animal Cuties!
summary: Survive high school and find love with a beautiful devil and two half-animal cuties!

name: Dexter Stardust
summary: Space! Dexter Stardust barely escaped when the Vreesians, inhabitants of the menacing Planet X, sent a fleet of robots to destroy all life on Earth. Now, twenty years later, a mechanical man from the 10th planet seeks to communicate with Dexter a very important message - he is the key to saving both humans and Vreesians! Play the taco-loving Dexter Stardust as he, and his good friend Aurora, go on the greatest adventure of their lives and discover the mystery of the Robot from the Planet X!

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Nezuko Advanced Demon Form
summary: Nezuko Kamado (Advanced Demon Form) will become a playable character.

name: D.E.V Bloodline
summary: D.E.V Bloodline is a Indie Horrorgame You find you self in your Residental Area with nothing but Darkness, can you arrive from the shadows or do you fall victim to them ?!

name: Desktop Dungeons: Rewind
summary: Desktop Dungeons: Rewind bestows bites of tactical roguelike action, which will quickly fester into a deep, lingering, and strategic obsession. Bargain with gods, equip your spoon and pick your battles, before retreating into the healing darkness. But beware… there are still many monsters to face!

name: Delta Dash
summary:
Delta Dash is a rhythm game in active development,

2 Lines, 4 keys, keep the rhythm !

name: Dead Pets: A Punk Rock Slice of Life Sim
summary: Struggling punk band, Dead Pets, are still looking for their breakthrough after almost 10 years. Gordy has big plans for the group, but when you turn 30, life starts to get in the way. Dead Pets Unleashed is a narrative, slice of life and management-lite game; get ready to unleash your inner demon.

name: Dead Beacon
summary: Dead Beacon is a first-person survival horror inspired by 1990s games and taking place in the Beacon manor, a location crawling with zombies and creatures governed by a malevolent will. Survive using the given array of weapons and escape the island.

name: Dengeki no Pilot: Tenkuu no Kizuna
summary:
Our protagonist Hugo lives a peaceful life, far away from war in a remote country named Portland. One day, Hugo witnesses a plane crash and hurriedly checks for survivors. On board he finds only a single girl, Fiona, who is chased by armed forces.
Hugo, without fully comprehending what is going on, sees himself forced to use his late fathers robot Pirot in order to protect Fiona and flee with her.
Eventually their adventure leads them on board of the floating battleship Starlight.
Thats when the cogwheel of destiny starts to spin.

name: Delisoba Deluxe
summary:
A driving/racing game for Sega Saturn developed by CAVE and TBS Television.

It was made as a tie-in to TBS's mid-1990s Japanese game show Tokyo Friend Park, where one of the games, Delisoba ("delivery soba"), had celebrities command a virtual motorcycle trying to deliver soba to the TBS TV Studios. Deluxe is a "port" of this game to the Saturn, which adds features such as a time attack and track editor, and was not sold in stores, but rather given away at the show (either to winners or to audience members, exactly what is unknown).

name: Devil War
summary:
Devil War is a 3D first-person shooting game. Doom is coming, take your sniper, ready to eliminate all devils and save human!

Experience the sniper action game! Are you ready for the challenges?

name: Destiny 2: The Witch Queen - Season of Plunder
summary: Eramis, awoken from her icy prison by a Dark benefactor, has rallied old pirate lords of Eliksni legend to assist her in recovering lost relics of great power... unless you plunder them first. There is no horizon to reach, no edge to your map, but there most certainly is treasure. Assemble your crew, Guardian.

name: Dead Island 2: Gold Edition
summary: The Gold Edition includes the Expansion Pass. A deadly virus is spreading across Los Angeles, turning its inhabitants into zombies. Survive, evolve and become the ultimate Zombie Slayer.

name: Dead Island 2: Deluxe Edition
summary: The Deluxe Edition includes two premium character packs, featuring a unique costume and weapon, and the Golden Weapons Pack. Pre-purchase now and get the Memories of Banoi pack, with two weapons, a special weapon perk and skill card.

name: Dehoarder 2
summary: Dehoarder 2 is a simulation where you take control of the life of Harry the Hilldale Hoarder. You must help Harry to get his life in order before the building inspector fines him into oblivion and forecloses on the family home. But change comes hard for Harry, and at first he will only be willing to part with the simplest of things.

name: Desert Journey
summary: Join this Desert Journey thorough the desert in the car. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Defender of the Oasis
summary:
Ufair, an Eastern Prince with courage beyond compare, has been sent by his father, Sultan Aqwa, to confront an evil growing within the kingdom.

Alone and outnumbered, armed with his bravery and skill, Ufair voyages far and wide across the desert dunes of his land.

It is with good fortune that Ufair always carries with him his trusty bow and quiver, luckily he will be able to acquire upgrades along the way to defeat the dark hordes sent forth by the evil Dragon Djinn, Azi Dahaka.

With the Sultan's army frozen by black magic, it is up to Ufair to push back the evil tide and undo the wicked plot set in motion; to poison the kingdom's most precious magic oasis with the blackest sorcery.

Sporting charming graphical design, this old school 2D take on the physics tower defence genre will enthral both the young and the old. Play today and see if you can beat your friends' scores!

name: Desert Journey: Nitro
summary: Join this Desert Journey thorough the desert in the pimped car with nitro. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Demo Disc: Spectral Mall
summary:
In the before-time - your childhood, or perhaps those of your forebears - the mall stood king among shopping locales. People of all kinds flocked to them, swarming store after store, purchasing copious amounts of tie-dyed fabric and greasy food and novelty knives. But now the people are ,dead, and the corporate catacombs stand silent. Their only customers now are rats and cockroaches.

Of late, though, there have been murmurs in the emptiness - flashes of too-bright colors, flickers of wires and flesh, strangled electric sounds, almost like screams. Brave or foolish souls have returned to the sites of their pasts, spurred by curiosity. The few who have returned, amidst their gibbering, mad cries, spoke of change. Storefronts peddling wares that they do not contain, advertisements that flicker in the corner of one's eye, and distant, echoing footsteps, coming from everywhere and nowhere in the dust-suffused halls.

Your town bore one such decrepit mall, a hopeful tourist destination long since abandoned by the few teens that frequented it. Yet you find yourself standing before it in the gloom, for the first time in years. Lights flicker from within, tinny music emanates from disconnected speakers. And a phrase burns in your mind as if carved with a burning knife...

name: Destination Bangkok
summary: Try to escape a treacherous thailandese temple !

name: Dead Island 2: Day One Edition
summary:
Dead Island 2 takes players across the most iconic locations of the City of Angels, now stained with horror, in an exciting pulp journey from the verdant suburbia of Beverly Hills to the quirky promenade of Venice Beach.
Combat delivers the most intense, visceral and gory first person experience possible, with plenty of weapons and tactical (and brutal) options to chew your way through the zombie horde.

Day 1 Edition includes:
- The Memories of Banoi Pack
- Banoi War Club
- Memories of Banoi Baseball Bat
- Weapon Perk – balanced
- Personal space skill card

name: Deep City
summary:
A small game for the PS1 Horror Jam 2021 made by Felix Kraus with audio by Viktor Kraus.
You started your journey on this rusty boat a long time ago. One night you are woken by an unusual noise and you get dragged down below.

name: Dead Island 2: Hell-a Edition
summary:
Dead Island 2 takes players across the most iconic locations of the City of Angels, now stained with horror, in an exciting pulp journey from the verdant suburbia of Beverly Hills to the quirky promenade of Venice Beach.

HELL-A Edition includes:
- Steelbook
- Season expansion pass
- Venice Beach travel map
- 6 slayer Tarot Cards
- 2 pin badges
- 1 patch
- 1 bonus weapons pack
- 2 additional DLC packs
- Memories of Banoi Pack

name: Death Architect
summary: Death Architect is a 3rd person action adventure shooter. A combination of slow atmospheric immersion in the dark, sinister atmosphere of a dystopian future world and intense gunfights

name: Deathrun Guys
summary:
Deathrun Guys is an online PvP platform racing game.
Race in competitive mode or against your friends in this frenetic race that features a Bunnyhop mechanic to gain speed while jumping.
Run, jump and knock your enemies off the platforms to win the race and secure your trophy.

name: Delicious Solitaire
summary: Delicous Solitaire cleverly combines themes like palate-pleasing and kitchen dreams with a popular card game. Unlock many solitaire levels with very appetizing looking backgrounds and enjoy different solitaire variations with a matching set of cards.

name: DecayLore
summary: We always thought that our annihilation as mankind would be different, something epic and straight out of an action movie… but it wasn’t. there was no zombie apocalypse, no nuclear war… just our own demons taking over us… nobody knows why all of this happened and at this point, nobody really cares either. People only care about survival and holding on to their humanity along the way. But it’s hard to live like an animal and not to feel like one. So, they are holding on to the only thing that made them different in the first place; imagination, creating something and mixing knowledge with art… literature.

name: Destroy All Humans! Crypto Does Vegas
Destroy All Humans!
summary: Destroy All Humans! was a tie-in mobile phone game of the PlayStation 2 and Xbox versions of the game. The game could be downloaded by texting CRYPTO101 to 69847 (MYTYHQ).

name: Death in the Night
summary: A puzzle platformer with deadly dangers.

name: Death or Treat
summary: “Death or Treat” is an action rogue-lite, Hack and Slash and 2D with traditional animations and handpainted environments.You will play as Scary, the owner of Ghost Mart. The Halloween spirit is missing. Join Scary to save HallowTown.

name: Death Rattle: Evil Onslaught
summary: Fight your way through the realm of Ulliadore on a quest that balances the fate of the entire realm. Use a variety of ancient and epic weapons to vanquish your foes. Find enemies weaknesses and avoid their strengths as you battle to become the ultimate warrior and protector of the realm.

name: Deathwish
summary: Trapped, Alone and long away from real world, a man must make his way through dangerous places to find a way out

name: Deception
summary: Deception is co-op horror survival party game. Stop one of your friends who turned into an evil monster from killing you and your teammates. Gather puzzle hints and communicate with your hacker teammate and solve puzzles to escape the evil forest.

name: Decks Against Destiny
summary: Decks Against Destiny is a rogue-like, card collecting, tactics game where the player makes decisions in an overworld that determine in-game events to impact reputation with various factions. A ticking clock to an ending battle is looming, so decisions must be made to determine fate.

name: Devi & Pii
summary: A new Sega Genesis/Mega Drive game released on the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive Mini 2.

name: Deadshot
summary:
Deadshot.io is a CS:GO style IO game that you can play right now within your browser at https://deadshot.io

As a highly skilled FPS Shooter, you have 4 different maps to master, along with 4 different weapon classes you can use. Taking inspiration from other games, Deadshot allows a quick and efficient movement system that allows you to slide around the map and confuse your enemies. This game is constantly in development, so expect many more exciting features coming soon!

name: Demon Path: Tower of Armagor
summary: The game focuses on the adventure of a demon who decides to leave the planet by finding a portal. Reach the bottom of the tower, overcoming 1,000 randomly generated levels. Build a base for defense and recovery. Maybe you will succeed...

name: Devil Devour Alive DX
summary: Devil Devour Alive DX is a pick-up-and-play occult themed arcade game with an over the top 90s style. It supports vertical screen orientation, online leaderboards, and unlockables. It also features retro 32-bit era style graphics, CRT shader, and spooky synth-wave music.

name: Devoured by Darkness
summary: A nerve-wracking walk into the wilds of the unknown.

name: Defcon 1: Alien Invasion
summary:
Defcon 1: Alien Invasion is the best experience in strategy and realistic simulation.
Take control of an Alien breed, select a target country and begin a cosmic war against humankind for Earth control. Remember, you need to use all your hi-tech powers to destroy the humans and leave no one alive!

name: Demonrock: War of Ages
summary: Demonrock: War of Ages is a reverse defense game with beautiful 3D graphics and intuitive game play. Lead your hero's soldiers to victory against hordes of monsters.

name: Dead Invaders: Modern War 3D
summary: Become the last line of defence and save humankind from an alien invasion!

name: Death of a Pet
summary: A short and disturbing little horror game about the tragedy of losing a pet.

name: Dereism
summary: Dereism is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame where you control a girl called Mayu and explore different worlds. The goal is explore and collect Flowers (effects).

name: Dead Like Ants
summary: You play as a young woman in red overalls, a red worker ant. Every spring, five dangerous creatures visit the tree and threaten the village, and every spring, the Queen sends one of her daughters to negotiate with them. This spring, the Queen wants you to be that daughter.

name: Dead Second
summary:
Second' bullet time reaction system with high fidelity impact physics reactions. Experience Intense shoot outs and gunplay unlike any game before it!

You're a righteous 'GUN FOR HIRE' taking care of the CORRUPT and WICKED throughout the city.​

Governments have fallen into disarray, Corporations and Private Military Contractors rule the streets.​

Take on a series of 'ASSIGNMENTS' and make them pay!​

The 'DEAD SECOND' is a bullet time reaction system. ​

Defeating an enemy activates a momentary bullet time slow motion giving you a chance to dodge incoming enemy fire. Chaining a quick succession of takedowns boosts your Score, Time & Accuracy points.

Progress through the Ranks and unlock additional Guns & Cosmetics on your way to the top of the Leaderboards.

name: Dead of Winter
summary: Build, gather and defend against relentless hordes of undead as you lead your villagers to safety and battle for survival in a world plunged into a seemingly endless winter

name: Deitrus
summary: In Deitrus, heroes are forced to fight for the sake of their techno fantasy world through fast-paced, grid-based, combat, but not everyone is up to the task…

name: Devil's Island
summary: Devil's Island is an FPS with elements of survival, maintained in a horror atmosphere with post-apocalyptic themes in a world that has already ended. This is a game whose history combines what has long been forgotten with what may yet come.

name: Death by Refund
summary: When you hire private detective Frederick Ugarte for a job, be sure you don't change your mind, or you might get a refund you couldn't even begin to imagine.

name: Destroiders
summary: No nonsense, action packed, 2.5D, Asteroids inspired shooter. Scream around speeding rocks narrowly avoiding an untimely death as you obliterate rocks whilst harvesting their valuable resources. See how far you and your friends can get. Best played with mates but also pretty fun on your own.

name: Dexter Stardust: Returns to Outer Space
summary: An SNES-Inspired, platforming, sci-fi adventure. It's like playing a Saturday Morning Cartoon!

name: Detonation Sauce University
summary: This is a checkpoint game, you always encounter things on the way to school delay, to the school and was scolded by the teacher, also often encounter campus bullying, can not go on like this, take up arms for their own honor fight, remove all obstacles chasing their own life!

name: Deep Abyss
summary: Become a diver yourself to explore the unknown. Take a trip to your deep abyss. Experience a poetic and fantastic world as you explore the deep sea and space.

name: Department of the Devil
summary: You're trapped in hell for all eternity - at least, that's what the paperwork says. Can you escape by snooping around the private office of The Devil himself? Or will you get caught by his watchful eye?

name: Destroyed Aperture
summary: Aperture Science Experimental Facility #7 is empty. Following the failure of the central core, the complex has been consumed by overgrowth and decay. With the exits sealed, David Grayling is trapped, with no recollection of his past. Will he ever regain his memories and discover the truth?

name: Delivery Driver: The Simulation
summary: You are a delivery driver, your primary job duties include ensuring successful transfer and delivery of goods to intended destinations.

name: Death of the Reprobate
summary: Explore a world built from the luscious landscapes, turbulent townscapes and preposterous portraits of real Renaissance paintings. Death of the Reprobate is a Rabelaisian point and click adventure from the creator of Four Last Things and The Procession to Calvary.

name: Death Walk
summary: The world is different. The virus has changed people, they are alive, well I think. they have become canibal. I don't understand, am I too infested? can mankind still be saved?

name: Delilah
summary: Eastern Europe is the newest Circle of Hell, but outside its walls things aren't much better. Relentless action, pixelated gore, 256 colors. That is Delilah.

name: Defend Homeland
summary: "Defend Homeland" is a first-person shooting fantasy defense games, will play a medieval archers, in order to survive in this cruel world can only beat back the enemy.

name: Desordre: A Puzzle Game Adventure
summary: Desordre is a first-person puzzle game, inspired by the Portal series, in which you solve each puzzle by traveling through two timelines the same room. You have at your disposal a portal gun and the ability to slow down time.

name: Death off the Cuff
summary:
They all stare at you expectantly, like children waiting to be told a bedtime story. Who can blame them? You are, after all, Antoine Saint Germain, the great French detective. No criminal has ever been a match for you, and everybody is looking forward to a description of your brilliant deductions.

There is just one small problem. One tiny detail that makes it different this time. A mere trifle, really. This time you have no idea who did it.

name: Deadline Enchanter
summary:
This is where I end and you begin. That, at least, is what I want to think. I don’t know you. Perhaps one day I will. But this Implementation-rather, its copies-are my seeds blowing to the wind. The palm-parsers, their oak gears whirring, will be pressed into hands long after I finish this. Hands like yours.

A metatextual work of interactive fiction by Anya Johanna DeNiro.

name: Deal or No Deal: The Interactive DVD Game Show
summary: DVD version of Deal or No Deal lets you play the popular game in front of your TV.

name: Demon Seed
summary: First-person survival game set in the early stages of an apocalypse. Explore urban areas filled with brainless demons. Find what you really want or become one of THEM.

name: Devin and the Celestial Necropolis
summary: You've died. You're dead. But do not despair, Devin is here - with his excellent business sense, winning smile, and beautiful Celestial Necropolis. All is well. Trust Devin. He is your only friend.

name: Devil May Cry 3: Dante's Awakening - Special Edition
summary:
An HD remaster of Devil May Cry 3: Dante's Awakening - Special Edition.

This edition includes all of the Special Edition content, including the ability to play as Vergil, and even includes extra bonus features exclusive to the Nintendo Switch, such as "Free Style mode," which enables you to switch freely between fighting styles; the abilty to switch between all unlocked weapons at any time; and finally, play "Bloody Palace mode" in local co-op.

Set before the events of the original Devil May Cry, this action classic sees Dante facing off against his twin brother, Vergil, who has designs on unlocking a gate to the demonic realm, to which Dante himself holds the key.

name: Devil May Cry Triple Pack
summary:
Includes Devil May Cry 1, 2, and 3 Special Edition.

Devil May Cry 3 Special Edition contains Switch exclusive features with "Free Style mode," which allows players to use all unlocked weapons at any time with a newly added radial menu, and to switch between combat styles mid-combat. Bloody Palace mode also has a new local co-op feature.

name: Devil May Cry HD Collection & 4 Special Edition Bundle
summary: This bundle contains Devil May Cry, Devil May Cry 2, Devil May Cry 3 Special Edition, and Devil May Cry 4 Special Edition.

name: Death Corp
summary: Death Corp is a classic 2D Point and Click Adventure game where you play as the young new intern for Death's own company.

name: Deer-Napped
summary: The player is a ninja working for Santa and must rescue his reindeer from the Abominable Snowpeople.

name: Desi Adda: Games of India
summary: Desi Adda consists of a collection of cultural games from India, based on traditional Indian sports. These include Kite Fighting, Kabaddi, Pachisi, Bagh-Chal and Gilli-Danda. The player is placed in an Indian village, where they can play the different games with other villagers and converse with them. The player will learn from the villagers of a couple in love, and must interact with different villagers in order to progress the story. An additional beat-matching dance game is unlocked by completing the story. The game is in four languages: English, Hindi, Tamil and Punjabi.

name: Detective Stories
summary: You are a detective who has to solve mystery and cold cases. Only a few clues will help finding murderer. Was it just an accident or a murder? Thief broke in to steal something? Money? Or was it just a broken heart revenge? Well, you`ve got a chance to solve this case...

name: Detective Grimoire
summary:
At 10:28 last night, a body was found at the local Fairground that operates just outside of town. The cleaner, one Jerry Spears, discovered the dead body of his former colleague, Hugh Everton, inside the Hall of Mirrors.

All the evidence points towards murder. The clown, Charles Ringer, who works at the very same fairground, is the main suspect. He seems to have some less than favourable links with the victim.

If this grim case remains unsolved, the Fairground Manager, Mr Gary Coils has stated he will have to "permanently shut down operations."

Private Detective Grimoire has been called in to clear things up. We've got one evening to find the truth about what happened last night. If Grimoire can't solve this mystery, no one can.

name: Defender
summary: A handheld clone of Defender by Gakken.

name: Defeated Girl
summary: Defeated Girl is a jigsaw puzzle.

name: Despot's Game: Collector's Edition
summary: Roguelike, auto-battler, deep progression, gratuitous violence, pretzels!

name: Dennis the Menace Redux
summary:
Dennis the Menace Redux is an overhaul patch to Dennis The Menace on Super Nintendo. Its primary goal is to balance difficulty, add several new mechanics and an SRAM function.

Changes from the base game:

Only Three Big Coins needed to complete a stage (Excluding Autoscroll stages, only 1 is needed)
Timer resets to 999 after losing a life
Weapons now one hit kill lesser enemies
Less invincibility time for bosses
Completing sewers 3 will take you to Sewers boss
Carry coins over to next level and between lives
Collect 49 small coins and Dennis receives full health, 1 Big Coin, 1 Extra Life, and 1 Extra Continue
Game saves with SRAM
SRAM: Saving: Game saves at the start of every level.

name: Dessert Love: Kare to no Hajimari
summary: An 18+ otome visual novel.

name: Dessert Love: Sweet Plus
summary:
Removes sexual content.
Adds two routes.

name: Deep Dungeon
summary: Deep Dungeon is a rogue-lite like you have never seen before. The vast underground caves are dangerous and full of vicious enemies. There's no failsave, no checkpoints. If you die, the run is over!

name: DeerHunterFan.com TV: The Season
summary: Hunt Deer that act and react differently depending on the time of the season, weather and rut stage. Bucks very in size and you will be able to hunt monster bucks that have potential to score well over 200 inches. Each successful hunt gains you EXP and you can purchase / upgrade gear and firearms.

name: Defect detector
summary: Defect detector - A dynamic game for fans of the breakout genre! Find the weak point among hundreds of colored blocks and destroy defect after defect in this exciting game! Collect bonuses, hit the ball accurately and get to the end!

name: Demolish or Die
summary: Demolish or Die is an open world third person action game that takes place in a destructible, dystopian city.

name: Deputinization
summary: Deputinization is run and gun action game focused on boss battles. The game features pixel graphics and music that is rooted in Ukrainian culture.

name: Derp Souls
summary: Flailing, Flatulence. It's fine. Some appliances have kidnapped your blowup doll soulmate, so go save her!

name: Despot's Game: Challenges
summary: Twenty missions on a lunar test site - nothing random, just pure strategy.

name: Detriot
summary: A political satire micro-management arcade game. Balance your time juggling a series of responsiblities in the ever chaotic City of Detroit, and see how long you can last!

name: Demolish Derby: Nitro-Battle
summary: Are you looking for a game where you can have fun destroying your vehicle? Speed up and go crazy in the newest driving game with realistic physics!

name: Deadly Desert
summary: Deadly desert is a survival story of two men, a young boy and his disabled father. It all started with an unfortunate accident in the middle of Nevada desert. Unfortunately, their car broke down on the way. They were waiting a long time for any help and then decided to take life in their own hands.

name: Death Relives
summary: Be prepared for a first-person look on life through the eyes of a teenager, who is trying to escape from mighty Aztec god Xipe Totec. Get ready for a chaotic experience with horror and survival mechanics.

name: Deceptus
summary: Arena PVP Multiplayer with up to 8 Players, pure mayhem, kill and collect famous death coins to unlock and equip up your characters with famous accessories and power-ups on 9 levels and counting.

name: Decopins: Asset Fighters Series
summary: Decopins (meaning flick in japanese) is a tower defense like game with simple click. Don't let Donuts escape from your donuts shop by Clicking! 20 stages, Hell/Death mode, and more. Level up your Decopin and make full use of your MAGIC.

name: Devolution: Maken no Ou to Shimobe-tachi
Detective Super Star
summary: Join the famous Detective Doyle to solve a series of murder cases in this captivating hidden object, adventure game.

name: Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed - Challenge Accepted
summary: Rise to the challenge and test your skills in this DLC that includes all 4 Challenge Modes from Destroy All Humans! (2020) Also included: numerous new Mutators that let you alter the rules of the game!

name: Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed - Challenge Accepted
Deadly Harvest
summary: Defend your farm from an invasion of evil pumpkins in this spooky casual roguelite! Upgrade your weapons and retrieve mystical artifacts to keep the horde at bay and uncover the secret to defeating the legendary Headless Horseman.

name: Demiurges
summary: Demiurges is a strategic roguelike game. Build your deck, develop your city, upgrade your heroes, and defeat your enemies in turn-based battles to save your world from destruction. Immerse yourself in a rich fantasy world. Collect new cards to create new strategies and increase your chances.

name: Dead World Heroes
summary: Dead World Heroes is an RTS-Action game in a Zombie setting. Travel the zombie-plagued country, collect supplies, build a team of survivors, crush the undead hordes!

name: Deathwatch
summary:
Deathwatch is a horror game in which you are tasked to observe haunted locations, log supernatural events and eradicate any potential paranormal threats.
You'll need to keep a keen eye on every camera and even your present location for any supernatural occurrences. Possible events vary from Audio to Victims and paranormal sightings, plus many more. Using your computer systems you must log each event to gather enough data to eliminate the entity, before it eliminates you!
Deathwatch puts you in a vulnerable state where your only chance of survival is to successfully log enough supernatural events in order to survive the night. You need to constantly be aware of your own surroundings because you may not be the only one observing.

name: Dear Magi: Mahou Shounen Gakka
summary: An academy adventure game that is set in a magic school.

name: Dear My Abyss
summary:
One day Subaru receives a weird book from an anonymous sender. The book has a putrid smell and is sealed. Within it is a message stating that she should never read it and that it’s impossible to dispose of, even by burning or cutting it to bits.
Rather than being disgusted or afraid, Subaru thinks of it as a good way to pass time and decides to show it off to Misuka and Kazumi. They decide to try burning it but not before Subaru reads a bit of it.

A few days later, strange things start to happen; the nice teacher who was Kazumi’s only ally disappears, strange people appear all around town looking for a book, and a transfer student immediately takes an interest in Subaru.

name: Desert Kingdom
summary: Desert Kingdom centers around Aspasia, a princess of the magical Kingdom "EVUU".

name: Deliverance
summary:
After defeating the alien leader Nihilanth, you, Gordon Freeman, declined the mysterious G-Man’s offer of employment and narrowly escaped death at the hands of several alien grunts.

After battling your way through the Lambda Reactor Complex and realigning the antenna dish you were able to make contact with the outside world.

Word has spread of the strange events at Black Mesa and the government is attempting to coverup the truth by reporting “a terrorist plot to obtain U.S. military secrets has been uncovered at the Black Mesa Complex. An undetermined number of civilian personnel have been killed in the well-organised terrorist raid which has been met by U.S. rapid-deployment forces.”

name: Densha Unten Shirei! Tokyo-wan-hen
summary: Densha Unten Shirei! Tokaido-hen (the title translates to Train Operation Command! Tokyo Bay Edition) is a download-only train driving game released for the 3DS, set on a fictionalised version of the railway line from Tokyo to Kamogawa.

name: Densha Unten Shirei! Tokaido-hen
summary: Densha Unten Shirei! Tokaido-hen (the title translates to Train Operation Command! Tokaido Edition) is a download-only train driving game released for the 3DS, set on a fictionalised version of the railway line from Tokyo to Atami.

name: Dead Days
summary:
Four strangers died that day. Now they live again, forced to hunt down specters just to keep their new bodies charged with the energy now fueling their second chance at life. Any joy they may have had at living again is soon stifled by the dispassionate employer that treats them as disposable combatants with no concern for the unnatural libido and arousal caused by their new bodies' reaction to stressors.
Can these ordinary people estranged from violence cope with the murder they must now inflict to survive and endure the flames of lust now burning within? Will they ever truly return to their normal lives, or will their return remain a superficial farce?

name: Detective Clean
summary: What follows is a tale of neither predetermined tragedy or comedy. You are Detective Clean, the most respected and feared crime fighter in Mupuqolis.

name: Dead Cells: Everyone is Here!
summary: Crossover content with Hyper Light Drifter, Curse of the Dead Gods, Guacamelee, Skul, Blasphemous, and Hollow Knight.

name: Detective Solitaire: The Ghost Agency 2
summary: Do you like solitaire games? Do you like to solve mysterious riddles, examine clues and catch dangerous criminals, or maybe you have always dreamed of joining the Ghost Agency? Then this game will not leave you indifferent!

name: Dead Sector
summary: The year is July 18th, 1993, off the coast of Britain to the North East, there is an island that had a dark secret. A terrible epidemic had started to occur only, but a few months ago. A horrendous and violent infection had began to spread all across the island attacking anything or anyone in it's path with tremendous speed and savage force leaving few survivors in it's wake.

name: Death in the Water 2
summary: Dodge and carve your way through swarms of terrifying sea creatures controlled by Death, a vicious giant mind-controlling Kraken that haunts your every move. Scavenge for hidden treasure to unlock weapons, and upgrades to help you in your fight for survival. Every dive reveals a new nightmare.

name: Death in Excess
summary: 18 slaughter maps of (mostly) progressive difficulty, not for the faint of heart

name: Devil May Cry
summary:
An HD remaster of Devil May Cry, first made available in "Devil May Cry HD Collection."

In the first installment of the Devil May Cry series, the player controls Dante as he faces off against the resurrected Demon Emperor, Mundus. The game introduces Dante's abilities, like Devil Trigger which transforms him into a demon, swordplay, gun-slinging, and stylish combos, all of which have become a staple of the series.

name: Devil May Cry 2
summary:
An HD remaster of Devil May Cry 2, first made available in "Devil May Cry HD Collection."

Devil May Cry 2 takes place many years after the first game. This installment introduces the ability to run along walls, the Rain Storm ability, and others, giving Dante even more freedom to defeat enemies in style. You can also play as the new character, Lucia, who uses speed as a weapon against enemies, as opposed to Dante who relies on power. The bonus mode, Bloody Palace, also makes its first appearance here.

name: Devil May Cry 3: Dante's Awakening - Special Edition
summary:
An HD Remaster of Devil May Cry 3: Dante's Awakening - Special Edition, included in "Devil May Cry HD Collection."

Devil May Cry 3 takes place before the events of the first game. In this installment, you can choose different close-combat styles like Swordmaster and Gunslinger, and it's up to you which style you decide to develop and improve on. This Special Edition lets you play as Dante's brother Vergil.

name: Dead Space: Deluxe Edition
summary: The Dead Space Digital Deluxe Edition includes the five exclusive cosmetics (three Unique Suits and two Suit Textures). It’s everything you need to look your best while surviving the horrors aboard the USG Ishimura.

name: Dead of Darkness
summary: Dead of Darkness is a 2D survival-horror action-adventure. Investigate a missing persons case on Velvet Island and unravel its disturbing secret. You’ll have to face grotesque creatures, hurdle deadly traps, solve puzzles, and most importantly, survive.

name: Degen Royale
summary: We welcome you to Degen Royale, a First-Person-Shooter taking place on the tropical Degen Islands. We bring the fun back into the gaming experience. Join us in whacky online rumbles with your friends and see if you can become the Degen Royale champion.

name: Deeper
summary: Deeper is a choice-driven Adult Visual Novel. In Deeper you play as Jake and guide him through life making decisions which will surely impact the world around him and his relationships with each character.

name: Death End Re;Quest: Dungeon Re;Quest Pack
summary: The Dungeon re;Quest Pack unlocks 1 additional quest and 4 additional dungeons to explore!

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Daki Character Pack
summary:
Daki will become a playable character.
Additional contents such as quotes and profile photos will also be included.

name: Dead Age: Zombie Adventure & Shooting Game
summary: Defend your city against waves of zombies in this totally new arcade survival shooting game with totally unique cartoon style!

name: Depot Dungeons
summary: Depot Dungeons is a box-pushing, bug-squishing, problem-solving, post-apocalyptic puzzle RPG by Otto Germain, built with the Megazeux game creation system, and designed to emulate old DOS games.

name: Death end re;Quest: Rook's Traveler Set
summary: Rook's Traveler Set unlocks 3x sets that will assist you in your traveling needs!

name: Dead Zombie Shooter
summary: Fight the zombie wave! Choose from a wide range of weapons and armor, cool weapon skins, distinctive professions, and an endlessly exciting mode! The essential zombie shooter games for your phone!

name: Dead of Night
summary:
Dead of Night is a 2D platformer set in the world of Ancient Greek mythology.

The game was developed for the Enix International Entertainment Contest in the Fall of 1996. The released version of Dead of Night – which is only a demo – only contains the first quest given by Zeus to Heropheles: to slay the Hydra and retrieve the map of the Underworld. The continuation of the story is hinted at but was apparently never done, otherwise the game is feature-complete.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Season 3 - Plaguefall
summary: The Rivals have been pushed back for the moment, but only just in time for a brand new threat to rear its ugly head. An insidious lithophage, a sickness of the very rock beneath our feet, has struck Hoxxes. Nicknamed the 'Rockpox', this planetary pathogen is spreading through the caves, infecting the rock and even directly affecting the local fauna. Even the hardy Dwarves can feel its insidious grasp. Prepare for PLAGUEFALL!

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Biohazard Pack
summary:
The Rockpox has come to Hoxxes, and our doughty Miners must face it properly equipped! Spice up your look with four new sets of unique armor (one per class), new helmets, and new Paintjobs. With the Biohazard Pack, you will be dressed to impress in the finest hazmat suits R&D have ever produced, shielding you from even the nastiest of airborne contaminants.

- 4 unique suits of Armor, one for each Class
- A unique helmet in two variants (Full Face & Half Face)
- Biohazard Paintjob for other Armors
- Biohazard Paintjob for your Weapons
- Biohazard Paintjob for Bosco
- Biohazard Paintjob for your Pickaxe
Important note: The contents of this Pack are cosmetic only!

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Robot Rebellion Pack
summary:
It's a Robot Rebellion! As in, we rebel against the Robots of the dreaded Rivals - but in style! Spice up your look with four new sets of unique armor (one per class), new helmets, and new Paintjobs. The Robot Rebellion Pack - crudely cobbled together during those long nights spent on the Space Rig waiting for the next engagement. The opposite of chic, perhaps, but eminently usable.

- 4 unique suits of Armor, one for each Class
- A unique helmet in two variants (Full Face & Half Face)
- Robot Rebellion Paintjob for other Armors
- Robot Rebellion Paintjob for your Weapons
- Robot Rebellion Paintjob for Bosco
- Robot Rebellion Paintjob for your Pickaxe

Important note: The contents of this Pack are cosmetic only!

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Rival Tech Pack
summary:
The Rival Tech Pack will let you deck out all your guns in theme with our new enemies - no reason to let all those lovely bits go to waste, after all!
On top of the set of new unique Weapon Frameworks for all your weapons, the pack comes with a matching Paintjob for your Armors, as well as a new Paintjob for your Pickaxe.

- The Rival Tech Framework - a set of FULL MESH RESKINS of all weapons in the game in the style of our new rivals.
- Rival Tech Paintjob for all your Weapon Frameworks.
- Rival Tech Armor Paintjob to match your new weapon Framework.
- Rival Tech Paintjob for your trusty personal Pickaxe.

Important note: The contents of this Pack are cosmetic only!

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Supporter Upgrade
summary:
So you like Deep Rock Galactic, but it’s just not enough? You want more? Well, then the Supporter Upgrade is for you! Help fuel further development of the game, while getting your grubby mining-gloves on this tasty bag of exclusive treats:

- Gold plated Paintjob for Bosco in the game!
- Supporter-only gold-plated skins for all weapons in the game!
- VIP treatment at the ingame Abyss Bar - Get the SUPPORTER EDITION of the tasty Glyphid Slammer for your whole team, served in the gaudiest of golden tankards!
- A unique Ghost Ship Games themed helmet, marking you as a permanent member of the Skeleton Crew!
- Your chat name will be gold, to show off your Supporter status!
- The unique Supporter Badge, shown next to your name ingame! (NEW: And in chat!)
- An exclusive set of blinged-out armor for each class! NEW This is now a Paintjob and can be applied to all armors!
- Our heartfelt and eternal thanks and gratitude <3

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Dark Future Pack
summary:
Wanna look your best, Miners? Well, then maybe the Dark Future Pack is for you! The lads down in R&D went all-out on putting together a hard-edged and tactical set of kit especially for our most discerning employees:

- 4 unique suits of Armor, one for each Class.

- A Dark Future armor Paintjob for all your other armors

- Two matching Helmets to go with your new Armor - a light version to show off your beards, and a heavier, full-face-cover version.

- A matching Paintjob for Bosco - team up with your favorite drone in style!

- NEW Bonus item: now also with a matching Weapon Paintjob!

name: Deep Rock Galactic: MegaCorp Pack
summary:
Straight off the industrial carbon presses of the research floor! It’s time to shine up your weapons and gear with the very latest in design aesthetics - and the company-approved MegaCorp Pack is here to provide you with just that:

- The MegaCorp Framework - a set of FULL MESH RESKINS of all weapons in the game into a flashy, cyberpunky style. Like all Frameworks, it comes with a Paintjob unique to it but supports all your other Paintjobs as well.

- Class-specific Armor Paintjobs to match your new weapons.

- A matching Paintjob for your trusty personal Pickaxe.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Roughneck Pack
summary:
If you really want to rough it up, the Roughneck Pack has you covered. Spice up your look with four new sets of unique armor (one per class), new helmets, and new Paintjobs. This pack is squarely aimed at those that can’t be bothered dressing up as a space marine, and just want to get stuck into the hard work at hand! Finally, show off those figurative guns - as well as that choice selection of tattoos you’ve kept under wraps for so long!

- 4 unique suits of Armor, one for each Class

- A Roughneck Armor Paintjob for all your other armors

- A unique helmet in two variants

- A new Roughneck Weapon Paintjob matching the heavy-duty armors

- New matching Paintjob for Bosco

- New Paintjob for your Pickaxe

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Dawn of the Dread Pack
summary:
The Dawn of the Dread Pack is here to offer something...a little bit different. Spice up your look with four new sets of unique armor (one per class), new helmets, and new Paintjobs. This Pack is reserved for the true Big Game Hunters of Hoxxes - dress up in the broken remains of your slain enemies, and make a statement! What exactly that statement IS, however...that's probably better left for the company shrink.

- 4 unique suits of Armor, one for each Class
- A unique helmet in two variants (Full Face & Half Face)
- Dawn of the Dread Paintjob for other Armors
- Dawn of the Dread Paintjob for your Weapons
- Dawn of the Dread Paintjob for Bosco
- Dawn of the Dread Paintjob for your Pickaxe

name: Deterrence
summary:
Artificial intelligence has plotted a path to a sustainable future, but humans aren't included. Defend humanity against the A.I. in this instant action tower defense, real-time strategy hybrid.

Deterrence is a tower defense, real-time strategy hybrid that offers a midcore single-player experience. Play as the human race in the not-too-distant future and fight malfunctioning artificial intelligence. Choose your own conflicts in the nonlinear campaign that's complete with mission rewards and research tree.

Each level is a puzzle to solve using strategy. Depending on your skill level, you will have to play an active role in helping your troops withstand the enemy onslaught whether that be repairing defenses, reallocating troops to another front, designating artillery strike zones, or destroying bridges.

Command your troops to victory by taking advantage of everything the battlefield has to offer. Garrison troops in civilian structures for quick defense. Build artillery batteries to pound enemy advances. Jam the enemy signals to gain an advantage. Call in air strikes, artillery strikes, and warheads to turn the tide of battle.

name: Detective Agency Gray Tie: Collector's Edition
summary: Avi Games presents the first game from the Detective Agency "Gray Tie" series. This exciting hiden object game is packed with beautiful locations, diverse and interesting ways of searching for items, as well as new mini-games.

name: Defenders of Tetsoidea: Chrono Chonus
summary: A contemporary turn based RPG where it is your task to figure out why a demon invasion is suddenly happening, and battle against it.

name: Dear Nostalgia
summary: Text-based adventure horror short game

name: Dead Space 3: First Contact Pack
summary: Contains the Marauder Suit and AL-9 Clearcutter.

name: Dead Space 3: Marauder Pack
summary: Contains the Marauder Suit and AL-9 Clearcutter.

name: Dead Space 3: Sharpshooter Pack
summary: Contains the Sharpshooter Suit and SMP-90 Sharpshooter.

name: Dead Space 3: Tundra Recon Pack
summary: This pack contains the Tundra Recon Suit and the Aegis VII Survivalist.

name: Dead Space 3: Witness the Truth Pack
summary: Contains the Witness Suit and Evangelizer firearm.

name: Delta Force: Black Hawk Down Platinum Pack
Devious Lick
summary:
A game where you have to sneak into a school at night to get your target. Your mission is to sneak into the school at night and get your target.

Be on high alert! Aim carefully and boldly at your target! Move fast and sometimes you need to hide in plain sight. Press and hold to advance, and release to hide in the cardboard. Go through the blind spots to get closer to the target.

Once you get the target, get as many likes on social media as you can!

name: Death end re;Quest 2 - Ultimate Weapon Set
Death in the Bunker
summary: An unknown virus is been changing people into bloodthirsty zombies. Many fled to the largest bunker in the world, house to a laboratory where the virus is being investigated. Most of the survivors hibernated in the bottom levels of the bunker.

name: Devil's Advocate: Alexander Twist
summary: Can you defeat the world's oldest mastermind in their own game? Stretch your wits and deduction skills to the maximum as you battle in Paris' craziest court. Here, only those who sacrifice everything reach the truth. What are you willing to betray to make it out alive?

name: Desert War WWII
summary: Build your army and enter into combat with your enemy in the desert battles of WWII.

name: Defending Lydia Collier
summary: Lydia Collier has been charged with the murder of her billionaire husband after he mysteriously vanished, and it is your job to prove her innocence. Find evidence, follow leads, make decisions and crack the case, and whilst you do it date and find love in London as a newly single, wealthy lawyer.

name: Demolition Master: Project Implode All
summary: Dramatic explosions, curious locations worldwide together with charming music, adrenaline, and hunger for victory are among the feeling that the Demolition Master will create for you.

name: Deemo: Reborn - Prime Pack I
summary: DEEMO -Reborn- Prime Pack I DEEMO -Reborn- Prime Pack I, has a total of 15 songs and 75 charts Content includes outstanding works by creators such as aioi, Ｍili, KAMATA JUNKO, HΔG, and Eshen.

name: Deemo: Reborn - Prime Pack III
summary: Deemo: Reborn - Prime Pack III DEEMO -Reborn- Prime Pack III, has a total of 15 songs and 75 charts Content includes outstanding works by creators such as Eye DT, Searlait, Nicode, Hoskey, Mai Aoyagi, Eye AC, Eye RH, Eye XY, Yoneko, and M2U.

name: Deemo: Reborn - Prime Pack II
summary: DEEMO -Reborn- Prime Pack II Content includes outstanding works by creators such as EARTHBOUND PAPAS、Rabpit、Yuk-cheung Chun Trevor Lin、Silvia Su、Sta、KIVΛ、Mili、Kevin Penkin、Michiyo Honda、Jerry Barnes Quiana、Sakuzyo、Presti、N.M.S.T. and 3R2.

name: Deemo: Reborn - Prime Pack IV
summary: DEEMO -Reborn- Prime Pack IVDEEMO -Reborn- Prime Pack IV, has a total of 10 songs and 50 chartsContent includes outstanding works by creators such as TQ, cosMo@bousou-P, Feryquitous, Sennzai, Rigel Theatre, SUi, Sakuzyo, Stone, soyomogi, Valunava and Y-SHIN.

name: Desktop Soccer 2
summary: Turn your desk into a soccer field! Divvy up the Joy-Con and play with up to 4 players! You won't be able to put down this easy-to-play game!

name: Dead Cells: Everyone is Here Vol. 2
summary: Introducing 6 new famous character (Shovel Knight, Hotline Miami, Katana Zero, Risk of Rain 2, Terraria & Slay the Spire) in this new cross over update. 6 new Outfits and Weapons based on 6 indie games crossovers!

name: De Blob Online
summary: De Blob Online was a game being developed by Balanced Worlds. The only reason this game is known to exist is because of a tweet made by Richard Brown, who used to work at THQ. This game gives players the ability to play as a customisable character and explore a small city somewhere in Raydia.

name: Dead by Daylight: Killer Expansion Pack
summary: There's more than one way to sacrifice a Survivor. The Killer Expansion Pack gives you access to 11 original characters to explore and unleash.

name: Dead by Daylight: Survivor Expansion Pack
summary: Will you be a leader? A hero? An escape artist? The Survivor Expansion Pack gives you access to 11 original characters to discover and explore.

name: Decay Collection
summary: Get both Decay and Decay - The Mare including all seven episodes in this compilation package.

name: Dead Station
summary: Dead Station is an old school platforming experience set on the space station Soyuz-1 overrun by some hostile monsters. Your task is to arm yourself with melee weapons and firearms, find any answers on what the hell happened there and survive no matter what!

name: Dead or Alive 6: Energy Up! Training Wear Set
summary: A set with all 16 Energy Up! Training Wear outfits.

name: Dead or Alive 5 Last Round: Core Fighters - Samurai Warriors Mashup Set
summary: This set contains all the Samurai Warriors Mashup costumes. This set contains costumes for the following characters: All characters except Akira, Jacky, Pai, Sarah, and Naotora Ii. *The Azuchi stage shown in the screenshots cannot be used in this version of the game. *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.

name: Demolition Pro Online
summary: Start up the demolition excavator and use realistic tools to take down the buildings! Work in a team of up to 4 players and master the challenges in different jobs. This 3D demolition simulation is based on destruction, cleanup and recycling.

name: Delivery Man
summary: A small town food delivery man receives an order to deliver food to a strange house. When he arrived, he discovered that the house contained a terrifying secret that one who knew it would not be able to escape to tell others.

name: Deep Sleep: Labyrinth of the Forsaken
summary: What dreams are made of is the stuff of nightmares in this new point-and-click adventure. Delve deep into realms both fantastical and terrifying, and use the power of lucid dreaming to solve puzzles, explore, and contend with eerie adversaries in your search for the brother you thought had died.

name: Death by Begonia
summary: Death by Begonia is a surreal LGBTQ+ Southern gothic murder mystery. Follow Riley's attempts to reconnect with old childhood friends in a town haunted by annual serial murders. Will you fall in love and unlock the mysteries hidden in your friends' hearts? Or will you die trying?

name: Dear Friend
summary: Join us on this psychological and spiritual adventure in which you will have a very special friend who will guide you to successfully face your greatest challenges.

name: Defeat Everyone
summary: The world she knew was really different. The Akai girl will have to go through numerous battles, learn the secrets of magic spells and get a chance to gain freedom. Adventure and danger, magic and dragons, battles and the desire to gain freedom, all this is combined in the game Defeat Everyone.

name: Delusion
summary: With all the nightmarish creatures on loose, Find your way out of the Asylum and uncover a grisly truth in the end in this First Person Nightmarish Horror. Play as Derek Muller a construction worker trying to find a way out only for him to find all his nightmares come to life..

name: Dereliction: 2022
summary: Dereliction: 2022 is a first person Co-Op Xeno-Horde Procedural Rouge-like. Fight through an endless world, against a swarm of alien bugs; the Dross, an endless enemy. They are vicious, but an overpowering arsenal will certainly help out.

name: Dealer's Life Legend
summary: Welcome to the Pecunian Empire, travelling merchant! Head between our many cities, expand your collection of wares and grow your riches. If your talent and skill are sharp enough, you may be in with a shot of winning the Wandering Merchant Quest and proving that YOU are the best dealer in town!

name: Dead on Arrival: Remastered
summary: Dead On Arrival: Remastered is an atmospheric horror-puzzle game. Uncover the true consequences of one’s actions. A remastered version of the original classic!

name: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles: Gyutaro Character Pack
summary: Gyutaro will become a playable character. Additional content such as quotes and profile photos will also be included.

name: Delving Deep
summary:
Delve into the depths of Mt Gorghul in your mission to unlock its secrets.
As either Rekkr or Thora Frœknhammer, the game’s dwarven heroes, you set out to track down your missing kin and Thrazoc’s legendary group of adventurers from within the labyrinthine Mt Gorghul.
Navigate your way through challenging maps, battle hundreds of monsters, complete dozens of quests, find and equip gear, level up your character, and increase your combat skills to aid you in tracking down your kin.

name: Demon Survival
summary:
Defeat tons of creatures, learn new magic spells and face fearsome demons in this survival game with roguelite elements!
Demon Survival offers a level-based survival adventure where you must improve your equipment, learn new abilities and overcome different challenges to defeat the fearsome Lord of Hell.

name: Delivering Letters
summary: Just deliver 10 letters that's easy, right?

name: Deducto 2
summary: A fun sus-like game where you backstab your co-workers and get mad at your co-workers for backstabbing you. (up to 10 players)

name: Defi Gravity
summary: High octane racing game with no speed limit. Defy the laws of physics in this thrilling game that takes competition to its limits.

name: Deep Diving VR: Adventure Pack
summary: The Adventure Pack includes two additional, brand new locations for your adventurous soul! Visit the Dead Mines and Sons of Horus to unravel an ancient mystery!

name: Denizen
summary: Make a living for yourself in a city full of opportunity while you meet a variety of locals, explore unique locations, and work your way to the top in this open-world life simulator.

name: Deliver us the Moon: Digital Deluxe
summary:
Deliver Us the Moon is a sci-fi adventure game developed by KeokeN Interactive and released in 2019. Set in a near future where Earth's resources are nearly depleted, the game follows a lone astronaut on a mission to the Moon to restore energy to the planet. Players explore abandoned lunar bases and use tools to solve environmental puzzles while uncovering the fate of the people who once lived there. The game combines narrative-driven exploration with light puzzle-solving elements and offers a mix of first-person and third-person perspectives.

Deliver Us the Moon: Digital Deluxe is a special edition of Deliver Us the Moon. It includes the base game along with the official soundtrack.

name: Destiny 2: Forsaken Pack
summary:
Over 20 Exotic weapons to collect and master. Draw Trinity Ghoul’s bowstring and vanquish waves of enemies with lightning or channel your inner gunslinger and turn opponents to ash with the Exotic Hand Cannon, Ace of Spades. Use your new power to face the challenges that await within the Shattered Throne dungeon and Last Wish raid.

Gear up for adventure by instantly unlocking three of your favorite Forsaken Pack’s Exotic weapons at the Exotic Archive in the Tower. (Excludes dungeon and raid weapons. Ciphers are awarded once per account.)

Explore the depths of the Shattered Throne dungeon and locate the source of the Taken invasion. Defeat Dûl Incaru, the Eternal Return, reap rewards like the Wish Ender Exotic Bow, and stand in service of the Light.

Defeat the evil at the heart of the Dreaming City. Are you ready to confront Riven of a Thousand Voices in pursuit of the One Thousand Voices Exotic Fusion Rifle? One of Destiny 2’s pinnacle raid experiences lies before you.

name: Dead Space: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: The Dead Space Digital Deluxe Edition includes the base game and five exclusive cosmetics (three Unique Suits and two Suit Textures). It's everything you need to look your best while surviving the horrors aboard the USG Ishimura.

name: Dead by Daylight: The 80's Suitcase
summary:
Our five dear victi… friends, have decided that if they were to be savagely murdered, they might as well do it with style!

Dress your favourite survivor with iconic pieces of fashion from the 80’s!
The 80’s Suitcase includes:
- The Tartan Special Top, The Skull Print Top, the Siberian Tiger Legs, the Stripes of Power and the Ripped Leggings, for Nea
- The Patches Denim Jacket, the Ripped Jeans and the Leather Pants, for Jake
- The College Letterman, the Hooded Training Top, the Sports Leggings and the Mauve Presentation Pants, for Meg
- The Two-tone Coat, the Electric Jacket, the Pale Jeans and the Red Flash Boots, for Claudette
- The Surf Tones and Dwight Cubed t-shirts, the Brown Slacks and the Watermelon Pants, for Dwight

These cosmetics were included in the base game for console releases.

name: Dead by Daylight: The Bloodstained Sack
summary:
A shapeless thing, soaked in blood, holding unholy gifts for the creatures of nightmares. The Bloodstained Sack will allow you to pick up your favourite killing outfit before you start your next chase.
This pack includes 8 new outfits for the Killers:
- The "Iron Man" and "Rogi" masks for the Trapper
- The "Swift Strikes" and "OWl" head paints with cloaks for the Wraith
- The “Scarecrow” outfit and the “Rancher’s” vest and hat for the Hillbilly
- The "Sand Bag" mask and "WW2 Nurse Uniform" outfit for the Nurse, added a month after release.

These cosmetics were included in the base game for console releases.

name: Dead by Daylight: Charity Case
summary: The Charity Case is a collection of 26 cosmetic items for many of the Dead by Daylight survivors and killers. It contains 20 brand new customization options based on your favorite broadcasters and 6 previously exclusive items from old friends.

name: Deserted Island
