summary: Alone, cold and hungry, do you have what it takes to forage, build and innovate on your new deserted island?

name: Derision
summary: A first-person horror mystery adventure game. Find a way to to avoid your captors and escape a nightmarish dungeon in an original world, and first video game, created by Anatolio, an independent developer.

name: Dead by Daylight: Forged in Fog Chapter
summary: Dead by Daylight's Forged In Fog Chapter features a new Killer - The Knight - and a new Survivor, Vittorio Toscano. Purchasing this add-on unlocks an exclusive Cosmetic for Vittorio: Handsome Riding Jacket.

name: Death Pipe
summary: Simple, easy to start, cute and dynamic timekiller. Surf with high speed along an endless tube filled with dangerous obstacles. Try to make alive as long as you can, dodging blocks and other whimsical constructions. The game score will be record automatically. You could upload your achievements and compete with other players.

name: De Tres al Cuarto
summary: A deckbuilding comedy game about a couple of small-time comedians.

name: Deceitful Devotions
summary: The world’s sexiest pianist has just asked you to be his fiance! But there’s gotta be a catch… right?

name: Devilish Charms
summary: A dark cult, a mysterious charm, and a struggle for power between humans and devils...

name: Deep in the Void
summary:
Deep in the Void plays in a Sci-fi Universe where you, the Player, were part of a Space Expedition with others from your home World. On your way from Platina X-27 to Frek Z-Y your expedition fleet was mysteriously pulled out of your Warp drive, destroying most of the fleet and heavily damaging your ship.

Fortunately for you, during the incident you were doing an Inspection on a mining Vessel. After a couple of hours, you wake up and start to realize your situation. The mining ship's Artificial Intelligence “Cora” has started an emergency procedure and activated an emergency Station.

The Ai gives you control over the mining vessel and gives you first Instructions. She tries to scan the surroundings and tells you to start mining the asteroids close to the Station.

The goal of the Player is to construct infrastructure to help save survivors that are still alive and lost in the void. Defend yourself and your colony from enemies. The end goal of the Game is to construct a Warp Drive Device to rescue you and your people.

name: Des Visages, Des Fissures
summary: It is a biographical top view game of the French metal band Desybes, based on a narrative puzzle, in a retro style. The player embodies Aëlice, a little girl plagued by night terrors who will have to survive and chain nightmare nights.

name: Defender
summary: This is a simple fighting game. You only need to press 3 buttons to experience easy battles. The original intention of this game is to bring the most simple and refreshing feeling of combat.

name: Dead Man's Fault
summary:
A short psychological horror game about descending into a cave.
This is a short (~30 minutes) first-person psychological horror game set in a deep, dark cave.
Cave exploring is a common practice. But what happens when you overstep your boundaries? The suffocating jaws of a tight cave don't let go as easily as they grab hold of you. Deployed as part of a rescue effort, you must explore the depths of Deep Den Cave and discover what happened to the last explorer that ventured down its path. Don't get lost.

name: Death at Cape Porto: A Dana Knightstone Novel - Collector's Edition
Dear Otome
summary: A collection of Shall We Date games.

name: Destiny 2: The Witch Queen - Season of the Seraph
summary: The Hive God of War moves to seize control of Rasputin’s network of weaponized satellites. In her hands, she would turn its devastating power on the Last City. To stop her, the Vanguard has authorized special covert operations armed with the Warmind’s most advanced weaponry. Agents conducting these operations are known as Seraphs.

name: Desert Strike: Return to the Gulf
summary: The player controls the helicopter from an overhead, isometric perspective. The Apache is equipped with three weapon types: a machine gun and two types of missiles of different strength. During the missions, the player must beware anti-aircraft guns, missile launchers and tanks, outmaneuvering enemy fire or destroying the enemy weaponry. The Apache is destroyed if its fuel runs out, or if the armor (functioning as health) is completely depleted. However, armor can be replenished by bringing back MIA soldiers and prisoners of war back to the landing zone. There are also fuel, ammo and armor pickups available on the field.

name: Dead Cells: Return to Castlevania
summary: The inspiration behind it all returns to its 2D action roots! Castlevania’s unforgettable characters & gothic setting meet the fast-paced combat of the award-winning roguelite Dead Cells in this unprecedented collaboration.

name: Death Stranding 2: On The Beach
summary: Embark on an inspiring mission of human connection beyond the UCA. Sam — with companions by his side — sets out on a new journey to save humanity from extinction. Join them as they traverse a world beset by otherworldly enemies, obstacles and a haunting question: should we have connected?

name: Depth
summary: Solve spatial puzzles by projecting objects in perspective.

name: Decrypt
summary:
When a freight ship goes missing and is later found abandoned, you are sent to investigate it to solve the mystery of its missing crew.

The ISS Travan is found at a fringe system thousands of klicks off its original course.

The GiS Trade Federation believes that its crew has abandoned the ship to evade crippling trade fines in a brutal interstellar economy. You are a Data Forensics officer assigned to investigate the vessel.

What you will uncover on the Travan is a far more insidious and horrifying truth.

Features:

First-person sci-fi survival-horror adventure
Story rich gameplay - piece together a compelling narrative to discover the fate of the Travan's crew
Deep Exploration - traverse the ship to locate Terminals to progress
All original soundtrack
Bite-sized thrill - 45 mins - 1 hour playtime!
Intense scares

name: Devoid
summary:
When a human moves into a new apartment, they decide to explore the area to meet their new neighbours. But they must be careful as the building is not all as it seems.
Devoid is a visual novel with point and click elements created in Ren'Py. Navigate through this building and meet your new neighbours. Be careful not to get trapped.

name: Demons of Dex
summary: You are Eino, a member of the druids. Your master, the archdruid has become old and it is time for somebody to replace him. As a young initiate you are sent to dungeon Dex, a mysterious labyrinth home to vile monsters. You must enter the dungeon alone and defeat three demon lords within. Can you achieve enlightenment and ascend to become the next archdruid?

name: Devilish Hairdresser
summary: Good and evil continues in Devilish Hairdresser. The devilish saga of the devil girl and the angel, now creating hairstyles and haircuts in her hair salon.

name: Dead Dimension
summary:
Dead Dimension is a short graphic adventure, designed to be played in one session.

In the year 2169, humanity has conquered the galaxies. Manned space travel has gone beyond what is humanly conceivable. Unfortunately, it has been proven with horror that there is no extraterrestrial life. The space race no longer makes sense.

However, the sights have turned to a new unexplored universe: the hidden dimensions.

Peter Travers, a prisoner enrolled in NASA's Interdimensional Exploration program with the intention of receiving prison benefits, must carry out a simple mission: go through the first dimensional portal and repair it from the other side.

name: Deep Fried Nikki
summary: Deep Fried Nikki is an English Yume Nikki fangame. It was made as a late April Fool's joke, satirizing fangames that are essential re-skins of Yume Nikki. It plays just like Yume Nikki, but with different graphics and music, and with an additional ending located in the White Desert.

name: Deja Vu
summary: deja vu is a Yume Nikki fangame starring Vivienne, a girl refusing to leave her room, instead exploring a dream world.

name: Deteriation Game
summary:
Deteriation Game which is a misspelling of deterioration, is a game about exploring your dreams and figuring out who you are. Travel through surreal recreations of your memory, or is it all just real?

Made for Dream Diary Jam 6.

name: Devilgotchi
summary: Debirutch no Tamagotch, also known as the Devilgotchi is a Tamagotchi release which debuted in Japan in early September 1998. The Devilgotchi’s official English release was in the form of the mobile game Tamagotchi Monster in 2006.

name: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided - Desperate Measures
summary:
Desperate Measures is a single mission DLC for Deus Ex: Mankind Divided. Originally, it was available only as a pre-order bonus or through purchase of the day-one edition, Collector's Edition, or Digital Deluxe Edition of Mankind Divided. Desperate Measures was later released as a free download. Like other story DLCs, Desperate Measures is accessed through the "Jensen Stories" section of the main menu.

Desperate Measures focuses on exposing the mastermind behind the train bombing in Růžička Station. Adam Jensen must travel to the Prague office of Tarvos Security Services to learn the truth about the bombing.

name: Dead Space: Collector's Edition
summary: Dead Space puts players in the boots of Isaac Clarke, an everyman engineer on a routine mission to fix a gigantic mining starship, the USG Ishimura. But aboard the Ishimura, a living nightmare awaits. The ship’s crew has been slaughtered and infected, and Isaac’s girlfriend, Nicole, is missing somewhere on board. Alone and trapped, with only his engineering tools and skills, Isaac faces a battle for survival—not only against terrifying monsters called Necromorphs, but his own crumbling sanity.

name: Demon Slayer Tamagotchi
summary: The Demon Slayer Tamagotchi also known as the Kimetsu Tamagotchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano model based on the anime and manga franchise Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba.

name: Demon Slayer Tamagotchi Hashira Gathering Version
summary: The Hashira Gathering Version is the second version of the Demon Slayer Tamagotchi that replaces Tanjiro, Zenitsu, Inosuke, and Nezuko with Demon Slayers Genya Shinazugawa and Kanao Tsuyuri while still featuring the 9 Hashira characters.

name: Demon Slayer Tamagotchi Yukaku Edition
summary: The Yukaku Edition, released in Japan in June 18th, 2022, is the third version of the Demon Slayer Tamagotchi. It features the standard version's roster plus the addition of Sumiko, Zenko, and Inoko, the courtesan disguises of Tanjiro, Zenitsu, and Inosuke.

name: Derringer
summary: You're a private detective and you get a letter saying that 13-year old model Miki is restrained.

name: Desynced
summary: Desynced is a sci-fi strategy game with fully customizable units and behaviors. Gather, build, research, and explore the unknown. Alone or with friends, unveil the mystery of an AI on the edge of self-awareness and uncover the hidden truth in this blend of strategy, automation, and exploration.

name: Deus Ex: Zodiac
summary: ZODIAC is a set of six single player missions for Deus Ex.

name: Devilish Pet Salon
summary: When the angel's away, the devil will play! Give this poor puppy a nasty hair cut! Sometimes, dogs look better dirty!

name: Devilish Stylist
summary: Create devilish style and don't get caught by an angel!

name: Devilish Cooking
summary: Angel or devil, you will you have to choose your role in this cooking game which offers two distinct game modes: a classic "nice" mode in which you'll learn more than a dozen delicious recipes and a "naughty" one where you have to ruin the dish of your rival.

name: Devilish Candy House
summary: Little Angel wants to eat the cookie, but she needs your help. Trigger the mechanisms at the right time, in the right order, so Angel can eat the cookie before the Devil does! There are hints beside every mechanism to help you.

name: Devilish Cat
summary: Your task is to feed the cat until it bursts. The owner must not see you. Be careful and make sure no one is looking at you.

name: Death Corridor
summary: Death Corridor is a game for the 3D Gamate.

name: Deceptus Map Pack + Bonus Items
summary: 5 Mini Maps plus Bonus death coins and 3 x Power Ups to keep the mayhem going forever!

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Additional Costume Pack - Kimetsu Academy Summer Uniforms
summary:
In-game costumes that can be used in Versus Mode.
Kimetsu Academy Summer Uniforms are now available for Kimetsu Academy Tanjiro Kamado, Kimetsu Academy Nezuko Kamado, Kimetsu Academy Zenitsu Agatsuma, Kimetsu Academy Inosuke Hashibira, and Kimetsu Academy Giyu Tomioka.

name: Devil's Liminal
summary: A demon's pact, a final summer. Yuri horror visual novel inspired by Azores folklore.

name: Defcon: Xenos
summary: Defend yourself against an onslaught of monstrous aliens in a variety of cities and landscapes of our beloved home: Earth. Combine equipment from your powerful arsenal of weapons, modules, and upgrades in order to face stronger and smarter aliens that provide an evergrowing challenge.

name: Death Swap: End As One
summary: Death Swap is a first person online Co-op horror game, where you are stuck in a secret science facility with a escaped horrific monster! Save your friend by swapping positions with the monster! Communicate and work together to complete tasks and repair the elevator while being chased by the monster.

name: Death Game Royale
summary:
Accused of crimes you didn't commit, you suddenly find yourself fighting for your life alongside actual criminals! The only way to survive these death games is to assemble a team, but how do you know who to trust?

As you begin to work together, you notice your teammates are looking at you as more than just an ally. Will you sweep them away with your sharp wits and charm or will you lead them to purgatory?

name: Desert Island 64
summary: Desert Island 64 (also known as Super Real Island) was a simulation RPG that was to be developed by Imagineer and released on the now discontinued Nintendo 64 peripheral, the Nintendo 64 Disk Drive.

name: Demolish & Build Classic
summary: Buy machines and discover new possibilities by modifying their equipment. Use specialized hand tools for finishing work.

name: Demon Invasion: Endless
summary: Demon Invasion: Endless is a tower defense game with endless challenges and tons of talent to explore. You will need to plan your tactics and build defensive towers to repel endless demons. Keep challenging and gaining resources to build your unique talent tree.

name: Deathtide
summary: A Roguelite where you are the Boss Fight! Defeat endless tides of the undead, complete tough challenges and dethrone powerful bosses. A Horde-Survival Roguelite where you unlock ancient powers and create overpowered character builds to become an unstoppable army-destroyer.

name: Dead Giveaway: Zombie Quiz
summary:
The game show of the dead. Don't let the zombies rattle your nerves, earn your freedom before it's too late.
In this zombie quiz game, you will have to answer some of the craziest questions and pit your wits against the leader of the zombie revolution.

name: Dear, Ella
summary:
Get ready to immerse yourself in Dear, Ella - an anime-style collectible RPG!

Heros can be converted into NFTs (a process not described on the website).
Crystal and Gem in-game currencies can be converted into tokens at XPLA GAMES in the XPLA Blockchain Ecosystem.

name: Dead People Driving HD
summary:
That Corpse and His Friends Just Stole My Car!
Jump into this free underground street racing app where you will be racing with friends to escape the cops, but you will have to do it as zombies!
It's your corpse, your buddies versus the cops!

name: Desktopia: End of the Road
summary: 'End of the Road' is a new game mode featuring a HUGE new level, five times longer than anything you've seen so far. Grow your village to an a massive 195 buildings, while dealing with multiple strongholds, new enemies, and new challenges.

name: Democracy: The Board Game
summary: Democracy is a new game that family and friends can enjoy together. An alternative to Monopoly, its simple and fun to play while at the same time promoting a fairer, cleaner, healthier world for everyone. The game has one goal...Defeat the Dictator!

name: Devil's 5 Days: Mischief Game
summary: A Role-Playing Game as play as an adventurer who travels with the pact demon, who is also his girlfriend, Ria, attend to a business contest with a powerful adventurer that lasts for five days to decide who will be the next pact holder.

name: Descend.gg
summary: A 2D rogue-like dungeon crawler utilizing Web3 technology. Descend into the dungeon while killing mobs, earning loot and gaining XP.

name: Decent Checkers
summary: Checkers is a timeless classic, steeped in rich history. This release supports 4 rulesets and includes PvE, PvP, and puzzle modes. From the casual checkers enthusiast to the competitive master, this game is sure to provide hours of entertainment and mental stimulation.

name: Devilish Valentine
summary: Find differences in the pictures about Valentine's Day with the devil and angel.

name: Devilish Trick
summary: A Halloween themed spot-the-difference game.

name: Devilish Christmas
summary: Christmas themed spot the difference game.

name: Deadly Desire
summary: An FPS shooter story game set in the Haluwa at the beginning of the Calculus pandemic. Answering the question "What if they were right?"

name: Deep in the Snowy Night
summary: A challenging, winter-themed horror experience

name: Demon Hunter: New Chapter
summary:
"Twenty years of peace came to an abrupt end, when Dawn Harlock, the last member of the mysterious order of demon hunters, has to, once again, face Archdemon Ragnar and save the world from evil.
One day she recieves a call from mysterious doctor Stuart Williams, who claims to be her foster father's long time friend. He promises valuable information about Dawn's biological parents, that might shed some light on her eerie past shrouded in mystery."

name: Demonic Tales Bundle
summary:
This bundle includes:
- Demon Hunter: New Chapter
- 9 Clues: The Secret of Serpent Creek
- The Secret Order: Return to the Buried Kingdom

name: Demolition Dodge
summary:
Buckle up and get ready for the ride of your life with Demolition Dodge - the new exciting and addictive survival racing game from insurance specialist Adrian Flux.
Battle your way around the carnage-packed arena in your chosen car, collecting rewards, racing and dodging the deadly opponents trying their best to get between you and your prize.

name: Death By Misstep
summary: Death By Misstep is an upcoming First-Person Rhythm, Stealth and Horror game set on a party cruise where a massive massacre by robots is happening.

name: De-Ja II
summary: Like its predecessor, De-Ja II is a Japanese-style adventure. The interface has been enhanced compared to the first game. Most of the commands are still done via the extensive verb menus and object sub-menus; once again, it is usually necessary to use those commands several times in order to gain new information and thus advance the story. However, in certain places, icon-based interface becomes available, with point-and-click interaction. The icons include traditional talking, touching, as well as less common commands such as hitting, and even an icon depicting a condom, for... err... scientific activities that are closer to anatomy than archeology.

name: Death Scourges
summary: Death Scourges is a linear and dark third person shooter mixed with tactical elements. You embody the captain of a special strike team consisting of four elite operators. Shoot, loot, craft and use your team to survive the unknown horror lurking in the depths of an underground research facility.

name: De Blob
summary: The cancelled DS port of de Blob.

name: Dead Space: Strange Transmissions Quest Pack
summary: Isaac Clarke has landed on the Island with the survival skills needed. Includes 1 Outfit, 2 Back Blings, 1 Pickaxe, 1 Built-In Emote and Quests to earn up to 1,500 V-Bucks.

name: Deal or No Deal
summary: Will you choose the correct briefcase and walk away with the JACKPOT!?! That's right, Intencity has the popular game show Deal or No Deal as an arcade game.

name: Deceive Inc.: Black Tie Edition
summary:
Dress to impress with the Deceive Inc. Black Tie Edition!

Every Black Tie Edition Includes:
Exclusive ‘Black Tie’ outfits for all 8 Agents
Custom ‘Black Tie’ Profile Portrait & Title
1,000 Deceive Inc. Bonds

name: Dead Unending
summary: A deadly virus plagues the city in Null County and the residents now roam the streets as flesh-eating zombies. Tactically loot the massive open world and build a self-sustaining zombie-killing fortress. Will you be able to survive the apocalypse or will you become one of the undead?

name: Demolition Derby 2: Circuit
summary: Smash and Bang your way to the lead in this fun and exciting Demolition game inspired by Banger Racing and Destruction Derbies all around the world.

name: Dead Venture
summary:
Battle legions of undead, help other survivors in 8 chapters of story mode!
The world is infected, the human race almost wiped out. Zombies roam the streets everywhere. A handful of survivors fight their way to safe haven, a military base on a far island.

name: Debtor: Enhanced Edition
summary:
In order to escape each level, you need to collect all coins and create path to the exit of the level. It is a dangerous place full of traps and ruthless enemies, be careful!
Solve 30 rooms in the 3 different biomes.
Move boxes, crush blocks with your head or use explosives for that - create your own path using the environment.

name: Delirium
summary: Delirium is a first-person graphic adventure in which we control teenage rebel Lola. Like Lola, our main objective will be to escape from Delirium along with her freak brother Danny, who will accompany us during the adventure.

name: Derby Stallion 96: Nintendo Breeders Cup You - Uma Data
Derby Stallion 96: Nintendo Breeders Cup - Yosen Taikai Race Data
Derby Stallion 96 Taiou: G1 Mogi Race
Derby Stallion 96: 97-nendo Ban
summary:
Derby Stallion 96 read data from 8M Memory Packs which included pre-made horse and race data for players to use in their games.

The data which it loaded is categorized into this series of Derby Stallion 96 download data which was broadcast by St.GIGA for Satellaview subscribers.

name: DeathWorm
summary: A concept game made for the MaxGames contest.

name: Desirable
summary: Enjoy the classic puzzle piece swapping gameplay with high quality, realistic, naughty & sexy girls!

name: Demon Blade
summary: Join the league of demon hunters and save the world in Demon Blade! Something strange is happening: the moon has disappeared and the border with the demon world has blurred. As a demon hunter, you must assume your role and save the people. But you won't be alone in this mission: form clans and join other players to overcome different dungeons and face the demon that torments these lands.

name: Destroy Simulator VR
summary: Destroy houses and relieve stress, now in VR!! It is also possible to compete with everyone in the score challenge

name: Devil's Peak Rally
summary:
Race your Rally car to the top of Devil's Peak, one of the most challenging road courses there is! Modify and tune your car for best performance, with more than 12 miles of twisty dirt and tarmac roads to play on. Once you have set a best time, race against yourself or against other user's best races.
Purchase any upgraded or classic rally car to unlock more tuning features and unlock down-hill mode !

name: Defending Earth
summary: As the Earth faces the greatest asteroid storm in the solar system, players must strategize and use a variety of weapons, tools and other resources to protect the planet. With a countdown to the incoming storm, players must act quickly and make strategic decisions to save Earth from the asteroids.

name: Dead Town Tales
summary: Dead Town Tales is a deck building strategy game.

name: Demon's Draw
summary: Demon's Draw is a push-your-luck card-based game where you summon demons to fight, surprizingly, OTHER DEMONS. Travel through the depth of hell and, upgrade your cards to defeat the increasing foe and absorb their power. May luck be with you...

name: Demon Dark I
summary: Demon Dark I Game is fighting style is a fast two-handed sword fight. Players will control a character who can use both hand-to-hand combat, punching, kicking, punching, archery fighting. and melee combat with a 2-handed sword and use of magic and can summon spirits to help in the fight.

name: Detective Ridelle
summary: Detective Ridelle is a cozy murder mystery game featuring escape room style puzzles. Find clues, interrogate suspects, solve the mystery - before it's too late.

name: Deadly Platform
summary: Lots of challenges and meaningful journey that comes with beating parkours waits for you with 3D and Third-Person camera. Not every obstacle is easy, watch out!

name: December 1914
summary: It's a comic-style narrative-oriented game based on the Christmas Eve Truce during World War I.

name: Death's Dungeon
summary: Survive the onslaught of Death's Dungeon in a rogue-like dungeon crawler with RPG elements. Shoot and melee your way through various dungeons with four different classes.

name: Dead of the Sea
summary: Dead of the sea is a pirate-themed VR multiplayer survival shooter where you can join your fellow pirates to end the curse of the Island of Lost Souls. Survive waves of the island's deadly inhabitants while collecting magical power by defeating enemies.

name: Demon Hentai Slayer
summary: Demon Hentai Slayer is a puzzle game, the ultimate goal of which is to swap the blocks to collect the image. But remember, the purpose of this game is to let you relax and enjoy the process. To do this, we added a minimalistic interface and relaxing music.

name: Demolition Party
summary: Demolition Party is a 4 player online multiplayer car party game. Enjoy unique maps and use tons of different guns to "demolish" your friends!

name: Deep Assault
summary: Test your attention by keeping your rapidly descending character away from the green lights and avoid the deadly machine coming towards you from above as fast as you can! and compete with yourself by scoring more with each try!

name: Deer Crusade
summary: An original and modern 2D adventure taking place in a vast (and cursed) world full of deadly creatures and clever puzzles.

name: Decks of Power
summary: Decks of power is an action rougelite deck-building game with a twist. Players are not allowed to discard unwanted cards and must figure out strategic opportunities to use them against the enemy. Enemies level up each time you defeat them in battle and are stronger when you encounter them again.

name: Death Angel Nightmare
summary: Death Angel Nightmare is a traditional RM horror character adventure game with single story and multiple death achievements. The story length is less than 2 hours.Matsushita and Taojing are a loving couple, but they are caught in the chase. Why is this?

name: Death Nomad
summary: Death nomad is a zombie survival game with procedurally generated environments. The environment will force you to improve your equipment, defense and constantly move around the world, prolonging your chances of survive.

name: Death Unphased
summary: Death Unphased is a challenging precision platformer where you phase through walls, spikes, and enemies with your dash. A short arcade-like experience with the goal of beating your fastest time in each level. Flex your puzzle-solving and speedrunning abilities as you forge the best path to the exit door.

name: Demomen Ltd.
summary: Demomen Ltd. allows you to become an Outback Demolition Expert and manage your crew in some of the craziest demo jobs this continent has ever seen! Gear up, hire the most incompetent employees, have a cold one, and build your own demolition business! (Grog not included)

name: Defaced
summary: Defaced is a first-person Horror game taking place in a realistic Environment. Trying to find a way out of the woods will soon become your biggest nightmare, because, hidden in the solitude of this abandoned forest, lurks something you were never meant to see...

name: Delivoo Delivery Sim
summary: Deliver orders through the large city of Peytor Town and save enough money to open a restaurant. Make sure you're ready, as there's a lot of challenges waiting for you!

name: Dearg
summary: Having just picked her sister, Amelia and Alanna drive through the Scottish forests when it starts to rain hard. Stressed and angry from the storm, they get into a heated argument when something suddenly appears in the road and causes them to crash.

name: Destiny Duel
summary: Simple to learn, impossible to master. Destiny Duel is a battle of the mind: in order to win, you must predict your opponent's every move. Attack, Guard, Recover, or Dodge. The choice is yours, and every choice matters.

name: Death Trick: Double Blind
summary: The star magician of Morgan’s Traveling Circus has vanished, but the show must go on! Death Trick: Double Blind is a non-linear detective game where an unlikely duo must gather clues, question suspects, and reveal contradictions to unravel the mystery of the missing magician!

name: Demolition City
summary:
Demolition City is a physics-based destruction game, in which your mission is to destroy each building with your dynamite. Place dynamite on concrete and hit boom! Each level has limited dynamite and requirements for dropping splits below the goal line. Physics says hello, because you have to find out which elements are indispensable for the stability of the buildings. Then you have to blow up exactly these elements so that in the end only rubble and ashes remain.

Your objective is to break the constructions into their individual parts in such a way that the remaining parts are below a certain line. This means that no pillar should be left standing and every wall, no matter how small, must be torn down. Do you have what it takes to cause real destruction?

name: Deck 'Em!
summary: Look, kid. Deck Em! is a solitaire-style boxing game. A card game you play to play. But you’re not even a contender. You’re a nobody. A total long shot. The Champ is a stone-cold killer. As big as an ox. Stronger than oak. But you got a lot of heart, kid. And, Mickey loves you.

name: DecaPolice
summary:
DecaPolice, a crime-suspense RPG from Level-5, developers of the Layton series, will be released on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5 and Steam in 2026!

The main character, a rookie detective named Harvard, hunts down criminals in a huge open-world crime-ridden city, traveling back and forth between physical and virtual reality.

name: Dead Trip: Hope
summary: Take part in the adventures of Lars and Jessica in a world of death and chaos. Surviving among the crowds of zombies in search of supplies and fuel in order to pursue the last hope of saving humanity and defeating the virus.

name: DeIz
summary: A short visual novel about a high-school boy admiring an indie film director who attends the same school as him. Will he be able to tell her his true feelings? Or just screw up and continue to stalk her like what he always do? Either way, he's not a lady's man to run his love life smoothly.

name: Detective Rosie Morgan: Death at a Dinner Party
summary: When a famous Human Rights Lawyer dies under mysterious circumstances in her Sevenoaks mansion, Detective Inspector Rosie Morgan and her team of indefatigable investigators are called on the scene to find out who murdered the barrister and why.

name: Deep Lake Reel Fishing
summary:
Enjoy the ultimate pocket fishing experience!
Grab your bait, rod, and reel and head out on the lake for some deep lake reel fishing all around the world. New fish and locations added weekly!
The world of fishing is at your finger tops. Catch big or small fish, upgrade your gear, upgrade your skills, upgrade your fishing level...Compete with friends…
Become the ultimate mobile fisher!

name: Demonic Labyrinth
summary: Demonic Labyrinth is an Action Roguelike with RPG elements. You find yourself in closed labyrinth littered with a pile of earth and stones. To get out, you have to clear your way and look for the right solution. labyrinth, fighting off a crowd of undead, which has long been waiting for a victim.

name: Dead Metal
summary: 1-4 player co op roguelike with turn based combat and an emphasis on exploring randomly generated dungeons in order to find loot and complete missions

name: Demon Lord Tamer
summary: You must evolve your own pet demon to destroy the world.

name: Deluge: Sermon for the Dead
summary: High school girls have been disappearing from Abbotsford. Unravel the mystery before all things wash away in a tidal wave of deep despair. An interactive visual novel with psychological and lovecraftian undertones.

name: Deep Sea Trip
summary: Deep Sea Trip is a story of a deep water adventure. The deep sea has many natural dangers, but there are new dangers that threaten all deep sea and ocean life. A hero fish must save the day and figure out their way through the ocean and life.

name: Dead World: La Argentina Muerta
summary: Dead World is a first-person action game set in a post-apocalyptic world, where you follow the journey of several characters through a war-torn Argentina.

name: Death Road
summary: Death Road is a solo Top Down Shooter game. Take on the challenge of liberating the earth from a zombies and monsters infestation, using over-the-top weaponry in a world with awesomely stylized graphics. The road journey has never been so much fun!

name: Deck Defenders
summary: Deck Defenders is an online card game where players can battle it out to become the top-ranked player. Collect cards and build your own decks to customize your strategy. Your forces need your strategies and tactics in this competitive card battler where the superior player always comes out on top!

name: Defina
summary: Defina Finance is a fascinating blockchain game that combines the concept of DeFi and NFT. Players are able to buy or collect various NFT Mystery Boxes to get champions/weapons as well as fight and enhance their champions to learn skills in numerous game scenarios. Players can participate in DeFi yield farming and earn abundant on-chain earnings while enjoying a fun and strategic card game with PVP and PVE modes. Defina’s vision is to bring blockchain to millions of players, allowing them to explore a new form of gaming through blockchain technology.

name: Deep Space
summary: Deep Space is a scary survival game. The action takes place on a spaceship and you are the main character, who has to go through several obstacles to survive.

name: Deep Freeze
summary: Freeze your enemies with your water gun and stop the bad guys from ruining Christmas.

name: Demonic Pack
summary: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Demon's Rise
summary:
Form a mercenary party of adventurers, sell swords, rogue sorcerers and assassins and enlist with an army of Dwarves trying to retake their ancient homeland. Fight in a brutal campaign against goblins, undead, ratmen and the demon lords they worship.
Demon's Rise is a turn-based tactical game where players must lead a party of six heroes through the bowels of an underground city. Battles are intense affairs where the proper use of terrain and cover is as important as the choice of spell or attack.

name: Death Tapes
summary: Death Tapes is an isometric 90s-themed phycological horror game that focuses on puzzle-solving and exploration. Play with 5 different characters who are imprisoned in haunting environments

name: Death Moto 3
summary: Do you like violence and passion to fight? In this chaotic world is fast, in case of be placed in jeopardy to blaze a new trail. Beyond those rookie driver, never slow down, would be smashed to pieces.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Tanjiro, Zenitsu, and Inosuke - Character Pack
summary: Tanjiro Kamado (Entertainment District), Zenitsu Agatsuma (Entertainment District) and Inosuke Hashibira (Entertainment District) will become playable characters. Additional content, such as quotes and profile photos, will also be included.

name: Delysium
summary: We welcome all Vanguards to the Metaverse to participate in the building and development of Delysium, and witness the journey of this top-quality game that could become a prosperous Web3 ecosystem, driven by the community, step by step

name: Dead Cells: Medley of Pain Bundle
summary: Play the award-winning action roguelite Dead Cells and its 4 original DLCs, plus unlock Castlevania content with the Return to Castlevania DLC.

name: Dead Cells: Return to Castlevania Bundle
summary: Slay countless foes in fast-paced combat in the award-winning action roguelite Dead Cells and storm Dracula's Castle with classic weapons in the Return to Castlevania DLC.

name: Deadword
summary: Deadword is a pixelated brain puzzler. Link four-letter words as you strategically move through the city, avoiding zombies, gathering supplies, and investigating clues. Discover Perks along the way that will give you the necessary skills to survive! Loot supplies and find items to patch your wounds, find your way, and distract the zombies! Can you escape Deadword?

name: Death Pool
summary: 30 + levels of exploding billiard ball action with lots of fun features to keep you glued to the table. Plus a new level every day !

name: Dead Age: Survivors
summary: Dead Age: Survivors is an Indie Survival RPG with a touch of strategy. Complex quests and real-time pauseable party combat. Loot resources, build camps, and conquer new areas in battles against 7 greedy factions. Farm animals, cook, and brew beer! Pay close attention to hunger, stress, and morale.

name: Desperate Skeleton
summary: In this 3D fantasy third-person rougelike game you will begin the journey of the desperate skeleton in which you will explore dungeons, fight enemies and acquire equipment and skills from them. It will be quite a journey on which even death cannot bother you.

name: Demolition Inc.: Level & Weapon
summary: Play the brand new “Back to Work” campaign with 21 new levels. Unleash the chaos with 3 new special destruction tools. Make cars fly, control swarms of cars and start asteroid hails. Unlock 10 new achievements. Do all this with the freshly updated Demolition Inc.

name: Desolation
summary: Unravel the mysteries of an abandoned city in Desolation, a multiplayer horror game. Your quest is to locate the source of a massive EMF output deep in the city. The shadows seem to be alive and stalking you as you progress deeper. What started as an investigation becomes a fight for survival.

name: Deltatile
summary: Deltatile is a puzzle game based on a unique tile swapping mechanic, featuring 6 different worlds and over 65 levels.

name: Depths of Helheim
summary: "Depths of Helheim" is a solo Action-RPG Adventure game, based on Norse mythology, explore the Nine Worlds and use your abilities to defend yourself from abominations.

name: Depths of Insanity
summary: 3D First-Person Adventure with exploration and uncovering secrets of the areas surrounding your crash site.Collect all necessary materials to craft a temporary home and hopefully find a way to rebuild your Spacecraft and return home before it's too late.The Universe is in your hands!

name: Deaded
summary: Build your defences, scavenge for loots and survive the zombie infested city saturated with a mysterious fog. Survivors will ask for help but its up to you to save them, or leave them for dead. How long will you survive before you become... Deaded...

name: Dead Island: Zombie Hunter
summary: An oasis island originally rich in resources, due to the attack of the virus, everyone was infected with the mutated virus, and the whole island was full of the breath of death... How do you defeat these zombies when you are the only survivor on the dead island? Can you survive?...

name: Destroyer
summary: Unlicensed game.

name: Demons vs. Wizards
summary:
A long time ago, when dragons were still flying above the castles… When true knights were often fighting for damsels in distress… When magic was not just a word from some old and dusty fantasy book… Back at that time the game called Demons vs. Wizards was popular in many taverns scattered across realms, which are long forgotten nowadays. As magic and sword duels were forbidden in most of the inns and taverns, this magic card duel game was the only way to settle the scores with an annoying young wizard, some bully stranger or even a travelling demon.
Demons vs. Wizards is a 5-10 minute turn-based card and dice game. It is so simple that even a small kid can play it without reading a complicated manual. You can either challenge your friends, or beat the computer controlled opponent to test your luck for today. Two players can play on the same screen, so it truly feels like a real tabletop card game.

name: Defender
summary: Game Boy port of Defender, released alongside Joust.

name: Destind: Mr. Almost Right
summary: Destined: Mr. Almost Right is an otome game by Voltage Inc. The game is found in Love 365: Find Your Story.

name: Destiny of a Wizard 3: Beyond the World
summary: Before the Blue Wizard could celebrate the defeat against Zarra, our hero was whisked away into another world! What brought him here? Why is he here? And most importantly, can he get back to his original world? An all new adventure awaits in Destiny of Wizard 3: Beyond the World!

name: Detuned
summary: An eerie anti-rhythm hiden-object roguelike. Avoid a procedurally generated song. Look for pearls in a surreal wonderland. Experience hyperacusis from the comfort of your seat.

name: Dead Earth
summary: A thrilling, first-person, action-survival game set in the modern post-apocalypse. As mankind's last hope, you'll traverse the hospital ravaged by a lethal plague. the fight for survival gets progressively more difficult as the story unfolds. Be ready for violence

name: Detective Ridley and the Mysterious Enigma
summary: A mobile puzzle game by Gameloft.

name: Demon Dash
summary: Somehow the world got taken over by demons because everyone was too gay. Despite the new demon overlords being a bit dangerous, most of them are just vibing and most humans got to continue their lives unaffected. After the general consensus came out that there was a niche for those who really liked demons, a dating and delivery app called demon dash was invented where people can sign up to be a lucky candidate to be picked up by a demon girl.

name: Deceit 2
summary: Deceit 2 is an online social deduction horror game. Inspire fear as the Terror, play detective as the Innocent, or create mayhem as the Cursed. Trapped with friends and strangers: who can you trust to help you escape?

name: Death Race Outer Space
summary: Fast paced 3d multi-player/single-player shooter which can be played both in online as well as split-screen modes. Players race against each other through the trenches of space in a gameplay style which rewards spontaneity, shooting and athleticism in a dynamic and complex environment.

name: Deliverance & Reign
summary: Join a gothic battle where Good confronts Evil using roguelike deckbuilding mechanics. Play as either side, invading Alaric's Castle, or as Alaric himself defending against the invading heroes!

name: Deep Death Dungeon Darkness
summary: Challenge yourself again and again to meet your dead lover in dark fantasy roguelike action The structure of the Labyrinth of Death, which leads to the underworld, changes every time you play Abundant weapons, heavy action and heavy-handed combat through magic

name: Desperate Survival
summary: Fight against Hordes of Zombies, Skeletons and other creatures to survive as long as possible. Upgrade your arsenal and rescue other Survivors on your DESPERATE SURVIVAL.

name: Delivery Kore
summary: It is an open world adventure game that tells the story of Kore, a girl who lives in Eleusis, a forest in Middle-earth where spirits gather, and Poring, who was born from a Spirit Flower. Become Kore, a forest girl, explore the forest of Eleusis with Poring, and deliver Poring to a new world.

name: Demon's Gamble
summary:
A mechanical A.I. God has kept you alive for one thousand years.
It wants to play a game to finally let you die.
Roll the dice, will you escape your fate or face an eternity of horror?

name: Devil's Peak Fury
summary:
Devil's Peak Fury, is an endless race across the wasteland, a race for survival and glory. Speed across the wasteland, pitting your driving skills against countless warriors in nitrous boosted trucks and cars.
See how far you can survive along this mountain wasteland road known as Devil's peak, filled with enemy cars, destruction, carnage and surprises.

name: Deeper in the Dark
summary: You like Sci-Fi games? You like FPS? You like games with secret items, collectables? You like short Indie games? Then you will love this game! The game takes place in a big mothership captured by aliens. Your mission is to kill all the aliens, and blow up the mothership.

name: Destiny 2: Lightfall - Season of Defiance
summary: In the aftermath of the attack on the Traveler, the Vanguard calls upon its closest allies. Guardians must master the righteous powers of the Awoken to stand against the encroaching Shadow Legion and prove themselves as Queensguard.

name: Devilish Kisses
summary: Just left-click anywhere on the screen to make the girls kiss. You have to avoid getting caught by the nosy bigoted demons in the back lol.

name: Destiny 2: Legacy Collection
summary: This edition includes The Witch Queen, Beyond Light, and Shadowkeep. Play through three epic campaigns, unlock 37 Exotic weapons, 15 Exotic pieces of armor, and the power of Stasis, allowing you to lock down and control the battlefield.

name: Dead Inside
summary: A thrilling, first-person, action-survival game set in the modern post-apocalypse. As mankind’s last hope, you’ll traverse the hospital ravaged by a lethal plague. the fight for survival gets progressively more difficult as the story unfolds. Be ready for violence.

name: Deed: Sustainable Business
summary:
Deed - the game that develops business strategies and entrepreneurial skills.
With Deed you develop your knowledge as an entrepreneur and investor to make more profitable business.
There are several steps with great content! Your challenge is to become rich and make the highest number of negotiations with other players using the 5 essential resources of the planet: people, knowledge, technology, clean energy and finance. Talent$ is the game currency, more Talent$, better is your position in the wealth ranking.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor
summary: Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

name: Destrium
summary: You find yourself in a maze-like structure that seemingly stretches on endlessly. Your main goal is to survive in this unpleasent environment. There are different kinds of worlds, each one of them has a different theme, different monsters inhabiting it and different resources.

name: Deadlock Station
summary: Turn the battlefield into your ally in this tactical rogue-like with indirect controls. Assemble a unique squad, destroy the alien invaders with precise planning, and uncover the truth about the Event and the mysterious disappearance of humans.

name: Defendun
summary: It is a real-time power defense merge game. Players can combine warriors, archers, and wizards to create a strong hero to fend off attacks from demons.

name: Deck of the Dead
summary: "Deck of the Dead" is a thrilling roguelike deckbuilder game set in a dark, mysterious world of vampires. Players will take on the role of a powerful vampire on a quest for ultimate power as they build their deck, defeat enemies, and explore a randomly generated world filled with danger and secrets.

name: Devil Hunters
summary: Together with your friends, defeat the swarming monsters! Collect gems, and unlock more runes through accumulated honor to enhance the fighting power of heroes! The level boss will appear in 15 minutes, hurry up to let the hero grow up and defeat it!

name: Dethroned
summary: Unleash your inner ruler in Dethroned - an army-building roguelike with short runs, tactical but dynamic fights and infinite possibilities. Choose a mage, hone unique abilities, hunt for spells and artifacts. Explore an unpredictable world, grow influence and forge alliances to reclaim the throne.

name: Deviant Anomalies
summary: Deviant Anomalies is an adult visual novel and investigator simulator. It features High quality renders with fully animated lewd scenes and immersive gameplay. Solve baffling cases, recruit Supernatural Anomalies into your team and help them control their newfound powers. The more uninhibited their minds are, the more their powers grow.

name: Dennis The Menace: Catapult Master
summary: Dennis throws objects on passersby people in the classic legacy mobile java game.

name: Dexter's Laser Lab
summary:
Dexter's Laser Lab is a Shockwave game based on Dexter's Laboratory that was playable on the official Cartoon Network website.

In this game, Dee Dee celebrates her birthday by having a party in Dexter's laboratory, leaving behind many balloons in her wake. Dexter, using his invention called the TidyTron 4000, a high-powered infrared laser, works to get rid of the balloons in his laboratory.

name: Dexter's Labyrinth
summary: Dexter's Labyrinth is a Shockwave game that was formerly available on the Cartoon Network website. Sometime later, it was delisted as a free game and added to Cartoon Network's Power Play Games program when it launched in 2003.

name: Dead by Daylight: Tools of Torment Chapter
summary: The Tools Of Torment Chapter features a new Killer - The Skull Merchant - and two new Survivors, Thalita and Renato Lyra. Purchasing this add-on unlocks 3 exclusive Cosmetics: The Skull Merchant's Slipshod Prototype, Thalita's Golden Ambition, and Renato's Golden Touch.

name: Demonologist
summary: Demonologist is a Co-Op horror game that can be played with a maximum of 4 people and at least 1 person. Your goal is to detect the evil spirit type in cursed places with your team or alone by using your equipment, and exorcise the entity.

name: Deal & Wheeler
summary: The world's most comprehensive car selling simulation game. Build your own huge empire on the vast and high-quality open world map. Buy a car and sell a car. Improve your circle and become a great businessman. Don't give up and follow your dreams.

name: Derealized
summary: Derealized is a choice based game inspired by games such as The Stanley Parable and Undertale. This experience offers 10 different endings for you to explore! How many will you find?

name: Deep Space Scoundrel
summary: Deep Space Scoundrel is a rouge-like space adventure where you use a variety of classic arcade mechanics to explore the universe, customize your ship, land at spaceports, and fraternize with other aliens and low-lives.

name: Death Moto
summary: Come and experience gives you unlimited pleasure, you know!

name: Democracy 4: Event Pack
summary: Give Democracy 4 a boost with these extra events to liven up the game. Will you still be able to maintain control of the country, and command the respect of the voters? or will your term in office be derailed by the tragic course of events!

name: Devil Slayer: Raksasi - Incarnation of Darkness
summary: A mysterious person used an ancient technique to create eight beings from Soul Crystals. These beings became known as the Charim—a race whose far more arduous trials take place in the [Incarnation of Darkness].

name: Deathchron
summary: Deathchron is an action side scroller where you play as a kid that finds an amazing mech to save the world.

name: Dear Magi: Mahou Shounen Gakka
summary: Remake of the original mobile game with reworked plot and mechanics.

name: Decathlon
summary:
The game can be played alone or with a friend. It offers 2 different modes: Single game (play only one sport) or Full game (play them all). The player can compete in these sports disciplines:

- 100-meters
- Long Jump
- Shot put
- High Jump
- 400-meters
- 110-meters hurdles
- Discus throw
- Pole vault
- Javelin throw
- 1500-meters

name: Demon Speakeasy
summary: Mix drinks and mingle with monster girls! Manage a bar staffed by cute waitresses and work hard to earn their affection! Take orders, make sophisticated small-talk and get lucky in the wildest ways possible...

name: Deal or No Deal: The Interactive DVD Game Show
summary: An interactive DVD game based on the Australian version of Deal or No Deal hosted by Andrew O'Keefe

name: Deal or No Deal: The Banker is Back!
summary: The DS port of Deal or No Deal: The Banker is Back!

name: Deal or No Deal: Family Challenge
summary: Deal Or No Deal: Family Challenge is a single player game based on the UK game show hosted by Noel Edmonds.

name: Deal or No Deal: Das Interaktive DVD-Spiel
summary: An interactive DVD game based on the Germen version of Deal or No Deal hosted by Guido Cantz.

name: DeepOne
summary: Naoya and his twin sister Konoka had lost their parents at a young age and had a tough childhood. Nevertheless they still managed to find happiness in the little things in life and wished that these warm peaceful days would last forever. However, this faint hope was mercilessly crushed when a Grimoire suddenly appeared before them. It is a forbidden magic book that has existed since the beginning of time, but which should not be in the human realm. They thought that they were an ordinary family, but they were actually the heirs to the “Old One”, which has the power to destabilize the world.

name: Deadly Soccer
summary:
Dear players, we draw your attention to the unique opportunity to see an abundance of various evil spirits in a soccer game.
In the heat of the lost souls' tournament, the accumulation of a large amount of immortal substance created to something which installed itself into the soccer ball, so that everything it touched started coming to life – from the lifeless bodies in the cemetery to the scarecrows in the gardens... All the revived ones demonstrated an unquenchable thirst for the game.

name: Detective Solitaire: Butler Story 2
summary: A detective world and solitaire! Explore the locations of an ancient mansion.

name: DevilutionX
summary: DevilutionX is a port of Diablo and Diablo: Hellfire that strives to make it simple to run the game while providing engine improvements, bugfixes, and some optional quality of life features.

name: Descent
summary: Descent tells the story of an unnamed hero's journey into the bowels of a dark and mysterious cave. As he drops deeper and deeper into the darkness, a disgusting brown blob follows closely behind, advising him to turn around and return to the surface.

name: Deliver Us From Evil: Masquerade
summary: Deliver Us From Evil: Masquerade is a short and sweet BL visual novel. Keldran and Ace are two centuries-long friends with benefits. What starts off as a fun haunted house trip soon turns sinister and If they cannot conquer their fears, they may find themselves wandering the halls forever.

name: Death Tour
summary: Deliver highly valuable cargo, but watch out: you’re being hunted down. Drive through the racy storyline at full speed, reveal the secret of the stolen briefcase and revenge a gang of cold-blooded assassins.

name: DefeatMe
summary: DefeatMe is an experimental shooter by Kenta Cho. Played on a single screen, the player needs to take out one or more enemies before a horizontal line, moving from the top to the bottom of the area, hits the player's ship.

name: De Cara no Muro
summary: De Cara no Muro was a web browser game based on a segment featured on Domingão do Faustão.

name: Destiny 2: Armory Collection
summary: Over 20 Exotic weapons including the famed Gjallarhorn! Instantly grow your armory with 3 Exotic Ciphers and a coveted collection of cosmetics. Then conquer two dungeons and a raid, all while discovering new weapons and armor inspired by Bungie's past.

name: Dennou Hyouryuu: Multimedia Cruising
summary: "Dennou Hyouryuu: Multimedia Cruising" is based on William Gibson's cyberpunk novel "Neuromancer," known as the pioneer of the cyberpunk genre. It captures the early '90s digital culture, blending tech visuals with a hint of digital hippie movement. Players navigate through a cyberspace filled with computer chips, accessing various themed worlds known as "sub-pools," such as CD-ROM, internet, magazine, music, digital Hollywood, art, and fashion. Each sub-pool offers multimedia content accessed through floating plates, providing movies, texts, and audio. Players control their movement with cruising-like commands, exploring these digital realms akin to browsing a multimedia digital magazine.

name: Density Limit
summary: Welcome to the Unspace. Not gonna lie, it’s a little scary there, but it’s very attractive for scientists and kind of mysterious as well. But what is the limit of this space? What happened here and why does it even exist? Your mission will be to solve this case.

name: Demons Infernalize
summary: Demons Infernalize is a bullet hell survival game with minimalistic gameplay .Fight as a fire spirit in the magical snow planet. Survive as long as you can until your soul goes out. Burn those ice people and complete the levels, upgrade yourself, become the true survivor in the magical snow planet.

name: Decimate Drive
summary: Try escaping a killer car infested city. Decimate Drive combines atmospheric horror with engaging gameplay, while taking inspiration from 70s & 80s car-themed horror movies.

name: Deep Dark Dungeon of Anglaus
summary: "Deep Dark Dungeon of Anglaus" is a first-person horror game set in a medieval fantasy world. Face the oppressive fears that haunt you in the darkness. Face unknown opponents in the dungeon of the demon lord Anglaus.

name: Demian Saga
summary:
Demian Saga: Chrono Pirates is a collectible RPG with a heavy focus on characters. The game features gorgeous character art, flashy cut scenes, and cute 3D models done in a chibi art style.

The level-sharing system is designed to help characters quickly level up, while the combat system requires players to plan which group of heroes from their pirate crew will engage in battle.

Massive real-time PvP content that allows up to 200 players from four unions (guilds) is also in the works and scheduled to release when the game launches.

name: Deltarune: Chapter Rewritten - Scampton The Great
summary: Deltarune: Chapter Rewritten created by The Winterer is a roleswap AU with the spirit of a kid's cartoon, follow Asriel, Noelle and Charkis down the dreaded abyss of Kueen's dungeon and free this sad, strange little man.

name: Deep Sea Quest: Rescue the Lost Mermaid
summary: Match the gems and help the lost mermaid find her way home. Watch out for the dynamite that will blow up matching gems and keep you from making the highest score. And pirate skulls will swap rows or columns of gems -- now where was that matching piece?!?! Fun game with just a little bit of frustration thrown in at the higher levels.

name: Desert Worms
summary: Colonization went fine, until They awoke. In the last steps of the evacuation you must collect the remaining research data and avoid being eaten by the giant worms. Race across the dusty planet and seek temporary refuge on cliffs and buildings from the vicious monsters.

name: Devil's Dive
summary: Devil's Dive is an action platformer rogue-lite. Dive deeper and deeper into the depths to regain your title as Lord of the Underworld... if you can defeat the usurpers! Death will see you spat out, returned to the surface. But you may Dive again, stronger!

name: Demon Tormentor
summary: Perform ancient rituals with your magical dagger and shoot your way through the darkest places of this VR fantasy horror. Avoid dangers as you look for mysteries and artefacts. Don't let demons stand in the path of your investigation!

name: Demonic Supremacy
summary: Demonic Supremacy is an old school 3D shooter with a certain nostalgic flavour and few gamer-friendly features. It offers several hours of hurricane gameplay rocking through memorable levels with the explosive heavy metal soundtrack!

name: Death From Above
summary: In Death From Above, you are a lone Ukrainian military drone operator battling Russian occupation forces. Hidden behind enemy lines, you command a 'super drone' to seek and destroy tanks, take back communication towers, recover stolen goods, and fight for a better tomorrow. Slava Ukraini!

name: Delivery Impossible
summary: Delivery Impossible is an arcade truck driving simulator spiced with fun and a little bit of madness. Immerse yourself in the world of Delivery Impossible and see for yourself what it is all about - real drive, fun and madness!

name: Dead Pedal
summary: Dead Pedal is a 3rd person, action, open world driving game set in a fictional version of the Mojave desert, where your goal is to cause as much chaos and destruction as possible. Go out and explore the world's threats to get revenge for your fallen goldfish, Ted.

name: Deathstreak
summary: Deathstreak is a fast-paced, linear single-player action game with a focus on Melee Combat. Deathstreak has environmental storytelling that doesn't interrupt gameplay. Progress by killing the surrounding enemies and bosses and discover the secrets of your world.

name: Detective Butler and the King of Hearts
summary: The members of a university Detection Club find themselves entangled in a series of murders. Follow Detective Butler through the eyes of his sidekick Gilligan as the two set out to find the culprit. Can they unravel the truth before the serial killer claims another victim?

name: Death Must Die
summary: Descend the nether in search of Death himself! Choose from God-given powers to slay his hordes of minions. Unlock new heroes, collect powerful items and create game-breaking synergies in this roguelite hack and slash survivors game.

name: Deformed
summary: Single player horror game set in a underground lab. Kill monsters and escape.

name: Device of Bakudan
summary: Explore and destroy levels with magic bombs to get revenge on a corrupted mage in this 2D action platformer!

name: Deathly Dangerous
summary: The game "Deathly Dangerous" is an arcade shooter for the extermination of the undead, whose souls cannot find peace. To correct an annoying mistake, Death itself decides to take up arms...

name: Dead City
summary: It doesn't matter who you are or who you were before. Welcome to the Dead City!

name: Deep Blue Odyssey
summary: Deep Blue Odyssey is a thrilling submarine running game that will test your reflexes and challenge your strategic thinking.

name: Desperate Island
summary: In Desperate Island, the player plays as a survivor on a deserted island and must use the island's resources to survive and cope with the challenges that nature poses to him. The player must search for food and water, create shelters and adaptations to protect himself from natural disasters.

name: Dev_Hell
summary: Welcome to Dev_Hell, the dark comedy game about the unrealistic expectations and chaos of the tech industry. Use coding skills to complete poorly-defined features, manage relationships with coworkers, and survive long enough to ship a product that may or may not crash on launch...

name: Destroy the Monoliths
summary: Explore. Mine. Build. Fight. Destroy The Monoliths is a single-player real-time mining tower offense roguelike where you explore a randomly generated map, mine the terrain to get resources, and build turrets to both protect your base and fight monoliths that keep spawning ever more minions.

name: Desertopia
summary: Desertopia is a relaxing and therapeutic idle simulator that allows you to spend 5 to 10 minutes of your day cultivating a desert island into a vibrant and lively place at your own pace. You are here to care for the island and restore its wildlife. Occasionally you need to pick up floating trash to keep the environment clean. You must also make decisions about events triggered by humans. Do you let a tour group onto the island? Should you build a resort? Every decision will directly affect the development of the island.

name: Dead of Day
summary: Survive the zombie apocalypse, in this retro styled old school dungeon crawler. Go out into the world, collect resources, meet and rescue other survivors, uncover the story of Dead of Day.

name: DeckEleven's Railroads 2
summary: DeckEleven's Railroads 2 is a fun and addictive railroads building game. Like a true Tycoon, you are in charge of everything! Design and build the perfect railways network.

name: Devil Dumper Doris
summary: Conquer a castle of demons!

name: Dedant
summary:
Dedant is the fourty sixth game of the NES version of Action 52.

You're a pink ant who has to kill other ants. But in the later levels, if a spider gets down where you are, you're pretty much screwed. The game has six levels. With each level, more types of enemies appear.

name: Dead Space Demake
summary: Dead Space Demake has everything you want and more, from necromorph limb dismemberment to affine texture mapping errors. You've played Dead Space (2008) and you've played Dead Space (2023) it's time to soak in the horrid vibes of Dead Space (1998)

name: Dennis Miller: That's Geek to Me
summary: Multimedia CD-ROM glossary of computer-related terms ("ASCII", "E-mail", "Cross-platform" etc.) with both a serious explanation spoken by an animated "geek" character, and digitized video clips of Dennis Miller giving his own humorous definition of the same term.

name: Demons vs. Fairyland
summary: Raise undead armies, construct brutally cute towers and summon dark energies to protect your children at all costs. Skills and gears will enhance your powers and structure upgrades with grant special abilities to fight your way back to the dark forest. Those goody two-shoes Fairyland folks aren't going to make it easy...!

name: Delicious in Dungeon
summary: A simple, easy to play roguelike game where all you have to do is choose which way to go, left or right! Each game takes about 30 minutes to play, but with the auto-save feature, you can play even if you have only 3 minutes to spare.

name: Death, Soul & Robots
summary: In this captivating Metroidvania game you will take on the role of a cute kitty cat on its mission to find the soul of Planet 42 to rescue the Earth. Fight enemies and bosses, solve puzzles and explore levels in this fascinating game.

name: Desolation
summary: Desolation will bring a complete Looter-Shooter experience to Mobile Devices with fresh controls, a focus on teamplay and a lot of build customization with near endless potential for maximizing your efficiency.

name: Deep Storm
summary: A shooting game with a pseudo-3D perspective.

name: Defence Mission
summary: A clone of Battle City with people instead of tanks.

name: Dead or Alive 5: Last Round - Character: Naotora Ii
summary:
With lightning fast leg strikes, Naotora Ii leaps into the fray! This mashup brings together the action of Samurai Warriors and the fighting entertainment of Dead or Alive 5 Last Round. Defeat the strongest fighters for the honor of the Ii clan!

Naotora Ii joins Dead or Alive 5 Last Round as a playable character!

Download this to use Naotora Ii in Dead or Alive 5 Last Round

name: Derby Quest: Horse Manager HD
summary: The Ultimate Horse Breeding, Training, and Racing Game! Grow your stable with many horses and train them to become Derby Champions. Breed your champion race horses to create 'super baby' horses that become even faster! Derby Quest is an amazing horse care-taking and racing simulation game. It's a game full of strategy and arcade action.

name: Deceive Inc.: Misery Empire
summary: A ghost from Ace's past has returned to break hearts and take names in Misery Empire: Deceive Inc's first seasonal catalog update. Featuring tons of gameplay improvements and fixes, over 50 exclusive new items to unlock, and Red - the devilishly charming new Scoundrel Agent!

name: Dead Earth: Combat Shooter 3D
summary: Become the last hope of humanity in a dramatic war against rebellious machines. Shoot tons of bullets, explore unbelievable cities and defeat a deadly boss in the ultimate battle.

name: Dead or Alive 5: Last Round - Character: Mai Shiranui
summary:
The super heroine of fighting games enters the fray!

The flying fan, the powerful flames, the bewitching beauty - all come to life with the hottest fighters in gaming!

Mai Shiranui puts her Shiranui style of ninja arts to the test in Dead or Alive!

Download this to use Mai Shiranui in Dead or Alive 5 Last Round.

name: Desterium
summary:
Since the beginning of the game, each character has a race that determines their physical form and a class that determines what they excel at in the game. Throughout the game, each player's character learns skills that will determine how successful (or not) they will be at their trade. The first two attributes (race and class) are chosen by the player when creating his character. The skill attribute mainly depends on the experience during the game and is deeply influenced by the way of playing and the preferences of each player.

The action takes place in a fictional virtual world where you take the role of a character who interacts with other characters, whether they are controlled by other players or by non-player characters. All the interactions take place in a fantastic environment like in a traditional role-playing game. You can chat with other characters on the screen, and through interactions, trade, trade, make friends, or other activities. We are waiting for you at Desterium!

name: Deadly Road
summary:
Escape the dangerous path of Deadly Road!

Get ready for an almost impossible challenge and push your skills to the limit to jump over prickly and dangerous obstacles and escape from the deadly road!

name: Derpy Dino
summary: Derpy Dino is a game where you are the last dinosaur alive. You try your best to survive and keep the dinosaurs from becoming extinct but be aware... meteors are crashing down.

name: Delicious Foods
summary: A camera-based game, where the sensor will place giant cartoon lips over the player's actual mouth. The player must move their mouth to eat the happy food, while avoiding eating garlic. ["DDR" hardware only]

name: Devil Island
summary: Devil Island is an action game for the Game Boy Color. It is alternately known as Devil Land, 惡魔城2 月風魔篇 (Castlevania 2: Record of Getsu Fūma), 魔戒博詵 (Lord of the Rings), and 魔戒3-不完美的世界 (Lord of the Rings 3: Imperfect World). The text is completely in Chinese, and no English translation is known to exist.

name: Delta-V Racing
summary:
Snake your way through the galaxy’s finest race tracks, and charge to victory in some of the coolest ships known to man. Quick thinking and faster reactions are the order of the day. Race tactically; throw off homing missiles with decoy mines or risk the tight fast route to pull a chain-boosted lead then claim your victory from the tournament boss as you take him out with a Laser blast…
Can you take your place at the top podium on every event and become a true Delta-V Legend?

name: Defense Derby
summary: Defense Derby is an epic battle of wits, where you can scout units to defend your castle and reach the top of your Guardian's Journey. Enjoy many different modes, from PvP, Boss Dungeon, Blitz PvE, Friendly Derby and more!

name: Deep Hunters
summary: Deep Hunters is a 2 player multiplayer game that focuses on hacking and deep web. You and your friend signed up for a deep web game, but you didn't expect that the you'll end up fighting with each other for your life. Will you win the game or will you sacrifice your life to save your friend?

name: Dessert DIY
summary:
Make sweet ice cream, popsicles, and waffles using your creativity in one of the best dessert decorating games!

Experience the satisfaction of preparing your customers' orders with your own hands, meeting their expectations, and witnessing their delightful reactions! Explore a variety of delicious molds, creams, syrups, and sweet ingredients to create mouthwatering works of art!

Does your customer want to take revenge on someone? Prepare yucky desserts with surprise bugs or chili peppers! Such a taste is definitely something no one will ever forget!

Every dessert sold brings you coins, a delightful reward that you can invest in enhancing the appearance of your store. Change the colors of your walls or floor, and add new furniture. Transform your store into a cozy and professional haven, all while having fun!

Ready to get your hands dirty and make unique, colorful desserts?

name: Death In Abyss
summary: Death In Abyss is an intense flight shooter that challenges you to utilize your maneuverability and explosive firepower to survive against the deep sea hostilities.

name: Demonheart: The Cursed Trial
summary: You are a girl with a demonic heart, trapped with a group of suspicious individuals. When a demonspawn arrives, the humans start dying. Save your life and romance some shady characters!

name: Death Harvest
summary: Death Harvest is a cooperative VR indie game in which players assume the role of a group of survivors from the Boston combat unit - the Reapers. Fight for the survival of your colony in a post-apocalyptic world full of zombies.

name: Delphiniums Rise
summary: Delphiniums Rise- A Fantasy Based, Full Loot MMORPG set in a world of wonder, magic and adventure. Experience this bold graphicly impacting MMORPG alone or with others, but be on your toes, as you can and will drop everything in your bags, and destroy your armor upon falling in Delphiniums Rise.

name: Delusion Out of Space
summary: Delusion Out of Space is an atmospheric first-person science fiction adventure game with an unforgettable story, a unique world, and supernatural alien technologies.

name: Deco Deck
summary: Deco Deck is a new logic puzzle from the creator of Semantle. Your goal is to link the cards on the board in connected groups of five, such that each group makes a valid "hand".

name: Destroy All Zombies
summary: Zombies again......

name: Deadly Dunk
summary:
Our hero Jordan is good at basketball. He always see out thieves trying to escape on the street. And he tends to use his skillful dunk to stop the thieves.
Unfortunately, it's tricky to do that because the street is full of obstacles.
He needs your help to find the best way beat the thieves.

name: Deadblast
summary: Arrange the warriors correctly to defeat the enemy!

name: Detectives United: Origins - Collector's Edition
summary: Join Mystery Trackers' Agent Brown, Haunted Hotel's James Blackthorne, and Grim Tales' Anna Gray as they join forces to stop The Collector's evil scheme.

name: Dead by Daylight: Silent Hill Cosmetic Pack
summary:
The Silent Hill Cosmetic Pack includes the very rare Alissa Gillespie outfit for Cheryl Mason and the Dark Wish outfit for The Executioner.

This pack is part of the Silent Hill Edition and the cosmetics are also available separately from the in-game store using premium currency.

name: Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed - Skin Pack
summary: Tuxedo, Mankini or sparkly Unicorn - 10 special skins for Crypto, the king of evil aliens himself. Fly high, with 4 special skins for his trusty saucer. Dress for the ocassion, dress for the invasion!

name: Deal or No Deal
summary: Deal or No Deal is based on the TV game show of the same name. It puts one contest against a banker. At the start of the game, the player choose one of the 26 briefcases. They contain prize money ranging from $.01 to $1,000,000. The different amounts are shown on a game board. Each round the player has to open a number of the remaining briefcases which are then marked on the board (six in the first round, five in the second, four in the third). Based on the remaining amount of money, the banker offers the player a deal, a certain amount of money, based on odds. The player can choose to accept the deal when large sums are gone, or decide to go through. After the third round the briefcase is opened and if it contains a higher sum than what the banker offered, the player has made a great deal.

name: Dennis the Menace
summary: A portable version of the game based on the movie of the same name. Dennis runs, jumps and fights his way through 16 stages (divided among 6 levels) to find Switchblade Sam and liberate Mr. Wilson's stolen wealth. He'll be going through Mr. Wilson's House, the Spooky Forest, the Sewers, the Adventure Park, the School and finally the Boiler Room.

name: Deviko TD
summary: Raise chicks and intercept enemies! Easy tower defense game.

name: Deckmate!
summary: Deckmate is a fresh take on the classic game of Chess. Using your cards, you can influence the board itself, make pieces explode, and more!

name: Detective: Stella Porta case
summary: Detective: Stella Porta Case, puts you in the shoes of a detective who investigates three strange disappearances. In all cases there is a contract signed by the disappeared, that contract is from an organization called "Stella Porta".

name: Dead On Arrival
summary: Dead On Arrival is a Crime Scene Investigation game where players must gather clues, use forensic equipment, and analyse the evidence discovered at the scene. Work with your friends to uncover who committed the crime, and convict the correct suspect on a wide range of different maps.

name: Dead Mire
summary: An action packed endless wave zombie shooter with elements of tactics and resource management.

name: Dead Girl's Notebook
summary:
Dead Girl's Notebook is a visual novel about love, personal growth, self-acceptance, masochism, etc. haphazardly assembled across 15 days for Variety Megajam 2021.

It has 10 chapters, and a little over 20,000 words of narration and dialogue. It is probably around 1 to 2 hours long, depending on how quickly you read. (If you use "auto mode", which advances text automatically at a relaxed pace, it is about 2 hours and 15 minutes long.)

name: Defectum
summary: Defectum is a virtual reality (VR) experience that seeks to express and give players a sense of the fear of failure by utilizing and visualizing my personal experiences and transforming them into a VR experience. Players are given the opportunity to take a “walk in my shoes” and view the world through an intimate lens—they will face feelings and emotions such as anxiety, unease, and a loss of hope and are encouraged to take their time to explore and experience the visuals that are presented to them.

name: DeathTrap
summary: A RogueLike based Puzzler set in a randomly generated dungeon.

name: Defender of the Wood
summary:
The realm is in peril! Nasty little Goblin-Things have been spotted massing in the forest. The King has assembled his best archers for training to prepare for the onslaught! Is it too little too late?

Test your skill! Find out what it takes to impress Lord Astirian and become... a Defender of the Wood. Take on the goblin horde and challenge your friends' hi-scores!
