The King has also put out a grand bounty on the fearsome creatures. Make sure you upgrade your amor and weapons before taking the war to their dragon commander.

name: Detective Chirpums: Private Investigator
summary:
They say the city's a roost for every bird.

Detective Chirpums is more than happy to disagree with that. Almost as much as he is downing a bottle of Grackle's Finest in one sitting.

He's the city's best detective. He's the city's only detective. Because someone had to.

And he's got a new case. It's his only chance at paying rent for the month. And not unlike too many of his cases, this one comes with a dame in sheep's clothing.”

name: Demon Scrolls
summary: Stop the Primagen before he can find the Demon Scrolls to usher in an Age of Darkness in this Single Player RPG

name: Death Requiem
summary: Death Requiem is a survival fantasy game. You'll explore the dungeon and gothic environment to experience the grandeur of architecture. The rift in the universe has opened and get ready to fight against constant stream of enemies using your strategy and skill combination.

name: Destiny Summoner
summary:
Destiny Summoner, the latest Idle strategy RPG from DH Games, is coming to your phone!
Start your adventure of redemption in the shattered world of Destiny Summoner!
Lead your team of heroes venture deep into a continent of mystery and save the world from demons and darkness.

name: Destiny 2: Lightfall - Season of the Deep
summary: In Season of the Deep, Guardians must travel to Saturn's moon of Titan and investigate an unexpected distress call. Guardians are tasked with diving into the depths of it's methane ocean to uncover ancient secrets and disrupt the Taken and Hive rituals beneath the waves.

name: Demoniac Words
summary: The evil has taken everything from two sorrowful girls, but the girls will not stop fighting, they will not stop resisting. They are not fighting for themselves.

name: Deadenders
summary: A text adventures with illustrations, a parody on the TV series the Eastenders.

name: Densha-zukuri no Popo
summary: This is a story about creating trains.

name: Deep Sea Sweep
summary: A cute 2d platformer where you clean up the sea of all these filthy treasures chests plaguing the various biomes. Swim, jump and bonk meanies on their head in many short but challenging levels with simple but tight controls.

name: Delven
summary: Explore the subterranean depths of an infinite 2D world and discover unique biomes, monsters, artifacts and more. Build your base to gather and manage resources. Fight bosses in tactical, turn-based battles and unlock dazzling and powerful loot!

name: Degroid
summary:
The game tells the story of a little man named Degroid, who was caught by Mad Doctor. He had gone crazy during his experiments with teleportation.

A player will have to pass the obstacle course to get to the perpetrator of his imprisonment and get out of this endless madness. On the way there will be loads of circular saws, thorns, aggressive slugs, lasers and other lethal obstacles.

Because of teleports, carrying the Degroid`s body between levels, a player acquires immortality, resurrecting after every defeat.

Will he become mad too after countless deaths?

name: Destiny 2: The Final Shape
summary: The Final Shape looms—a nightmarish calcification of reality into the Witness's twisted design. Embark on a perilous journey into the heart of the Traveler, rally the Vanguard, and end the War of Light and Darkness.

name: Deep Golf
summary:
Golf down through the Earth. Billions of procedurally generated holes, every game and device is different. Play to the center of the Earth and see what you find along the way. Replay with all new holes.
How deep can you go?
Touch and drag to shoot. Tilt to add some spin. Put the ball in the hole.
Play anywhere on your Apple Watch.
Instantly try or share Deep Golf with its AppClip. Even save the AppClip onto an NFC Tag.
I hate ads too. So there aren't any. You can upgrade to play with much longer courses, and use any ball before unlocking it with holes-in-one.
Upgrade to also play with some fun Physics. Bouncier? Stickier? Mixed with a Square golf ball? Upgrade to mix and match.

name: Dein Sportpferd
summary: Learn how to take care of a horse, ride horses and solve puzzles.

name: Dealership Simulator
summary: Dealership Simulator is allows you to simulate a Vehicle Dealer´s Life in your Real Life while playing this game.

name: Devil Apartment
summary: Hello, Jake. Welcome to the game.

name: Deep Sea Rhapsody
summary: This game is a game of musical rhythm, in which the player can pick up the drumsticks in the scene and beat the drums in the scene to relax rhythmically

name: Death Rabbit Arena
summary: Death Rabbit Arena is a realistic first person and third person shooter that takes place in real world locations. Play with friends online or offline against the computer or by yourself and explore big open world maps.

name: Destroy the Wall
summary: A 2D metroidvaina action game with a unique control scheme. Guide a snake constantly chasing your cursor--but be sure not to let them touch. Explore the decaying landscape of a condemned world and fight its monsters so you can grow strong enough to destroy the wall that always holds you back

name: Detective Agency Gray Tie 2: Collector's Edition
summary: AviGames presents the second game from the Detective Agency "Gray Tie" series. In this hidden objecft game you have to investigate the theft of a famous painting and solve loads of mindchallenging mini games and riddles!

name: Demon Lord: Reincarnation
summary: Assemble a party, explore the dungeon, fight your way through hordes of monsters, and defeat the Demon Lord in this brutal dungeon crawler. Are you up to the challenge?

name: Death of the Augnob
summary: An alien goes on a quest to defeat the Augnob.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Season 4 - Critical Corruption
summary: Welcome to Season 4 - Critical Corruption! Though we have gained great ground against the rampaging Lithophage in the past months, it remains a constant threat- and to make matters worse, reports of alarming new mutations are starting to come in. Let's get right into it!

name: Death Game Hotel
summary: Death Game Hotel, the online death game battle where players put their own body parts at stake in order to win the championship.

name: Demeo Battles
summary: Welcome to the arena! Demeo Battles is a competitive turn-based strategy game for 1-4 players.

name: Desert Bus
summary: Desert Bus is a mod for Undertale that recreates the original game of Desert Bus with an 8 hour long room in Undertale.

name: Dessert DIY: Complete Edition
summary:
Preparing delicious desserts is a piece of cake. Try it yourself!
Make sweet ice cream, popsicles and waffles using your creativeness in one of the best dessert decorating games right now.

name: Dead Detective: Zombie Conspiracy
summary: Take on the role of Margh, undead private detective, in this humorous and wacky graphic adventure that combines point-and-click mechanics with an elaborate “deaduction” system. Use your brain (or what's left of it) and solve bizarre and unconventional mysteries in a world ruled by zombies.

name: Dead Shapes
summary: Dead Shapes is an action rogue-lite. Fight, die, learn, and repeat as you journey through uniques levels. Be ready to discover thousands of character builds.

name: Destruct Blocks
summary: Destruct Blocks is an addictive isometric puzzle game that combines strategic thinking, block destruction, and color matching challenges. Navigate a shape composed of colored blocks through intricate levels, strategically demolishing target blocks while avoiding others.

name: Delphine Software Collection 1
summary: Enjoy three stunning Amiga classics and a console gaming legend from the cinematic masters of home computer games, Delphine Software. Travel through time in Future Wars, unravel an international mystery in Operation Stealth, make first contact with an alien race in Another World and recover your identity in Flashback!

name: Deadly Delivery
summary: Deadly Delivery is a first person horror game. Your goal is to deliver a package to an abandoned psychiatric hospital. Could it be that the address is wrong? Or maybe the hospital is getting renovated? Who knows… You better deliver the package as soon as possible.

name: DekaPari
summary:
Your childhood sweetheart is dead. As you reminisce, you notice looming over her eternal site of rest, adorned with flowers, is a giant girl with a familiar face.

DekaPari is a spin-off of Towelket, a long running indie RPG Maker adventure series. Unlike previous entries, DekaPari's exploration is mostly in 2D as opposed to the isometric style. It is described by the developer as a "comfy pixel art RPG."

name: Dead Hook
summary: Dead Hook is an explosive mix of roguelike and shooter genre with brutal combat and captivating storytelling. Explore the elder planet Resaract and take on the role of Adam Stone, a mercenary, smuggler, thief, and devoted husband.

name: Deathloop: Deluxe Pack
summary:
Upgrade to the most stylish version of DEATHLOOP with the Deluxe Pack! Assassinate in style with classy character skins, premium weapons, and two trinkets to buff your gear.

Deluxe Pack Content:
• Character Skin: "Party Crasher" Colt Character Skin
• Character Skin: "Sharp Shooter" Julianna Character Skin
• Unique weapon: Transtar Trencher unique weapon (PS5 Exclusive)
• Unique weapon: Eat The Rich Tribunal unique weapon
• Unique weapon: .44 Karat Fourpounder unique weapon
• Unique weapon: “Chrome Demon” MG-1 Pepper Mill
• Two Trinkets (equippable buffs)

name: Deck of Souls
summary: Roguelite deck-building meets souls-like. Break out of an infinite loop to close the hell gates, turn enemies into cards, and build your own omnipotent Deck of Souls! Rolls included.

name: Delia: The Traveling Witch
summary: Delia and her glowing pig Bao are now in Glutinous Kingdom. After receiving a request to cure a sick child, they are wrapped in an adventure that spans the whole magical land!

name: Dead by Daylight: Nicolas Cage
summary: Prepare for a tour de force performance. Dead by Daylight's Nicolas Cage Chapter Pack features a new Survivor, legendary actor Nicolas Cage in his deadliest role yet. Purchasing this add-on unlocks an exclusive Cosmetic: Teal Jacket as well as the Very Rare Gorgon Drip outfit for Nicolas Cage.

name: Demon Loop
summary: Take on the repeating Loop in this digital board game from the pen of renowned board game author Alexander Pfister! Protect humans from the monsters they had only recently called friends.Wield an increasing deck of cards to master strategy across each unique loop. Build and repair structures, rally villagers to your side and improve your own skills to overcome the demons running wild across the land.

name: Detectives United II: The Darkest Shrine - Collector's Edition
summary: Your favorite detectives have teamed up for another mystery and this one spans the globe! James, Anna, and the Mystery Trackers each rush to investigate paranormal activity related to places from their past cases. Meanwhile, a dark organization looms over them all, threatening to take them out. The collector's edition includes a bonus gameplay chapter, ingame strategy guide, and other goodies.

name: Debug Quest
summary: Debug Quest is a single-player game on an adventure to heal a bugged game world. Use blocks, items, and plugins to heal the game world and complete missions! Explore the map and connect the road with blocks!

name: Demon Subduing Master
summary: A horizontal version of casual adventure and decompression action game, where players will play a Taoist who subdues demons and eliminates them, kills the demon king, obtains the demon king's inner elixir, and strengthens their own strength.

name: Dead by Daylight: End Transmission
summary: Dead by Daylight’s End Transmission Chapter features a new Killer – The Singularity – and a new Survivor, Gabriel Soma. A new Map, Toba Landing, is available for all players. Purchasing this add-on unlocks 2 exclusive Cosmetics: The Singularity’s Curved Scythe and Gabriel’s Illuminated Shirt.

name: Demon's Bane
summary: Save the animal kingdom in this innovative roguelike deckbuilder. Battle enemies, unlock abilities, and customize your deck. With 10 classes, 350+ cards, and a 100 different enemies. Experience strategic card combat with a twist. No In App Purchases.

name: Delearnia: Fractions of Hope
summary: Delearnia: Fractions of Hope is a thrilling puzzle adventure where action, mystery, and mathematics collide. Navigate the enchanting world of Delearnia, conquer challenges, and defeat enemies with the power of mathematics. Rediscover the fun in being a thinker. Become the Mathemagician!

name: Desolated District
summary: Desolated District is an open world survival game. Loot, craft, build and fight in a post-apocalyptic dystopia, alone or with friends. Explore the dark and dangerous depths of the city while looking for a way out.

name: Defenders of Legends
summary: Defend your kingdom against legendary monsters. Place turrets strategically to block their path. Upgrade your defenses to fend off enemy hordes. Become the legendary guardian of the earth alone or in co-op!

name: Desktop Mark
summary: Desktop Mark is a simple minigame-centric idler revolving around the goofy character of Mark, a smiley that bounces all around your screen. Every so often, Mark hits the corner and prompts you to procrastinate & have some fun with Mark.

name: Deep Blue Fantasy
summary: Deep Blue Fantasy is a roguelike adventure game set in an underwater world. Collect weapons, recruit crew, hold the lucky dice in your hand, and embark on a journey into the unpredictable depths of the sea!

name: De Blob: Utrecht
summary: A UFO is flying through space near Earth and Saturn, but it collides with an asteroid within the asteroid field. It crashes into the HQ of I.N.K.T. in Utrecht, but the occupant escapes the crash using a parachute. He is then surrounded by I.N.K.T. forces but tries to escape...

name: Desert Spirit Grave
summary: Desert Spirit Grave is an adventure game through desert and time. Grab your grappling hook and swing trough the stages of ruin. Find the secrets hidden in the runes!

name: Devinica
summary:
A corporate artificial intelligence simulator.

Deviniva is a first-person retro shooter set in a dystopian nonsensical city. Play through five levels set in apartments and warehouses and fight different enemies.

name: Dead City: Sci-Fi Pack
summary: Space stormtrooper on the streets of the Dead City!

name: Decurse: A New Magic Farming Game
summary: Journey to a magical sparkly island where pandas, wizards, mermaids are just the beginning! Can you reverse the curse with the power of smiles and rainbows to bring happiness to the villagers?

name: Def Leppard: Let's Rock It!
summary:
Welcome to Def Leppard's "Let’s Rock It!" - Step into the shoes of Bethany, an up-and-coming rocker on the rise to stardom with the help of the legendary Def Leppard.
Collect stylish clothes and new musical instruments, conquer social media, and make your way to the top of the charts as you progress through levels & solve puzzles using match-3 combinations!

name: Dead City: Street Fighter Pack
summary: What could be better than a good old street fight!

name: Decay
summary: A survival RPG that's about an hour long that's totally not influenced by current events. Go to work in the midst of a pandemic and a monster outbreak. Buy food and try not to starve. Hope you don't get sick or beaten to death on the way to work. Hope you don't lose it.

name: Devil’s Propose
summary: A dark romance fantasy otome.

name: Dead by Daylight: Attack on Titan - Warhammer Pack
summary: It's your last chance to get these 5 Attack on Titan Outfits for The Spirit, Felix, Kate, Zarina, and Ace before they leave the store on July 18th. The War Hammer Pack only includes the Outfits, and Dead by Daylight characters must be purchased separately.

name: Dead by Daylight: Attack on Titan - Armored Pack
summary: It's your last chance to get these 5 Attack on Titan Outfits for The Oni, Dwight, Yui, Jake, and Meg before they leave the store on July 18th. The Armored Pack only includes the Outfits, and Dead by Daylight characters must be purchased separately.

name: Detective Reborn Bundle
summary: Become a young Sherlock Holmes and solve two mind-bending mysteries that will scar the brilliant detective forever.

name: Devil Ninja Fight: Kungfu combat
summary: Devil Ninja Fight is a Fast paced and super addictive ninja game.In this face paced fighting game,your goal is to kill enemies and Monster on the devil's land. And there are various props to increase your combat effectiveness.

name: Demon Dodger
summary: Demon Dodger is an all-ages, heckin' good time! Navigate a rain of demons without falling to waste alongside them. Dodge the cons of a magical fairyland, and make sure not to be caught while lurking amid the remnants of an experimental disaster.

name: Death Slayer
summary: Death Slayer is a 2D Metroidvania-style platformer where you control Asura, a young swordswoman whose goal is to eradicate the evil that plagues her land.

name: Demon Hunter
summary: Defeat demons to improve your stats and feel the speed of combat

name: Defenders of the Omniverse
summary: Defenders of the Omniverse is a Reverse Bullet Hell Rogue-Lite set in a world between realities, where heroes and monsters from all across space and time face off in the final battle for the fate of the Omniverse!

name: Densetsu no Kusuriya-san
summary: An in-development otome game by Mix Factor.

name: Dekiru! Game Center
summary: Simulation title where players can run their very own game center, with many parodies and homages of popular arcade titles.

name: Delicious Quest
summary: Delicious Quest is a game about a dog on his journey to find the Holy Roast Turkey. Unfortunately, this dog can't control himself and will require your help to go further in his epic quest!

name: Deep Dive
summary:
Fly through a number of checkpoints into the finish line as fast as possible.

The Glider has no propulsion, the only way is down.

You can brake midair to slow down and fold in your wings to drift.

Happy Highscore Hunting.

name: Death Elevator
summary: Death Elevator is a simple roguelike where every hit is lethal but time slows down whenever you are in danger. Reach the top floor or die trying!

name: Delaweare
summary: The independent video game Delaweare is a free ZDoom based first person shooter in which the emphasis is put on visual and audio experiences. The aim of the game is to explore its strange world to collect all music tracks.

name: Defense of the Kings
summary:
Welcome to Defense of the Kings, the ultimate castle defense game where you get to lead your army to victory and defend your kingdom against fierce warriors and monsters.

In Defense of the Kings, you can choose from five different races of warriors: Ancient, Human, Orc, Forest, and Undead. Each race has unique abilities, strengths, and weaknesses, giving you a diverse set of options to build your army and conquer your enemies.

name: Desert Tycoon
summary:
Have you ever dreamed of building a mega-metropolis in the Arabian desert?
Play Desert Tycoon and become an Arabian business tycoon by building your dream city in the thriving Arabian emirate of Abu Lumba!
Start from humble Bedouin beginnings and progress step-by-step in building your business empire of real estate, business, energy, and tourism assets. Develop major industries and watch your economy grow right before your eyes as you expand your city and progress to new levels in the game!

name: DeliCat
summary:
Take to the skies and join the ultimate food delivery team!
As a daring cat, quirky chameleon or loyal dog, fly your drone to deliver mouth-watering meals to hungry customers!
Earn cash for each successful delivery and use it to unlock new animals and gear: powerful drones, cool glasses, stylish hats and more!
Featuring intuitive controls and addictive gameplay, DeliCat will keep you hooked for hours! Complete tricky levels in Career mode or beat your friend's high score in the endless High-flyer mode!
But that's not all - DeliCat also features a variety of challenges that you can complete to unlock additional rewards! With each new challenge, you'll become a more skilled pilot, able to navigate the alley with ease and deliver meals faster than ever before!
So, are you ready to take on the ultimate food delivery challenge in this action-packed arcade game? Join the DeliCat crew and take your place among the elite team of animal drone pilots!

name: Dessert DIY: Nasty Edition
summary:
In Dessert DIY: Nasty Edition you can make desserts and seek sweet revenge!

Unlock mean ingredients to create desserts with a nasty surprise for the bad guys. Imagine adding cockroaches, ants, worms, and other yucky things to your ice cream and popsicles!

name: Derby Baseball
summary:
Jump into your virtual park to play baseball from the comfort of your home. Play ball with your friends from across the world! Practice your swing, home runs and trick shots. Spawn infinite pitches in this virtual batting cage and take as many swings as you’d like!

Derby uses custom baseball physics, making VR baseball feel more real than ever before!

name: Decadence
summary: This mod draws inspiration from all over the place, but in the end it’s aiming to be its own thing.

name: Deppart Prototype
summary:
Deppart is an indie first-person horror game with shooter elements.

Be very careful, enemies kill you with one hit.

name: Dedz0ne
summary: Dedz0ne is a Yume Nikki/Splatoon fangame based on Dedf1sh's backstory. It was created as a submission for Dream Diary Jam 7. Game contains visuals that may hint at Octo Expansion spoilers.

name: Dead or Delivery
summary: Included in the Story Me app.

name: Deadly Ritual
summary: Deadly Ritual is a short episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards led by 40oz.

name: Dead But Dreaming
summary: Dead But Dreaming is your descent into madness, disguised as a 12-level limit-removing episode for Doom 2 summoned by @dmdr and the occult folks of Doomer Boards.

name: Deceive Inc.: Neon Nights
summary: Agent Hans gets a rude awakening when the ex-henchman who cut off his arm comes out of retirement! With his days of villainy behind him, new agent Sasori aims to bring Deceive Inc. into the future of corporate espionage.

name: Der Pferderennstall
summary: Der Pferderennstall is a real-time strategy game where you will manage a racing horses' farm by making the constructions, buying horses, hiring workers to take care of them, and observing their growth until they are prepared to race your opponents.

name: Deep Sea
summary: Deep Sea is a standalone release of the Deep Sea pinball table, originally included in the game Epic Pinball.

name: Death Under Tuscan Skies: A Dana Knightstone Novel
summary: Journey across Italy as best-selling novelist Dana Knightstone in Death Under Tuscan Skies: A Dana Knightstone Novel! During a lecture in a university in Tuscany, you are startled by the ghost of a 19th century girl named Eva. Decades ago, she died of a mysterious illness while her lover Giovanni left to find a cure. Why did he never return? Unravel the mystery of his disappearance as you explore beautiful landscapes in this incredible Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

name: Death Under Tuscan Skies: A Dana Knightstone Novel - Collector's Edition
summary:
Journey across Italy as best-selling novelist Dana Knightstone in Death Under Tuscan Skies: A Dana Knightstone Novel! During a lecture in a university in Tuscany, you are startled by the ghost of a 19th century girl named Eva. Decades ago, she died of a mysterious illness while her lover Giovanni left to find a cure. Why did he never return? Unravel the mystery of his disappearance as you explore beautiful landscapes in this incredible Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

The Collector’s Edition includes:

Bonus gameplay
Integrated Strategy Guide
Stunning Soundtrack

name: Death the Guitar
summary: "Death the Guitar" is a pop and violent 2D Platformer action game. The player is a killer electric guitar whose owner was murdered, and the goal is to take revenge on the humans by manipulating "sound" and "electricity".

name: Deckstrander
summary: A survival + deck building + story generated simulator. Build shelter, craft weapon & tools, hunt food, tame animal, fight creature, slavery, and story generation with character traits.

name: Detective Patch
summary: Detective Patch is an adorable 2D turn-based RPG where you solve mysteries and interrogate enemies. Battle menacing foes, meet quirky characters, and solve the mystery of the stolen ruby.

name: Defenders of Cardom
summary: Defenders of Cardom is a traditional tower defense game blended with deck-builder roguelite elements. Build your deck, play your cards right, and hone your strategy to defend against waves of enemies!

name: Defenders of Kronos
summary: Defeat the corrupted inhabitants of Kronos in this 4-player online co-op adventure. Uncover the source of corruption, collect unique weapons and items, and upgrade your arsenal with stars. Join forces with friends, vanquish hordes of enemies, and save Kronos in this epic co-op experience.

name: Deaths Toll
summary: Journey across the world with a deadly beast always right on your tail! Go alone or with a buddy as you search for supplies, compete in dance-offs, meet a bunch of weirdos, and fight off hordes of monsters in a randomly generated quest for survival!

name: Demon's Blood
summary: Demon's Blood is a first-person shooter that throws you into a Demonic universe, Become a special agent, arm yourself and improve your equipment in different games to repel the demonic forces trying to invade your world.

name: Demonsomnia
summary: Demonsomnia is a CO-OP horror video game developed and published by Woziva on Steam. It is a 4-player online CO-OP horror game about the impact of post-nuclear reaction. Radiation spread all over, put on your gas mask and go to the forest, collect the objects, and return to the mansion. Your goal is to gather evidence with equipment and hunt down the ghost.

name: Death Ration: Back to 19XX
summary: In Death Ration, You can confront the aliens to save the world, uncover the truth behind the spread of nanomachines and invasion, dedicate your remaining time to work for the community of refugees, transport supplies to camps using trucks, decorate your own house with furniture, the choice is yours.

name: Deadfall
summary: Deadfall is a dark, bloody, atmospheric, dynamic, brutal shooter in the spirit of action movies of the 80s and 90s.

name: Deck of Bullets
summary: Unleash explosive action in a deck-building top-down shooter. Customize your bullets with a strategic deck of cards for devastating effects.

name: De'Vot
summary: De'Vot is a 2D platformer puzzle game set in a dark and treacherous world. Survive deadly encounters as everything outside your home seeks your demise, with humanity long gone.

name: Dead Petals Bliss
summary: A fractal-trance bullet-trip from the creators of Dead Petals and satryn.

name: Destination Unknown
summary: Destination Unknown is a fast-paced single-player spaceship shooter with exploration in space galaxies, RPG elements, mini-games, mining, and crafting. Experience an adventure through a randomly generated universe filled with an exciting sci-fi story full of secrets, quests, and more.

name: Deconstruction Simulator
summary: Deconstruction Simulator is a game that allows you to experience the thrilling world of demolition and recycling! Take on the role of a skilled demolition manager and transform unwanted items into valuable resources.

name: Desert Dungeons
summary: As the newest recruit to the Coral Springs Adventurer's Guild, you'll have to gear up, explore the Holokai desert, and delve into the dungeons located there to become the best Adventurer!

name: Dere. Some Answers Before I...
summary: Come back, for no one is waiting for you. Search for your memories - no one ever knew you. Destroy everything in your path - all around you are nothing but ruins. End the endless cycle, for it has long since closed in on itself.

name: Deru
summary: This game is a Fantasy turn-based adventure game.

name: Dead Wolf
summary: „Dead Wolf” is a psychological thiller that introduces players into the world of paralyzing fear, vision of the end of the world and desperate will to survive.

name: Detective Dotson
summary: Chase down criminals, spy on bad guys and solve cases! Change into a disguise or recruit a team member - your choices matter! Enjoy multi-genre gameplay and watch thrilling episodes. Games and stories from the endlessly intriguing modern day India!

name: Dennou Tenshi: Digital Ange
summary: An Adventure game released in Japan in 1993.

name: Detective Solitaire: Butler Story 3
summary: Get in the middle of an investigation! Solitaire solitaire puzzles and train your mind!

name: Desert Force: Rescue Mission
summary:
Special mission to the special force to handle a war in the land of middle east. You are a special man in this force who are given difficult task to handle the war in the middle east.

You must use good tactics and your skills to fight the enemy. And you must be careful from the terrorist.

Complete the deadly missions in the land of middle east, to fight the terrorist.
There are 15 stages of different difficulty levels, play and feel the tense atmosphere when you fight the enemy forces.

name: Deathless Survivors
summary: Embark on an online co-op Survival Roguelite adventure. Team up with friends, slash through endless waves of foes, conquer formidable bosses, fulfill quests, craft potent weapons, and unlock unique characters!

name: Death Mile
summary: DeathMile is a Co-Op Multi-Player driving/shooting game where you blast your way through Mars!

name: Defy the Omphalos
summary: A trio of glitched out Doom II maps from The Shareware Vats crew.

name: Deep Breath
summary:
Deep Breath - a short mapset at the bottom of the ocean.

In this project, our little green hero steps through the entryway airlock of an underwater base, the H.A.D.E.S (Hydro Atomic Deepsea Experimental Science) Facility, to find that demons are running rampant. Our mission: get to the heart of the Facility and activate the self-destruct protocol. Hopefully Doomguy can make it out alive, or at least sink down to a watery grave with all the monsters.

Greatly inspired by AD_79's map 05 from Tetanus by Squonker Team - the ingenious mechanics and visuals used in that map made me think of other potential ways in which to continue that narrative and visual thread.

name: Dear Pretentiousness
summary: A train of thought twine game.

name: Detective Barnett: The Cursed Artifact
summary: Put your sleuthing skills to the ultimate test to solve a mystery like no other in this wild match-3 puzzle adventure!

name: Deathwave Aftermath
summary: Deathwave Aftermath is an open world post-apocalyptic turn-based strategy game inspired by classic games like Final Fantasy and Chrono Trigger but with a higher focus on giving you control over how your character is built.

name: Deadshot
summary: Deadshot is a retro styled first person shooter inspired from classics like Half Life, Doom, Quake and many alike.

name: Demons of Asteborg/Astebros
summary: Discover the legends of Asteborg in two fantastic 16-bit games for Evercade. Fight back the demon invasion in Demons of Asteborg, and discover the origins of Asteborg in the roguelite platform adventure Astebros.

name: Delivering Hope
summary: Get IRyS flying and deliver hope as far as you can in this hololive fangame!

name: Dead or Love
summary:
An epic of suspense and romance.
Who will you choose to live with in a paradise of love and desire?
Will you be able to escape alive?!

name: Demons of Problematique
summary: A short trip through hell, set on by a classic Doom story. Originally intended as just a Boom compatible level, I got a little carried away with it, especially the ending credits\scenes.

name: Demons of Problematique 2
summary: An obvious sequel to Demons of Problematique. No cutscenes (aside from the ending), no new weapons, no new monsters, just Doom. With some fancy effects.

name: Death Animal Parade
summary: Casual Strategy game full with Animals

name: Death of Eternity
summary: You were created to purge all that defile. Slaughter hoards of such filth, gaining powerful items and abilities with every drop of blood. Forge your own path through the heavens fully customizing your experience. Share in this virtuous crusade with up to three friends in Online multiplayer co-op!

name: Deep Under
summary: DEEP UNDER is a grim visual novel about how an ordinary camping trip with friends can turn into a real nightmare.

name: Demise: Survival Uncharted
summary: Survive Or Die. it's in the name. Welcome to a solo developed, online multiplayer survival game. From the shades of Rust and The Forest: build, craft, survive, and raid! Coming soon in early 2024 from Modern Monkey Studios.

name: Dead Underground
summary: Dead Underground is a sci-fi survival game with RPG elements inspired by horror movies and the game Dead Space

name: Deja Vu: The Backrooms
summary: Deja Vu: The Backrooms is a 1-4 player co-op exploration game set in procedurally generated levels. Traverse diverse scenarios, with unique entry points, entities and levels, as you aim to reach the end of each journey.

name: Defendron
summary: Defendron is an epic, acion-packed, cyberpunk/futuristic themed tower defense with unique twist on upgrade path. Place towers, fend of huge enemy waves and emerge victorious!

name: Dead End Mission
summary: The humans fled for their life! Now only aliens remain in the city. Your name is Mark, a professional marksman. You have one mission, to kill the alien Queen! Your helicopter buddy will provide you with supplies during the mission. But this will not be easy...

name: Deep Secret
summary: This is a casual puzzle match-3 game. Players need to use the mouse to select two unobstructed squares, and if they are the same, they will be eliminated. After success, you can advance the plot and story development of the two protagonists!

name: Demonic Deviation
summary: This wad contains 11 maps replacing Maps01-11, these are pretty much tech based themed though they can be separated by the traditional map07 intermission screen, the first six are more earth base style and revolve around a power facility, the final five are more military base style. There will be a lot of familiairty from some past works of mine (Maps 07 and 10) or indeed other peoples works from the past (Map04 and perhaps 11). This wad is limit removing (complevel 2)

name: Deckweaver: Descent Into Chaos
summary: Deckweaver: Descent into Chaos is a first person deckbuilding game where the player crafts their abilities using different cards they find in the environment. Obliterate forces of chaos, fighting through corrupt locations in the world before getting the chance to face and defeat Chaos itself.

name: Detective Gatuma: Get a Clue!
summary: Detective Gatuma: Get a Clue! is an upcoming non-linear investigative visual novel where the player, with each mission, must interview witnesses, gather evidence, and find contradictions in the suspects' testimonies to find out who the real culprit is.

name: Deep Abyss 3D
summary: Famous 3d platform game in which you must avoid falling into the lava or running out of time that was preinstalled on some sony ericsson cell phones

name: Death's Dichotomy
summary: Death's Dichotomy is 5 maps by 4 mappers for GZDoom. This is an offshoot of the now cancelled Near Death Experiences project. The aim of the project is to explore ideas and thoughts on death and dying.

name: Demonastery
summary: A medium sized, architecturally detailed single-player map which twists back in on itself several times, set in a crumbling monastery made of marble and corpses.

name: Death Tormention: The Complete Trilogy
summary: 20 years after the release of the original Death Tormention. I present "The Death Tormention Trilogy". This compilation megawad contains all previously released 3 Death Tormention episodes in one megawad replacing Episode 2, Episode 3 and Episode 4 of the Ultimate Doom with improvements to gameplay and various bug fixes over the original. Also replacing Episode 1 is Simply Phobos.

name: Decanumber
summary: “Decanumber” is engaging mathematics puzzle game!

name: Declared New Apocalypse
summary:
The player will travel through prisons, rifts, mazes, fortresses, forests, graveyards, sewers, factories, labs, the Hell, haunted libraries, all to chase down (or be chased down) by new stronger demons and bosses, but with the help of new powerful weapons at his disposal.

The wad presents 3 new Episodes, with 14 new levels, 12 + 2 secret, a Hub (reachable by beating the final level or just by entering the "Reliquary" episode), from where you can play all of the levels pistol starting (actually "fist starting"), go to a "testing area", change the skill level and reach the secret 15th level, a wave based arena.

name: Death Again
summary: Death Again is a single player horror fps. Journey through a nightmarish realm that lies between dimensions in search for salvation.

name: Dead Underworld
summary: Embark on a dangerous odyssey through the Dead Underworld. Unleash potent weapons and unearth artifacts to conquer this unforgiving dungeon diving roguelike. Ally with others, forging bonds or exploiting friendships, or gain power among factions to survive in this desolated realm.

name: DeadBlitz
summary: A fast paced first-person action shooter set in a futuristic city overrun by zombies and robots. Feel the flow as you freely grapple and blast your way through a procedurally generated sci-fi city. Get satisfying kill streaks and challenge yourself by besting your best.

name: Demon Mage
summary: Demon Mage is an action-platformer shooter. Levitate between platforms to strike down enemy Mages with a variety of upgradeable spells. Explore the lairs of each guild with secrets to find in every level.

name: Dead Wells: The Devil Fragment
summary: Hack, Slash, Parry and Dodge your foes in this Souls-like Action RPG. Explore the countryside in search of The Devil Fragment while fighting enemies with a multi game inspired combat system where you can launch foes into the air and then juggle them to build your combo meter for multiple buffs.

name: Des Racines et des Graines
summary: A garden game where you will explore a calm and peaceful island. You will gather some seeds from the vegetation and re-plant them close to each other to get hybrids. Day after day, you will cross-breed the plants to create some new ones, to finally find and restore the ultimate tree: Yggdrasil.

name: DefenseCraft
summary: DefenseCraft brings revolutionary new mechanics to the tower defense genre, combining the traditional tower defense style with exploration, crafting and more! Sent to a far-off land called Sector 4, in search of a lost group of explorers, we find that the land is not as docile as it seems.

name: Dead Spreading
summary:
Dead Spreading is an idle game based on the dead,come with us to resist deads!
Search the camp to save survivors,recruit soldiers to resist mad attack of the dead!
Reasonably arrange soldiers to defense and collect supplies,fight and produce at same time to maximize your profit!

name: Devilish Girl
summary: Devilish Girl is a Casual Erotic Puzzle game, you reveal 15 devilish girls in increasingly dificulty puzzles.

name: Dere Vengeance
summary:
Unleash your fears in a fourth-wall-breaking platformer that will leave you questioning allegiances... and reality itself.

Let the hauntingly atmospheric soundtrack and meticulously designed pixel art engulf you in paranormal encounters, impossible glitches, psychological horror, and the nostalgia of classic side-scrolling games.

Enjoy the guidance of A.I.D.E. and a very kind and morally right "Dev," who'll be there to assist players every step of the way. The companions also help give an eerie charm to the surreal experience of playing this unique game. Players also encounter eccentric characters, scary creatures, and unsettling corruptions along their journey.

Experience terror as you navigate nightmarish yet fair platforming challenges with precision and dread. The old-school hard gameplay is reminiscent of classic games that are hard to put down, preparing the brain for the kind of scares that make most analog horror media effective.

Dive into thrilling meta-horror that defies the boundaries of the creepypasta digital horror genre, blending fear and suspense into a truly surreal experience. In DERE Vengeance, the player is part of the story.

Embrace the perfect blend of nightmare and adventure in this story-rich platformer that promises genuine scares and enjoyable gameplay. You can embark on DERE Vengeance without playing our other games, though not advisable, as this terrifying adventure stands on its own with a unique and intriguing experience.

name: Dewborne Dawn
summary: In this new hand-drawn, story-rich metroidvania, explore the last haven of a dying world, and discover the purpose you play in saving it. Shape your own path, fight the all-consuming blight, and help bring hope back to the survivors. Take up the flames of dead gods, and stand firm in Dewborne Dawn!

name: Dendam
summary: Dendam is a game of hide and seek, you can fight and will be given weapons but can only load 1 bullet, besides that there will be ghosts that bother you, some puzzles to complete the task.

name: Delta Force
summary: Delta Force is a free-to-play multiplayer tactical first-person shooter reboot of the Delta Force series.

name: Der Pfad des Pinguins
summary:
You wake up in a snow-covered landscape and can't remember anything. You have to find out how you got to this place and survive. On your journey you meet penguins who confront you with a mysterious disease. Can you help the penguins?

This is a RPG Adventure Game!

name: Deviled
summary: This map was created for vinesauce mapping contest, which happened in 2018. It got renamed from "dual layered violence" to "deviled". This version is more improved and more detailed than my contest version.

name: Demonic Libido
summary: This is the first map I've ever released, it's a straight-forward blowthrough, not too difficult and it offers around 15 to 20 minutes of gameplay...maybe less for skilled players.

name: Destiny 2: Lightfall - Season of the Witch
summary: To pursue the Witness, Eris Morn must turn to the magic of the Hive and accept a deal that Savathûn crafted before her death. To honor our end of the bargain, Guardians must become masters of the arcane and harness the power required to defeat a god.

name: Destiny Star Girlfriend
summary: The Steam version of Destiny Star Girlfriend with its sexual content removed.

name: Dereliction Derby
summary:
Dereliction Derby is a single map release that was a result of being inspired by a number of more modern projects such as Eviternity, Bloodstain, Valiant, and so forth.
The desire was to create a stand-alone release that made some use of these modern stylings, especially by making use of Boom features, to create something that has a constant feel of pressure and higher action, while also being detailed enough to make it seem like a real place rather than the most abstract stylings of a lot of Doom fare.

name: Death By Hamster
summary: Hamster. In a car. Shooting people.

name: Democracy 4: Country Pack
summary: Democracy 4 - Country pack adds six new countries to the game for you to govern: Greece, Ireland, Switzerland, Poland, Turkey and Brazil.

name: Deep Maze
summary: Experience the game from a top-down perspective that allows you to delve into the heart of the mountain range, measuring your progress against the speed. Now, let's see how far you can go. Let's find out!

name: Desktop Basketball 2
summary: Invigorating basketball everyone can enjoy together! Prepare for the next evolution in dunking!

name: Death Crown: Immortal Edition
summary: Embrace the definitive experience of the minimalist real-time strategy game that has captivated players with its 1bit style and engaging gameplay. Immortal Edition is an all-in-one package that delivers the complete journey of Death's battle against humanity's Kingdom and more.

name: Deep Nest
summary: Deep Nest is a fast-paced single player action shooter roguelite where you play a space marine fighting off an endless horde of alien monsters in an infested facility.

name: Dead Alone
summary: Dead Alone is an intense first-person survival shooter set in a dangerous apocalyptic cityscape. In this desolate landscape, your precision in shooting and meticulous resource management will be the key to survival.

name: Designer City 2
summary:
Design and build a town, nurture and grow it into a gigantic sprawling metropolis. This free town building game can be played online and offline.
In this free town building game, you will need to attract residents by building houses, condos, apartments and skyscrapers for them to live in. Once they've settled in, they will need employment opportunities so you will also construct businesses and industry where they can work. Add bars, restaurants, nightlife, stadiums and other entertainment to keep your people happy. Construct hundreds of unique skyscrapers and world famous landmarks to decorate your city skyline.

name: Deltazone: Map Pack #1
summary: This DLC gives you Access to 4 Maps.

name: Detonator
summary: A puzzle game that involves a weird M&M looking guy and a platform full of bombs. Detonates in your mouth, not in your hands.

name: Deep Down & Dark
summary: The exposition of character and basic gameplay for a game currently in development.

name: Deserted "Firefly Islands": Chronicles
summary: A survival game with crafting and building elements.

name: Devoid Prototype
summary: Welcome to the Anadeia Galaxy, start your journey in the Iarus Belt as you discover what it means to be starship pilot in a universe filled with danger and opportunity. Fight, Mine, Scavenge, Trade, Craft or Mission your way through the void alone or in split-screen with a wingman.

name: Dead by Daylight: Alien Chapter Pack
summary: Dead by Daylight's Alien Chapter brings two iconic characters into The Fog: new Killer the Xenomorph and new Survivor Ellen Ripley. A new Map, Nostromo Wreckage, is available for all players. This Chapter Pack unlocks the Motion Tracker Charm, as well as the Very Rare Back in Action outfit for Ellen Ripley.

name: Depthris
summary: Depthris is a 3D puzzle game inspired by the classic BlockOut game for DOS. Move and rotate the pieces almost anywhere (except backwards) and aim for the highest score.

name: Death Life: Beyond Purgatory
summary: Humanity has lost its war against the virus, a world where balance and order have been disrupted. A unit unaffected by the virus, dedicated to aiding humanity, has emerged. A courier whose path leads to New State. Will you be able to complete the delivery in the face of the challenges ahead?

name: Descend
summary: Descend is a VR multiplayer shooter set in a vast Cyberpunk universe. Use special abilities with unique skins, manual reloading features, an extensive loadout system and a collection of unique weapons to secure the objective!

name: Destroy Korcity
summary: Tower shooting game with cool music and endless enemies

name: Devil Peach Soda
summary: Carve your way through a twisted and demonic manor in this fast paced roguelike. Devil Peach Soda combines quick arcade gameplay and RPG mechanics, featuring a variety of ways to build and customize your character each run.

name: Desktop Agents: Covid-999
summary: Consider wearing a mask to play. A virtual alien virus COV1D-999 uses dramatic scenes from movies and series in order to conquer your PC. Interact with your desktop while playing, watch Youtube videos, chat with your friends and more! Wash your hands after playing.

name: Descriptionary
summary:
Descriptionary is like a classic drawing board game, but the roles are reversed; instead of drawing something based on a prompt while others guess what you’re drawing, you’re given a vague description of something and then you have to guess what you were supposed to be drawing!

Join our bunny-themed cast featuring a wide variety of characters who all need your help! Try to navigate their individual mannerisms in order to depict what they’re trying to describe, all under a time limit.

name: Deleted
summary: Take control of a powerful drone and prepare to face off against hordes of enemies standing in your way. Collect currency and upgrade your drone with new weapons and skills. Are you ready for the ultimate challenge?

name: DeltaBlade 2700 Re:Create
summary: Fight your friends as a cyberpunk robot ninja mercenary in DeltaBlade 2700 Re:Create, the remake of the original DeltaBlade 2700. It’s the same high energy, competitive local multiplayer brawler with fast paced sword combat and jetpacks you love, but with tons more features!

name: Delineation
summary: The 3D dot-connecting puzzle game.

name: Dead Ground Arcade: Ellis Island
summary: Now you can visit Ellis Island. You have to survive on the small bridges there. If you succeed in surviving until the final stage, you may face much more stronger walker. Guess who?

name: Dear Brother
summary: Point and click adventure game series! The game consists of 12 gradually releasing chapters. Mystery and mystical story about young doctor and his family is waiting for you. Solve puzzles and uncover the mystery of the Blake family.

name: Dead Space 2
summary: Cancelled Nintendo Wii port of Dead Space 2.

name: Destiny of Immortal
summary: Fate of Creation "is a meat pigeon, cultivation of immortals, and storyline game. You accidentally obtained one of the most precious treasures of creation and embarked on the path of cultivating immortals.

name: Departed Away
summary: Discover 'Departed Away,' a captivating visual novel where friendship intertwines with mystery. Uncover secrets, engage in verbal duels, and make choices that shape your story. Delve into emotional depth and intricate connections in this unique story.

name: Deadpoint
summary: "Deadpoint" is an engaging third-person survival game set in an apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. Players take on the role of a resourceful scavenger, tasked with navigating the dangerous landscape and ensuring their survival amid the hordes of undead.

name: Desktop Pet
summary: Desktop Pet is a life simulation game where you can take care of cute creatures while working or playing on your computer. Write documents, play games, watch videos, all together with your little companion.

name: Delicards: A Delicious Card Game
summary: Imagine being a chef at a restaurant, but instead of enduring the heat of the kitchen, you're using trading cards portraying recipes, ingredients, seeds and special cards. Compete, Earn, Grow and Collect cards from all over the world and become #1 Kard Chef.

name: Descentia
summary: We fused card games and open-world rpg together to make the best single player open world deckbuilder we could. Build your party with different races, craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, complete the quests and get ready for a breathtaking adventure

name: Demigod Idle: Rise of a legend
summary: Play the overwhelming 'Demigod Idle: Rise of a legend' and unleash your divine and dark powers! You are the mighty Demigod, who possesses both the power of angels and demons. You, who had all your powers taken away by the Archangel Michael and the Archdemon Lucifer while trying to conquer the heavens... Now, regain your angelic and demonic powers and embark on your revenge..!

name: Desert Rush
summary: Each mode offers hours of gameplay and free entertainment for you and your friends.

name: Devastated Path
summary: The life of an ordinary freelance programmer Romero, whose existence is swallowed up by darkness. Not the fairy tail, but a dark part of humanity.

name: Dear, Virginia
summary: embark on an emotionally charged journey through a vast open-world landscape as you assume the role of an inspiring protagonist set during the American Civil War, the game transports players to a gritty and historically inspired world filled with rich storytelling and immersive gameplay.

name: Demon's Den
summary: Demon's Den is an Arena-Shooter-Roguelite from a bird's viewpoint, where you aim to explore and conquer a den teeming with demons. Select from various upgrades that influence and alter the gameplay to create unique builds and survive until only you remain as the sole survivor.

name: Degraman: Act II - Victor
summary: An otome visual novel with the main character trapped in a new, cruel reality. A lot of choices, unpredictably and cruelly affecting the outcome.

name: Descended
summary: A deep sea adventure for 1-6 players set far from the surface in an alien sea. Fight, befriend, and study your environment to unlock specialised mutations and tailor ecosystems in which you thrive. Spread Light beneath the Twilight Zone!

name: Degradation: Kyomu's Fury
summary: Fight viruses, survive insane waves of rays and bullets, and find out more about the inhabitants of the Network in this mix of exploration and 3D bullet-hell/FPS game.

name: Demegraunt
summary: The two heroes are trying to escape from an abandoned planet after a shipwreck, breaking through the wild environment and automated security systems.

name: Deluxe Trivial Pursuit
summary: Deluxe Trivial Pursuit is an improved new version of Trivial Pursuit, featuring among others 3,000 new questions, VGA 256-color graphics, music and sound effects, and a fully animated quizmaster.

name: Demon Slayer Shion
summary: When her fellow Demon Slayer, Ayano, disappears in the depths of an enormous dungeon, Shion and her friends take it upon themselves to find her.

name: Death Lease
summary: You will die.

name: December 25, 2016
summary: A game about a nightmare I woke up from christmas day.

name: Decollate Decoration
summary: This is a point-and-click, command-selection style adventure game where the protagonist is a girl who has become a ghost. The objective is to fulfill her desires by speaking to her beloved "him" causing poltergeists, visiting in dreams, or even cursing.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Sweep the Board!
summary: Embark on an adventure through iconic settings from the anime Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba in this action-packed board game. Compete with friends as you brave the elements on your quest to become the strongest demon slayer!

name: Dead Past 8
summary: Dead Past 8 - Survive zombies and unravel island mysteries in this 2023 open-world horror. By day, explore, craft and harvest. After the sun dips below the horizon face stronger, cunning undead. Team up, adapt, and confront the nightmarish challenge. Can you survive "Dead Past 8"?

name: Demon of the Dark
summary: A 3D Survival Horror Game, in which the player has to investigate an abandoned hospital, while looking out for whatever danger that resides in the unknown darkness. Play Demon Of The Dark for a bone-chilling experience, like none other!

name: Decaying Orbit
summary: Net Yaroze game made by Scott Cartier & David Dewitt.

name: Demon Castle
summary:
Demon Castle is a Castlevania-style game for PICO-8

An evil sorcerer is trying to summon an ancient demon into the world. You are the only one who can travel to the sorcerer’s castle and prevent him from completing the summoning. Best of luck.

name: Deidthraw
summary: Deidthraw is a first person endless shooter with rogue-lite elements set in a fantasy style 1940's era Scotland. Fight, Upgrade, Build defences and Survive against the hordes in Deidthraw. How long will you make it?

name: Defense Cards
summary: Defense Card is a very creative barrage shooting game. It combines the gameplay of barrage shooting and card use. It also has a random in-game growth mechanism, making it an addictive and fast-paced bullet hell game. curtain shooter

name: Devil's Mansion
summary: "Devil's Mansion" is a game designed and produced by the Taiwan R&D team, which will take you into a fantasy haunted house full of relaxation and fun. Here, you will no longer be just an ordinary devil, but the "devil who doesn't want to be a devil but opens a haunted house to make a living" who decided to open a haunted house to attract tourists!

name: Detective Zhuge
summary: "Detective Zhuge" is a detective puzzle game. Players through the "two-in-one" play, in the game's story level to promote the story, explore the level to find clues to the case, and finally in the trial level, through all the clues obtained, the suspect is finally brought to justice.

name: Deep Space Directive
summary: Build. Expand. Upgrade. Defend. Combine TD and RTS mechanics to defend your growing economy.

name: Defendor
summary: Defendor is a throwback to the fast paced arcade games of the 80s.A retro style, arcade shooter where you upgrade your base to increase the capabilities of your ship, unlock new weapons, ships and cause more mayhem.Defend your base until everyone makes it into the escape ship.

name: Deceived by the Host
summary: A slice of life RPG. Hiroshi Kawada’s third year as a college student is as hectic as it can be. He’s trying to secure a job for the sake of his beloved girlfriend, Nanami Miyasaka. Experience romance and drama in a modern Japanese setting.

name: Deathwatchers
summary: Deathwatchers is a 4 player online co-op 'spot the difference' style, psychological horror. Use the equipment at your disposal to locate & log as many events as possible. Build your ritual and try to cleanse the locations of any demonic threats. An incorrect ritual and you may never leave.

name: Debtors' Club
summary: Be the tax collector of a shady city hall in this narrative-driven resource management game. Talk to debtors, manage a team, make difficult choices, and challenge the city's moral decay. It's their money, but it's your job.

name: Devil Engine: Complete Edition
summary:
Lightning Strikes Again! Take control of the AI ship Andraste and blast through hordes to destroy the Devil Engine!

Devil Engine is a high-octane, classic-styled side-scrolling shoot-em-up heavily influenced by the best in the genre from the 32-bit era, featuring a variety of incredible locations, hand-drawn pixel art, and a blood-pumping soundtrack that brings the dark future to life.

name: Der Bauernhof
summary: Der Bauernhof is a Simulation game, developed by Entwicklerteam Slaby and published by Astragon Software, which was released in Europe in 2009.

name: De Ontdekker en het mysterie van de Diamanten Scarabee
summary: De Ontdekker en het mysterie van de Diamanten Scarabee you play the role of Ben the Archaeologist who is searching for the Temple of the Diamond Scarab. Once he is in the temple he meets Tiri, an enchanting Egyptian princess. Going through a maze of underground passages they look for ancient Egyptian treasures and confront various challenges. The Guardian leads them step by step to the exit. The game is played on a Balance Board, a standard Wii accessory. With this you can move through the maze, find treasures and enter challenging situations. Since this is the first game in the world developed jointly for visually impaired, blind and fully sighted children, the game can be played in Dutch and in English.

name: Der Gesundheitscoach
summary: Der Gesundheitscoach is a health and fitness game released in Europe for the Nintendo Wii.

name: Decopins2
summary: "Decopins 2" is a sequel to "Decopins" a Decopin-type tower defense shooting game. Use traditional Japanese finger flick -Decopin- to repel the approaching donuts. Collect EXP and money to level up your Decopins. Depending on your level, you will also be able to use magic. This time, it's tougher...

name: Defense of Nations
summary: A base defense shooter in the vein of flash game classics like "Elona Shooter" and "Defend Your Castle" but with a satirical, political-sim twist. Shoot hordes of monsters, negotiate your operating budget, and navigate international rivalries, all for The Good of Humanity️!

name: Desert Crypt
summary: While traveling through a desert region, you are ambushed and knocked unconscious by a group of golems. You wake up to find yourself inside a sarcophagus. You push the lid of off the coffin and climb out. You hear the sounds of stone debris being piled up outside the entrance to the tomb. They are sealing you in. At your feet you notice your crossbow. Whoever has put you in here has tossed your weapon on the tomb floor to be sealed in with you. You force the door open and begin fighting your way out of the crypt...

name: Despair
summary: Five new levels for Heretic built in the Hpack mindset: a bit of custom content, custom monsters, and new powerups!

name: Descent Into the Abyss
summary: HeXen: Descent into the Abyss is the recent entry in my Heretic/HeXen mappack series. Descent Into the Abyss serves as a prequel to explain some events in Tower of Chaos: Special Edition that would otherwise remain unanswered until the next sequel to the story that picks up where my third mappack, A New World ended. This may sound like you need to play my previous works before tackling this, but don't worry because the story told here is still self contained enough that you will understand it.

name: Dead Horizon
summary: An adventure game that mixes rail shooter elements into a world of sand, dust, and blood. You play Bonnie Star, former murderous gunslinger now turned carnival sideshow act, as she tries to find redemption at the end of a gun.

name: Death Fighter V.2
summary: Sharp game, similar to Street Fighter

name: Dead Humanity
summary: "Dead Humanity" first person It is a horror game. You too can join this adventure. A tense story, rich graphics and themes that question the depths of human nature make the "Dead Humanity" game unforgettable. How far will you go to survive in this post-apocalyptic world?

name: Delivery Life Simulator
summary: Delivery is difficult. Any type of delivery is more difficult. Become the best in package delivery by climbing all the steps! Buy the most luxurious cars and houses. So, in this simulation and open-world game, join us on a delivery journey that begins with an old bike!

name: Dementium: The Ward
summary:
Dementium: The Ward, an atmospheric retro horror FPS returns. Be adraid.

The award winning survival horror experience returns from the dead. Built from the ground up for Nintendo Switch, Dementium: The Ward combines smooth first-person shooter gameplay with a demented tale of mystery and terror.

name: Demonic Episode
summary: In this 4 player first person online co-op horror game, play as a group of content creators who are on a mission to banish a demon back to hell. The advanced, randomized game mechanics offer you and your friends a high replay value.

name: Der Gesundheits Coach: Wohlfuhlen jeden Tag
Deadly Secret Beneath the Dark Wood
summary: A forest-themed single level.

name: Der Dativ ist dem Genitiv sein Tod
summary: The bestselling phrasebook for Bastian Sick's cult column, now on the go! Is someone who is wrong on the wooden steamer, on the wrong way or on the wrong steamer? Is Brad Pitt considered the handsomest, best-looking, or best-looking movie star of our time? With the exciting Nintendo DS game "The dative is the genitive's death" based on the cult column by Bastian Sick, you can now explore the labyrinth of the German language while you're on the go! In the new game concept, specially developed for Nintendo DSTM, numerous new questions are available. In addition to the questions on German spelling, grammar, vocabulary and literature, four varied game variants provide a multitude of opportunities to put logical thinking, memory and skill to the test. Compete against other players in multiplayer or tournament mode and put your knowledge of the German language to the test! Features: The ultimate brain trainer: Gradually improves attention, reaction and memory skills Four fun game variants: Quiz, Logic, Memory and Skill Over 450 questions promote goal-oriented learning at school and in your free time Slip into the role of the little bookworm Willi and fight your way through the book labyrinth in 10 levels Improves multitasking ability Suitable for beginners as well as for professionals: Choose different levels of difficulty to answer tricky questions Over 4 million copies of the book series have been sold

name: Deco Tendances
summary: A home decorating game for the Nintendo DS.

name: Dekiru Otoko no Mote Life: Hiru no Mote Kouza-hen
summary: A DS dating sim by Takara Tomy.

name: Dekiru Otoko no Mote Life: Yoru no Mote Jissen-hen
summary: A DS dating sim by Takara Tomy.

name: Denksport Varia
summary: A puzzle game for the Nintendo DS.

name: Denjirou Sensei no Fushigi na Jikkenshitsu
summary: An edutainment game in the style of Brain Age.

name: Deviens Miss France
summary: Deviens Miss France is a Simulation game, developed by Gimagin Games and published by Micro Application, which was released in Europe in 2007.

name: Deutsch 1.-4: Klasse - Fit fuers Gymnasium
summary: An edutainment game designed to teach the player Dutch.

name: Dead Signal
summary: Monitor camera feeds, report valuable info, and hand-deliver shady packages. An hourly quota of reports will test your keen eye to spot the differences, while timed deliveries will force you outside unexpectedly. Until you clock out for the night almost nowhere is safe.

name: Deep Space Tavern
summary: Deep Space Tavern is a playful fusion of management and clicker gameplay. Design your tavern, attract patrons from across the system, and master the art of keeping them happy and safe. Experience the joy of management without all the hassle!

name: Delicious: Cooking and Romance
summary: Join Emily & her family in a new Delicious Restaurant and Time Management game.

name: Dead Zone: Rebirth of Survivors
summary: Dead Zone: Rebirth of Survivors is an FPS zombie-themed bullet hell game set in the Dead Zone universe. Use massive destruction guns to shred hordes of zombies! Improve your character with in-game improvements and skill tree training, and survive against bosses with various abilities.

name: Demon Island Massacre
summary:
DEMON ISLAND MASSACRE is a hyper-8-bit-action platformer in a similar vein to arcade and 8-bit classics such as Ghosts n Goblins and Castlevania. Josh Baron and the crew at Polyanna Video invite you down a rabbit hole of sprawling colorful landscapes and twisted nightmare realms that bend the boundaries between 8-bit and 64-bit sensibilities. The priestess Flower Momogami must run, jump, and utilize an array of holy weaponry to overcome the demons that lurk every corner during the invasion of Tenryu, in the first chapter of this tale of Japanese-style horror.

Only challenge the road ahead if you dare!

name: Detail Detective
summary: Can you spot all differences and conquer the world of details?

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Rogue Core
summary: DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: ROGUE CORE is a 1-4 player co-op FPS roguelite featuring 100% destructible environments and procedurally-generated caves. Join a team of dwarven Reclaimers tasked with reestablishing control over lost deep mining operations on Hoxxes IV.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Ultimate Edition
summary:
Ultimate Edition Content:
Includes base game, all Digital Deluxe content, and all Character Pass content.

name: Devil Seeds
summary: Explore a ghost island dominated by mystical creatures. This game offers an experience that mixes horror and RPG, allowing you to explore every dark corner, solving puzzles, finding files and meeting strange characters.

name: Derpixon x FNF
summary: Derpixon x FNF is a pornographic mod for Friday Night Funkin'.

name: DeadHex
summary: DeadHex is an action packed fusion of MOBA and FPS, battling head-to-head to destroy your rival's headquarters. Command minions, crush towers, and wield artifacts in intense duels.

name: Dead Cells: Return to Castlevania Edition
summary: Dead Cells: Return to Castlevania Edition is a compilation. It contains: - Dead Cells (base game including the 34 free updates) - Dead Cells: The Bad Seed DLC - Dead Cells: Fatal Falls DLC - Dead Cells: The Queen and the Sea - Dead Cells: Return to Castlevania - Dead Cells: Rise of the Giant

name: Destiny Maiden
summary:
Destiny Maiden is a mobile card battle game with authentic TCG/CCG sensibility.
An online turn strategy card battle game, The coin system of unit cards that will be a variable in battle, Psychological warfare of invisible magic cards, With 6 hand cards and shuffling opportunities provided every turn Unleash a variety of powerful card combinations that can change the battlefield.

name: Desert Storm
summary: A large level set in a canyon somewhere in the US. Duke has to infiltrate a command center, which is now under alien control, and kill the two overlords responsible for the takeover - the Bruiser Brothers.

name: Demolition Plant
summary: Duke has been sent to stop aliens from ruining the Hydro Fusion Sub Station apart somewhere in Nevada. After this Duke finds himself in Demolition Plant, before known as Modern World Building Site. It seems to like those aliens can´t stop going on with their plans so Duke has to kick some tough alien arse, and find out what kind of evil plans are waiting for him...

name: Deadfall
summary:
Duke mistakenly shoots down his ride home, and has to make
another arrangement for passage. The local doghearts want him to stay, for dinner! After figuring out the menu, Duke decides to have a barbecue of his own!

name: Deltarune: Rouxls Kaard
summary: Witness the Duke of Puzzles, the Crafty Box-Maker, the... Lesser Dad? Fight in a battle of wit and unfair advantages readily given to your opponent, thee Rouxls Kaard. Puzzling jukes, jabs, and jars are sure to trip you up so keep your head (and your HP) high whilst combat commenceth.

name: Design & Conjure
summary: Join Dalia, a young witch, in her cozy adventure to fix her hometown. Reconnect with nature and bring beauty back as you clean, decorate, solve light puzzles, and help magical creatures affected by the mysterious corruption.

name: Deathmatch Dimension
summary: A single player episode containing 10 maps inspired by the official Quake deathmatch maps. Features four previously released and now updated maps, as well as five completely new maps and a start map. Most levels are medium-sized and take 10-20 minutes to complete. All maps can be played in sp, coop or dm and support all skill levels.

name: Deer Hunt
summary: Set out on a hunt to capture the best deer! Strategically move your units while being careful not to spook it. Play hundreds of hand crafted levels designed to challenge and engage you intellectually set in a beautiful relaxing medieval world.

name: Defenders Guild
summary: A thrilling fantasy tower defense game! Instead of towers, you'll recruit and lead brave adventurers in the fight against hordes of evil enemies. Do you have what it takes to lead the best guild of defenders and safeguard the land from the growing darkness?

name: Der Wanderer über dem Säuremeer
summary: Small and tight vertical runic level.

name: Dead But Dreaming
summary: Large Knave-textured level.

name: Dead Memories
summary: Medium-sized idbase map with many crates and a critical slipgate malfunction.

name: Devastation
summary: Small mixed-style level; the single player version of q1shw1. The GPL map source is included.

name: Deep Research
summary: Small base map using Speedbase textures. Comes with a new skybox and a custom music track.

name: Dead Meat
summary: Lucia's just killed her husband... probably. Can you get a confession before her lawyers arrive? Use your own words to manipulate, persuade, threaten, or even seduce her into 'fessing up. This billionaire has a terrible secret. And time is running out.

name: Death Rabbit
summary: The city that never sleeps has taken a sinister turn, and the dark tunnels of the MTA have become the epicenter of a horrifying outbreak. As Alisa, you must navigate through a labyrinthine underground world fraught with danger, where unspeakable horrors lurk around every corner.

name: Department 14
summary: You're a regular employee of department 14. One day, after falling asleep at your desk, you wake up and notice that all the other workers have left early and you are alone in the department.

name: Deepest Oblivion
summary: Dark oldschool dungeon level, originally made in 2019.

name: Death's Taste
summary: Small Wizard castle.

name: Deep Loot
summary:
Deep Loot is an oceanic explore-’em up. There's loot, deadly sea creatures and secrets to be found. On-the-fly procedural content means you can explore the ocean in every direction without limits and without waiting.

There are hundreds of unique loot items to find as well as equipment and upgrades to spend your profits on. Soon you'll be zapping the denizens of the deep with white-hot plasma as you plunder ancient ruins for legendary treasures, well on your way to becoming the world's greatest Deep Looter!

name: Dead Man's Quest
summary: Hey, you! Welcome to the island of Pequena! ️ Dead Man's Quest is a narrative hand-tracking and puzzle short story and technical demonstration, lovingly wrapped in a light-hearted and quirky pirate theme!

name: Descent into Hades
summary: Descent into Hades is a military base level

name: Decay
summary: Decay is a dark, atmospheric, rather deadly level set in a ruined city.

name: Desert Complex
summary: A sequel to Forever and One More Day and Day After Forever. Desert Complex is a medium-size hi-tech/desert map.

name: DeResolution
summary: BANG...You awake to find yourself in a foreign place called TH3 GR1D. Explore, fight, and throw your digital vorpal frisbee to escape this digital landscape.

name: DemonCountdown
summary: Demon Countdown is a Bullet Hell roguelike where hordes of Demons lurk in waves from hell, Kill all’em while sun is brightness… Every map is unique, and you can Play coop with your friends. Buy Skill boost Temporal! Will you be able to survive Before nightfall?

name: Dead Island 2: Haus
summary: Lose yourself in a surreal, psycho-horror dreamscape as you explore a mysterious villa in Malibu. Descend through madness, debauchery, and gore, where survival means confronting a new wave of unexpected horrors.

name: Debt Deadline
summary: We drag you onto David’s headspace: A disturbed Debt Collector hustling on the surreal Naked City. In this survival narrative psycho-thriller RPG, you use secrets to manipulate, craft alliances, and create murder schemes. Manage your sanity or your mind will turn against you.

name: DemonStar: Original Missions
summary: The Shareware legend Demonstar comes soaring back with new game modes, revised gameplay, and new Eastereggs to encounter. Originally published in 1997, and later earning Shareware Game of the Year 1999, Demonstar was, and still is one of the highest rated Space shooters ever created.

name: Deceive Inc.: Of Queens and Kings
summary:
New Agent, Octo: meet the boisterous super-hacker, Octo!
New Private Lobbies: Players now have the ability to facilitate their own private matches!
Catalogs from Seasons 1 & 2 will remain permanently completable!
New Map, Operation Sound Eclipse: Stop a powerful EMP super-weapon on a high stakes mission in a futuristic space opera
New Store Items & Premium Catalog Available: New legendary skins, poses, and inks for gadgets and weapons
Quality of Life Improvements: Additional improvements have been made based on community feedback

name: Demon Plague
summary: The only cure for this plague is your trusty shotgun. Your mission is to clean out the demon infestion of a long deserted, slime-encrusted outpost. This level was inspired by the general 'look' of many Quake levels.

name: Death Drive
summary:
Death Drive is a 5-level action packed episode taking a lot of inspiration from classic L.A. Meltdown levels and a more recent release Metropolitan Mayhem yet with a twist of my own style and challenging fights of my own map "Slaughterfest".
Basically it's a huge battle from the very beginning till the very end if played on the intended difficulty setting. What makes it a bit different from the rest is the fact that every single map of this episode was made less then in 20 hours each.

name: Dead Meat
summary: Duke burger setting

name: Delator
summary: Overcome your deepest nightmares and face your unavoidable fate. `Delator´ is a cosmic horror puzzle-platformer where you will play the role of a skittish doctor chosen by the cult of Delator to be the last sacrifice.

name: Definya
summary: Easy Start, Endless Challenge: Begin with a beginner-friendly system that ensures a smooth learning curve. From novice to veteran, Definya's balanced gameplay offers a fulfilling experience.

name: Death's End
summary:
You have died.

Death has some questions for you.

name: Defense Protocol
summary: Do you have the resources and upgrades you need to leave the planet in this roguelike genre where you try to defend your base, survive, gather the necessary resources, and upgrade your technology while trying to repair your spaceship on an uncharted planet you crash-landed on?

name: DesperaDrops
summary: A crime-romance set in Summer 2028, Italy where exchange student Mika Amamine finds herself embroiled in murder case and she is a suspect. While being escorted to be further interrogated, she is freed when her vehicle gets overturned in an incident–on top of all this there is a mysterious assailant who is after Mika’s “powers” and she finds herself trying to escape both the police and the assailant with 6 other people who all have a criminal past.

name: Deep Deep Deep Nightmare
summary: Deep Deep Deep Nightmare is a 2D Top Down Shooter. Survive by facing monsters in the nightmare of a little boy who didn’t heed his mother’s warnings that eating too much before bed can cause nightmares.

name: Dethrone
summary: Dethrone is a minimalistic city builder / management game where you govern a medieval town... unfortunately under the rule of a ruthless king. Will you perish from his wrath or be able to turn the tide?

name: Dear Esther
summary: Dear Esther is an award-winning, critically acclaimed, experimental first-person game. Built in the Source engine, it abandons traditional gameplay, leaving only a rich world soaked in atmosphere, and an abstract, poetic story to explore. Dear Esther was originally launched in 2008 and was later rebuilt by Robert Briscoe in 2012 and 2016.

name: Deep Mine
summary: Explore with up to 4 players in a randomly generated world ! Mine, fight, craft and build in this 2D survival game ! You are free to do whatever you want, as long as you do not awaken the demon of the mountains...

name: Delicious Burger
summary: Satisfy your customers by accurately delivering a variety of burger orders at Delicious Burger. With the income you earn, decorate your shop as you wish or unlock new burger ingredients.

name: Decade
summary: Decade is a map designed by Russell Pearson and released in 2004. It requires a ZDoom-compatible port. It uses the music track "Sinister" by Robert Prince. The level was constructed as a homage to celebrate that 2004 was Doom's tenth year.
