It is a "new school" map (using detailed architecture, ACS and other port features) constructed to be evocative of iconic areas from both Doom and Doom II.

name: Demonized
summary: DemoniZed is a two-level PWAD for Doom II and Boom compatible source ports. It was created by Pedro Francisco Puicón (NokturnuS) and released in November 1998. The PWAD was among the first to experiment with TeamTNT's then-new Boom engine, which had been released only a month before, and thus experimented with many new visual and level design effects that were not previously seen in the community.

name: Deltarune: Chapter 3
summary: A chapter for Deltarune. It released alongside chapter 4.

name: Deltarune: Chapter 4
summary: A chapter for Deltarune. It released alongside chapter 3.

name: Deltarune: Chapter 5
summary: An upcoming chapter for Deltarune.

name: Deep Space Drifter
summary: A text adventure game in which you play a deep space explorer, stranded on an abandoned space station, a victim of your own poor planning.

name: DeltaBeats
summary: DeltaBeats is an independently produced touchscreen rhythm game designed as a spiritual successor to certain commercial rhythm games that are no longer playable.

name: Descent of the Hunted
summary: You are a monster. You’re fresh on the trail of new prey, an isolated wretch vulnerable to your influence. But how will you stalk her? A long pursuit? A slow, parasitic feeding? A devastating ambush? In this psychological horror VN, you determine the manifestation of the beast under your control.

name: Delta Park
summary: Delta Park is a horror and exploration title with a retro style. After being attacked by a strange being and our pet “Pepa” disappears without a trace, the search will lead us to discover the twisted origin of the creature and its creator. We must find Pepa, and return home safe and sound.

name: Death of Marionette
summary: A ruined factory that arrived to prepare for the event. I go through strange things in that place. Will they be able to get out safely?

name: Deadlocked
summary: Deadlocked is an adrenaline-packed Top-Down shooter where you'll confront hordes of relentless robotic foes. Unleash futuristic weapons, master strategic combat, and prove your mettle against the mechanical onslaught. Can you outmanoeuvre and overpower the relentless enemy threat?

name: Detective Fantasia: Excalimurder
summary: A dead orphan has been found slashed next to Excalibur... Explore the orphanage to gather clues and uncover the truth in this colorful Game Boy-inspired mystery game, Detective Fantasia: Excalimurder!

name: Dead Cells: Netflix Edition
summary: Escape a limitless castle with an undead twist in this roguevania action platformer. Find secrets, take down bosses, and if you die? Start from the bottom and reignite the fight.

name: Deadliest Demolition
summary: A 11-map Vanilla Dehacked mapset loosely inspired by the 1995 Cabal series, originally created for NaNoWADMo 2022. This mod contains numerous gameplay changes to your weapons. After a humiliating defeat, your supervisor saw it fit to demote you from a cyberdemon to a mere human, so that you can learn to maximize your combat potential instead of squandering your superior firepower. But there's no force in hell that could ever make you part with your beloved weapon...

name: Delivery INC: Large Cargo
summary: Expand your fleet with trucks and conquer the large cargo market. Pursue new lucrative contracts, hire delivery assistants, and enjoy a new campaign scenario taking place in Stockholm, Sweden. Large Cargo is coming!

name: Death & Tactics
summary: Death & Tactics is an autobattler roguelike where you craft the strategy and your team does the fighting.

name: Delta MMORPG
summary: Online MMO RPG filled with adventure & action. Slash enemies or use magic to conquer. Embark on quests, delve into stories, encounter dragons, orcs, elves & more. Choose your class: Warrior (Guardian/Knight), Archer (Hunter/Ranger), Mage (Wizard/Archmage), or Priest (Druid/Cleric).

name: Deep Treasure
summary: A 3D third-person dungeon crawling game. Arm yourself with useful equipment and items to find the hidden deep treasure.

name: Deadly Contagion
summary: In 2006, three forest rangers and a mysterious ABIN agent are sent to a mansion in a small town. Upon arrival, strange events begin to unfold. Manage your inventory, investigate the mysteries of the mansion, and survive if you can.

name: Dead or Alive 5: Last Round - Core Fighters Character: Honoka
summary: This DLC will unlock a new character: Honoka!

name: Desert Patrol
summary: Combat shooting game.

name: Death by AI
summary: Step into a world where AI holds all the cards. Will it be your ally, or will it pull the plug? Choose wisely, because it's not programmed to care! Death by AI is an online prompt based survival multiplayer game to play with your friends, family, community and coworkers on mobile and web.

name: Desktop Explorer
summary:
Desktop Explorer is an exploration-puzzle game set in a retro-style operating system. Solve puzzles by interacting with built-in software features, immersing yourself into a realistic late 90’s computer experience.

The game follows a fairly innocent narrative as you progress through it’s puzzles. However it becomes clear to you that there is more than meets the eye with this machine, as you slowly see its familiar façade fade away in favor of a darker aesthetic..

name: Detective: Minerva Case
summary: DETECTIVE Minerva Case is a crime deduction and solving game, with an adult and original story. Visit the crime scene, look for all the evidence and understand what happened.

name: Deepcut
summary: Become king and rule over the eyes and ears of your kingdom.

name: Dear Flower
summary: Dear Flower is a point and click adventure game. You can experience the story with hand-drawn animation and cutscenes.

name: Deepophobia
summary: Swim deeper and deeper into this underwater horror game. Explore open worlds. Find your beloved companions. Hunt. Escape getting eaten alive. What are you waiting for? the depths are beckoning you to go deeper!

name: Dead Plate
summary: Short 2D restaurant tycoon themed rpg horror game with visual novel and point-and-click elements set in 1960s France following the story of a lively waiter named Rody trying to make as much money as possible in a week at a fancy bistro owned by a charismatic and successful chef, Vince.

name: Deus Ex: Malkavian Mod
summary: When you base your expectations only on what you see... you blind yourself, to the possibilities of a new mod release: The insanity returns. Old men... are the future.

name: Deus Ex: Greasel of the Year Edition
summary: Ever wondered how Deus Ex would play out if the main character was a regular greasel instead of a nano-augmented agent? Now you won't have to.

name: Defender X
summary: A short, caravan shmup. Reach for higher scores, unlock new pallets, unveil the eye!

name: Debug Girl
summary: Spend a summer with an old high school classmate making games! Play and debug a 2D action RPG to make the best game ever.

name: Deviator
summary: 'Deviator' is a Metroidvania game centered around parry, featuring exquisite 2D hand-drawn visuals. explore unknown wilderness and mysterious cities, delving into enigmatic realms of consciousness and encountering peculiar creatures. uncover the truth behind this chaotic world.

name: Desk of Desires: VR Office Sex
summary: Step into a world where office fantasies and erotic desires come to life with "Desk of Desires: VR Office Sex." This immersive adult VR game takes you on an electrifying journey into the secret world of professional passion.

name: Dee's Nuts 2
summary: Dee is back, in an all new game of grabbing Dee's nuts. Fill your tree to the brim with nuts before the winter season. This time you can race your friends in an all new single player, up to 3 person multiplayer experience and battle to collect the most nuts.

name: Deep Sleep
summary: A horror game about infinite dreams, where you need to constantly find abnormal places in the room to stay awake, otherwise you will fall into terrifying dreams

name: Devilish Blind Date
summary: This game is heavily inspired by『Vampire Survivors』 You are summoned into an Isekai and fighting monsters with a mysterious girl, Nanako.

name: Deathrun
summary: Deathrun is an electrifying online multiplayer sprint where speed, strategy, and survival go hand-in-hand. Team up or go solo in a race through a treacherous obstacle course where every player is for themselves. Dodge traps, outpace the competition, and don’t trust anyone.

name: Deus Ex: Transcended
summary: Built largely for first-time players, Deus Ex: Transcended is a mod focused solely around faithfulness to the original, while bringing an unmatched arsenal of bug fixes, paired with key notes of Quality of Life changes.

name: Dead Letters
summary: Your mission is to enter the mansion of the dead magnate who killed his family and committed suicide. When still alive, he hid many treasures but nobody knows where. Look for his diary to be able to find them.

name: Deaduction
summary: An otherworldly social deduction game that combines horror with prop hunt elements. Players must communicate and collaborate in a possessed hotel. The imposter spirits attempt to trap, sabotage and kill the innocent staff members as they earn money for tools that help uncover them.

name: Desolate Realms
summary: Desolate Realms is a top down horde mode, survival game with tons of content. Multiple maps and weapons to explore and discover while facing multiple types of enemies. New challenges are created for each run to keep goals in mind when attempting to level up.

name: Devil Slot Machine
summary: On a cursed slot machine, you engage in a deadly game of souls with the demons. Devil Slot Machine is a roguelike pigeon tower defense game. Purchase chips as defensive towers and release elemental bullets to destroy your enemies. Enjoy the exhilarating feeling of annihilating demons!

name: Deadly Survival
summary: Deadly Survival is an online survival horror game. Immerse yourself in the apocalyptic world of zombies, where every moment is a struggle for survival. A game for the real brave! The big world is filled with scary zombies.

name: Detective Hayseed: The Cloning Madness
summary: Join the crazy police detective Francis in his search for a kidnapped cloned beauty and go through countless escapades with him in this classic point & click adventure full of comedy.

name: Destiny Saga
summary: Sixteen years ago, the Montereys continent suffered a disaster from the Xorc crisis. The protagonist Rosen, with only a clue - a core chip from sixteen years ago, explores the continent again with his friends, trying to find out the cause of the crisis.

name: Descent from Arkov's Tower
summary: Highly moddable retro roguelike. Descent from Arkov's Tower - or die trying!

name: Detective Dave
summary: A washed-up Detective demoted to graveyard shift has gone rogue and stops going by the book. You play the part of Detective Dave as he explores the dark side of the city. Solve cases, work undercover, or hand out justice the old fashion way.

name: Devil's Heaven
summary: Devil's Heaven is an Action game, developed by Compile and published by General, which was released in Japan in 1983.

name: Desolate City: Last Show
summary: It's the last concert of his tour, and Don Aitor will have to survive the horror. Discover the consequences of the strange virus threatening the pixelated city of Gray Bay in this survival horror/action RPG.

name: Delta
summary: Dynamic and colorful first-person battles with alien creatures, spectacular parkour, exploration of mysterious locations in the atmosphere of space science fiction. Become a ruthless killing machine and free Delta Station from the invasion.

name: Devil's Gambit
summary:
Devil's Gambit follows Hector, a badger healer returning to the little town of Rannai, the birthplace of his fondest memories. He holds dearly his time with the mischievous yet friendly wolves, the stories they told, the fertile forest east of town, and the mist that heralded every sunrise. Most of all, he remembers Cadgan: a wolf a bit younger and smaller than himself — an unrepentant troublemaker who left in him a bundle of emotions.

But that was nine years ago, when he was just a teenager. Upon his return, Hector finds the town transformed by the new duke's reign, and a Cadgan that has grown into a cold, distant mountain of a man. As he works as a healer and reignites a long-forgotten passion, Hector notices something other than love in the air.

The trees' roots stir with his every step.

name: Death Front
summary: Death Front is a first-person shooter with supernatural elements. Team up in parties of four to uncover the mystery behind a series of gruesome murders while being haunted by ghosts. Do you have what it takes to face these sinister forces?

name: Desert Falcon
summary: The Atari 7800 port of Desert Falcon, a 3D (isometric) flying shooter game that was developed and published in 1987 by Atari.

name: Deckbuilder Fantasy
summary: Embark on a thrilling deckbuilding adventure! Craft your strategy as you explore treacherous lands and face challenging foes. Discover a vast array of powerful cards and unique treasures, fighting your way to the final boss on a journey that's different every time.

name: Deadville
summary: In Deadville, players must face their deepest fears, rely on their survival instincts, and make tough decisions to outlast the apocalypse. Only the most resourceful, cunning, and resilient survivors stand a chance against the relentless zombie horde.

name: Deltarune 97
summary: Deltarune 97 is a Hong Kong 97 spoof game developed by Late Night Tom based on the video game Deltarune. The game is a recreation of the video Deltarune 97 by Xploshi.

name: Deepspace
summary:
DEEPSPACE is an innovative Web3 strategy exploration MMO set in an expansive space environment. It integrates a sophisticated economy system using DPS, its native in-game token, along with NFT-based assets, providing players with genuine ownership of their in-game assets. The game is structured into multiple distinct stages, each offering a unique gaming experience, with The Hangar serving as the gateway to the vast DEEPSPACE universe.

Players in DEEPSPACE embark on a journey of purchasing, trading, and upgrading spaceships, fostering a dynamic interstellar experience. The game places a strong emphasis on exploration, inviting players to uncover the mysteries of genesis planets and various other aspects of its rich universe. The gameplay is diverse, ranging from resource mining to engaging in tactical battles against AI opponents and fellow players. Key features include strategic turn-based combat, the formation of alliances, and the expansion of territorial influence.

Operating on both the Ethereum and BNB Chain, DEEPSPACE adopts a gamefi model, blending gaming with decentralized finance. This model enhances the gameplay experience by offering economic incentives. The DEEPSPACE multiverse is a carefully crafted blend of exploration, resource gathering, and combat, ensuring an engaging and multifaceted experience for players.

name: Death Mall 3000
summary: A freeware game distributed in the late 80s via Macintosh's HyperCard system. It is a point-and-click adventure game where, after spending time in cryostasis a lone astronaut crash lands on earth. Seeking shelter in an abandoned mall the player must find a way out and figure out what happened to the Earth.

name: Detective Instinct: Farewell, My Beloved
summary: A woman vanishes without a trace on a cross-country train. The catch? Nobody on board remembers her ever existing in the first place - nobody, except for you. Uncover the story in this detective ADV/visual novel!

name: Dexterous: Time to Steal
summary: A Match-3 Roguelite where you build your deck of blocks, collect game-changing relics, and battle your way through crime bosses in an attempt to pay off your debt and escape the time loop.

name: Demons are coming!
summary: Demons are coming! is a bullet hell rougelite shooter where you fight a high variety of demons that occupied your holy land. Use the upgrades you find to your advantage and create your ideal guns to help you kill the most terrifying monsters.

name: Deficiency
summary: A FIRST PERSON IDLE GAME where you are tasked with producing energy for your company. PRODUCE -> TRANSMIT -> UPGRADE -> PRODUCE MORE!

name: Defender
summary:
Defender is a 1981 horizontally scrolling shooter video game developed by Williams Electronics for arcades. The game is set on either an unnamed planet or city (depending on platform) where the player must defeat waves of invading aliens while protecting astronauts. Development was led by Eugene Jarvis, a pinball programmer at Williams; Defender was Jarvis's first video game project and drew inspiration from Space Invaders and Asteroids. Defender was demonstrated in late 1980 and was released in March 1981. It was distributed in Japan by Taito.

Defender was one of the most important titles of the golden age of arcade video games, selling over 55,000 units to become the company's best-selling game and one of the highest-grossing arcade games ever. Praise among critics focused on the game's audio-visuals and gameplay. It is frequently listed as one of Jarvis's best contributions to the video game industry and one of the most difficult video games. Though not the first game to scroll horizontally, it created the genre of horizontal scrolling shoot 'em ups. It inspired the development of other games and was followed by sequels and many imitations.

Ports were developed for contemporary game systems, most of them by either Atari, Inc. or its software label for non-Atari platforms, Atarisoft. The 1982 Atari 2600 version was one of the best-selling games for the system and sold over 3 million cartridges.

source: Wikipedia

name: Defend the Base: Tower Turret Shooting Range
summary: The turret is ready, shooter! Demonstrate your marksmanship skills, defend your base from invaders and complete the tower defense simulator!

name: Death Run
summary: Death Run: The ultimate first-person parkour game in the sky! Experience a journey over floating platforms. Your mission: Survive and find the portal to the next level. Beat the clock for a high score. Dodge obstacles to win. Are you ready?

name: Destiny 2: Lightfall - Season of the Wish
summary:
A Dream of Dragons

The door to the Pale Heart remains locked. And in the wake of our endeavor with the Hive, an ancient mystery turns our gaze to the Dreaming City, to the last of the Ahamkara, and to the place of the Fifteenth Wish.

The key to the Pale Heart cannot be taken. It must be granted.

name: Dead by Daylight: Chucky Chapter
summary: Meet your new best friend ‘til the end. Dead by Daylight: Chucky brings an iconic horror legend into The Fog with a new Killer: The Good Guy - Chucky. Purchasing this add-on unlocks an exclusive Charm: Good Guys Box.

name: Deer God
summary: 'Deer God' is a breath-taking hardcore platformer. Play as a Deer God who was sent to Hell as punishment. Jump to the top through challenging levels to seek revenge and reclaim your godly powers.

name: Deep In The Snowy Night 2
summary: After drunkenly passing out on a sidewalk, Christopher wakes up in yet another nightmare. Venture through the many different zones to uncover the truth behind these strange nightmares.

name: Detourist
summary: Atmospheric exploration game in which the protagonist's body emits light and warmth. A feature that will both limit and assist them as they venture through uncharted terrain.

name: Degenheim
summary: Dive into a world gone limitlessly mad and slash your way out through hordes of enemies in an action-packed isometric rogue-lite title, where every run offers a unique experience and challenge.

name: Deadly Nightmare Unwanted Heritage
summary: Deadly Nightmare Unwanted Heritage brings you back to the nightmare world, where your mission it so try and break the curse before 6 AM. In the first Deadly Nightmare game, you played the role of John, but this time around you take the role of his grandmother. Surviving is not easy!

name: Detective Masochist 3: The Case of the Naked Truth
summary:
Our setting is the venerable city of Kanazawa...

Our protagonist is the (Acting) Director of a Private Detective Agency, tasked with keeping peace in this fair city. As a detective, he's still a little green, but as a super-masochist, he's top-notch!

His brave assistant is one Satomi Komatsu. The two of them have gotten wrapped up in a case involving strange rings. One such ring has twisted Satomi physically and mentally, and at times she transforms into a super sadist herself!

Our hero investigates the rings hoping to return Satomi to normal, but he just can't quite crack the case. Troubles plague him during his investigation, first when he takes another case by the well-endowed erotic novelist Kiriko Noto, and then when the Agency is taken over by the beautiful and mysterious Regina Kaga.

A detective story filled with ups and so, so many downs!! And that's even before the Queen of Dawn, an assassin for the sinister Association, shows up!

What will tomorrow bring for a man who can never improve as a detective and can't stop improving as a masochist?!

name: Detective Face
summary: A 2 player pass-n-play deduction game for the Playdate

name: Defy
summary:
Descend into terror in DEFY, an immersive first-person horror game set within a surreal liminal world. Unspeakable creatures use their raw senses, alongside cutting-edge AI, to hunt you through the ever evolving darkness. Engage in heart-pounding physics-based combat against vicious abominations using brutal melee weapons and powerful firearms. Built exclusively for VR, in DEFY, you must use both your wits and weapons to survive.

It’s your personal odyssey as you embark on a desperate battle towards freedom, against unspeakable monstrosities. CAN YOU SURVIVE?

name: Demeter: The Asklepios Chronicles
summary: Help a lost traveler find their ship, explore a hostile world, see combat against various enemies, and uncover secrets of this sci-fi setting in this trailer for Demeter: The Asklepios Chronicles.

name: Deep Dive Duet
summary: You and your partner find yourself deep underwater in a sinking submarine. Your goal is to swim as far as possible. Stay on course, repair holes, don't let electrical wires fall into the water and try not to die in a closed, flooded compartment.

name: Desert Kingdoms
summary: Desert Kingdoms is a minimal real time strategy game. Protect your king and conquer the desert.

name: Den of Wolves
summary: Den of Wolves is a co-op heist FPS from the creator of Payday: The Heist, Payday 2 and GTFO. In this techno-thriller you and your friends operate as criminals for hire in the conflicts between rival corporations in Midway City. Gather your crew, design the plan, gear up and execute the heist.

name: Desirable Deals
summary: Our protagonist is an aggressive alpha and senior in college who tends to bite off more than he can chew. He's already secured a job and will be joining the company after graduation. He dreams of making it big there and surrounding himself with women and cash. But the company he'll be working it as all about results and the CEO expects everyone to put in their all.

name: Desert Island in Summer?
summary: Hikaru sets off for a fun-filled summer vacation at his university's club retreat. However, a sudden fierce storm blows in, causing their boat to drift off course, leading to them being stranded. Will Hikaru be able to make a girlfriend before they manage to escape this predicament?

name: Demeter
summary: In this revolutionary platformer, you will find yourself for the first time ever solving puzzles, fighting enemies and exploring a brand new world in your own living room. The game uses mixed reality to create levels and challenges in real time that adapt to the environment you are in. Climb, jump, fly and run using your walls - and your furniture! - in a way you have never experienced before.

name: Decayed
summary:
DECAYED is an open-world post apocalyptic singleplayer survival game.

Choose your own battles. Come out weapons blazing, using your tactical skills and whits to make your way through the undead, or hunker down and protect an area, standing your ground.

Explore the world with absolute freedom. Stay in the city and loot buildings, homes, or bases for powerful items, or stay secluded in a forest, with the decreased abundance of threats. There are zero restrictions by missions or NPC's. You are your own commander now.

name: Detached
summary:
A lewd psychological horror comedy dating sim that touches on mental health, illness, and spookies.

It follows the life of Daine, a 25 year old man that is just discovering what it means to actually live, his road to recovery, and discovering himself.

Of course, not everything is as it seems as there are many players out there, both in the Plane of the Mundane and the supernatural, pushing and prodding him down the gentle stream of fate. One of these players is you, the Hand of Fate.

As the Hand of Fate, you will help guild Daine through his daily life, choosing where he goes, and what girls he'll visit to increase their affections towards him. Along the way, you'll get to know their own stories and histories while the world's mysteries unravel before you.

name: Deepest Regret
summary: A 3D action RPG featuring swordplay and magic battles.

name: Dexter's Momatory
summary:
A Porn Parody of Dexter's Laboratory.
Dexter's been missing classes so you decide to go to his house to deliver his homework
but instead of Dexter you meet his cute hot mom.​

name: Dear Red
summary: Red had grown, she understood what happened, why he always mentioned those words although she couldn't stand watching and being overwhelmed by the old memories all the time. Now that he's dead, it doesn't have to be so anymore...

name: Dead Ninja Mortal Shadow
summary:
"Hell comes with the power of darkness"
The demonic shadow comes first to the human world for one purpose, to destroy. With dark power, punish your opponents. Be fast, stealthy and deadly. Enter the world of the ninja and be the death.

name: Demon Turf: The Tower
summary: You've been stripped of all your powers and there's only one way to regain them: Climb the Jester's impossibly high tower! Can you overcome all of the hazardous challenges and gain back your abilities, one by one? All it takes is one slip up and you'll have to start over... You'll be sweating, you'll be swearing but with each attempt you'll climb just a bit higher... And just that much closer to beating this incredibly tough challenge! Good luck, fellow demon!

name: Defender II
summary: Save the humanoids from the impending aliens in the sequel to Defender. The task is still rescuing humanoids before Landers can turn them into Mutants, while avoiding and shooting other foes, however you must now carry humanoids to safety through the Stargate of the title. Entering this Stargate not only warps you to the nearest humanoid in jeopardy, but can also warp you ahead (while on the first 15 levels) if you enter it with 4 or more humanoids, and give you extra lives if you warp with 10 humanoids, so there is a trade-off between guaranteeing the safety of existing humanoids, and trying to advance your position There are more enemies on screen than ever before. The Inviso button makes you invisible to enemies, but also to yourself, so you will have to follow your bullets to work out where on the screen you are.

name: DemiDato: Monster Dating Show
summary:
DemiDato is a comedy romance visual novel inspired by real-life dating shows with a tongue-in-cheek monster twist!
Welcome to the set of the monster world's biggest dating show, DemiDato! Your protagonist (with your choice of name and pronouns) is a plucky human in a silly hood, the latest contestant to team up with the show's notoriously snarky host Paul T. Geist on live TV.
It's time to find your very own demihuman date! But if you can't win anyone over, you must risk leaving the show utterly dateless 3 Good luck! You might need it!

name: Deep Dungeon
summary: Deep Dungeon is very much like Wizardry with the exception that you are not controlling a whole party but a single hero through eight maze-like dungeon levels to get rid of the evil overlord who is responsible for kidnapping the princesses soul.

name: Demonology 101
summary: A small game about finding the true names of demons.

name: Deathloop + Ghostwire: Tokyo Bundle
summary: Death takes many forms - To some, an endless timeloop; To others, an entire world peering into ours. Break a vicious cycle of live-die-repeat in Arkane Lyon’s DEATHLOOP and face a citywide takeover of the supernatural in Tango Softworks’ Ghostwire: Tokyo in this two-pack collection of critically acclaimed Bethesda Softworks titles.

name: Deep Vault 69
summary: Might I say, you're looking fit as a fiddle! And this is not surprising, because you are one of the survivors in a comfortable vault! But it's time to get to the surface to explore the world. Well, or try to do it!

name: Dead Drop
summary:
Dead Drop is the 19th game in the Carol Reed series.

The game is 100% mouse driven and features a classic adventure game interface.
There is absolutely no need to have played any of the previous games in the Carol Reed series to fully enjoy Dead Drop.

The game takes place is Sweden, but it is in English. All dialogues have subtitles.
The game contains no graphic violence or any swearing. It has no action elements, and is suitable for ages 15 and up.

name: Deep Space Waifu: DLC
summary: Academy themed DLC for the first Deep Space Waifu game, containing new levels.

name: Deep State
summary: Deep State, a first person shooter inspired by classic games such as Goldeneye 007, Deus Ex, and Resident Evil.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Special Edition
summary: Deep Rock Galactic is a first-person co-operative sci-fi shooter for up to 4 players, featuring fully procedural and destructible environments to explore, mine, and explode your way through to reach your objectives. As a team of veteran dwarven space miners, you must take on perilous missions for the interplanetary mining corporation Deep Rock Galactic and go where no-one else dares, into the deepest, most dangerous cave systems of the most hostile planet ever discovered.

name: Dead Rising 3: Day One 2013 Edition
summary: This is a version of Dead Rising 3 released alongside the Xbox One as a launch title. This version features a silver background front cover and exclusive tribute packs to Frank West and Chuck Greene.

name: Death ring
summary: This is a fun casual shooting game where players will need to control the Pea Shooter to fire from an appropriate angle and defeat enemies from all directions. Some of them have exceptional combat power, while others have very fast movement and attack speeds.

name: Degu Squad
summary: Important personnel were kidnapped by terrorists. When no one dared to come forward, the Degu Squad received the rescue plan. The special operations team of more than a dozen people needs perfect cooperation to complete such an arduous task. Are you ready?

name: Dense forest
summary: In this game, you have a fairly simple task - to collect all the fruits to complete the level

name: Descent
summary: Mythology based bunnyhopping FPS with various movement mechanics.

name: Desktop Tourney World
summary: Desktop Tourney World is a simulation construction, immortal cultivation survival game, you need to collect food, construct buildings, build equipment, and fight with all kinds of monsters.

name: Deep Dark Space
summary: Deep Dark Space is a 4 player online co-op horror game in space. Investigate abandoned stations to collect evidence and deduce the monster. Beware betrayal from the team!

name: Decks of the Damned
summary: Raise an undead army by night, while by day, fend off human attacks on your lair. Enhance your minions by crafting and looting gear. Discover powerful crafting recipes. Explore lost ruins in quest for rare artifacts. Raid human villages. Shroud the land in darkness under your control.

name: Dead by Daylight: Gold Edition
summary:
Embrace terror with Dead by Daylight’s Gold Edition, which includes the base game and 12 Chapters for a total of 16 Killers and 19 Survivors.

Whether you’re starting your journey in The Fog or looking to take things to the next level, there’s no better starting point than the Gold Edition. Experience a sprawling roster of horror characters in the quintessential Dead by Daylight experience.

In addition to the base game characters, the Gold Edition includes:

- The Clown and Kate Denson
- The Spirit and Adam Francis
- The Legion and Jeff Johansen
- The Plague and Jane Romero
- The Oni and Yui Kimura
- The Deathslinger and Zarina Kassir
- The Blight & Felix Richter
- The Twins and Élodie Rakoto
- The Trickster and Yun-Jin Lee
- Mikaela Reid

name: Dead Estate: Assignment Anya
summary: Assignment Anya is the fifth update in the six part update series for Dead Estate. Featuring a whole new campaign accessible from the get-go, inspired by classic survival horror games and set prior to the events of the main game. Also featuring several brand new challenge modes, new curses and more.

name: Detective Kiwi
summary: "Detective Kiwi" is a free to play multiplayer puzzle game that designed up to 6 players, featuring a simple rule: There will be 4 images every round. You need to find them as fast as you can.

name: Depth Charge
summary: Planned as a pack-in cassette title for Amiga's never released Power Module peripheral and described as 'the first machine-interactive video game', offering head-to-head play, with one player the submarine commander and the other the destroyer captain. Each player would have had their own screen display and set of commands. The Power Module was dropped in favor of the Power Play Arcade carts, and the game’s development only went as far as this version. Catalog description: 'You know he's down there. But where? Your sonar is picking up indiscriminate blips. Then a pattern emerges. You've found him. You launch a round of depth charges over the side, and the explosions rock the ship. You smile confidently and check the scanner: completely blank. Suddenly, there's a blip. And another. Or... You know he's up there. But where...' The cart, box and manual are reproductions from 2010 with permission of Jerry Lawson.

name: Dennou Gakuen
summary:
You have been selected as one of the few lucky male pupils to go to the famous Cybernetic Hi-School. But before you can enroll, you must undergo three tests executed by fellow female pupils. Each test has three rounds of 25 questions, of which 20 must be correctly answered. As you finish a round, your exam proctor takes off some clothes. The questions are decidedly nerdy, pertaining mainly to science fiction, comics, animation and toys, as well as the technology used in such genres and media.

An updated version, sold as Dennou Gakuen V2, was released for the PC-9800 series and included full screen graphics and faster load times.

name: Delta Arm
summary: Set in the year 2064 this creeping horizontal space-shooter will certainly help you get your SHMUPS on. Different ship configurations give you different shooting types and patterns.

name: Demon Slayer 3
summary: Demon Slayer 3 is an Adventure game, developed and published by T&H Software, which was released in Japan in 1991.

name: Desperate Escape
summary: Ted Williams, who has been sheltering in a school bunker for three years after a rocket attack, now has to escape due to a lack of food supplies. To do this, he has to solve his self-constructed puzzles and obstacles that were supposed to prevent him from escaping the bunker.

name: Dead by Daylight: Old Wounds Pack
summary: Pain awaits in the Old Wounds Pack, which includes 8 playable characters from 4 of Dead by Daylight's most unforgiving Chapters yet: Darkness Among Us, Demise of the Faithful, Cursed Legacy, and Chains of Hate.

name: Dead by Daylight: Macabre Tales Pack
summary: Tragedy strikes in the Macabre Tales Pack, which includes 7 playable characters from 4 of Dead by Daylight's most experimental Chapters yet: Descend Beyond, A Binding of Kin, All-Kill, and Hour of The Witch.

name: Death Motel
summary: Death Motel is a first-person horror game.

name: Dead Tomb
summary: Dead Tomb is a brand-new fun, point and click adventure game, that will take you back to the heyday of retro gaming.

name: Detective Pomu and the Tatsuki Manor Mystery
summary: Join Detective Pomu as she tracks down the elusive Phantom Thief Selen Tatsuki to her Mystery Manor to save the poor missing Mascots. Solve puzzles, collect cute mascots, and most of all have fun with your oshi! Can Detective Pomu unravel the Mystery of Tatsuki Manor and save the Mascots in time?

name: Detective Bass 2: The Case of the Stolen Pearls
summary: Crime never rests... but thankfully, neither does Detective Bass! Put on your detective hat and help Detective Bass get to the bottom of a robbery, in this witty, narrative-driven detective game!

name: Derby Tsuku 2
summary: Derby Tsuku 2 (ダビつく2) is a Sega Dreamcast horse racing training simulation released exclusively in Japan.

name: Derby Tsuku: Derby Uma wo Tsukurou!
summary: Derby Tsuku: Derby Ba wo Tsukurou! (ダビつく ダービー馬をつくろう!) is an entry in Sega's Let's Make series for the Sega Dreamcast. It's a horse racing simulation game.

name: Denpa Shonen-teki Kenshoseikatsu Soft Nasubi no Heya
summary: Denpa Shonenteki Kenshoseikatsu Soft Nasubi no Heya (電波少年的懸賞生活ソフト なすびの部屋) is a 1999 game by Hudson for the Sega Dreamcast. It ties into a Japanese reality show where a comedian willingly locked himself in a small apartment living off sweepstakes winnings until he won ¥1,000,000 worth of goods.

name: Demi Daggers
summary: Take the cursed dagger, use its power to dispatch the horrors from this hellish place, score the best time! A fan game based on Devils Daggers for PICO-8.

name: Death Inn Ⅱ :The Immortal Is Coming
summary: Death Inn Ⅱ: The Immortal Is Coming is a horror puzzle. The film crew is in a castle to finish, What is the mystery behind the mysterious death of a leading actress in a castle? Was it a homicide or was there more to it? It's a foggy castle, but none of the truth is buried forever.

name: Death Angel Trial
summary: This is a game about online violence, all of which are based on the personal experience of the producer and shared with netizens. As far as possible to reduce the reality of one after another bloody cruel phenomenon. Today's victims may only be a little-known person, and the next It could be you.

name: Desire Gambling House
summary: Desire Gambling House is a classic 21-point card game, in which there will be four unique beautiful women as your opponents, they will even use clothes as a bet, do you...continue?

name: Deers and Deckards
summary: You goes to visit your best friend for a fun weekend of games. There you also get to meet his dad, making the stay more eventful then expected...

name: Defense Master
summary: Defense + Shooting + Roguelite, simple yet fun. Enemies will continuously appear from the right. Can you withstand the onslaught?

name: Dead by Daylight: Alan Wake Chapter
summary: From one Dark Place to another. Dead by Daylight: Alan Wake brings bestselling author Alan Wake into The Fog. Purchasing this add-on unlocks an exclusive universal Charm: Nail Gun.

name: Devil's Deck: Polar Night Falls
summary: This content requires the base game Devil's Deck on Steam in order to play.

name: Dead Heat
summary: Go head-to-head in this exhilarating arcade racing game by Namco. Race through four tracks based on real-life locations with eight customizable cars to choose from. Using the state-of-the-art PIN system, it can be stored to save your high scores and driving styles to be used as computer players for future races.

name: Dead End
summary: Use all opportunities to survive as long as possible.

name: Death Machine
summary: Conquer the mechanical citadel in Death Machine - a metroidvania, with a roguelite item system. Gather items to gain strength, navigate the perilous machine world, leverage the aid of ancient demons, and seek out dangerous denizens to defeat before the forces of the machine close in on you.

name: DearMyFriend
summary: Set off to the unknown world Stargather Land now. The shadow of chaos is shrouding here for so long, a girl from another world shoulders the responsibility of saving this land. Travel with the power of elements until the end of destiny, only fight will lead her to the finish.

name: Dear Edmund
summary: Navigate a Victorian street under strict party rule. As Edmund, choose between personal gain and community health. Manage resources, upgrade your home and street, and face a dynamic environment. Your decisions will shape your destiny and the street's future.

name: Death Fighter
summary: This is a simple side-scroller made by one person. It's my first game and I would really appreciate any reviews from you !

name: Death Penalty Hero
summary: A fantasy role-playing game where you become an adventurer and move freely around the world, fulfilling the "righteousness" of each person's heart.

name: Deathpital
summary: Survival horror in a scary hospital

name: Deathray
summary: Immerse yourself in the eerie atmosphere of an abandoned laboratory with the effect of photorealism. Explore mysterious things, solve puzzles. But be careful, you are always being hunted.

name: Deep Down
summary: Deep Down is a narrative roguelike deckbuilder about emotional resilience. Restore your relationships through card-based dialogues, express, transform and even repress emotions conveyed through cards, and confront buried memories to break the cycle.

name: Decurion
summary: Combine the unique abilities of Mechs and Pilots in strategic synergy. Team up with friends in local co-op to conquer dynamic levels with different geometry, shaping your strategic approach. Watch out for anomalies introducing unexpected challenges as you defend your base and strive to stay alive.

name: Deep Among the Swarm
summary: Deep Among the Swarm is a challenging survival RTS roguelite about surviving against thousands of enemies. Drill ever deeper underground while fighting the endless onslaught of the Swarm. Can you save humanity?

name: Deep in the Woods
summary: The Deep Forest tells a classical tale of searching for family. Players will experience the changing seasons throughout the game and explore enchanting scenes depicting each season.

name: Deepmess
summary: DEEPMESS is a turn-based tactics descent into the mind of god. Armed with a hammer and nail, tunnel your way through layers of flesh and bone while thinking one floor ahead. Dig deep and make mess through intense, god-lobotomizing fun.

name: Devil's Hideout
summary: Devil's Hideout is a horror point and click adventure. Lauren learns from a mystic that her young sister is still alive, with cultists staging her death. Traveling to the hospital where her sister received care, Lauren plunges headfirst into a nightmare.

name: Devilish League
summary: Swing, hit, and bounce! Blast enemies with your heavy bat in this hilarious cartoon roguelike!

name: Devastating Fog
summary: Devastating Fog is a top-down survival shooter roguelike game. You play as one of the few survivors, whose goal is to reclaim the Earth from the fog. Fight enemies, craft and upgrade your weapons. Discover the deserted post-apocalyptic world where everything wants you dead.

name: Defile
summary: Discover the story behind the blood queen and bring an end to the evil entity which now inhabits the manor.

name: Dead Faces
summary: Dead Faces is a mind bending psychological horror about hallucinations and facing your past. Unravel Jack's disturbing mind, the faces from his past and the ultimate truth behind his actions. You must remember their faces.

name: Detective: Ritual of the Sea
summary: Step into the shoes of an experienced detective and uncover dark secrets while solving criminal cases. In this thrilling detective world, you'll face stressful decision-making moments, reconstruct crime scenes, and utilize cutting-edge technology for evidence analysis. Your mission will be to discover motives and connections between suspects, spot lies and inconsistencies in testimonies, interrogate witnesses to unveil the truth, collaborate with other law enforcement agencies, gather evidence, and apply deduction and reasoning to solve the most complex criminal cases.

name: Dead by Daylight: Maddening Darkness Pack
summary: Danger lurks in the Maddening Darkness Pack, which includes 8 playable characters from 4 of Dead by Daylight's most twisted Chapters yet: Of Flesh And Mud, Spark Of Madness, Curtain Call, and Shattered Bloodline.

name: Devotion
summary: Devotion is a partial conversion of RatArena to Quake III Arena.

name: Dead's dawn
summary: Deads Dawn is a multiplayer survival game, explore an unpopulated world full of threats, you will find other survivors along the way who can be your allies or enemies. Create, build and hunt to survive as long as possible. Developed with Unreal Engine 5.

name: Demon Lord Reincarnation Gaiden
summary: Assemble a party, explore the dungeon, fight your way through hordes of monsters, and defeat the Demon Lord once again in this brutal dungeon crawler. Are you strong enough to free humanity from the reign of terror?

name: Demon: Recollect
summary: Step into the shoes of an ancient mutant and get thrown into the modern, mortal world. Learn what you can about your past as you don the mask of a villain!

name: Desolar
summary: Desolar is a turn-based tactical dungeon crawler that incorporates elements of a card battler. The game merges the classic look and feel of 90s retro RPGs with the strategic depth of chess.

name: Detective Luigi
summary: Explore a rainy city, solving a mystery as Detective Luigi.

name: Debasing Grounds
summary: Debasing Grounds is an adult web-browser-based RPG and social simulator set in a post-apocalyptic world. Players can play it online or download the game. The game is compatible with various platforms, including Windows, Mac, Linux, and Android.

name: Dead End
summary: Trapped in a hallucinatory, liminal-space style underground passageway, explore and unravel the endless "dead-end" paths to find a way forward. "Dead Path is a short ambient horror puzzle game that references Exit 8, but with a completely different core mechanic.

name: Defender
summary: Game Boy Color port of Defender, released alongside Joust.

name: Dengenki Days
summary: Juno's rent money has gone missing! The end of the month draws near- what is an attractive and spunky girl to do in a situation like this? Join Juno and her friends as they try to earn some quick cash!

name: Defender Bros
summary: Prepare your defenses during the day and survive until dawn. Defender Bros is a Tower Defense roguelike game where you play as a soldier defending your base. Pick between multiple abilities as you level up to increase you survivability, then after each run buy perks and become even stronger.

name: Deep Scanner
summary: Due to your debts, you have been sent to the BAORA9 production facility. A quiet place, if it weren't for the raids by local creatures. Will you be able to complete your work and leave BAORA9 safe and sound?

name: Defenders
summary: You thought you landed alone. You were wrong. Now you must defend yourself against waves of enemies in order to survive. Vanquish thousands of foes, master your abilities, call in reinforcements, and survive in a quest to become a true Defender.

name: Denger Zone
summary: VT03 (16-bit graphics) port of Danger Zone.

name: Desktop Baseball 2
summary: Get ready for an all-new and improved baseball experience! Assemble an original team like no other!

name: Dead End Exit 8
summary: This is a thriller game based on memory puzzles that supports PC play and VR mode. The theme is inspired by people's depression and tension while waiting in the hospital.In an infinite loop space, one must carefully observe all abnormal information and strive to escape from the infinite space

name: Desktop Hacker: Echoes of Pandora
summary: Desktop Hacker - Echoes of Pandora brings you into the intriguing era of early 2000s hacking. In this expansion, uncover a hidden digital conspiracy using your hacking skills and the mysterious Pandora hack. Each step takes you deeper into a captivating story set in the world of cyber espionage.

name: Deo
summary: Deo is a 3D adventure-platform game with unique input model. The rich set of actions and game mechanics make Deo a truly challenging game for even the most experienced gamers. The game features large realms with lots of secret and hidden areas, various creatures and challenging obstacles.

name: Derby Tsuku 3: Derby-ba wo Tsukurou!
summary: Derby Tsuku 3: Derby-ba wo Tsukurou! is an entry in Sega's Let's Make series for the PlayStation 2 and GameCube. It's a horse racing simulation game.

name: Dead Heat Riders
summary: Based on Bandai Namco’s popular Dead Heat Street Racing arcade game, Dead Heat Riders takes that same exciting, neck-and-neck racing premise and applies it to motorcycle racing. Hop on your bike to race through 4 incredibly detailed cities, which were personally surveyed by the development team. Just like the Dead Heat street racing game, zoom through the streets of New York, Chicago, London and San Francisco but now on different courses through each city. Select from 5 different superbikes as you ride on a recreated motorcycle swivel seat. Another great feature is found with Namco’s patented software technology that analyses and stores registered players driving styles, later mimicking registered players as “ghost drivers”. This allows current players to race against previous drives, even when they are not around. This title also features a completely revamped soundtrack, designed to match the white knuckle intensity of each race. Enjoy more social racing with the Integrated Camera! This takes a picture of the players and uses that photo to identify your car and other players you are racing against in real-time during the race.

name: Dead Weight
summary: Challenge the Ancient Gods! Set the sails of your flying pirate ship and embark on the adventure in the steampunk world of Dead Weight. Explore floating islands in search for loot. Choose a class or create your own and enjoy turn-based tactical combat on tiny battlefields where every step matters.

name: Demon Night
summary: Demon Night is a lost Scott Cawthon game released in 2003, out of all the lost Scott Cawthon games, it probably has the least amount of info known about it. It seems to be some sort of sequel or successor to Mega Knight.

name: DeepSea Serenity: VR Underwater Trip
summary: This is a realistic VR visual experience game in which you play as a beautiful woman who freely travels through the magnificent underwater world.

name: Death's Web
summary: "Death's Web" is a challenging "Rogue-lite" platformer where you explore an ever-changing 2D world filled with enemies ready to slay you. Numerous curses are waiting to be discovered; they may lead to your demise, but perhaps they're valuable.

name: Dea
summary: Turn-based fantasy RPG that takes place in Lastia, the last piece of land on a world that survived a great war and is now facing a new threat: strange creatures named Xempts.

name: Demonic Astal
summary: Demonic Astal is a 2D platformer where you as a brave demon hunter, go to the demonic world to find a magical portal. You must go down the floors in search of a portal, overcoming various obstacles and fighting dangerous creatures to become stronger.

name: De3amy
summary: "Players, please break the chains of Amy's nightmares with DR3AMy!" Break free from nightmares with the lovely DR3AMy android and Amy. This game contains visual and auditory horror elements. It is not recommended for the elderly or those with a weak heart.

name: DeadNeverStop
summary: 《DeadNeverStop》 is a roguelike tower defense game. You will be the hero who can use unique defense towers to help the survivors survive from countless zombies. Dozens of defense towers, multiple skills and a large number of battle cards are the key to survive from endless zombies! Good luck!

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Supporter II Upgrade
Deepwell
summary: Deepwell is a story-driven adventure game, about a small town surrounding a giant mystery hole.

name: Desposis
summary: Father Mandus, armed only with his sacred crucifix and the hallowed verses of his Bible, embarks on a daring crusade to vanquish the malevolent presence that lurks within the cursed confines of the Williams mansion.

name: Desert Special Forces
summary: Captain, you have a new mission!

name: Deep Into Darkness
summary: Deep Into Darkness is a horror game that features a cursed environment where you wake up with no knowledge of your surroundings. While you are explore the abandoned building you found yourself in some crazy situations, being chased by monstrous creatures, while discovering the truth.

name: Dentist Bling
summary:
Ready for the ultimate dental experience?
Dive into the world of tooth care and become a master dentist!

name: Delicious Donut
summary: Donut puzzles. Very. Delicious.

name: Death World
summary: After a long night you wake up alone in the bunker as a bunker security guard. Hunt, kill, gather. Do anything to survive.

name: Decypher
summary: Decypher hidden codes, with tons of exciting variants and levels

name: Dental Strike
summary: A throwback to retro shoot'em up games typical of the 80s, where you play as a tooth fairy fighting against rotten teeth and bacteria using different abilities and special shots.

name: Descending The Woods
summary: By day, tend to your farm, care for your pets, and explore the mysteries of the haunted woods. By nightfall, They will come from the woods, Beware of ghosts and demons of the haunted woods. Hide, Survive, Build, Fight and Explore in this eerie Survival Horror alone or with friends.

name: Dead Get Rekt
summary: In the shadow-drenched realm where modern warfare intertwines with necromantic horrors, we have conjured an unparalleled adventure. Forge your arsenal from an evolving deck of cards, face legions of the undead delvers, unearth artifacts of might and vanquish the darkness that festers down the Crypt!

name: Deep Space Drillers
summary: Deep Space Drillers is a top-down spaceship game, where you mine and sell valuable ores from asteroids to upgrade your ship and explore the dangerous depths of space in search of the rarest metals and gems.

name: Dead by Daylight: All Things Wicked Chapter
summary: Dead by Daylight's All Things Wicked delves into the depths of analog horror with new Killer, The Unknown, and new Survivor, Sable Ward. Purchasing this add-on unlocks 2 exclusive Cosmetics: The Unknown's Garden Casual and Sable Ward's Designer Corset.

name: Device Doctor Simulator 2024
summary: Device Doctor Simulator 2024 offers an interactive and detailed simulation experience of becoming a technology repair expert. In this unique simulation, dive into the complex world of various digital devices, including smartphones, tablets, and smartwatches.

name: Destiny Online
summary: Destiny Online is a 2D Fantasy MMORPG and offers free-to-play access. Pet System: Capture monsters, make them pets, and have them aid you in combat. Character Dressing up System: Freely DIY your favorite style with hairstyles, headwear, clothes, back accessories, and tails.

name: Deflect Boy
summary: Deflect Boy is a top-down arena shooter, that instead of guns, you only have a shield. Deflect the bullets, acquire, and combine new skills to create unique deflection powers and survive until the nightmare ends.

name: DeadballCrusader
summary: Defeat the Evil Demons with your baseball bat

name: Deceit 2: Werewolf
summary: Stalk your prey and hide your true nature as a wolf among sheep with the Wyrtorn Terror. The Werewolf Pack also gives you an exclusive curse, The Chemist, and an exclusive item the Ball & Chain.

name: Deperson
summary: Are you ready to step into a dark and mysterious world with Aaron, who is afraid of his own shadow? A file that has been closed for years is opened again, the forgotten ones wake up from their sleep and the silence is broken by screams.

name: Devil Blade Reboot
summary: An immersive pseudo-3D experience that pushes the limits of pixel art. Destroying enemies in close vicinity dramatically increases both the difficulty and your score. With the Berserk System, dangerous play is the best choice, as high risk brings high reward.

name: Destroy Them!
summary: In Destroy Them, you need to destroy all the robots on 4 differents maps using advanced movements to earn points and beat your high score !

name: Delverium
summary: Explore, Build, Farm, Craft and Fight in this vast procedurally generated survival adventure for up to 4 players. What you do is up to you, but the deeper you delve, the more you uncover the hidden truth. Could you be the hero to restore stability to the land and put an end to the invading "Faults"?

name: Decktamer
summary: Deck-building meets monster catching in this turn-based roguelike. Recruit enemy cards to your party as you dive into the depths of the abyss. Will you kill them or will you tame them?

name: Dead Man's Hand: Card Roulette Action
summary: Dead Man’s Hand is a 2-8 player party game that combines the classic game of Russian Roulette with the unpredictable nature of card games.

name: Deep Sleep: The Beggining
summary: Discover the truth about winderfield, the ghost town and solve the mysteries.

name: DeliSpace
summary: Deliver packages... in space! Test your agility by navigating through different galaxies carrying diverse packages and upgrade your ship. Will you become the best courier in the universe?

name: DeepWeb Simulator
summary: DeepWeb Simulator is a simulation game where you will get lost in the dark corridors and experience the thrill of illegal trade. Place ads, make secret deals and build your criminal empire in the illegal world of the deep web.

name: Descensus
summary: Descensus is a souls-like action-RPG with challenging combat set in post-catastrophe diesel punk world. The player's goal is to reach the heart of the mysterious Rift of the Fallen Star. It is necessary to stop the expansion and spread of the anomaly before it absorbs the whole world.

name: Demonic Deckmaster
summary: Become a new commander in the army of Hell. Ascend the dungeon, craft your deck, and prove your worth to the King of Demons in this roguelike deck building game.

name: Demoniac TV
summary: Destroy demoniac TVs with crazy powerups! Demoniac TV is a roguelite with a cyberpunk look that has its game flow in waves. Kill, buy weapons and become stronger! In this mission, exorcising is your final destination.

name: Deus Proxy
summary: Deus Proxy is a roguelike that brings together the most exciting aspects of new-school auto battlers and old-school tabletop gaming. Every game is a completely new adventure with 15 factions, human opponents, and hundreds of heroes, items, traits, and spells!

name: Destiny 2: Into The Light
summary: Destiny 2: Into the Light will deliver new game content, available for all players, throughout the months of April and May in preparation for the launch of The Final Shape in June.

name: Deadly Disco
summary: This is a high score chaser where you dance on a collapsing floor to gain points.

name: Demon Drop DX
summary: Monster Hunt for up to 3 players simultaneously!

name: Desert Witch
summary: An open-world action game in which you eliminate enemies with a sniper rifle, often from very long distances. The game area is a desert locally built with low and high buildings in which you can hide or take a shooting position.

name: Despot Zombie
summary: The AI within could be humanity's salvation…or its end. Experience mind-bending combat, explore a dark fantasy wasteland, and unravel a twisted tale as Kurt, humanity's unwilling hope.

name: Death tree
summary: This is a puzzle game that requires your eyes and hands to work together to score.

name: Death Valley
summary: This is a casual game.

name: Demons and Doobins
summary: Sneak, Scirm, Doob.... all things you'll do in Demons and Doobins, the 2nd most fun game on Steam. Demons and Doobins is a multiplayer game meant for some stupid fun with friends.

name: Devil Jam
summary: Rampage through hell’s metal artists and their countless followers! Immerse yourself in a hand-animated, survivor-like experience that blends beat-driven combat with a unique 12-slot inventory system, allowing for near-infinite demonic builds.

name: DeMiriam Magic: Blueprint of Miracle
summary: Create your sweet memories with the girls on the island, manage and build your own island in a relaxed atmosphere, operate the island's airport, and try driving a small plane to visit the island you have built

name: Deathbound
summary: Death needs a replacement. You're just the Grunt for the job. But unfortunately you're not the only grunt fighting for Death's job. Perseverance, quick reflexes and a quick trigger finger are the only thing that will help you survive. Reach the 13th Depth and defeat Death to Win!

name: Depths of Insanity 2
summary: A Dark Sick Cartoony Shooter/Adventure/RPG. INDIE-MUSIC SOUNDTRACK OF 100 SONGS! Aliens - Space - Monsters - Sausages!

name: Death From The Darkness
summary: "Death From The Darkness," a horror game where survival takes precedence in harsh conditions without conventional weaponry, facing a formidable adversary. There are no hints; you must be vigilant and use your wit to endure. Darkness conceals both danger and salvation.

name: Depths of Darkness
summary: Your car falls victim to a horrifying attack at the entrance of the village. The owner of a nearby mansion notices you and invites you into his home. In this atmosphere filled with fear and suspense, explore the ancient mansion infested with creatures and uncover the dark secrets of the past.

name: Deckbuilder Fantasy: Elvenglade
summary: The forest is no safe place, where predators hide in every bush and even the trees have eyes. Young elven warriors must prove themselves against the fierce creatures that lurk in their woodland realm.

name: Deal of the Dead Final Cut
summary: Deal of the Dead: Final Cut is a Solitaire-style, survival horror, card game rendered in a unique, hand-drawn, art style. Fight your way through randomly shuffled decks of cards and escape from a zombie-infested city set in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Destination: Dragons!
summary:
Ever want to train your own dragon? Ever want to watch her fight?
Now you can in this game.

name: DeathSprint 66
summary: DEATHSPRINT 66 redefines hardcore arcade racing, fusing high-speed on-foot racing with a dystopian setting and deadly obstacles. Unleash your velocity, push limits, and claim glory like never before.

name: Death End Re;Quest Code Z
summary:
A mysterious man appears, and the heroines are in danger. And so new protagonist Sayaka Hiwatari must face against a chaotic scene of friends and foes alike.

The battle against the upper world is about to enter a new phase…

name: Detective: The Motel
summary: Detective The Motel is a deduction game where, to advance, you must take a pencil and a piece of paper and write down everything that seems like evidence in order to answer all the questions that arise. Solving the case will depend only on you.

name: Deck of Delirium
summary: Deck of Delirium is a PvE deckbuilding card game where you build your own misfit crew full of animals, pirates, animal pirates, pompous sailors, and even cultists to make your way through the perilous journey across the sea battling rogue pirates, sea monsters, and other uncanny enemies.

name: Devil Below
summary: A Roguelike platformer for GBJAM 5. Jump and shoot your way to the Devil below.

name: Desert Bus Frontiers
summary: Welcome to Desert Bus Frontiers, the action-packed 580 km long trip from Tucson, Arizona to Las Vegas, where Literally Nothing Interesting happens.

name: Deep Dark Wrath
summary:
Deep Dark Wrath is a hand-drawn, card collecting, dungeon crawler where you fend off countless enemies and find its source with the help of powerful Enchanted Cards.

It's a 2D Topdown Action RPG Collectathon game that focuses on being easy-to-learn, replayable with the variety of ways to dungeon dive, but somewhat hard-to-master with a mostly fixed layout Dungeon.

name: Defend It!
summary: Defend it! Are you sure you can defend the base until the last enemy? Try your luck because it's free to play!

name: Defense of the Earth
summary: Gather a task force of the best fighters earth has to offer and research technology to defend against the invaders out of space. You have to lead your squad through various grid- and turn-based battles. Between missions, you plan your next moves, manage your crew's abilities and relationships.

name: Deflectorium
summary: Deflectorium: 2D sci-fi rogue-lite singleplayer. Deflect deadly shots back at your enemies to become unstoppable. With unique deflection system, you'll dominate battles while upgrading your skills and stats. Prepare for adrenaline experience where defense isn't just a tactic but an art.

name: Delirium
summary: A psychological game about hardships of depression, life, being stuck, enraged and unable to fight. Unable to find the reason to continue and touches the dark side: The rage, hate, denial and definitely the wish for it to stop and for you to give up... But that's the easy way that leads nowhere...

name: Der Anzeigenhauptmeister
summary: Slip into the role of the advertising master! Detect illegal parking in a big city and select the correct offense from a list. Collect money for the state and punish traffic offenders for their actions! Law is law!

name: Devils Wind Mine
summary: Devil's Wind Mine is a game where you play as an engineer controlling the pumps, seeking to save the son of a desperate mother. You are the decider of this story. It is your duty, as an engineer, to save as many miners as possible, or just one; the devil waits to be fed inside these passages.

name: Deadland Chronicles
summary: Deadland Chronicles promises endless hours of excitement and challenge.

name: Detective Olivia: The Cult of Whisperers
Deep Beyond
summary: Deep Beyond Is a first-person interactive thriller about a sea explorer and the mystery behind her father’s disappearance.

name: Deadliest Warrior: Battlegrounds
summary: Head onto the first-person melee multiplayer battlefield with an army of warriors. Pit an army of Knights, Spartans, Samurai, Vikings, Ninjas or Pirates against one another or send a mixed unit into battle for a fantasy match-up of warriors, weapons and skill. Each warrior brings with them an exclusive set of weapons and strengths to prove their superiority in the art of warfare. With numerous game modes and extensive customization play out every scenario in a battle to the death and determine who is the deadliest warrior.

name: Decolonators
summary: Kick capitalist colonizer butts out of Vietnam in retro-arcade game glory!

name: Dead Paradise
summary: Ready for some serious racing action in apocalyptic cars? Drive to survive, join the racer’s gang and jump straight into explosive and dangerous battles on wheels.

name: Dead Names
summary: A small sci-fi visual novel for Game Boy -- set during one winter day, in a future that hopefully never comes.

name: Devils of the Deep
summary: You are salvaging the treasures of legendary Atlantis.

name: Device 0101
summary: Device0101 is a mystery action adventure that aims to find a key in a mansion, open the door, solve puzzles, and destroy monsters to escape

name: Detective Secrets Solitaire: The Curse of the Village
summary: Crack a complex case! A detective-themed solitaire game! Engrossing gameplay! A unique solitaire game with a mysterious story!

name: Deber
summary: Deber is a short platform game where you play as Deber, a minor demon. You have to help your demon lord to get back his precious flame, which gives him his power.

name: Deadrock Redemption
summary: Embark on an epic journey into the heart of the Wild West with "Deadrock Redemption," an open-world RPG that seamlessly blends captivating storytelling, deep character interactions, and an expansive 3D world waiting to be explored.

name: Deck of Darkness: Infernal Depths
summary: You are an artifact hunter, a seeker and purveyor of rare, magical relics. The ultimate goal of your search is the fabled Deck of Darkness, an incredibly potent arcane artifact said to grant it's bearer immortality... for a price. Journey into the Infernal Depths and face your terrifying destiny.

name: Death Pilot
summary: Immerse yourself in the mind of a lone clone, created by an abandoned factory with an inexplicable mission: conquer a desolate planet. Uncover the mystery of your existence as you explore a world littered with the remains of failed clones, questioning your purpose and sanity.

name: Dead Season
summary: Guide a group of unprepared strangers in their struggle to survive a zombie apocalypse, in Dead Season, a turn-based tactics game. Strategize to endure against relentless undead hordes, but beware, noise attracts more danger. Can you escape the outbreak's grip?

name: Destination Paradise
summary: Embark on a global adventure to uncover hidden objects in charming locations, solving puzzles across 20 captivating chapters.

name: Deep in The Fear
summary: Dive into heart-pounding terror with our co-op horror experience for 5 players. Uncover chilling mysteries, face unspeakable horrors, and survive together in this intense collaborative nightmare. Will your team escape the shadows, or succumb to the darkness that lurks within?

name: DeTechtive 2112
summary: DeTechtive 2112 is a co-op, stealth/action game from an isometric perspective with a linear storyline set in a cyber universe.

name: Dead Shells
summary: What's that behind you? Navigate through the eerie graveyard of this first person atmospheric experience while you aim to be precise, quick, and responsive to defend yourself and survive.

name: Deadly Parkour
summary: Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey in a modern-classic 2D precision-platformer that pushes the boundaries of your agility and reflexes. Choose between two unique playable characters, each with their own set of skills, as you navigate through intricately designed levels filled with challenges.

name: Dead Fibers
summary: A deadly virus has transformed the majority of the global population into relentless, ravenous zombie-like monsters called "Fibers", leaving only a scattered few survivors clinging to hope in isolated pockets of civilization.

name: Deluxe Flame Party Pack
summary: A collection of Twitch based games that streamers can play with their chat live on Twitch. The chat plays by typing in chat.

name: Devil's Calling
summary: Lift the curse. Get revenge on The Bad Man.

name: Deck Remover
summary: There are many different decks. And your goal is to draw all the cards in that deck. It's a game of 70% luck, 5% skill, and 25% doubt. A card will tell you what the 25% doubt is.

name: Desvelado
summary: Turn off the lights, dodge the ghosts and go to sleep as soon as you can in this hand-crafted 2d platform experience! In this vampiric precision platformer you will overcome challenging puzzles and deadly enemies before going to sleep in your cosy coffin.

name: Decadent
summary: Decadent is a story-driven FPS combining atmospheric exploration, horror and combat into an immersive experience. Become John Lorn, a Great War veteran turned decadent occultist on a quest to save your lost son and uncover an ancient secret; challenging not only your skills, but your very humanity.

name: Deadly Footprints
summary: You find yourself being chased through snow-covered terrain by a relentless killer who is tracking your every move by following your footprints. Run, sneak, hide and use the items you find to evade the killer, in a pixelart horror game where every step you take could be your last.

name: Deeper Than Hell
summary: Deeper Than Hell is an action roguelike for 1-4 players where you play as mysterious mage, driven by the legend of a great treasure, he goes deeper and deeper to find the legendary treasure. Wield weapons & accessories, build synergies and find out what lies deeper than hell.

name: Debate
summary:
All debates are black and white, there is no middle ground, is there?
Debate is a simple game designed for parties and gatherings of friends, it simply gives you topics to debate and assigns you one side of the argument. You can't choose which side, the app will do it for you!

name: Death Race
summary: Death Race is an unlicensed game developed by American Game Cartridges Inc. that was released on the Nintendo Entertainment System in 1990. It was also released by Home Entertainment Suppliers for an Australian release. The game is a remake of the 1976 arcade game by Exidy.

name: Desert Of The Undead New Frontiers
summary: Slaughter the undead to save your town in this 8 bit action run-n-gun

name: DEPO: Buy Me a XXL Coffee
summary: Did you like DEPO and do you want to help me to continue generating content for the game? Wow, you are willing to buy the XXL coffee! It means a lot to me, thank you very much.🤫 Hey... You will also give an XXL coffee inside the game to Meyers.

name: DEPO: Buy Me a Coffee
summary: Did you like DEPO and do you want to help me to continue generating content for the game? What better way than to buy me a coffee! Thank you for your support. 🤫Psss... You will also give a coffee inside the game to Meyers.

name: Desert Race Adventures
summary: Embark on a thrilling rally adventure across Europe and Africa in Desert Race Adventures! Manage your team, vehicle, and resources strategically to navigate treacherous terrains and claim victory. Every decision counts in this intense desert racing challenge. Will you lead your team to glory?

name: Deadside: "DragonSkin" Skin Set
summary: A set of skins for those who want to explore the dangerous world of Deadside with style.

name: Deadside: "Ghost From The Deep" Skin Set
summary: A set of skins for those who want to explore the dangerous world of Deadside with style.

name: Deadside: "Anatomical Atlas" Skin Set
summary: A set of skins for those who want to explore the dangerous world of Deadside with style.

name: Deadside: "Ass on Fire Team" Skin Set
summary: A set of skins for those who want to explore the dangerous world of Deadside with style.

name: Destroy Blocks
summary: Control the spear and throw it, break all the blocks in the level to win, score points, complete the level, earn coins and go to the next level.

name: Demon's Regalia: Colosseum
summary: A Turn-based Combat Fighting game featuring monster girls, monsters, and human warriors alike; to earn wealth and glory in the colosseum!

name: Decked in Love
summary: "Decked in Love" is Inspired by games like "Slay the Spire" and "Ring of Pain". Contains roguelike-deckbuilding and visual novel elements for an adult audience: craft a unique deck, choose your own style, do activities with your crush, and overcome any obstacles put between you two!

name: Delivery Mayhem
summary: Race against time, embrace chaos, and become the ultimate delivery daredevil in "Delivery Mayhem." Top-down mayhem meets high-speed action!

name: Demon Hunting Diary
summary: Internet scams and the badger game are just two of the many incidents that have shattered this rare moment of relaxation. It must be that the demons have come out to wreak havoc on the world again. When the new magic weapon I bought on the Internet arrives, I'll capture you all to have sex with me!

name: Depths of Ascension
summary: Depths of Ascension is a turn-based, tile-based traditional roguelike set in a high fantasy world inspired by Sumeria and the early Bronze Age cultures. Explore the twisting corridors of the Maze of Madness and use magic, stealth, diplomacy, brute force, the Gods, anything, to reach the Ascension.

name: Desire: Mrs. Claus
summary: Desire: Mrs. Claus is a captivating puzzle game with 18 levels, each featuring a sensual Mrs. Claus. Get into the holiday spirit, exercise your mind, and have fun with this relaxing and exciting game.

name: Destiny Star Girlfriend 2
summary: Seiji’s “tied by fate” again, this time with a magical girl one year his senior! In part 2 of this rowdy rom-com VN series, a freak faceoff sees Seiji become Maja’s familiar—and bound by an enchanted tether to survive. Will proximity lead to love, or is he doomed to serve till the end of (his) days?

name: Dear Diary
summary: Dear Diary is an interactive story game where you help Anna Blake, a high school student, make decisions that shape her life. From choosing who to date to deciding between studying or going out, your choices determine how Anna’s story unfolds. Explore her diary, face relatable challenges, and guide her through school, friendships, and romance.

name: Deep Dark Wood
summary: “You´re now at the Main Crossroads. There are seven paths leading from here into the Deep Dark Wood. Each path is a separate micro game written by a student from Senica, Slovakia as an answer to an open call for entries with common starting point - in the middle of a forest.”

name: De:Fanastasis
summary: A full-length RPG that focuses on map exploration, where you can enjoy "discovery". A ruined kingdom with countless hidden passages and doors. Peek into the lingering thoughts of the dead to find clues, and expand your search with items from hidden treasure chests. Fragments of information obtained in various places may eventually connect and reveal not only one's own memories but also the hidden "truth."

name: Deathtrip
summary: Ayla's Deathtrip is a daring, stylish, high-octane FPS catered to the speedfreaks, mid-2000s weirdcore enthusiasts, hypercore fanatics and adrenaline junkies. Rack up style points as you strafe and bunnyhop through a demonic near-death experience.

name: Deaf Wish
summary: Uncover the horrors of Lily's life and help her navigate her feelings to make the best out of the life she didn't ask for.

name: Deadzone Blackout
summary: Deadzone Blackout is a competitive, fast-paced, arcade FPS. Immerse yourself in the pure adrenaline of a frantic, almost generic FPS. Master the fast-paced action, show off your quick reflexes and claim victory!

name: Demonica
summary: Boomer Twin-Stick Shooter Rogueilike. Swap your weapons and slash to replenish your resources. Learn the enemy's attack patterns and health types, then, determine the best way to slay them based on your current battle status. Every combat encounter is unique in the ever-changing land of DEMONICA.

name: DeSoloFender
summary: a tower defense game in a 3D environment. Unique interface design and damage system which significantly increases the strategy factor. With a choice of 4 different weapons and a lot of improvement options, this game is perfect for putting your strategic skills to the test.

name: Deathless Death
summary: Deathless Death is a narrative puzzle game with psychological thriller elements. You play as a priest navigating a world of thoughts and illusions, tasked with listening to the confessions of four sinners.
