Through their stories, you uncover hidden truths about their pasts and unravel the complex fates that connect them, all centered around one mysterious woman.

name: Death Horizon: Cyberfusion
summary: Roguelike, physics-based, full-body FPS with cybernetic implants and procedurally generated levels. Enhance your abilities with a variety of cyber implants, experience physics-based interactions, play uniquely generated game levels, upgrade any weapon at your disposal.

name: Demon Save the World
summary: "Demon Save the World" is an action rogue game where you play as a gangster to save the world.

name: Defense of the Dauntless
summary: Endless horde mode tower defense with permanent and per-run progression. Unlock dozens of towers, survive and become dauntless.

name: Deus Cult
summary: Deus Cult is a tribute management game in a pre-apocalyptic world. Join humanity's last line of defense, and manage your resources carefully to please the Gods. Plan your strategy and offer Money, Faith or Blood as tribute, while the Gods unleash the plagues that will bring the end of time.

name: Deathtroopers: The Outpost
summary: The story is very simple, but it connects directly with the original: a fleeing soldier ends up crashing into Endor. Here he will find death and a deadly virus, already widespread throughout much of the Outer Rim of the known galaxy. Seeking help, he finds an old resistance outpost, seemingly abandoned. In an attempt to find a means of communication to call for help, he enlists the help of his faithful but damaged droid DD5. Having learned of the events that are happening on the planets around his own, he decides to embark on a fight for survival without any other choice.

name: Dead Crossway Zompell Survival Zombie
summary: "Zompell Survival Zombie" on Steam pits players against waves of undead. Earn XP to unlock spells, compete on leaderboards, and anticipate updates and multiplayer. Survive the apocalypse in "Zompell Survival Zombie."

name: Descent: The Dark Corridors
summary: Terror, chases and terrifying creatures in this atmospheric horror game. But no matter what happens, never be left alone in the dark.

name: Death Is A Guest
summary:
Your story starts when your best friend gives you an invitation to her boss' luxury Halloween party. Excited to meet new people and enjoy a few drinks, you plan to make this night unforgettable. However, everything changes when a dead body appears in the main hall.

Dreams become nightmares. Friends turn into hunters. The prince is now a monster.

Playing the role of detective in a horror movie, you now have no choice but to fight for your life.

The season of treats and tricks has arrived. It's time to get your costumes out of your wardrobe and party, as your life depends on it!

Dance, flirt, and solve a mystery. But do it all before the night ends.

name: Dead Island 2: SoLA
summary: Stage dive into the heart of SoLA, the ultimate Californian music festival, built upon ancient grounds... Stalking the pulsating heart of LA's final rave is a psychedelic beat that has unleashed total chaos, leaving nothing but a rotting crater of gore and a malevolent presence haunting the shadows. Something is out there and it’s still hungry.

name: Defence of the Arcane Realms
summary: A 3D tower defender where you must strategically use a combination of magical powers, traps, and towers in order to defend your castle against hordes of orcs, undead, and other unsavory sorts.

name: Deep Dish Dungeon
summary: Co-op online multiplayer game where you must unite to survive the treacherous depths of a mysterious dungeon, navigate puzzling passageways and gather resources to improve your camping site. Encounter enemies with diverse behaviors, discover coveted treasures, and unravel enigmas within its depths.

name: Desires of a Vampire
summary: Your days are spent as a simple maid in service to a powerful vampire lord. Luckily, the lord you serve is kind and gentle with you, as long as you let him drink your blood. Just as your relationship with your lord begins to move beyond professional, your beautiful estate is stormed by angry vampire hunters. At first, the leader of the group thinks you’re just another trapped human, but then he realizes you have a secret that runs through your veins…

name: Desires of a Dragon Prince
summary:
You’ve been taught about dragons since birth without knowing your true bloodline until one day you’re whisked away to a different world—a world full of dragons that have their own set of rules and clans. You’re accompanied by three handsome princes who tell you that you’re the Lost Dragon Princess and must take your place on the throne if the Dragon World is ever going to see peace amongst themselves and humans again!

The path is treacherous as you and your princely companions struggle to unite the clans. It seems there’s another dark force at work that’s just waiting to see you fail. You wonder how you can unite the Four Clans when your princes can’t even seem to agree amongst themselves half of the time. Will you let the bickering over you keep you from your mission?

Find out in Desires of a Dragon Prince!

name: Demonic Crusade
summary: As a humble seamstress eking out a living in these fog-drenched streets, you’ve always sought something more, and the recent string of murders only reinforces how fleeting life can be. When the most eligible bachelor in the city promises to grant your greatest wish, you barely have time to count your blessings before fate intervenes and reveals that his offer is actually a contract for your soul!

name: Demonic Suitors
summary: You have just received an invitation to a prestigious school and are on your way when your chauffeur takes a sudden turn into a dark tunnel! You’re certain this must be a mistake but after the bumpy ride, you’re greeted by a devilishly handsome young man who calls you “princess.” Just one thing, though—he’s got horns on his head! If there’s one thing the school failed to inform you, it’s that the school is for demons.

name: Defender FX
summary:
Defender FX is inspired by the classic game.

Your planet is under attack! Save the treasures from being stolen.

name: Demon Hunter: Cursed Hearts
summary: After witnessing the death of your father, you learn that you come from a long line of demon hunters. What's more, your mother's locket was once the property of a powerful demon hunter, and contains one half of an ancient, powerful demon known only as the Founder.

name: Demigods of Destiny
summary: Your life as a college student seemed normal… But one day, you’re visited by a mysterious woman in your dreams who tells you that you have powers that could change the world. You try to brush it off as just a dream, but things get real when you’re attacked by a man that controls fire!

name: Destined Memories
summary: During a performance in your hometown, an unexpected guest creates a stir. That same night you are unexpectedly attacked by soldiers of the Empire…

name: Detective Bass: Fish Out Of Water
summary:
There has a murder on a luxurious cruise ship!

As the clever, wise, and handsome Detective Bass you must investigate 8 fish-people to decide who is responsible and put them behind bars.

name: Decomission
summary: A map that was originally meant for a personal project that never happened. Mainly a brown storage facility with plenty of green foliage.

name: Demon RPG
summary:
The Demon who ruled Hell, betrayed!
The outskirts of hell, the adventure of the demon begins to get back the throne.

name: Departure!! Shipping Freighter
summary: A shipping simulator from Kairosoft

name: Deal To My Heart
summary: By a stroke of luck, you manage to get a job as a casino dealer on Aurum, the newest ship by Durst Cruises, straight out of high school.

name: Destiny Knight Romance
summary: You were raised as one of Wengins Kingdom’s knights. The Kingdom is destroyed one day by an invading kingdom. Four knights, Baldrake, Alfredo, Saddam and Ketra, were killed in the attack.

name: Deadly Attachment
summary: It's been 4 years since Samantha last saw her stepbrother Daniel. Suddenly he comes back home for her eighteenth birthday with his new girlfriend Jess. Sam can't be any happier - she always adored Dan and missed him terribly. But their reunion is ruined with the news of Jess' death. Police considers it to be a robbery, but Sam sensing something fishy, decides to start her own investigation.

name: Death of the Artificer
summary:
The planet H-004 has only five inhabitants: a reclusive scientist, a paranoid doctor, a scrappy mechanic, a shady mining executive, and a surprisingly human-like AI system.

If your intel is right, one of them is a murderer.

Play as Hordeus Sung, an IA agent sent by ICARUS (Intergalactic College of Animatronics, Robotics, and Universal Science) to investigate the death of Dante Gallagher, H-004's late Superintendent.

Remember: not everything is as it seems, and loneliness… is everywhere.

name: Decision
summary:
Decision is the 1st game of the Decision series, you play a survivor who decides to liberate a city from zombies.

Recon territories, destroy enemies, capture factories and towers, upgrade weapons and abilities. Capture and pump up each area.

name: Dejig: Tin Toy
summary: A jigsaw puzzle game for the Sega Saturn in which players build images of children's toys based around vehicles, machinery, or industry.

name: DejaVu by dropout.tv
summary: A brief maze game created by Dropout for an episode of Game Changer.

name: Dejig: Aqua World
summary: A jigsaw puzzle simulator themed around aquatic animals and oceanic scenes.

name: Deme Game
summary: A fangame made for a twitch streamer and vtuber deme. Currently in early development since February 2023.

name: Devil Zone
summary: A spaceship fights against wave after wave of alien demons.

name: Depths of Despair
summary: Welcome to Depths of Despair, a thrilling solo/multiplayer game where you must fight off waves of enemies to survive for a set amount of time. With each wave, the enemies become stronger and more challenging to defeat. Can you and your team hold out long enough?

name: Decision 2: New City
summary:
Decision 2: New City is the second game in the Decision series, implementing new features like new weapons, abilities and gameplay elements.
Another city is infested with zombies and other creatures and you're the last survivor. Keep your eyes open, aim and remember you're alone.

name: Democracy 4: Console Edition
summary: Democracy 4: Console Edition lets you take the role of President / Prime Minister in one of ten countries.

name: Dead Meat
summary: Three decent sized challenging maps for Doom 2 requiring a limit removing source port. Each map contains a Cyberdemon.

name: Devil Girl
summary: Animation System Visual Novel "Devil Girl."

name: Dead by Daylight: Dungeons & Dragons
summary: Dead by Daylight: Dungeons & Dragons brings the realm of fantasy horror into The Fog with new Killer, Vecna and new Survivors Aestri Yazar and Baermar Uraz (one character with 2 playable options). A new Map, Forgotten Ruins, is available for all players.

name: Dead by Daylight: Castlevania Chapter
summary: So comes the very night incarnate, accursed and ravenous, for darkness is Dracula’s domain. With the ability to transform into the vile denizens of the woods and conjure unnatural flames, all mortals shall succumb to The Dark Lord’s vengeance.

name: Dead Don't Die
summary: Dead Don't Die is a top-down action shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Every encounter is high-stakes; one stray bullet or sneaky knife attacker is all it takes to end your run ... not to mention the zombies that grab hold and won't let go. So use cover, be accurate, and be quick or be dead.

name: Delic
summary: Explore the countryside of Brazil in this third person survival horror game. Fight, survive, and discover that sometimes good intentions can lead to devastating results.

name: Dead by Daylight: Endless Hunt Pack
summary: Fear follows in the Endless Hunt Pack, which includes 9 playable characters from 4 of Dead by Daylight's most ruthless Chapters yet: Portrait of a Murder, Roots of Dread, Forged in Fog, and Tools of Torment.

name: Devices Tycoon
summary: Devices Tycoon is a unique business simulator that will make you feel like the owner of a company that creates your own devices! In the game you can create your own smartphones, tablets, laptops, smart watches, headphones, operating systems and even your own processors!

name: Deadlands Duel: Time Rift Rumble
summary: Deadlands Duel is a wave-based zombie defense shooter that takes place throughout all of history via time travel. You will fight hoards of zombies with various weapons and armaments. Choose one of four class types to specialize your gameplay to fit your desired role in this team-play focused arena.

name: Death Education
summary: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of an old abandoned Soviet school and find out what's going on inside its walls from the first person in the new psychological horror Death Education. But be careful, something is already watching you.

name: Deadlock
summary: Deadlock is an upcoming multiplayer game from Valve in early development.

name: Death in Unison
summary: Survive the world's deadliest psychopaths. Experience a unique 2-player co-op experience that puts your teamwork and communication to the test. Complete your duties alone or with a partner in a prison like no other.

name: Deck Defense
summary: Deck Defense is a deck building tower defense game, where the player controls both their defenses and the expansion of the map. Expand your deck after each wave with one of over 65 cards to choose from, and try to keep the enemy blobs from reaching the portal.

name: Dead Cards
summary:
WELCOME IN DEAD CARDS !

Each game, a card is killed in a deck a card. The killer is always the card that was on top of the victim in the card game. Find the truth by questioning each card, which will give you clues as to their position in the deck. Only one card lie, it's the murderer! Investigate and find to incoherence to put it in jail.

name: Dear Murder Diary
summary: Dear Murder Diary is a text-based murder mystery type game, where the player tries to piece together who died and how by reading newspaper articles. Built from a simple gameplay loop where even the finest of detail can bring you closer to the truth.

name: Detective.exe
summary:
Welcome to the SQLPD. You, as the rookie on the force, are tasked with solving the only case not corrupted on our computer systems. Using our "latest" program: detective.exe.

Bring the murderer to justice.

name: Demon's Island
summary: Choose between 26 unique characters... Get a custom particle effect to scream at people.... Find and uncover 40 secret rooms... Find 22 unique familiars to customize yourself with... Unlock 54 mysterious achievements... Get 15 unique upgrades to explore the map further... Discover the dark secret of the conspiracy room... And do it all online with your friends... Or by yourself in singleplayer...

name: Death Park Bundle
summary: This bundle features 3 terrifying horror games - the iconic Death Park 1 & 2 and the horrifying Antarctica88. Are you ready to face your deepest fears?

name: Detective Lin: Time Murder Frenzy
summary: A narrative click and point game where you gather information from the past to solve the murder of your best friend.

name: Devil's Food
summary: Hey there! Welcome to Devil's Food! Hang out with two awesome pastel goths and see if you can survive the day. Will you crack them up, get under their skin, or maybe something else will happen? Give it your all and let's have some fun!

name: Dead Room
summary: Dead Room is a combination of rogue-like and wave based games, where the player collects items that change their stats and mechanics while fighting off hordes of monsters and bosses, all while adding a unique twist in the form of a cellar creature that demands sacrifices.

name: Deepest World
summary: DeepestWorld is a coding sandbox MMORPG where you can automate your character with JavaScript. Explore an endless open world. Hunt rare monsters and bosses. Craft deep builds and items. Acquire programming skills. Grind 24/7.

name: Depth Diver
summary: Depth Diver is a co-op game where you go on an underwater trip with your friends to gather resources and repair underwater facilities in dangerous waters.

name: Death by Deduction
summary: Death by Deduction is a unique blend of logic puzzle and classic murder mystery set in an old English manor during the 1970s. Explore the manor, examine evidence, and question suspects to deduce who the murderer is in "Death by Deduction".

name: DeMonkey
summary: This is a GTAG fan game where you can (so far) talk to your friends! but it's not always just talking... But also to play infection!

name: Deer in the Headlights
summary: Deer in the Headlights is a game about the strained relationship between a young deer and her dad as they drive to the airport. Navigate through a branched narrative to try and repair their relationship (or not).

name: Deathless: The Hero Quest
summary: A roguelike deck-building game set in the universe of the Tales of Old Rus that features epic Slavic heroes and monsters.

name: Delivery Driver Service
summary: Let's work together to rebuild the region's infrastructure and overcome the challenges left behind by the devastating hurricane. By doing so, we can create new opportunities in the world of Delivery Driver Service.

name: DeafBlind
summary: DeafBlind offers an immersive sensory deprivation experience, simulating what life might feel like if you were both deaf and blind. This game invites you to navigate a world shrouded in silence and darkness, challenging you to adapt and explore in entirely new ways.

name: DeathTower
summary: Wake up, Ikarus! DeathTower is an overclocked roguelite tactical RPG. Survive each floor of the megastructure. Stealth, hacking, devastating weapons... Do whatever it takes to fight your way to the top.

name: Dear Elonai
summary: Travel back in time in Dear Elonai, a noir point and click game and try to avoid the death of your love live.

name: Detective Diaries
summary:
"Detective Diaries" immerses you in a riveting murder-solving adventure. Assume the role of Elena Volkov, determined to uncover the truth behind her father's chilling murder in an isolated Arctic research center.

Explore the frozen corridors, interrogate suspects, and solve puzzles to unravel the complex web of relationships, deceit, and hidden motives. The clock is ticking, and the Arctic holds more secrets than it lets on. Can you decipher the clues and unveil the dark truths hidden in the ice?

With its gripping narrative and challenging puzzles, "Detective Diaries" promises an unforgettable journey into the heart of mystery. Are you prepared to confront the chilling secrets concealed in the frozen Arctic landscape?

name: Devil May Cry
summary:
Devil May Cry is a mobile game based on Devil May Cry 3: Dante's Awakening.
This version of the game is a side-scroller action game with 2D graphics.

name: Devil May Cry
summary: A 3D version of Devil May Cry 3D, a mobile game based on Devil May Cry 3: Dante's Awakening.

name: Delusion
summary: Delusion is an unusual puzzle game that tells a story about a beautiful world, full of life and colors, which changed beyond recognition after a series of unexplainable events had taken place.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Order of the Deep Pack
summary: The Order of the Deep DLC grants you the armor of this venerated dwarven mining guild. It's your turn to represent the Order, plunging ever further into the perilous depths.

name: Destiny of Heroes
summary: Destiny of Heroes is a twin-stick, squad-based shooter set in occupied Indonesia at the end of World War II. Fighting Dutch and Japanese colonizers, you will lead the struggle for independence, in a heroic struggle against foreign tyrants. Liberty or death!

name: Demolition Derby Reloaded
summary: Take part in a demolition battle on city streets between old worn out cars using the latest in high tech 3D rendering, physics, collisions and interaction. You must last the longest, take the least damage, and score the most points within the time limit. Attack with your rear bumper and avoid chasers coming in with trying to T-Bone you from the side. This game features detailed urban environments, city roads, buildings, and many different types of cars.

name: Delivery Drop
summary: Solve the puzzle and delivery the toy

name: Dead On Arrival
summary: Dead On Arrival is a horror game set on trains. In the heart of an eternal night, a seemingly endless train barrels through a desolate, otherworldly landscape. Each carriage unfolds as a unique nightmare.

name: Death Protocol
summary: The voices in your head keep repeating numbers. You know only one way to make them stop...

name: Deathland Drifters
summary: Pilot a hovership across a doomed alien planet in this co-op roguelike FPS for 1-6 players. Master each hovership's unique playstyles, scavenge loot to create different builds, and work together with your crew of Drifters to fight your way off world.

name: Death Finder
summary: horror experience, with puzzles to be solved and collecting files to win avoiding monsters and big giant spiders. Walk slow, pay attention to details and read all papers when see. Stay away from monsters and Spiders or risk becoming another victim of the abandon hospital

name: Deals With Witch
summary: A crisis has descended upon the village where you live. Following an ancient legend, you embarked on the journey to find the witch. In order to save the village, you had to strike deals with the witch repeatedly. A huge conspiracy buried in history was also uncovered.

name: Dead Scrap
summary: Stranded in the decaying space colony of the Reach after a catastrophic event known as necroevolution wipes out most of the population, you must navigate a dystopian nightmare. Craft, build, and fight to survive in this ruthless survival horror simulator.

name: Deliver Us Home
summary: Deliver Us Home is a solitary sci-fi experience where one astronaut works to secure a new home and future for humanity.

name: Delivery Express
summary: "Delivery Simulator": Drive and upgrade your delivery vehicle to handle more packages and improve energy efficiency. Tackle increasing daily challenges to become the ultimate delivery master.

name: Demon Crush
summary: Demon Crush is a fast-paced 2D side-scrolling combat-platformer that blends expressive, combo-based fighting mechanics with the charming visuals and intuitive controls of a bygone era. Play as multiple characters, master different weapons and combat styles, and plunge into adrenaline-soaked action in a fantasy Japanese setting. Wall jumps, air combos, grappling hook traversal, super moves, chaotic battles, death-defying leaps, and razor-sharp duels to the death against inhuman, villainous bosses all await you!

name: Demon Kingdom
summary: Demon Kingdom is a strategy card game with elements of a interactive novel. Rule the kingdom, solve mysteries, build relationships, and defeat your enemies.

name: Den of the Defiant
summary: Den of the Defiant is a story-rich adult Visual Novel about a demon who is accidentally summoned by a coven of adorable witches. Navigate the strange world of the humans, forge bonds with your witches, and together face the coming storm.

name: Desk Deck Heroes
summary: Dip your pen in the company ink with this roguelite card-based adventure game! Find heroes, assemble a powerful party, and get ready to fill your weekdays with battles and quests!

name: Desert Kingdoms 2
summary: Desert Kingdoms 2 is a minimal real-time strategy game. Manage resources, develop villages, protect your king and conquer the desert!

name: Descent the Abyss
summary: Descent the Abyss - you take on the role of an experienced detective who goes in search of a lost traveler lost in a dangerous underground labyrinth. You must explore dark and twisted corridors, solve puzzles, fight monsters, and overcome traps to navigate through danger and find the missing person.

name: Derf Party
summary: Players compete in a shooter, party game where the rules and goals of the game change for every minigame.

name: Destroyer 7800
summary: You are the anti-submarine warfare officer of a destroyer on patrol somewhere in the South Pacific. The sea below your ship is rife with enemy submarines. Your job is to destroy as many enemy submarines as possible within your 90-second firing window using your ship's main ASW weapon: The depth charge. Your ship can launch up to 4 depth charges at a time. Since depth charges are timed to explode at a pre-determined depth, you must place the aiming line at the depth you wish the charge to explode while gauging the time it will take the charge to reach that depth to explode on an enemy submarine. The aiming line can be moved vertically using the controller. Depth charges are not contact weapons so they will only destroy an enemy submarine upon exploding at the pre-determined depth. You may fire a depth charge by pressing the button on your controller. Your destroyer has two speeds which may be changed using the alternate button on the controller. If you manage to manage to rack up 2500 points or more, your firing window will be extended by 30 seconds.

name: Deckfort Alchemist
summary: Strategic roguelike tower defense game where you fortify your defense line by stacking cards in deckforts, play various cards on enemies and deployable grids, and receive general contributions to your defense from altar structures.

name: Destiny 2: Echoes Silver Bundle
summary: Purchase the Echoes Silver Bundle and receive the Power Stance Dance Legendary emote along with 1,700 Silver (1,000 + 700 bonus Silver) which you can use to purchase Episode: Echoes, cosmetics, and more!

name: Dead Island 2: Expansion Pass
summary: Dive back into the epic horror pulp adventure of Dead Island 2 with our Expansion Pass. Brace yourself for mayhem as you uncover more of Hell-A, with brand-new missions, caches of lethal weapons, skill cards to master, fresh fits, and all the zombies you can slay.

name: Dead Island 2: Red’s Demise Katana
summary: Slice through the zombie horde with the Red's Demise Katana, which earns you a temporary damage boost with every slay.

name: Dead Island 2: Character Pack - Steel Horse Carla
summary: Slay in style with our premium character pack. Character Pack - Steel Horse Carla includes the Pantera Trueno costume and Van Flensing weapon.

name: Dead Island 2: Character Pack - Venice Vogue Bruno
summary: Slay in style with our premium character packs. Character Pack - Venice Vogue Bruno includes the Downtown Dandy costume and Skull Driver weapon.

name: Dead Island 2: Character Pack - Cyber Slayer Amy
summary: Slay in style with our premium character packs - Cyber Slayer Amy includes the Neurunner costume and the Casimir & Julienne weapons.

name: Dead Island 2: Character Pack - Jungle Fantasy Ryan
Dead Island 2: Character Pack - Gaelic Queen Dani
summary: Slay in style with our premium character pack. Character Pack - Gaelic Queen Dani includes the Thoroughly Modern Medb costume and the Brainzzz-Biter weapon.

name: Dead Island 2: Character Pack - Silver Star Jacob
summary: Slay in style with our premium character pack. Silver Star Jacob includes the Rodeo Sunset costume and Devil's Horseshoes weapon.

name: Dead Island 2: Pulp Weapons Pack
summary: The Pulp Weapons Pack features two signature weapons that are sure to leave a lasting impression - the Homewrecker and the Eye Opener.

name: Dead Island 2: Golden Weapons Pack
summary: Our slayers don't understated and neither will you with the Golden Weapons Pack. Slay in style with the beautifully decorated Abuela's Ashes Mace and Sam B's One Hit Wonder Pistol.

name: Dead Island 2: Memories of Banoi Pack
summary: Featuring weapons, skills and perks that celebrate the original Dead Island game, the Memories of Banoi pack is an essential addition to any Zombie Slayer's arsenal.

name: Destiny 2: Legacy Collection
summary:
Embark on a cinematic story in an action-packed and thriving universe. The Legacy Collection 2024 unlocks access to over 50 Exotic rewards, the Strand subclass, as well as:

- Lightfall Standard Edition*
- The Witch Queen Standard Edition*
- Beyond Light Pack**
- Shadowkeep Pack**
- Forsaken Pack
- 30th Anniversary Pack
- Pit of Heresy Dungeon
- Shattered Throne Dungeon
- Grasp of Avarice Dungeon

*Dungeon Keys for Lightfall and The Witch Queen are sold separately
**The Beyond Light and Shadowkeep campaigns are open to all players in Destiny 2 and are not included in this pack

name: Devils Run
summary: An indie platformer and race to escape an imploding planet! Time your moves carefully..

name: Devil.., Heart and Possession
summary:
"If I had known this would happen, I would have killed you then, with my own hands."

Dangerous and mesmerizing demons have appeared before you in Hell after an unexplained death.

To escape Hell, you must steal their hearts!

"A kiss would be tempting, don't you think?"

With demons constantly coveting your body,
can you escape Hell in one piece?

name: Demon Slayer
summary: Demon Slayer - Set in the year 2075, when dark demons have invaded the world and threaten all of humanity. You will play the role of the leader of a group of killers, whose goal is to destroy demons and collect their analyzes to ensure the survival of humanity.

name: Detective School Club
summary: Welcome to the Detective Club! Led by the troublesome and shy president Alice Baskerville. Follow this comedy story where together you will solve cases using your deductive powers!

name: Delicious: Mansion Mystery
summary: Emily & Francois investigate the poisoning of a high-society party host

name: Demon Tides
summary: Explore the open seas and uncover the kingdom's dark secrets as you expressively platform your way across dozens of locales, upgrading your gear every step of the way!

name: Dead Blue Rose
summary: A multiplayer horror where you escape a laboratory at the cost of others.

name: Dead Zone Defense
summary: Destroy hordes of zombies in the company of friends or alone.In this dynamic shooter with a top view, you have to build a base, come up with strategies, improve your weapons and buildings. There is only one goal - to destroy them all.

name: Destiny Star Girlfriend 2
summary: Seiji’s “tied by fate” again, this time with a magical girl one year his senior! In part 2 of this rowdy rom-com VN series, a freak faceoff sees Seiji become Maja’s familiar—and bound by an enchanted tether to survive. Will proximity lead to love, or is he doomed to serve till the end of (his) days?

name: Devyat' princev Ambera
summary:
Devyat' princev Ambera is an adventure game based on Nine Princes in Amber (1970), the first novel from the Chronicles of Amber series by Roger Zelazny. It follows the adventures of Carl Corey, who wakes up in a hospital with amnesia, escapes and starts searching for answers. After a while he discovers his true identity, his mission and a fantasy world hidden from the eyes of mere mortals. A lot of work has to be done.

The gameplay is linear and consists of several loosely connected elements: a simple point-n-click adventure, a number of quick-time events and 9 stand-alone puzzles. The story is told through dialogs that follow the text of the novel closely. The game comes with 2D hand-drawn characters and pre-rendered backgrounds.

name: Deathwish Enforcers: Special Edition
summary: A gritty, non-stop blood bath from the creator of Insanity's Blade, Super Battle Princess Madelyn and the recently released GuardGrave. And a parody of beloved 60s and 70s classic action films, heroes and villains. Deathwish Enforcers... There's gonna be hell to pay!

name: Destiny Star Girlfriend 3
summary: Spring 2019—the first year of Reiwa—but even as Japan rings in a new era, nothing ever changes for Seiji and his sleepy student ways. Aside from the arrival of new hottie Maja, who joined his class in the winter, each month so far has proven to be as brain-numbingly dull as the last. Until...

name: Destiny 2: Echoes
summary: An aurora spreads across the stars, and from within its shimmering confines, a mysterious object materializes and falls to the surface of Nessus. Travel to the planet and begin your search for this object, known only as an Echo.

name: Denny's Atari Remix
summary:
A selection of popular Atari games with a Denny's theme.
Centipede becomes Centipup, Asteroids becomes Hashteroids and Break-Out becomes Take-Out.

name: Dead Station 2
summary:
Humanity has colonized the Moon and Mars. The search for extraterrestrial civilizations is among the main ideas of man. For the purpose of a more detailed study of space, as well as the search for other civilizations, research bases are being created. One such base, "TAU-9", was set up on Titan, Saturn's moon.

But one day, "TAU-9" stopped communicating. For this reason, a rescue shuttle was sent to Titan. But approaching the Titan, for some reason, the shuttle loses control...

name: Defendo
summary: A simulator of the handheld game of the same name.

name: Dead by Daylight: Dungeons & Dragons Edition
summary: New to The Fog? Check out Dead by Daylight: Dungeons & Dragons Edition, which includes the base game, the Dungeons and Dragons Chapter, and 2 Dungeons & Dragons Outfits: Baermar's Roadside Ambush and Vecna's Whispered One.

name: Dead War Rise of Zombies
summary: The zombie apocalypse, a reality that transcends the pages of the most terrifying nightmares, rises as an ominous threat. The social order, once solid and organized, dissolves into an unbridled collapse, giving way to a desperate struggle for survival.

name: Deadbeat Wizard
summary: Follow Garth and Pigeon as they discover and solve occult mysteries in this action-rpg shooter.

name: Devil Cult Party
summary:
Bring about the doom of mankind, and watch out for competitors!

Human sacrifices, studying the occult, selling merch, bringing back the dead and transforming cultists into demonic abominations is all part of the business. Get to work, the world won't end itself!

name: Decor Dream
summary: Decor Dream is a match-3 puzzle game where you solve puzzles to unlock furniture and redecorate clients’ homes. Choose items from a catalog and design rooms with different styles to complete makeovers.

name: Dead for Dread
summary: Dead for Dread is an exciting game in which you take on the role of a brave hero who goes into the dark labyrinths to retrieve a stolen artifact. Embark on a dangerous journey through mysterious dungeons full of mysteries and sinister creatures.

name: Department of Collections
summary: A tasked based procedural online co-op sci-fi horror game that can be played both casually or more hardcore

name: Deep Space Dapper Squad
summary: Are you Dapper enough for the perils of Deep Space? Join the elusive Dapper Fleet today!

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Season 5 - Drilling Deeper
summary:
Hello Miners, Welcome to SEASON 05 - DRILLING DEEPER!
Management’s got their sights set on mineral riches deeper down toward Hoxxes’ core, which means we’re increasing your depth of operations. You’re venturing down deeper than ever before, claiming unprecedented treasures for the company, and confronting all the lethal horrors that stand in your way.
In other words, it’s another great day at work.

name: Devil's Deal
summary: This game throws you into the shoes of a character struggling to survive in a corrupt ghetto overrun by gangs, mafia bosses, and crooked politicians. This is no ordinary RPG; Devil's Deal is designed for players who dare to delve into the heart of darkness and pay the price of their choices.

name: Demon Still Alive
summary: Demon still alive is a metroidvania with brutal action – platformer using skilled combat set in the nightmare world of Demons. Explore, upgrade your abilities , unleashed the power of fire and ice and executes the enemies that stands between you and your destiny.

name: Devil's Way
summary: A nightmare that starts with hallucinations in a forest where we don't know where... Demons that resemble familiar faces are after us. Is it real or a game of your mind? The game invites you to a challenging journey in the dark.

name: Deity's Domain
summary: Deity's Domain will be a god-like city builder strongly inspired by Black & White series, set in ancient Rome, in which you will have to compete with other deities to reach Olympus, during this journey you will be accompanied by your Creature, create your path and become what you want to be.

name: Detective AnnIntae: Missing Basketball Court
summary: Solve the disappearance of the basketball court with Detective Ann Intae of JooJoo City!

name: Demons
summary: Demons is a co-op horror card game for 1-4 players. An evil cult tries to unleash an ancient demon and all that stands between them and the apocalypse is you, your friends and a deck of cards.

name: Desktop Pals
summary: Desktop Pals is a simple 2D Game which allows you to share your desktop and interact with a cute cat! Scratch the cat when it is looking for love and hear it purr!

name: DeathJack
summary: Play Blackjack where the wager is your life. Do you have what it takes to beat the host? Let's find out...

name: Deep Cuts
summary: Genre-bending blend of messy physics, storytelling, and highly detailed worlds. A new chapter in the Scythe Saga Universe from the horror masterminds behind Happy's Humble Burger Farm!

name: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster
summary: Dead Rising returns with modern graphics! More than just a remaster, this Deluxe Remaster is a full graphical overhaul of the first game in zombie-slaughtering action game series "Dead Rising." This remaster has also been fully voiced, supports auto-saves, and has various other quality-of-life features. Witness the unmatched mayhem and freedom for yourself!

name: DeathRoll
summary: DeathRoll is a horror strategy game inspired by games such as Buckshot Roulette, Inscryption, and Balatro. Play as a damned soul that must save itself from the grips of the monsters in the underworld.

name: Deimos' Endless Pursuit of Becoming Deimos: Part One
summary: unsuccessful game poem attmepts

name: Dejig: McKnight Art Collection
summary: Dejig: McKnight Art Collection is a jigsaw game for the Sega Saturn released as part of the Dejig series.

name: Deltatraveler: Section 1
summary: In Ruins (or, alternatively, Section 1) is the first section of Deltatraveler, taking place in Undertale's Ruins.

name: Deltatraveler: Section 2
summary: Oh, Mother (or, alternatively, Section 2) is the second Section of Deltatraveler, taking place in Earthbound's world.

name: Deltatraveler: Section 3
summary: Hell's Forest (or, alternatively, Section 3) is the third Section of Deltatraveler, taking place in the world of GG!Underfell.

name: Death by Hype
summary:
Death by HYPE is a melee Boomer-Shooter focused on fast-paced combat. The game takes place in the middle of the HYPE virus pandemic, and you (as an essential worker) must attend your shift at the beloved restaurant chain KAFC (Karlos Frango Cozinha), to sustain the needs of never-ending HYPEhead shoppers. In an unfortunate-- but predictable turn of events, your coworker bites your hand, and with the imminent infection ready to take its toll, you decide to go out by fullfilling your lifelong dream: taking out your pent up frustration on all your HYPE-ified customers.

Punch, slice, and stab through the maze corridors of the mall. Enter the stores and find out what happened with the other employees and survive as long as you can in this arcade boomer-puncher experience.

name: Delve into Pawssion
summary:
Delve into Pawssion is a NSFW Adventure/RPG combined with mild Visual Novel mechanics, such as building up affection with characters, completing their quests, making choices that can alter some scenes, and rewards or reactions from characters.

This game is heavily based on rewarding the player with NSFW art.

name: Deltarune: Frozen Heart
summary: The end of the Snowgrave Route seen from another place. While Kris gets torn to pieces by a bootleg Mettaton NEO, Susie have to face Noelle, lost in the trance of the Thorn Ring, before she freezes her to death! And who knows, maybe the situation can get even worse than that?

name: DeckHex
summary: Dark Sci-fi Adventure

name: Der Zorn Gottes
summary: A map that takes place on an oil drilling platform.

name: Demolition
summary: Demolition is a very gory and explosive map. The level begins with Duke cruising on into town on his bike, crashing through gates and ploughing through bad guys all in nicely explosive fashion. Almost every street building you see in the beginning is susceptible to being blown up. Even your all your weapons now have explosive properties.

name: Dead by Daylight: Tomb Raider Chapter
summary: Dead by Daylight: Tomb Raider includes new Survivor Lara Croft, and 3 unique character Perks: Finesse, Hardened, & Specialist. Purchasing this add-on unlocks an exclusive Charm: Climbing Axe.

name: Destiny 2: Echoes - Act 2
summary: Destiny 2: Echoes continues with Act 2 which includes new story missions, the new "Echo Battlegrounds" activity, 50 more tiers of the Season Pass and more.

name: Destroy the World Bundle
summary: Farm and survive in Farm for your Life a zombie filled post-apocalyptic farming game or destroy the world yourself as Rack an alien demon in Rack N Ruin.

name: Dead Or Alive 5: Costume Catalog LR46
Deep Space 7
summary: This is an independent action shooting game with a third person horror atmosphere. Facing the terrifying monsters in the space station, you must overcome the shortage of supplies, solve numerous mysteries, and successfully escape danger

name: Deduce Together
summary: Players throw questions at an AI and deduce the correct answers in this competitive multiplayer game. Compete based on your accuracy rate. Have fun with friends while testing your deductive skills and aim to become the ultimate knowledge champion!

name: Der Weichensteller: Odyssey Live
summary: The internet is puzzled by a mysterious phenomenon: Posts are suddenly reappearing on the Instagram accounts of three deceased individuals. The only common denominator: all three died in accidents. The videos are cryptic, and no one can make sense of them. Therefore, the family of the deceased Wilson is asking for your help to get to the bottom of this case. In this murder mystery, you take on the role of Consulting Detectives Falkenberg.

name: Deja-Vu!
summary: A small 5-map episode for Quoth. Starts with base maps and ends in a Doom-like "hell bunker".

name: Deliver to When You Came
summary: Deliver the meal. Don't become one yourself. An open-ended puzzle platformer based around physics and AId

name: Desktop Farm: Expansion Pack
summary: This DLC includes more animals, crops and fences for everyone who likes this game. By buying this DLC you will support my projects.

name: Demon Attack
summary: The Intellivision version changes up the graphics and adds a boss that was not present in the original game.

name: Descendant
summary: Descendant is a 2D dungeon exploration game with roguelite elements and turn-based RPG combat. Controlling a team of 4 characters, the player explores a mysterious cave filled with dangerous enemies, mystical locations and unclaimed treasure.

name: Deathpuddle: Choose Violence?
summary: Enter the chaotic, not-so-superhero world of Deathpuddle: Choose Violence? Guide Deathpuddle through epic and absurd missions filled with dark humor, bizarre characters, and unpredictable outcomes. Can you help Deathpuddle survive and clear his name, or will he always end up back in jail?

name: Decipher the Deck
summary: Decipher The Deck is a rule discovery puzzle game that turns traditional playing cards into interesting puzzle mechanics. Discover the secrets of cards, their abilities, and much more in 70 hand-crafted levels.

name: Defenders
summary: Face endless waves of monsters in Defenders, a thrilling roguelike game. Use WASD to move and the mouse to attack, battling basic monsters, elites, and bosses. Level up your character after each wave to enhance your abilities and survive the onslaught.

name: Deep Inside
summary: Deep Inside is a first-person psychological horror game! You are a police officer who has to find out who is behind the most high-profile murders in the city. Use your detective skills to catch the killer, but remember that the truth can be bitter!

name: Deeplands
summary: Explore the Deeplands, an ancient underground world harboring the remnants of a lost civilization. Fight and parkour your way through destructible caves and dungeons, acquire mysterious powers and tools to grow stronger and recover the ancient dwarven crown in this open-cave roguelike platformer!

name: Defend 99
summary: DEFEND 99 is a rogue-lite tower defense game with deckbuilding and autochess elements. Place your turrets, roll for upgrades and balance your economy in the hope of defending your network of the elite from an array of digital attackers. Can you hold off all ninety nine waves?

name: Deliberate
summary: In this game, you're transported into a mystical forest brimming with the whimsical charm of cartoonish pixel art.

name: Death Sword Spirit
summary: In this mesmerizing gray brown game,

name: Deepest Trench
summary: Explore the hidden mystery of the Mariana Trench. An underwater local co-op game with immersive storytelling, stunning visuals, and dynamic gameplay, ‘Deepest Trench' offers an unforgettable adventure that challenges your skills and intellect.

name: Desert Racer
summary: Are you a good driver? A game to test your reaction speed. The player controls a car, the speed of which is gradually increasing. It is necessary to turn and collect gasoline cans in time.

name: Deep Space Survivor
summary: Survive massive amount of enemies in space in this top-down action auto-shooter.

name: Detective Sir Biscuit in Green Burguer Mystery
Deep Sea Hunter
summary: A game similar to flying aircraft, where players navigate submarines in the vast depths ocean, engaging in thrilling fishing expeditions and mysterious deep-sea explorations through meticulous strategy and flexible mouse control. Unparalleled in its exhilaration, come play for the ultimate rush!

name: Deadly Descent
summary: A co-op horror looting game about exploring luminal spaces, evading monsters, gathering valuable loot and selling it to meet the quota

name: Delta Strike
summary: Gear up, soldier, and prepare for the ultimate FPS showdown in Delta Strike!

name: Death Plunder
summary: Death Plunder is a 2D pixel platen survival game,You'll play as a mortal who risks everything for a treasure,Deep into the quarantined zombie island,plunder all kinds of loot and supplies To ensure survival.

name: Defend It!: Machinegun
summary: In this DLC, you will receive a new ally that will help you defend your base. And bonus, you will be able to shoot automatically.

name: Devil Road Run!
summary: Run away from the oncoming heroes! Create a path by placing blocks in the direction the Devil is going, and lead her to the goal by blocking the way of the heroes with monsters and blocks, so that the heroes will not catch up with her!

name: Destruction Simulator
summary: Destruction simulator is a demolition simulation game, where you take on the role of a construction worker. You are tasked with the destruction of multiple buildings, using your tools to fullfill your job.

name: Descent X
summary: Descent X is a top-down bullet shooter that focuses on maneuvering and prop stacking. In this cyberworld full of enemies, use your imagination and creativity to match a variety of combat styles and define a game experience that is uniquely yours!

name: Defender of Falyndor
summary: Defender OF Falyndor is a First-Person Tower Defense game in Virtual Reality! Take control of your character, towers, and much more to protect Falyndor from waves of invasions to become the ultimate Defender of Falyndor!

name: Depth Ascend
summary: Embark on an epic race for your survival, feeding on fish before time runs out. Unlock new levels as you dodge dangers and uncover the mysteries of the depths in Depth Ascend.

name: Destiny Encore
summary: A frenetic third-person shooter with roguelite elements and a large skill tree.

name: Deck Dash
summary: Create your deck, improve your cards by merging them, and defeat all your opponents. To be a survivor, don’t forget this; collect the best items you can find and upgrade them. Exciting duels await you on this island.

name: Devil In My House
summary: Shortly after Lucas leaves, he learns that his wife Ashley is missing. After receiving this information, he returns home to investigate and find out what happened at home.

name: Deep in The Mine
summary: In a fantastic universe, form a group of up to 5 dwarves. Choose a class then set off on an adventure in mines. Be careful, one of you will have become a monster, born to hunt you. Your goal is to extract materials there. Survive by working as a team but also using many gameplay features

name: Despondent
summary: Despondent is a first-person survival horror title. Play as Sedgewick, a young man tossed into a hellish fight for his life while trying to pick up the pieces of his past. Manage a debilitating sickness, hold on to what little hope is left, uncover a rancid plot and just maybe... make it out alive.

name: Demolish
summary: This game is a road racer where players drive a sports car down a challenging highway.

name: Debilitating Dream
summary: Debilitating Dream is a Yume Nikki Fangame developed for Dream Diary Jam 8. The game is an attempt to create a traditional YN experience with a different style.

name: Deltarune - Spamton Restitched
summary: a fan-made sequel to the Spamton Neo fight.

name: Derpy's Fun House
summary: This is a very short Point and Click Adventure where you try to find Items for Anon because he is the strongest who can help opening the Door to the outside

name: DeathGearX
summary: A thrilling online PVP battle game! Experience the Ultimate Mech and Tank Battles! Create unique mechs, tanks, and armed jeeps, and master diverse weapons with distinct advantages.

name: DevilConnection
summary: "Shall we do something immoral?" A demon-teasing adventure where you summon unique kemono and gather magical powers to restore the naughty demon "Debirun's" form!

name: Demon Lord: Clicker
summary: A Steam-Drop Clicker with real game mechanics in a high fantasy setting. Click for drops, then choose to combine them for stronger/rarer variants, equip them for power! Amass wealth and glory! Be the hero, assault the Demon Lord! (No fruit is harmed during gameplay)

name: Destroy All Letters
summary: Destroy All Letters is a challenging game where you practice typing. Each time you type, your goal is to hit and destroy as many letters as possible without looking at the keyboard. Improve your typing skills by solving speed and accuracy challenges to achieve the best result.

name: Destroyer For Windows
summary: A clone of Battleship made by Timberline Software for Windows 3.x. You take turns shooting shots at each other on a grid based map, hoping to hit and sink the enemy boats.

name: Descenders Next
summary: Grab your board and master the mountain! Descenders Next is the ultimate extreme sports game, with sprawling snowy peaks, winding dirt tracks, and tons of parks to conquer. Will you and your friends become the Next Ultimate Descenders?

name: Debrecen
summary: A city themed map, inspired by the hometown of HUNdebLeonidasX

name: Devil's Island
summary: Being held prisoner on Devil's Island you plan your escape.

name: Deadly Standards
summary: A community made Episode 1 replacement for Ultimate Doom. The only limit given was to use the stock IWAD resources (graphics, sounds). The exception being a new midi/soundtrack.

name: Deadly Standards 2
summary: A community made Episode 2 replacement for Ultimate Doom, sequel of the Deadly Standards. Again, the only limitation is to create a map for Doom using only the stock assets (graphics, sounds, etc.), with the only expection of new midi soundtrack.

name: Deadly Standards 3
summary: A community made Episode 3 replacement for Ultimate Doom, sequel of the highly acclaimed Deadly Standards episodes. This time things gets a little change from the previous two installments with a new sky, a black void patch, a reskin of the original monsters and a theme of a frightening horrors that are hiding in the depths of a mysterious void world....

name: Deadly Standards 4
summary: A community made Episode 4 replacement for Ultimate Doom, sequel of the highly acclaimed and cacoward runner-up Deadly Standards episodic series. This time the classic stock assets theme got a rough deviation to more new assets, taken mostly from Alpha Doom and Romero dump of unused assets, as well as some other sources like Doomer Boards: Earth Ends and Ghostbusters Doom. Fight a terrifying world of a hell (on Earth?) that you never experienced before! Behold, the horrors of bureaucracy in a corporate world where anonymous towns are dominated by brutalism!

name: Devils Adventure
summary: 2.5d Platformer where you control devil character. Mission to avoid traps and enemies and finish different levels and find skulls

name: Desire & Decorum: Book 1
summary: Desire & Decorum, Book 1 is the first book of the Desire & Decorum series. It is followed by Desire & Decorum, Book 2, and Desire & Decorum, Book 3.

name: Desire & Decorum: Book 2
summary: Desire & Decorum, Book 2 is the second book of the Desire & Decorum series. It succeeds its first book, Desire & Decorum, Book 1, and is followed by Desire & Decorum, Book 3.

name: Desire & Decorum: Book 3
summary: Desire & Decorum, Book 3 is the third and final book of the Desire & Decorum series. It succeeds its first two books, Desire & Decorum, Book 1, and Desire & Decorum, Book 2.

name: Desire & Decorum: First Winter
summary: Desire & Decorum: First Winter is a holiday special book of the Desire & Decorum series.

name: Defect
summary: DEFECT is a cyberpunk, squad-based, Immersive Shooter set in a dystopian world, where AI controls the city with fearsome police forces. They battle rogue gang factions in intense 4x4x4x4, multi-objective, multi-finale face-offs featuring futuristic weapons & tech.

name: Derma
summary: Short horror RPG

name: Death of the King
summary:
The King of Robots has been betrayed.

Caught off-guard, he finds himself trapped in his Mech. The Mech itself can probably last until help arrives -- but its overheating core can't. Use an army of robots running around the Mech to try and stabilize it!

name: De:Lithe Last Memories
summary: "De:Lithe Last Memories" is a Rogue-like RPG game.

name: Deadly Days: Roadtrip
summary:
Deadly Days: Roadtrip is an exciting action roguelite, that combines reverse bullet hell gameplay with strategic inventory management.

Start your road trip through the zombie apocalypse! Fight your way through, gain experience and collect items to assemble an epic inventory.

Craft more effective weapons and find out what items you can combine to withstand the ever-increasing waves of zombies.

name: Dead Cells: The End Is Near
summary: Dead Cells final new content update. It brings new mobs, weapons, mutations and biome effects all expanding on the curse mechanic, 40+ new head skins, almost 20 new legendary affixes, extra accessibility options and more.

name: Dead Detention (Rescribbled)
summary: Dead Detention is a scribbly interactive story about a nerdy teen turned dooms day survivor! Play as 15 year old Max as he tries to escape his high school during a deadly zombie pandemic! Will he and his new friends get to safety?!

name: DeMyth
summary: DeMyth is a short puzzle game inspired by Helltaker. In it, you Interact with cute demit girls to find your missing aunt in the Astral Realm.

name: Demon Guardian
summary:
Four girls and a newbie witch doctor explore their friend's haunted house. Although welcoming at first glance, the house shows its true colors when night falls...

Based on the ghosts and beliefs of Thai folklore, Demon Guardian is a visual novel with multiple endings, told from the perspective of Pim, a girl who attract spirits. She quickly drew the attention of the new transfer student, who seems to have a ton of these spirits under his control...

name: Death's Apprentice
summary: Death's Apprentice is a PC-Windows game. It's an Arcade Platformer with a linear progression through the stages.

name: DeLight: The Journey Home - Chapter 4
summary:
DeLight: The Journey Home - Chapter 4 is the fourth part of the five-part story.

Chapter 4, after leaving the shelter, Sammy and Deli finds themselves struggle to make the journey possible. They come to a post office who desperately in need of help making some deliveries. Sammy agrees to help in return for a car ride but what lies ahead may not be that simple...…

name: Destiny 2: Echoes - Act 3
summary: Confront the Conductor. Solve the mystery and put an end to the twisted machinations fighting for control of the Echoes.

name: Destiny Star Girlfriend 3
summary: In the final(?) route of this award-winning VN series, Seiji survives an attempt on his life by Kanoko, aka secret magical girl no. 3. The leads all point to a childhood tragedy and a certain deep-space Majin, so why him? And will Kanoko leave the dark side to save Seiji—and mankind—from herself?

name: Deltatraveler: Section 4
summary: Shining Savior (or, alternatively, Section 4) is the fourth Section of Deltatraveler, taking place in the world of The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past.

name: Dead Space: Flash
summary: 2D Flash fangame based off the Dead Space series.

name: Demonology: Incubus: Chapter 1
summary: an erotic interactive fiction series

name: Demonology: Incubus: Chapter 2
summary: an erotic interactive fiction series

name: Decathlon DX
summary:
You do it for yourself, your country... and the gold.
All of the individual athletic disciplines are yours - speed, strenght, stamina and the desire to win. But they will all have to come together as one, because you're about to participate in the most prestigious video sporting event in history: Decathlon DX.

name: Descending
summary:
An experimental game about operating drills and managing information.

Your new job takes you to the bottom of a giant pit, where the only thing to keep you company is an old one-way fax machine. Survive unrelenting underground storms and get back to the surface safely after finishing ten shifts.

name: Deflex V
summary: 'Deflex', aka, Deflex V is a port of Jeff Minter's title for the VIC-20. This game was released on the same cassette along with another Minter title 'Rox' by publisher DK'Tronics.

name: Defend Your Nuts
summary: A cute defense game starring a squirrel who must defend his acorns against waves of evil monsters! The game features many upgradeable items and weapons, half a dozen monsters, and a boss battle on stage 20!

name: Deflex
summary: Simple ball and deflector game with roots back in ancient prehistory.

name: Dex & Akane
summary: Immerse yourself in a dystopian world with these grim action-packed titles!

name: Deception Engine
summary: Upcoming heist-themed roguelike deckbuilder by the developers of Chrono Ark. It is said that it will feature a similar combat system, full combat visuals and permanent dungeon progression.

name: Dead Eye Deputy
summary: Be quick on the draw in this wild west shootout! Dead Eye Deputy is an old fashion wild west shoot out! Be quick on the draw, ride a horse, battle other outlaws and more.

name: Detariki Z
summary: Detariki Z is a “girl and jammer cooperative RPG”.

name: Dead Island 2: Neighborhood Watch
summary: Patch 6 will introduce all Dead Island 2 players to the Neighborhood Watch game mode, a new cooperative horde mode, in which players will have to work together against swarms of zombies, including a new way to strategize against the undead.

name: Debut Project: Cooking Cafe
summary:
As a new cafe employee, you’ll be taking orders and completing challenges on your journey to create recipes which will take social media by storm. Share pics of your cooking to get Likes and boost your cafe’s rating. See if your culinary creativity can earn a million followers for the cafe!

Create up to 80 different menu items in the cafe kitchen! Experience the joys of cooking though 13 minigames in which you’ll choose flavors, toppings, and more!

name: Deal or No Deal: Electronic Personald Hand Held Game
summary: Deal or No Deal: Electronic Personald Hand Held Game is a LCD game based on the original 2003-2013 Australian adaptation of Deal or No Deal.

name: Dead Or Alive 5: Costume Catalog LR49
Deadly Heart Gambit
summary: You only have 3 months left to live. Gamble for extra time in Alice-sama’s life-or-death game. Be careful — she wants to steal your heart.

name: Designed to Climb
summary: The mineshaft you were working in has started to flood with lava, time to make your escape! You'll have to use your massive robot to make your way up the mineshaft, but it wasn't really meant to be manned by a crew of just one... You need to keep all of its systems in working order if you're ever going to make it out.

name: Death Moon
summary: DEATH MOON is a murder mystery death game visual novel inspired by games like Danganropa. However, ironically, in this "death game", death itself is not permanent. Every time you die, you open your eyes at the start of the loop forever trapped in an endless game of death and misery.

name: Deadzone: Rogue
summary: Deadzone: Rogue is a roguelite first-person shooter set in deep space. Slay hordes of enemies, loot powerful gear, and customize your loadout during each unique run. Uncover fragments of your past as you piece together the truth behind your mission. Fight. Die. Revive. Repeat.

name: Dead or Alive
summary: Exclusive to the PlayStation version of the game is two additional characters.

name: Desktop Dodgeball 2
summary:
Throw, Dodge, Catch! Grab victory with all your might!
Engage in intense battles in this new and improved dodgeball game!

name: Deckception
summary: Deckception is a rouge-like deck builder with local co-op allowing for 1-2 players to conquer the endless floors. The game has one player using the keyboard which can control the cards in the game while the other player controls the mouse which can control the dice. How far can you make it?

name: Decidit
summary: Decidit is a fast FPS roguelike in which you must use all the arsenal and movement abilities at your disposal in order to progress in an unstable demonic maze. Be fast, precise but also strategic using all the demonic weapons and abilities collected on the way to create powerful synergies.

name: Devious Path
summary: You are trapped in an endless astral world. Keep a close eye on your surroundings to get out of the astral world.

name: Desert Dive
summary: Lift and drop Big Blue to launch his friend into the pool. Make five dives to win.

name: Detective Nekko
summary: Mystery adventure where no one dies. Use your “ability to see too much” to uncover an inconvenient truth.

name: Deep Space Armada
summary: Buy and equip spaceships, configure their combat behavior and defeat enemy fleets in Deep Space Armada, a tactical auto battler that tests your wits to outsmart the enemy.

name: Dead City
summary:
DEAD CITY is an incredibly thrilling, interactive chat story which cannot be told without your help. For Sam, you are the only contact outside of the evacuated area. Can YOU save Sam?
Live up to the trust placed in you and guide Sam through the post-apocalyptic chat text adventure game in real-time. Make your choices carefully, as they will have severe consequences on the story of the game.

name: Depth Loop
summary: A werewolf game set in a deep-sea lab, where the survival of humanity is at stake—does justice lie with humankind or the werewolves?

name: DeepCover
summary: In DeepCover, players solve a variety of fun and stimulating puzzles to outsmart evildoers, prevent scams, and save the day. Playing as an undercover agent, players are awarded more intel at every level they complete, used to outsmart scammers and help protect potential victims. Players are also able to customize their character, unlock new levels, play special training games, and learn additional info about real-life online scams and their impacts.

name: Deep Copy
summary: Deep Copy is a top down point-and-click literary adventure set in a hand-painted science fiction world. Awakened with no memory, you must solve puzzles and navigate a branching story to piece together the dense, interconnected mystery at the heart of the lab.

name: Depths of Faveg
summary: Fight your way through hordes of monsters, and try to reach the fabled treasure at the bottom of the dungeon of Faveg in this brutal Roguelike RPG. Can you train a party strong enough?

name: Dexter The Hamster
summary: Help Dexter chomp and shoot his way out of the deceptively oppressive Happy Hamster Farms in 6 personality packed platforming levels.

name: Decay of Opulence
summary: Survive the aftermath of a divine cataclysm in this 1-bit pixel art, turn-based horror RPG. Explore a rural town overrun by rival cults.

name: Devil's Drizzle
summary: An enchanting 2D pixel art platformer with an engaging story, starring a brave kid, their trusty umbrella, and Sumerian demons. It features a diverse range of mechanics and level designs, including action, adventure, horror, puzzle, and drama.

name: Deepolis
summary:
In Deepolis, the player takes on the role of under water admiral commanding a submarine in a three-dimensional underwater world, with the aim of completing quests and sinking other players and NePCs. As a result, the player collects experience points (EP) and advances upwards through the levels.

The game optionally supports player clans, both for PVP and PVE play.

name: Deceased.cable
summary: Single map for Boom format made as a tribute to dead.wire by Xaser.

name: Detective of the Dead
summary: In this narrative noir adventure game you are a detective in the colorful Mexican underworld and must prevent a conspiracy to ruin the classic Día de los Muertos forever. Investigate & use your wit to solve many cases, puzzles, mini-games. Your trusted magic companion dog Xolo is there to help!

name: Deep Crafter
summary: As a specially trained explorer in "Deep Crafter", you'll gather resources, design production lines, automate everything, and explore this vast, ocean-covered planet to uncover its secrets.

name: Deadbeat
summary: Make your voice heard in this isometric Action-RPG where quick thinking and patience guide the way to victory. In a hazy Hereafter that's not heaven or hell, fight bizarre demons, call your friends, and explore the deepest reaches of death.

name: Dead or Alive Ultimate
summary: Dead or Alive Ultimate features the original SEGA Saturn version of Dead or Alive as well as a totally redesigned Dead or Alive 2 along with more costumes and more features including the addition of Live! support so the player can take their fight online.

name: Deltatale
summary: Have you ever wondered what would happen if Kris fell into the Underground instead of Frisk? Introducing DELTATALE, an alternate world where just that happens! This mod is aimed at players that have played Undertale, Deltarune, or UT Yellow and are looking for a new experience that implements lore and various upgrades from these games!

name: Devilition
summary: Build and detonate chain reactions to drive the demon horde out of town!

name: Dead Cart
summary: The fall was pretty bad. Your leg is definitely broken, but at least you escaped those things. And you've still got your gun. You've made it to the car park; there's a security guard's cart in the corner with the keys still in the ignition. You crawl into the seat and start it up. Now you can move faster, and hopefully escape.

name: deathwish
summary: A melancholic tale set in a forest and you don't remember who you are. It comes with 5k words, 4 animated endings, and an endless love story.

name: Devil Mail
summary:
Devil Mail is a short 3D platform adventure created in fancade. You must find a way to access the castle and deliver an important message to the king, a message from a very far away place...
It can be played directly in the fancade app, or from itch.io

name: Defend Him, Not Me!
summary: A comedy Ace Attorney fan case, named after "Kiss Him, Not Me"

name: Dear Edwin
summary: A woman's death has sparked intrigue in a small, derelict city district. Follow a young detective as he unravels a mystery that runs deeper than he might have known, and help him to make decisions that will alter the course of the story for better or for worse.

name: Deckarium
summary: A deck-building pet simulator. Play pet cards to populate your terrarium or aquarium, be on the lookout for card-packs to expand your deck, keep your creatures fed to collect coins, and use them to buy more pets! But look out for ghosts! They hunger for the souls of your pets.

name: Deep Space Cache
summary: Deep Space Cache is a short & simple semi-idle game about mining asteroids for resources and converting them into valuable bits for upgrades.

name: Defense Breakers
summary: A roguelike tower defense game. Pick your players, collect treasures, and break through the enemy's heavy barriers. Each expedition brings a new experience.

name: Deepest Dungeons
summary: Venture into the ever-shifting labyrinth of Deepest Dungeons, a rogue-like with extraction elements. Explore a maze that changes with each attempt, battle enemies, avoid deadly traps and collect gear. Survive long enough to reach deeper levels, or escape with your belongings and try a new descend.

name: Destiny 2: Revenant
summary: Fikrul the Fanatic has re-emerged, possessing a powerful Echo and an army of undead Scorn at his command. Guardians will become Slayer Barons and upgrade their abilities with powerful tonics to confront the Scorn’s corrupted ether.

name: Deeplanders
summary: DEEPLANDERS is a relaxing, minimalist strategic building game where you must satisfy the needs of the Deeplanders to populate the depths. Explore, build, and decorate your own underground kingdom... and when you're ready, embark on a journey to new, unexplored depths!

name: Defense Golem
summary: Defense Golem is a tower defense game that supports random evolution.

name: Demon Hunt
summary: Demon Hunt is a rogue-lite top down shooter set in cursed lands overrun by demons, featuring intense boss fights and evolving weapons. Discover powerful artifacts, loot unique items and create outrageous synergies. Spend collected resources at your base to upgrade and unlock new ways of playing.

name: Demonology: Incubus - Chapter 5
summary: an erotic interactive fiction series

name: Deal or No Deal: DVD Game
summary: An interactive DVD game based on the UK version of Deal or No Deal.

name: Destiny: Rising
summary: Enter an era of heroes and legends set within the rich tapestry of the Destiny Universe, where you will meet both familiar faces and intriguing new characters. Experience top-tier sci-fi shooting action in the franchise’s first mobile game as you embark on a new adventure in an alternate Destiny timeline. Play as these unique characters to defend future Earth and reclaim humanity's future!

name: Deads On The Road: Shoot Zombie Hunting 2024
summary:
Survive the zombie apocalypse in "Deads on the Road"!
Scavenge for supplies, battle hordes of the undead, and uncover hidden secrets.

name: Delta
summary: ∆ is an atmospheric exploration experience that takes you on a journey through the dream world into the Beyond.

name: Decksplorers: Into the Shell
summary: Dive into the world of Decksplorers: Into the Shell, where deckbuilding card combat meets real-time action in a thrilling roguelite adventure! Master the art of strategic card play, swift reflexes, and exploration as you venture into the mysterious ever-changing caves of "The shell"

name: Demon Hunter: Shadow World
summary: Demon hunter is an action-packed dark fantasy hack and slash game with an incredible combat system and awesome boss fights, assisted by a one of a kind character control mechanism and a perfect mix of RPG elements to make your adventure super immersive.

name: Deepest Depth
summary: uncover the deepest secrets of the ocean and go into a sea hole to see with your very own eyes what lies in the deepest depths

name: Dead Island 2: Ultimate Edition
summary:
The Ultimate Edition contains the Dead Island 2 base game, plunging you into the heart of Hell-A, with intense zombie-slaying action, along with both epic story expansions: Haus and SoLA.

Unleash a new level of carnage with special weapons and stylish gear. Included in the Ultimate Edition you’ll find: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II pack, Memories of Banoi Pack, Golden Weapons Pack, Pulp Weapons Pack, Red’s Demise Pack, and each Slayer’s Premium Skin Pack.

name: Death Note: Killer Within
summary: Death Note: Killer Within is an online social deduction game for up to 10 players. Players will be split into two teams with different objectives. To win the game, players will need to figure out each other’s identities and either eliminate L who threatens Kira's power or seize the Death Note.

name: Destiny 2: Revenant - Act 3
summary: Fikrul’s forces await in the depths of his Revenant fortress. Gather your allies, Guardian, for a new Kell will be crowned.

name: Destiny 2: Revenant - Act 2
summary: Guardians will raid the Tomb of Elders to rescue Eliksni prisoners and stop Fikrul’s plan to add powerful enemies of the past to his Revenant army.

name: Deep Snow Delivery
summary:
Humanity is on the brink of extinction due to a self-inflicted ice age. Navigate the frozen wastes in an ancient WW2 tank fitted with a storage bucket and claw arm. Collect and sell junk, make deliveries between underground settlements, navigate mountainous terrain, and buy upgrades to make your job easier.

Thousands like you have tried and failed to undo humanity’s mistakes. Will your story be different?

name: Delirium
summary: Delirium is a psychological horror game set in a suburban house. After a mysterious explosion, reality begins to unravel.

name: Deep Despair 3
summary: Deep Despair 3 is an open-world survival action-adventure with RPG elements! Fight, survive, dig, build, explore vast worlds, engage in farming, breed animals, gather resources, and level up to the max!

name: Desert Mercenary Corps
summary: Welcome to Desert Mercenaries, a role-playing adventure game set in the desert. In the vast and barren Monchi Desert, you will form your own team and explore the unknown desert mysteries. Let your team win the respect and recognition of the entire Monchi Desert.

name: Departed
summary: Departed is an anomaly detection game, where you are stuck inside a looping subway system. Explore the station carefully and spot the differences. Nine consecutive correct decisions will bring you closer to your goal. Can you make your way through the endless platforms or will you get lost forever?

name: Delve Diver
summary: Fall-down platformer with Auto-generated stages. Obtain items to help your journey - but beware, you should only bring what you can lose.

name: Depths of Endor
summary: Classic, turn-based dungeon crawler RPG. A retro-styled adventure that combines the best elements of old-school role-playing games with modern features of a roguelike.

name: Dead Ascend
summary: A 2D point'n'click-like adventure game written in Qt/QML and Javascript

name: Deep Lake Mall
summary: A small town mall has a big secret.

name: Deck of Haunts
summary: Deck of Haunts invites you to become a malevolent Haunted House. Lure humans into your cursed halls, manipulate their fears, and drain their essence to grow your power. Use strategy to build your mansion and expand your dark influence, turning your home into a terrifying, inescapable nightmare.

name: Deathbound: Accepted by Death
summary: Enter the mysterious liminal space between Life and Death a floating rock in the void. In this epic DLC you must release the great essences of the 5 bosses representing five stages of grief – Denial, Anger, Bargaining, Depression and Acceptance – before unlocking Path to Death for the final showdown with Grief – The Purifier – the mightiest of them all.

name: Defend Earth: Xenos Survivors
summary: You are Earth's last line of defense in a relentless alien invasion. Experience intense top-down roguelite action across diverse landscapes, fighting invaders with a versatile arsenal. Outsmart, outgun, and survive your foes. Every run increases the challenge - so adapt, evolve, dominate!

name: Death to Venice
summary:
Take part in a collective rite of putrefaction.

In a wounded world, you're dying. Venice - frail, alien, abandoned - welcomes you in your last moments.

Experience memories of death in Venice's past through six game poems across the city's sestiere districts: a death of biodiversity, a death of institutions, of community... then ponder your feelings on endings and change, talk it out with the city herself. It's all either of you has left.

Venice and its lagoon are dying. This game is for them, and for the Venetians who resist.

name: Delved
summary: A platformer for the Playdate!

name: Devils on the Moon Pinball
summary: Themed on the astrologically Occult, Devils on the Moon is a Single board VG-Pinball Heavily inspired by all the great Pinball games of the past and some modern ones as well.

name: Dead Abyss
summary: A short first-person horror experience that places you in the rusted out hull of a mysteriously abandoned shipwreck. Search for clues, solve puzzles, and uncover the mystery of the wreckage, but beware of the evil that lurks within.

name: Designed for Danger
summary: Designed for Danger is a story-driven Portal 2 campaign (PTI map series). It consists of eight levels that provide players with one to two hours of playtime. It mixes regular puzzle chambers with story moments and exploration sections.

name: Dead Dock Protocol
summary:
A neon-bloody action cyberpunk zombie shooter from Game Studio 1979.

Introducing Dead Dock Protocol, a thrilling cyberpunk zombie shooter packed with intense, neon-blood-soaked action! Embark on a crucial mission to rescue six besieged city zones from the clutches of Zombots and their formidable bosses. Whether you fight alongside your team or venture alone, your objective is to stay alive and eradicate the hordes of Zombots.

name: Deadly Connection
summary: Death in the VR world means death in reality... Are you brave enough to play?

name: Destino Indomable
summary: In Destino Indomable, you're the new actress tasked with playing the main character in a telenovela! This is a wild visual novel inspired by the craziest Latin soup operas, filled with humor, drama, romance, horses, handsome men, Spanglish and slaps!

name: Deathmatch Classics Vol. 1
summary:
Episode consisting of seven classic deathmatch maps converted for single player (with speedrunning in mind):

dmc1m1 : basewalk (basewalk) by Preacher
dmc1m2 : Acrophobia (dm7) by (maybe) American McGee
dmc1m3 : Bloodrun (ztndm3) by ZTN
dmc1m4 : DeutschMaschine (cmt3) by Gandhi
dmc1m5 : Domination (p3a) by Pingu
dmc1m6 : #endif (endif) by Yataze
dmc1m7 : Lost Entrance to the Dismal Oubliette (e2m10) by John Romero

name: Deathmatch Classics Vol. 2
summary:
Episode consisting of five classic deathmatch maps converted for single player (with speedrunning in mind):
