dmc2m1 : Deadalus Revisited (imp1dm6) by Biff Debris
dmc2m2 : Slipstream (slip) by Inertia
dmc2m3 : Black Rain (evdm1) by Evan Wagner
dmc2m4 : The Killing Jar (kdmj) by Kell
dmc2m5 : Void Runner (kdmv) by Kell

name: Deathmatch Classics Vol. 3
summary:
Eight small deathmatch levels by various authors converted into an action-packed single player episode. Comes with a start map and a secret level.

dmc3 : Deathmatch Classics Vol.3 by negke
dmc3m1 : Orange Whip (lundm1) by Lunaran
dmc3m2 : Zeal & Fury (spirit1dm3) by spirit
dmc3m3 : Deep Scars (q1shw2) by ShadoW
dmc3m4 : Aghast (aghast) by Vondur
dmc3m5 : Devastation (q1shw1) by ShadoW
dmc3m6 : Dark Ritual (ritual) by Tyrann
dmc3m7 : /me Votes Vondur For World Domination (rpgdm1) by R.P.G.
dmc3m8 : Base Of Two Deaths (negdm1) by negke

name: Deathmatch Remix
summary: Eight deathmatch levels remixed for single player, most of them based on the stock DM maps. They run on the SMP mod (included) and come with two skyboxes plus a music track.

name: Demon Slayer
summary: Dragon Slayer is a classic browser MMORPG that immerses players in a sprawling, medieval fantasy world filled with epic quests, deep lore, townbuilding and intense PvP action. Set in a war-torn land where the forces of light and darkness battle for dominance, players assume the role of a hero destined to shape the outcome of the ongoing conflict.

name: Delicious: Emily's Big Surprise
summary: Enjoy this surprisingly cute mini-game from the famous Delicious series! Hilarious chaos ensues in Snuggford as Emily plans a big surprise for Patrick. But Patrick thinks he's on to her and starts to prepare a surprise of his own. Meanwhile Francois is freaking out because he's terrible at keeping secrets. And what’s up with Snuggy the cat?

name: Destination
summary: Use your brainpower and focus to solve anti-stress levels while enjoying a relaxing and hypnotizing experience when you find the solution. Destination is a game where you need to drive a ball to its destination, but by following certain strict rules.

name: Deliverance
summary: Deliverance is a remake for Deliverance: Stormlord II.

name: Delicious Date
summary: Can you (socially) survive your first date with a really cute and hungry guy?

name: Death By Chatter
summary: A 2D platformer rage game developed by Youtuber PinoPrime that is directly affected by your Twitch chat. Try to get to the top as your own chat sabotages you along the way! (Disclaimer: Game may cause rage even for epic gamers like me)

name: Detail Hunter
summary: Can you spot every detail? Step into the challenge with Detail Hunter!

name: Deliverance
summary: Deliverance puts you in the role of a delivery driver on a routine night shift. But when one last delivery leads to a shocking twist, you’re trapped in a nightmare. Navigate dark corridors, find hidden objects, and uncover a sinister mystery as you fight to escape.

name: Defend Your Flaahgra
summary: Reinterpreting the events in Metroid Prime's Sunchamber, Defend Your Flaahgra tells the tragic tale of a mutant flower's fight for survival in its own home. Using simple mouse controls, you must wield a diverse array of attacks and upgrades to resist the incoming legions of creatures and unleash the true power of the mighty Flaahgra!

name: Deadcam
summary: DEADCAM is a 80's and 90's inspired psychological survival horror game based around found footage presented as "recordings". These recordings serve as a collection of short, self-contained experiences, each set in their own location featuring unique entities, monsters and creatures.

name: Desperate 1: After Sunset
summary: The first work of the "Desperate" series - After Sunset, it’s a horizontal 2D action game with hand-painted, and using a new keyboard operation, you can feel a more intuitive combat experience in this game. Fight for the thing you loved in your life in every street you pass by！

name: Demon Alive
summary: Enter the ancient forest ruled by cursed demons. Your mission: Find the hidden chalices. But beware – the demons use these chalices to teleport you to eerie, dangerous places!

name: Demon Compass
summary: Demon Compass is a third person horror adventure game focused on exploration, light puzzle solving and abstract narration. Navigate through three separate story lines, each with distinct characters, environments, and challenges.

name: Deep Horrors of Fishing
summary: "Deep Horrors of Fishing" is a fishing game that involves catching monstrous creatures that are lurking beneath. Armed with a fishing rod, bait, and a fragile boat, players must fish up everything in the deep. Players will encounter grotesque fish with their own rarity and items. Will you dare reel these up?

name: Deadly Danger Dungeon
summary:
The first "Board James" inspired computer game.

Mario has ventured into the elaborate and infamous "Deadly Danger Dungeon"! A place of unspeakable peril and glorious treasures! Take control of him and lead him through the ever-changing trail to collect grand wealth while avoiding all sorts of swift and, of course, deadly traps hidden throughout the dungeon. Only those with great skill and luck will make it through.

The game is a simple, single-player, platformer, high-scoring game.

name: Deep Dead
summary: Dive into a kilometer deep cave to find riches, lost technology and unnamed artifacts, but watch out, for "IT" slumbers in the forgotten depths. The game is a rogue-light slightly inspired by Spelunky where you have to reach the bottom to unlock upgrades, that is if the teeth in the dark will let you escape...

name: Dead Space Nokia
summary: Dead Space demake for the Nokia! Experience the classic action survival horror through a tiny, mono-audio, 2 colored screen!

name: Deserter
summary: In this stealth RPG, you play as a deserter who is forced to become a thief in a grim, war-torn town. You'll have access to a rich arsenal of tools and devices: from lock picks and crowbars to grappling hooks and dynamite. Additionally, take advantage of your surroundings: find or create alternate routes, stick to the shadows, stay quiet, or use loud noises to cause distraction.

name: Deities Flush
summary: This is a card-building game, where users build decks to pass levels.

name: Deepest Fear
summary: DEEPEST FEAR is a sci-fi horror FPS with a retro-future aesthetic. Deep beneath the ocean, a long dormant secret has been unearthed which throws mankind’s future into jeopardy.

name: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster: Special Edition
summary:
Say cheese! Everyone’s favorite zombie-hunting photojournalist, Frank West, is back in action with the beautifully remastered Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster. Reanimated from the ground up with Capcom’s RE ENGINE, Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster is the definitive remaster of the 2006 classic Dead Rising, which delivered a fresh take on the zombie genre with incredible action, over-the-top combat, hordes of weapon choices, wacky costumes (trust us, they’re even wackier this time around), and a comedic yet compelling storyline

Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster introduces freelance photojournalist Frank West as he ventures to Willamette, Colorado after overhearing there is something going on in town. Frank soon finds out he is in the middle of a zombie takeover and has 72 hours to uncover the truth about this outbreak!

name: Detective Beebo: Night at the Mansion
summary:
Detective Oliver Beebo has been invited to a party by an ex-rich man in the middle of nowhere. Snacks included.

Unravel the mystery of the party, the guests, the house and the strange phenomena causing you to forget... something important? Surely it won't affect your love life.

name: Defensurvivor
summary: DEFENSURVIVOR is a strategy game where you build obstacles and place and move units to block zombies. There are various units with unique characteristics and powerful high-level units that can be obtained through combination. Use randomly given units to survive until the end!

name: Decoration Rush
summary: Run and decorate! What could be stranger and more fun?

name: Deepy
summary: Deepy is an underwater complex built to house a maximum-security prison, where the most dangerous inmates on earth are forced to work extracting gold from the seabed.Your task? Fight, help survivors, search for objects and solve puzzles all to survive, escape and reach the surface.

name: Devil Slayer: Raksasi 2
summary: "Devil Slayer - Raksasi 2" is a top-down, action, role-playing game. The game offers four major professions with over a dozen growth directions, more than one hundred weapons, and a rich array of special abilities. Countless powerful enemies lie ahead, and the shattered world needs you to repair it.

name: Desktop Survivors 98
summary: Desktop Survivors 98 is a chaotic roguelite dungeon crawler that unfolds right on your Desktop. Take control of your cursor as you explore new rooms, battle relentless waves of enemies, and collect powerful new weapons.

name: Deprision
summary: Deprision is a psychological horror game that delivers an immersive and terrifying AAA experience. Survive human madness, amnesia's power, and navigate parallel worlds via a deadly virus. Solve your world's problem, survive, prevent more deaths, and escape before it's too late.

name: Dead By Daylight: Doomed Course
summary:
CHAPTER 34: Doomed Course is the thirty-fourth Chapter DLC for Dead by Daylight.
This DLC features the following content: 1 Original Survivor: Taurie Cain, 1 Original Killer: The Houndmaster. The Chapter will release without an accompanying new Map.

name: Detective Mikami
summary: The outbreak has hit the entire world like a truck. Yet, in some respects, the infestation of the population has affected Mikami and Hirano the most. That is because the two of them are so unlike one another yet they are stuck together, trying to live through this new, dangerous world.

name: Decending Horror
summary: Find your self in a long lost place with not a sane sentence spoken.

name: Dead Streets: Zombie Blitz
summary: Dive into the adrenaline-pumping action of Dead Streets: Zombie Blitz, where the fate of the city rests in your hands! This action-packed shooter throws you into a city overrun by the undead, transforming every corner into a battle for survival.

name: Denbora
summary: Leap through time in Denbora, a darkly humorous 3D puzzle game. Navigate intricate puzzles and unravel the cyclical nature of the labor market, guided by a sarcastically witty AI. Each decision echoes through past and future!

name: Decline
summary: This game transports players into a mysterious dark world, where they play as a red strawberry bear.

name: Dead, Too Dead
summary: Dead, too dead is an open-world survival game where an ordinary person from the 21st century is summoned to a fantasy world on the brink of apocalypse. Use any means necessary to survive in this world. Just remember one thing: you are not a legend. You are just an ordinary person.

name: Delivery Point Simulator
summary: Welcome to "Delivery Point Simulator"!Manage a parcel pickup point: receive and deliver packages, improve infrastructure, purchase licenses for new products, manage transportation, and invest money in the bank. Become a leader in the logistics industry!

name: Desert of Ash: a Post-Apocalyptic Gay Sex Simulator
summary: The world has burnt to ash. Wander the wasteland, scavenge and trade for vital supplies, hook up with over a dozen hot guys, develop relationships—however fleeting—and decide how you want to live in this new world.

name: Depth-Blind
summary:
It's the year 59,341, and you, multihyphenate Captain Mari, have been dispatched to the underwater depths of a planet on the Outer Rim of the galaxy, following a violently disastrous previous expedition. You're not alone though - your companion Ana is always supporting and supervising you via a camera drone.

With a variety of weapons and Ana by your side, shoot your way through waves of alien creatures in Depth-Blind!

name: Deltarune: A Different Snowgrave
summary: A Deltarune Fan-Game containing creative, difficult battle based on the "Snowgrave" route from Deltarune Chapter 2, as well as several unlockable achievements!

name: Deadly Rehearsal
summary: The rehearsal must be flawless. Every sound, every light timed perfectly. You are one of the best stage manager's after all. Failure is not an option. The play is cursed... and it demands perfection.

name: Dequivsia
summary: Dequivsia is a puzzle game developed by Nishikigatsuo in which you navigate to a maze-like structure and collect keys. Some rooms are holes, and entering them costs a life. Each room has an hint of how many solid rooms are around, needing a minesweeper-like strategy for navigating the maze.

name: Destiny 2: Revenant Silver Bundle
summary: Purchase the Destiny 2: Revenant Silver Bundle and receive the Deal With It Legendary emote along with 1,700 Silver (1,000 + 700 bonus Silver) which you can use to purchase Revenant, cosmetics, and more!

name: Deck the Underhalls
summary: 34 festive Underhalls tributes in MBF21 format. Explore endless underground tunnels, collect more super shotguns than you'll ever know what to do with﻿, an﻿d marve﻿l at the shotgunners stuck in ﻿the walls!﻿

name: Dead Christmas
summary: Step into the boots of Santa Claus himself, facing a nightmare like no other. A peaceful North Pole is thrown into disarray when an alien spacecraft crashes near Santa's village, unleashing a deadly virus that infects his loyal elves.

name: Dead Heat Unleashed
summary:
The sequel to the 2010 arcade hit, “Dead Heat Unleashed” is an intense new racing game with four new courses, new cars, and an attractive LED lit cabinet that responds to the game, changing lighting patterns during gameplay. Link up to four cabinets to challenge players head-to-head in tight races that are sure to be a dead heat every time! Players charge their ULTIMATE HEAT gauge through aggressive racing and crowding their rivals.

Once they unleash their ULTIMATE HEAT, players can blast ahead of the competition and propel towards the finish line. Like its predecessor, “Dead Heat Unleashed” features a camera above the screen that allows the player to take a photo before the race. This helps players quickly identify their competition and know exactly who they are battling with for the first-place title.

Choose from one of ten different licenced cars (with all new colour variants) and drive through eight realistic courses depicting famous locations from around the world. Unleash your ultimate driving experience today!

name: Destination: The Planet
summary: Welcome to Destination: The Planet, a 3D collect-a-thon platformer all about exploring weird little worlds! Once a lost game for the DreamSoft console, now playable on your computer!

name: Dead Rush
summary: DEAD RUSH - This is a dynamic first-person shooter in which you must confront hordes of hungry zombies! There's no convoluted plot, side quests and a large open world. Here you will find only concentrated action. The only thing you will be doing in this game is shooting at the crowd of reanimated dead. Explore the location, find the most powerful gun and destroy ten waves of zombies before they reach you!

name: Debug Deadline
summary: The main character is hired as a debugger at the game company “Dokidoki Games”! With a time limit of one week, will he be able to find the bug safely? The debugging work with fate on the line begins now!

name: Dead Estate Classic
summary: Cornered with nowhere else to turn, can you escape the monster-filled mansion?

name: Deficit
summary: You are a corporate espionage freelancer. Your latest assignment: steal the reality-shifting Interpolator from the sprawling research labs of Project Sidereal. Use the device to escape the grueling defensive layers of Hadrian's Wall and cross the threshold into the strangest frontiers of reality.

name: Demon Dust
summary: Demon Dust is a Survival Horror Dungeon Crawler with a unique, mouse driven interface. Scavenge the depths of concrete and metal while rationing supplies to stay alive.

name: Desierto
summary: This is a game about getting lost.

name: Dermimi's!
summary:
Welcome to Dermimi's - you're speaking to Mimi! ♡

A cute game with cute girls.. what could go wrong?

name: Dekiai Heart Candy Kun.
summary: This is the otome game that you can experience living together with a slightly twisted boyfriend.

name: Decocraft
summary: Decocraft is a Minecraft mod that masterfully weaves a tapestry of cozy charm into your adventures. As its name implies, this mod is a testament to the art of decorating, adding a rich tapestry of new, inviting items and objects that will transform your in-game world into a cozy haven.

name: Desmond's Castle
summary:
The vampire Desmond woke up from his long sleep and attacked the villagers of Burnsley.

A knight sent by the realm, will go to the vampire's dwelling to settle this matter.

From room to room, he will have to face the enemies and take the different secret passages of the castle to be able to face the terrible Desmond!

name: Deadstar: The Game
summary: Flappy Bird clone with Smokepurpp's head as the character. Was used to promote his debut mixtape "Deadstar" and also featured some unreleased songs within it.

name: Death Howl
summary: Journey through the sorrowful spirit world in a soulslike deck builder. Craft cards and claim powerful totems to defeat the woeful spirits lurking in the mystical lands. Unravel the tale of a grieving mother in her desperate attempt to defy death and bring back her son.

name: Decade
summary: Explore an alternate past. Discover how its ideas develop, distort, and disappear. Seed new movements, destroy others. Subvert the rise and fall of empires, art, ideologies, and individuals in this narrative adventure game.

name: Delta Force: Season 1 - Genesis
summary:
Delta Force: Season 1 – Genesis is the thrilling first chapter in the revival of the legendary tactical shooter series. Released in December 2024, this season sets the tone for a gripping episodic experience that combines cutting-edge technology with the strategic gameplay that made the franchise iconic.

In Season 1: Genesis, players step into the boots of an elite Delta Force operator tasked with counter-terrorism and high-stakes covert operations across the globe. From desert encampments to urban strongholds and icy tundras, every mission presents unique challenges that test your tactical prowess, decision-making, and combat skills.

name: Destination Paradise: Collector's Edition
summary: "Destination Paradise" is a hidden object game that takes players through 20 chapters, each set in different global locations. Every chapter contains three unique scenes, offering a range of challenges. The game includes various puzzle types such as jigsaw puzzles, tile-swapping, and tile-rotation. Players will also complete tasks like finding listed objects, unscrambling letters to form words, and solving riddles in an optional bonus mode.

name: Dedalo
summary: Uncover the secrets of a frozen world. Explore ancient Arctic ruins, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover the power of a lost artifact.

name: Defender of the Crown
summary: NES port of Defender of the Crown. The Age of Chivalry! A time of lusty wenches and black hearted villains. King Richard has been murdered and England is thrown into civil war! Amidst the ringing clash of steel and the thunder of charging steeds the bold Saxon knights have chosen you to lead them into battle against the hated Normans. Victory will not come easy. To save England your skills as swordsman and military leader will be severely tested. But should you succeed you’ll win the Crown of England and the love of many a beautiful damsel!

name: Deep Space Delivery
summary: Deep Space Delivery is a fantasy space ship builder. You are the captain of a small vessel, eager of growing your ship while you are traversing the deep, unknown edges of space.

name: Deputy Arsh
summary: Deputy Arsh is a simple monochrome endless runner game for the Atari ST. It was written in C/68000 ASM, with the goal of using no operating system features (aside from the supervisor toggle to access restricted memory). Everything in Deputy Arsh was written from scratch, including the raster library, sound generation library, custom interrupt vectors, and keyboard/mouse drivers.

name: Deltafall
summary:
Deltafall is a Deltarune AU where the original trio discovers that their school was built after a science facility that conducts dangerous experiments with the dark world.

In 1977. A top secret corporation has found a way to harness the power of dark worlds to create any worlds they wanted. IDEATION INC has one goal. To create the perfect world. For all lifeforms. Not bound by reality. But bound by imagination.

name: Deltamon
summary: Explore the vast region that Kris calls home as you aid them in becoming champion! Your rivals Susie, Noelle and Berdly join alongside you to see and catch over 200+ pokémon from Kanto to Paldea!

name: Deltarune: Hypothesis
summary: A Deltarune fangame featuring a collection of hypothetical scenarios, each imagined as a fully playable segment of gameplay. Discover the hidden mysteries that connect these scenarios as you dive into each one, unraveling an existential truth about you and every adventure you’ve been on so far.

name: Desktoptale
summary: Desktoptale is a tiny program that puts a fully controllable Undertale, Undertale Yellow or Deltarune character of your choice on your Windows desktop!

name: Depper Jar
summary: Depper Jar is a turn-based RPG with fast QTE-based battles and different game modes inspired by Mario & Luigi and Undertale.

name: Deltaruined
summary: Deltaruined is a mod of DELTARUNE, the Toby Fox's lastest game to the date. This mod includes both chapter 1 and 2. Enjoy Completely new battles! New Cutscenes! (original cutscenes reworked too!), new mechanics and a lot of unused content restored!

name: Deltarune: The Upper Hand
summary: Dive into the capitalist utopia of New Yolk and engage in the short story of Sockswald. Building up to the climactic fist-clenching bossfight against HANDROMEDA.

name: DevTycoon
summary: DevTycoon is a software development business simulation with a charming pixel art style, which challenges you to build and manage your own company in a world where competition is fierce and the challenges reflect real life.

name: Devil's Corp
summary: Devil's Corp is a 2D pixel art game where you play as an employed hunter hired by the devil to deliver demonic souls.

name: Deltarune: Broken Destiny
summary:
Deltarune: Broken Destiny is a tale set in the original Deltarune universe.
We see a new part of Deltarune's world away from Hometown.

name: Dead Lamb Walking
summary:
You are alone and vulnerable. Beware of the big bad wolf.

A short, free, thriller-suspense interactive fiction made in RPG Maker.

name: Demiurgos
summary: Demiurgos is a competitive strategy god game where you wield divine powers to convert followers, outmaneuver rival deities, and reshape the world. Choose Good or Evil, Chaos or Order, and forge your path to dominance. Inspire devotion or instill fear—the choice is yours.

name: Deltarune: Internal Demons
summary:
One day, the trio found themselves caught between getting caught from the teachers around the corner, or risking everything and jumping into the strange grey door. Leaving their school and world behind.

After a long fall Scuta wakes alone, with only one option to go, he has to proceed further, finding his friends and leaving the new dark world.

name: Desktop Cat Cafe
summary: Build your dream cat cafe in this tiny cozy management sim that lives at the bottom of your screen! Unlock exciting new recipes, decorate your space with our wide variety of goodies, and hire cute staff to take care of the cafe while you're doing other things.

name: Demon Core
summary: Abandon hope and delve into the core of an old nuclear power plant in this psychological survival horror experience. Trust your map and radiation detector to navigate the irradiated plant... And be forced to discover the monstrous cause of its sudden reawakening.

name: Deltarune Wandering Makers: Pantheon of the Discarded
summary: Taking off from the original storyline, you explore a strange new "darker-than-dark" world, looking for "shadow bosses" to battle for their "Shadow Crystals"

name: Devil's Wish
summary: This game is a fictional themed casual game that mainly tells the story of two young girls. Players will play as one of the blue haired girls named Cao Dan. After encountering Cao Dan, Liu Lian'er, who had thought she could escape poverty, was caught up in a shocking conspiracy.

name: Destiny 2: Heresy Silver Bundle
summary: Purchase the Destiny 2: Heresy Silver Bundle and receive the Spinning Seat Legendary emote along with 1,700 Silver (1,000 + 700 bonus Silver) which you can use to purchase Heresy, cosmetics, and more!

name: Dead Daylight
summary: "DEADDAYLIGHT" is a side-scrolling platform action-adventure game.Developed independently by a single person. It tells the dark story of a protagonist who wakes up from a nightmare about the plague during a plague after the gods abandoned the earth, and then return to the Cathedral of Holy Light.

name: Dead Air
summary: An Indie Psychological Horror Rhythm Game. Featuring songs based off popular internet horror icons.

name: Destiny 2: Heresy
summary: The Dreadnaught has returned. Gather your allies and bring order to chaos as shadows gather in the galaxy. Descend into the ship and stem the Taken tide before it overwhelms Earth in the new three-player activity. the Nether.

name: Detective Bundle 4 in 1
summary: This bundle contains: - Agatha Christie – Hercule Poirot: The First Cases - Blacksad: Under the Skin - Murder Mystery Machine - Arsene Lupin – Once a Thief

name: Dead Trash
summary: Years into a brutal lockdown, a once-thriving city lies in ruins, abandoned by its government and overrun by vicious, mindless infected. Grab your hammer, collect your nerves and enter the mayhem.

name: Deceit 2: Vampire Pack
summary: Lure your prey and strike as the blood-lusting Vespal Terror. The Vampire Pack also gives you an exclusive curse, The Soulbound, and an exclusive item - Earmuffs.

name: Death Kid
summary: Death Kid is a fast-paced arcade-inspired arena brawler with meta-progression. Wipe out hordes of daunting foes, master powerful abilities and grow stronger with each attempt. Venture deep inside a treacherous well to put the wheel of life and death back in motion and break the curse of immortality.

name: Devil of the Mirror
summary:
RPG Maker MV remake of Devil of the Mirror (2017), featuring an extended story, new graphic assets and two additional endings.

Striving to escape her futile existence, a lonely and sick girl is performing a spell upon a mirror, wishing for friends and for a better life... But she didn't know that the mirror she used was holding a demonic entity in it. Will that spell be a blessing for the girl... or a curse?

name: Denshi Life 2
summary: Control life forms, represented by the movement of particles, through “mutation”, “wind”, and “activation” to take the pictures directed by the mission! The simple, new gameplay of the previous title has been developed in a more accessible way, with greatly enhanced visuals and sound.

name: Decadent Thinking
summary: Over 100 short stories told by a mysterious girl. A "read" prescription for those of you who are tired of living.

name: Deeeer Simulator: Shikanoko Dance
summary:
A collaboration with the anime My Deer Friend Nokotan!

For a limited time only, selecting the “Dance” command in-game will let you do the Shikanoko Dance accompanied by the My Deer Friend Nokotan opening theme “Shikairo Days”.

Distribution Period: 10:00 AM January 7 to 9:59 AM February 4, 2025 (PST)

This DLC was provided as an update instead of a separate free download on consoles.

name: Deus Ex: Lay D Denton project
Defense of Fort Burton
summary:
This is game made by Ledx. A small indie game developer.
This is a single player game where player can defend the Fort Burton againsts evil forces. This is side scrolling point of view and similar to the genre of tower defense where enemies come in series and player need to strategically defend the fort.

name: Detective Frizbee
summary: Welcome to "Detective Frizbee". It’s an open-world RPG with a detective twist. In this game, you play as Frizbee, a cuddly, silly yet clever puppy. You’ll follow the storyline and help Frizbee solve puzzles to deduce who the culprit could be.

name: DeadWire
summary: Hack, link, and shoot in a fast-paced top-down cyberpunk shooter. Create devastating chain reactions to outwit enemies, break records and save your childhood mentor from a ruthless syndicate

name: Deadzone Haunt
summary: Deadzone Haunt is a wave-based First-Person Zombie Shooter. Customize your loadout, upgrade weapons, and use perks & power-ups to dominate the demons. Experience smooth movement, satisfying gunplay, and a new approach to weapon camo customization.

name: Demon Hunters
summary: Demon Hunters is a 2D RPG with roguelike elements where you explore dungeons, fight hordes of enemies and epic bosses. Upgrade weapons, collect artifacts and close the demonic portal!

name: Delta Force: Black Hawk Down
summary: In this thrilling free-to-play co-op campaign, step into the boots of an elite Delta Force operator and relive one of the most iconic military operations, where a straightforward capture operation turns into an impossible extraction.

name: Deepspace Emporium
summary: Deepspace Emporium is a gritty shopkeeping sim set in the depths of a sprawling space station. As a former scavenger turned merchant, you trade in goods of varying legality—all while facing rising rent. Navigate a divided society, balance faction demands, and dodge authorities as you try to survive.

name: Delinquent Community
summary: Welcome to Sterling Heights... Play as Jacob Stains and explore the town to learn about Jacob and his reputation in the community, meet unique NPC's across town, choose to make positive or negative decisions for Jacobs life, and optionally use violence against other residents.

name: Delta Vector
summary: Delta Vector is a unique turn-based racing indie game that combines tactical decision-making with vector-based physics. Master the art of precision racing as you calculate your every move across challenging tracks!

name: Demon Inc.
summary:
Demon Inc. is a strategic deck-building game where players take on the role of a demon CEO, trying to dominate the business world by taking down their competitors. Assemble powerful card combinations, expand your influence across diverse biomes, and make calculated decisions to grow your empire.

Featuring a dynamic mix of resource management, tactical card play, and evolving abilities, Demon Inc. challenges players to harness the power of demonic contracts and outmaneuver rival entities.

name: Dead Spaceshot
summary: In Dead Spaceshot, shoot robotic mutant aliens in the head, uncover the secrets of an abandoned military space base, and don't die. Customize your weapons, face deadly enemies, and conquer new planets in this intense third-person sci-fi adventure.

name: Delivery Guy Simulator
summary: Welcome to Delivery Guy Simulator, where you take on the streets of a vibrant city as a determined delivery guy! Navigate bustling city blocks, deliver all kinds of packages and rise to the top of the delivery business.

name: Death Climbing
summary: Get to the top of a huge mountain with unpredictable conditions using its resources.

name: Deep Sea Heroes
summary: Dive into a fast-paced underwater roguelike! Battle swarms of sea creatures, cursed pirates, and colossal bosses as you explore unique aquatic biomes. Collect a variety of weapons, uncover treasures, and survive the unknown in an epic journey through the ocean depths!

name: Detective: Rainy Night
summary: Detective Rainy Night is a psychological horror narrative adventure with elements of deduction. Violent crimes, mature stories, and a touch of horror await you at the Motel Holiday. Grab a pencil and paper because solving this case won’t be easy.

name: Death and Ladders
summary:
Death and Ladders: Roll the dice, climb the ladders, avoid scythes, take risky shortcuts, use Tarot Ability Cards to improve your odds or trap your opponent. Reach the end first to win.

You are supposed to die, but Death is bored to death doing the same job for an eternity. So he gave you a chance to win back your life, if you entertain him by playing his board game.

Gamble your soul in a relaxing atmosphere amongst a Skeleton crew, or if you want more of a challenge, try your luck against other unfortunate souls in Online or Local PVP.

name: Death Remains
summary: Enter Death Remains: an open-world, permadeath survival. Scavenge, build, and barter or battle factions across a harsh sandbox. Master ruthless RPG skills, but remember—when you die, Death Remains.

name: DexSweeper
summary: A minesweeper-type game where the cursor never stops moving. Use the Playdate's crank to guide your movement, then time your tile reveals carefully. One wrong move could be your last.

name: Defying the Shadows
summary: Embark on a tactical roguelite adventure where you assemble your team of heroes to battle the Shadow army in turn-based combat. Test your strategy, adaptability and progress through the game to upgrade your characters and unlock new ones, shaping your ultimate squad for the battles ahead!

name: Deforb
summary: Deforb is a roguelite top-down shooter game where a mad orb defends its tower using up to four melee guns, a long-range gun, and strategically placed turrets. Upgrade your skills and craft powerful builds to survive relentless waves of enemies.

name: Dead of Night: Supermarket
summary: Experience the dread of a midnight shift in a quiet supermarket. As mundane tasks blur with eerie events, discover that the darkness hides more than just silence.

name: Dead Beats Survivors
summary: A 2D shooting survivor game! Survive in a dark, zombie-infested underground disco and earn money!

name: Destroy Your Home
summary: Enough is enough.

name: Deadside: Deluxe Pack
summary: Includes Deadside base game, Supporter Pack DLC, flags set, and all skins.

name: Decks of Dexterity
summary: Decks of Dexterity fuses bullet hell shooter gameplay with a strategic turn based card game; your deck determines your power! Explore the Void to discover hundreds of cards, powerful treasures, unique characters, all contributes to building a powerful deck and defeating the corruption!

name: Devolve Online
summary: An action MMORPG third-person shooter that blends classic MMORPG persistent progression with short, session-based challenges where hundreds of players fight for growth at once, seamlessly integrated into the dynamic, expansive, ongoing game world.

name: Deal With The Devil: Chapter 1 - Journey to Tuonela
summary: A dark and mysterious adventure that takes players on a journey through Finnish mythology and the mysteries of Tuonela. Players guide John through the adventure in Tuonela, encountering characters from Finnish mythology and other mythological creatures.

name: Devwill Too ZX
summary: Devwill Too ZX/MSX is a Arcade platformer for ZX Spectrum and MSX. The game is based on the Mega Drive/Sega Genesis version, but it's not the same game, more like a new game based on the characters and world of the GEN version.

name: Demon Corporation: Onboarding
summary: This game is a strategy RPG with the theme of anti-work from 9 am to 9 pm, six days a week. The gameplay inherits from the classic "Magic Tower" series, combining elements such as pigeons and BD combinations. Please play with caution under the age of 35 to avoid dissing and hurting the boss!

name: Decadent Heir
summary: Rewrite history in this narrative RPG set in the last days of Imperial Russia. Born into nobility, you will shape both your destiny and the fate of a nation. Will you preserve the old order, ignite the flames of revolution, or carve out your own path? Every decision will echo through time.

name: Deep Dark Block
summary: Roguelike Tetris, Super Challenge Mode

name: Deep Blue: Devour and Evolve
summary: Play as different fish, devour opponents in the ruthless underwater world of survival of the fittest, and evolve your abilities.

name: Detective Araka
summary: In this gripping visual novel, step into the shoes of Yuuki, a boy with amnesia, and team up with top-tier exorcist Ihayase Araka. Together, you must uncover the dark secrets of Inusai Village and piece together your forgotten past.

name: Deep Water
summary: Explore a roguelike RPG set in dynamic, procedurally generated mines filled with diverse biomes. Battle relentless monster waves using a mobile base, gather resources to upgrade your crab, and brave the ocean's depths through shifting weather and day-night cycles.

name: Delta Z. INC
summary: Delta Z Inc. is a horror sci-fi puzzle game where you work as a repurposing technician, responsible for modifying reanimated bodies to suit the needs of your clients while keeping within the company's budget.

name: Destiny 2: Heresy - Act 2
summary: The Echo of the Navigator has emerged aboard the Dreadnaught, assuming the form of Oryx himself. Over centuries, countless throngs have bent to his will; he will ensure that the Guardian is no different. But a voice from beyond forms a wellspring of hope…

name: Deadly Joy
summary: Deadly Joy is a multiplayer horror game where Play Center employees must survive deadly missions. Cooperate or betray in challenges like Parkour, Basement, and Tower, while escaping terrifying mascots like Hugster and the CatBox.

name: Deductopia Chapter 1: Bring Your Pet to School Day
summary: Can you sort out this chaotic classroom? Six kids, six pets, six desks--but whose is whose? Drag the right names and pictures to the right desks to win!

name: Dead In Antares
summary: Dead in Antares is a turn-based survival management game with RPG elements, set on an alien planet. Lead a crew of survivors sent on a mission to save humanity. Manage their needs, strengthen their teamwork, and explore this mysterious world to find a way back home.

name: Death In Your Dice
summary: Can you outwit fate when your turn comes? From now on, all you care about is the game of dice and its consequences. Observe, investigate, act, defend yourself. Time is ticking away, but death will not wait.

name: Dear Boys: Fast Break!
summary: Dear Boys: Fast Break! is a Japan-exclusive PlayStation 2 gem that brings the beloved manga series to life through an engaging 3-D basketball simulation. Released on September 18, 2003, by Konami and developed by KCEJ, it immerses players in the journey of Mizuho High School's basketball team as they face off against rivals like Honmoku East and Tendōji High in a gripping story mode. With over 50 characters, a gallery mode for unlocking artwork, and a blend of realistic gameplay and dramatic cut-scenes, it’s a must-play for fans of the Dear Boys franchise and sports game enthusiasts alike, despite never leaving Japan."

name: Deserto Divino
summary: You're Quespin, a young Egyptian who suddenly dreams of something that could change your life forever — so you set off on a bold journey across Egypt’s endless deserts and ancient pyramids to chase it. Along the way, you'll face challenges, meet unforgettable people, and discover that this journey will transform your life in ways you never imagined.

name: Death & Faeology
summary: In a world where the fae-touched fall prey to a sinister killer, only a faeologist can uncover the truth. A dark academia murder mystery narrative game inspired by Strange Horticulture and the Ace Attorney series.

name: Death Stream
summary: You wake up in a basement room, bound, with a camera staring you down. A deranged masked man entices his audience. You’ve been abducted by a lunatic who thrives on chaos and carnage. His goal? To force you into a twisted game of luck while the entire internet watches in real time.

name: Desperate Place
summary: Desperate Place is a strategic tower defense game where you play as a crew member who wakes up early on a damaged colonization starship. Stranded on an unknown planet, you must gather resources, repair the ship, and defend against alien monsters to survive and escape.

name: Dead Rails
summary: Dead Rails is an intense, cooperative, twin stick shooter. In a world where humanity has come to rely on rail roads and train stations for transportation of supply, players must work together to progress through the railroad, and get as far as possible through each train shelter.

name: Deep In The Lab
summary: Deep in the Lab is 2D '90 style survival horror game, with old style pre-rendered backgrounds, puzzles to solve, keys to collect, monster to avoid or defeat (your choice), poor resources, jumpscares, limited saves, FMV and a five floors lab to explore.

name: Demigoddess!
summary: Demigoddess! is a unique game that focuses on the essentials of turn-based strategy games. It is designed so that each gameplay can be won or lost in 1 hour. The random map generation system makes different situation each time. You can control over 450 types of soldiers and monsters of 20 factions.

name: Deep Fringe
summary: Deep Fringe is deep tactical combat game set in a biopunk wasteland. Lead powerful factions in turn-based battles, leveraging the strategic use of an interactive environment. Modify or destroy terrain to achieve tactical supremacy. Craft legendary chapters with the level editor.

name: Decaying Wires
summary:
"...Today was a good day. And I hope tomorrow will be too."
You just downloaded a cute looking visual novel, you will definitely have a good time! And, after all, what can go wrong?

Experience a lot of fun and cheerful moments with Mitsuko and Shizuka!

"Can you hear it too now?
It always drills my brain."

The game contains original art, soundtrack and takes 15-20 minutes to complete

And remember, wires always look for a new owner.

name: Deltarune: Chapter 1 - Noelle Edition
summary: A Deltarune chapter 1 mod that adds Noelle to the party. It (probably) has no bugs, new story and snowgrave route! If you wanted to play something like "what if Noelle were in chapter 1", I think this is definitely what you are searching.

name: Decontamination
summary: You work in a decontamination organization. Travel to different zones and clear them of infection. In these zones, you will need to complete tasks such as cleaning up toxic lakes, collecting minerals, or even saving the creatures in these places.

name: Dead Silence: Echoes of the Damned
summary: An atmospheric horror game with an open world and cinematic scenes. Explore the dark forest, search for items, read notes, perform rituals, and uncover a terrifying story. A first-person experience filled with jumpscares and intense tension.

name: Detective: The Test
summary: Test your detective instincts across three challenging cases. No hints, no help—just you, your intuition, and your ability to piece together the truth. Can you solve the mystery?

name: Dead Weight
summary: During a thick and stormy winter hike, Ronan is determined to make it to safety. But there is one thing weighing him down. Will he continue to carry it? Or will he go on without it?

name: Death From Above: Complete Edition
summary:
The Complete Edition contains:
Death From Above
Death From Above Soundtrack
Aerorozvidka Supporter Skin Pack
Fellas & Defenders Supporter Skin Pack

name: Detectives United: Beyond Time - Collector's Edition
summary: Detectives United - Beyond Time Collector's Edition presents a galactic adventure! When a mysterious parcel sent through time arrives at your agency, you quickly find yourself in a race against time to save humanity! An otherworldly entity is rising, set to destroy your world. Can you defy the odds and stop a cosmic catastrophe? Find out in Detectives United - Beyond Time Collector's Edition!

name: Deltagun
summary:
You have a gun.
Shoot enemies.
They run away from you.

name: Deltagun Deluxe
summary: DELTARUNE but you have a gun and it's not just a simple gun... IT'S THE STRONGEST WEAPON IN THE UNIVERSE, that have 2 gimmicks.

name: Deltarune: Master Mode
summary: Deltarune: Master Mode is a fan-made "hard mode" mod that re-imagines the game with increased difficulty. It features stronger enemies and a more challenging experience, where only the most skilled players will be able to survive.

name: Desktop Golf
summary:
Play on colorful courses made of stationery!
Enjoy a refreshing game of golf right on your desk!

name: Demon's Souls: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Demon’s Souls Digital Deluxe Edition includes the full game and additional in game digital content to prepare you for the ultimate challenge, including;

• Legendary Hero Soul
• Renowned Warrior Soul
• Storied Warrior Soul
• Red-Eye Knight Armor
• Boletarian Royalty Armor
• Ritual Blade
• Hoplite Shield
• Ring of Longevity
• Preservation Grains
• Phosphorescent Grains
• Bearbug Grains
• Large Hardstone Shard
• Moonlightstone Shard
• Original soundtrack

name: Define
summary: As the game progresses, the speed at which the fruits fall will increase, making the game more challenging. Players need to react quickly and accurately determine the landing points of the fruits in order to achieve higher scores.

name: Den' Rozhdeniya 2
summary:
Teddybear Finni needs your help with planning his birthday party. Collect items, presents, and fruits and invite your friends!

This game was developed to teach russian kids the English language.

name: Desolate Dusk
summary: Desolate Dusk is a story-driven VR horror where survival hinges on your ability to adapt to new environments and locations. Explore and survive the wasteland using environmental objects like buttons, doors, and switches to fend off the unknown. Will you be able to survive?

name: Deck of Defense
summary: Deck of Defense is a deck-building, tower defense game where you place cards to defend your base. Craft a unique deck, upgrade your abilities, unlock game-breaking defense strategies, and see if your Deck of Defense can stand the test of time.

name: Defense of the Sodomites
summary: An exciting tower defense game where you have to defend your people from the invasion of enemy forces. Your task is to build and upgrade cannons to fend off waves of attacking enemies.

name: Death Report
summary: This is a horror game that will take you into a world full of suspense, thrills, and psychological challenges, testing your courage and wisdom, uncovering secrets that have been sealed by time. -Pure manual map, without using automatically generated maps -Pure manual system, easy to adjust

name: Death Delivery
summary: You work as a delivery driver/package handler for "Fed-ups". You're loading the packages into your truck as usual when someone next to tells you, they're being stalked.

name: Dead Pixel
summary: How sharp are your eyes? Can you see it? Is it even there? If you've never seen a dead pixel now is your chance.

name: Defender's Squad: The Last Ride
summary: Defender's Squad is a sci-fi vertical scrolling shooter 2D that combines 7 different levels. Play Solo and pick one of the 3 ships to kill enemies and save the earth from aliens.

name: Death Worm
summary: If you've ever secretly harboured a desire to snap up entire elephants in a single bite, Death Worm, more Shai-Hulud than Nibbles, just might be the game for you. Loosely inspired by cryptozoological accounts of the Mongolian Olgoi-Khorkhoi, this game allows the player to be to the Gobi Desert what Jaws was to Amity Island -- a menacing avatar of hunger incarnate, lurking somewhere unseen beneath the surface... waiting to strike!

name: Destroy All Cars
summary: Use your car and a quarterpipe to trash stacks of clunkers. Is there any sweeter way to waste technology? I think not, people.

name: Deadly Rails
summary: Fight your way through the horde of undead and reach your goal. The only limits are your wits and determination.

name: Devil's Derby
summary: Devil's Derby is a fast-paced first person shooter on skates, where you fight endless hordes of demons as you use advance movement techniques to shoot, skate, and slide your way around a singular arena to compete for high score.

name: Dere Quartet
summary: A funny story about four cute girls. Join their class and have a good time with this relaxing game!

name: Demon Knives
summary: Survive waves of demons and collect their gems to level up. Compete against your friends for the #1 spot on the leaderboard. Or conquer the worldwide charts.

name: Dessert Storm Girls
summary: Avoid bullets and eliminate enemies to earn points.Take on challenging enemies and bosses across multiple stages, each with its unique design and challenges. Use your skills to stay ahead of the enemy and emerge victorious.Help the CDF stop the separatist uprising and restore peace.

name: Deep Dungeon Knight
summary: Deep Dungeon Knight - an immersive 3D rogue-like dungeon adventure where magic and bravery guide your path through treacherous dungeons! Step into the shoes of a valiant knight, wielding powerful spells to combat fearsome monsters lurking in the shadows.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles 2
summary: Destroy demons with the power of forged bonds! Tanjiro Kamado's battle will once again unfold…

name: Deadside: Beehive Skin Set
summary: A set of skins for those who want to explore the dangerous world with style.

name: Deadside: Supporter Pack
summary: A package of goods for those who wish to go the extra mile to support the game.

name: Deadside: Salamander Skin Set
summary: A set of skins for those who want to explore the dangerous world with style.

name: Deadside: Royal Flush Skin Set
summary: A set of skins for those who want to explore the dangerous world with style.

name: Deadside: Jungle Skin Set
summary: A set of skins for those who want to explore the dangerous world with style.

name: Deadside: Hooligan Skin Set
summary: A set of skins for those who want to explore the dangerous world with style.

name: Deadside: Guerilla Skin Set
summary:
A set of skins for those who want to explore the dangerous world of Deadside with style. The skin is unlocked through purchase and then become available in painting menu on a workbench. Contains ingame "Guerilla" Skin for these weapons:

AK-Mod
AR4
AK-SM
AR4-M
VSD

name: Deadside: Flags Set
summary: 30 in-game Flags Skin that can be used on a base.

name: Deadside: Dragonfly Skin Set
summary: A set of skins for those who want to explore the dangerous world with style.

name: Deadside: Bushranger Skin Set
summary: A set of skins for those who want to explore the dangerous world with style.

name: Deep 3D: Submarine Odyssey
summary:
Dive into an interesting underwater world and experience action-packed sci-fi adventures!
DEEP takes you to Kappa, a distant aquatic planet with exotic life forms. YOU are an independent fisherman and mercenary, living by mining natural resources and performing combat missions for the colonists who rule Kappa. In this adventure story, you must be confident both on the battlefield and making money. Uncover all the secrets of the ongoing incident between rebels, pirates and mysterious forms of sea life.

You can operate and successfully upgrade many types of submarines, as well as trade various types of goods in hundreds of locations in this very interesting underwater adventure. But be careful! The pressure of the ocean water and the deadly solar radiation on the surface can cost you your life if you do not upgrade your submarine properly!

name: Dead by Daylight: Tokyo Ghoul
summary:
Teeth gnash, grinding and gorging until nothing is left. A black and scarlet eye blazes above a grotesque grin. The screams turn to gurgles as they plead for mercy that will never come.

Dead by Daylight: Tokyo Ghoul, features new Killer, The Ghoul, a chilling reimagining of Ken Kaneki.

name: Dead by Daylight: Tokyo Ghoul - Cosmetic Pack
summary: The Dead by Daylight: Tokyo Ghoul: Cosmetic Pack includes two exclusive outfits: The Ghoul Within for The Ghoul, capturing Ken Kaneki’s dark transformation, and Touka’s Struggle for Yui Kimura, inspired by Touka Kirishima’s fierce determination

name: Dead by Daylight: Tokyo Ghoul Edition
summary: Check out Dead by Daylight: Tokyo Ghoul Edition, which includes the base game, the Tokyo Ghoul Chapter, and 2 Tokyo Ghoul Outfits: The Ghoul Within for The Ghoul, and Touka’s Struggle for Yui Kimura. Also included are the Maddening Darkness Pack, and the Cursed Legacy Chapter

name: Devil May Cry
summary: In 2005, Capcom announced a Devil May Cry title for the PlayStation Portable. However, after years with no new information or gameplay footage, the game was officially removed from release schedules and its cancellation was confirmed by Capcom in 2009.

name: Dear His Majesty
summary: Dear Princes and Princess, a legendary kingdom awaits your inheritance. Your people eagerly await your wisdom and courage. Yet, this journey is fraught with challenges; obstacles will test your resolve. Do not betray the trust your people have in you. Lead them to true greatness!

name: Decrypto Project
summary: Our algorithm has chosen you for inclusion in the Decrypto Project. Your job is simple: we send encrypted texts, you decipher them. Loyalty and diligence will be rewarded with upgrades and customization options for your system. Disobedience and sabotage will be punished.

name: Desecrated Deck
summary: Desecrated Deck is a dark and occult-inspired card game set in the basement of a cursed house where every move is the difference between life and death. With the help of powerful Item and Perk cards, you forge spiritual pacts to put a stop to malicious souls...

name: Detectives United: Mission Possible - Collector's Edition
Demian
summary: Emil Sinclair is torn between a monochromatic understanding of the world of childhood and the ambiguity of adulthood. As Emil dives deeper, he's caught in a swirling journey where dreams and desire are indistinguishable from reality. His path is lined with bizarre encounters. Maybe a strange boy with a mouth full of biblical riddles can help him find his way. Demian is a reinterpretation of the novel "Demian" written by Hermann Hesse and published in 1919.

name: Deer Hunting Camp
summary: Deer Hunting Camp allows you to create your own private deer habitat which can be traded with friends! Once done creating, managing, and scouting your property you will be challenged with early fall bow hunting, late fall black powder hunting, and winter rifle hunting.

name: Desert Tank Chaos
summary:
Desert Tank Chaos – The Battle in the Desert Begins!

Can you survive the chaos in the scorching desert? Desert Tank Chaos is an action-packed tank warfare game! Fight your way through 6 uniquely designed levels, commanding your powerful tank against relentless enemies. But beware—it's not just rival tanks you'll face! Deadly aircraft patrol the skies, strategic watchtowers guard key locations, and enemy soldiers are ready to ambush you at any moment.

Use your heavy artillery, dodge incoming attacks, and find the best way to survive in the desert! Think tactically, plan your assaults, and conquer the battlefield amidst the chaos.

Are you ready, Commander? The desert awaits!

name: Depths Debris
summary: A walking simulator about a journey in search of the mother ocean. Control "Hoi-chan," a girl with a yellow hat, and collect hearts hidden throughout various locations.

name: Delos: Space Traffic Control
summary: In Delos, you are the space traffic controller managing the flow of ships at a bustling space station. Direct docking, allocate resources, and prevent collisions in a real-time strategy setting. Balance efficiency and safety to maintain order in the interstellar hub.

name: Debug Life
summary:
Anyone who has tried making games knows that it's a never-ending grind. Stop the bugs from breaking you and your project! Submitted to Nokia 3310 Jam 7.

Your ammo are the dots on the laptop, while the special is the diamond meter on the laptop. Your remaining life -- the hearts, obviously.

name: Dead Sale
summary: You are Marcus, an appraiser exploring a house for sale. Power outages reveal a dark entity hunting you. With the help of a mirror, uncover what’s hidden and escape before both time and the shadow claim your life. Realistic graphics, unique dialogues, and a fast gameplay loop. Horror genre

name: Death Becomes You: Yuri Onsen Vacation
summary: Alice and Sophie finally have the time to go on an onsen retreat. However, their trip gets inturrupted by mysterious magic. The last straw: "MY FOOD!!!" Will the couple be able to find the culprit and finally enjoy their vacation?

name: Deathblossom
summary: Deathblossom is an action / kinetic novel hybrid about love and mortality. Enjoy visual novel-style written scenes and high-octane top-down action as you shoot, kick and blast your way through an erotic revenge thriller. Featuring a fully illustrated story by Zoquete!

name: Death In The Afternoon
summary: In Death In The Afternoon, throw yourself into a night of drinking. You play as Arthur, a young student who likes to drink a little too much... Try to fight your addiction ! And choose your drinks and interactions carefully, or you might have the worst BlackOut of your life !

name: Death in the Gulag
summary: Stories from the Russian Gulag

name: Deathly Dominion
summary: Deathly Dominion is an intense survival game where players face endless hordes of zombies in a post-apocalyptic world. Each wave brings new challenges, requiring quick skills and well-thought-out strategies to survive. An immersive and challenging game for fans of the genre.

name: Death to the Universe: Act I
summary: This game is for people who enjoy classic 3D Platformers, but also have an interest in indie games that combine storytelling, character design and gameplay. Death comes with abilities to challenge any obstacles. Shoot a hookshot to swing across gaps, or wield his scythe to shred any opposition.

name: Debt City
summary: A retro open world life sim RPG. Explore a seedy sandbox city, and do anything you can to pay off a debt to a mob boss.

name: Decision Legacy Collection
summary: All the games in the classic Decision series bundled together. From the zombie-ravaged streets of the original Decision to the brutal medieval battlegrounds of Decision Medieval, this collection delivers the raw, blood-soaked combat, base building, and survival gameplay that hooked Flash game fans.

name: Decorporate
summary: Become the best weeb in the world!!!!!!!!

name: Deep Sea Pursuit
summary:
Dive into the mesmerizing world of the deep sea, where hidden treasures await the bold and daring! In this thrilling underwater adventure, you take on the role of a fearless diver exploring the ocean's darkest depths. Your mission is to collect precious pearls and rare artifacts scattered across the ocean floor. But beware, a relentless octopus is on your trail, watching your every move!

As you navigate through stunning underwater landscapes, you'll need to dodge dangerous obstacles and outsmart the cunning octopus. The deeper you go, the more valuable the treasures you’ll find—but the challenges will also increase. The octopus grows faster and more cunning with each passing moment, making escape a true test of skill and strategy.

Featuring rich underwater environments, captivating graphics, and heart-pounding chases, "Deep Sea Pursuit" offers an unforgettable journey beneath the waves. How far can you go? Will you emerge victorious, collecting the ocean’s most elusive treasures, or will the octopus ensnare you in its powerful tentacles? The ultimate underwater treasure hunt begins now!

name: Deep Siege
summary: Deep Siege is a fast-paced, first-person endless wave shooter. Play as Akula, an Atlantean sharkfolk warrior, and defend your underwater realm against waves of mutated sea creatures. Rack up kills to gain buffs using Bloodthirst or heal during tough moments.

name: Defenders of the Dune
summary: Defenders of the Dune is a game about overcoming the wilderness and establishing a kingdom in defiance of the land itself. Players will fight to survive each day, experiencing the challenge and pride that comes with building up their base against all odds

name: Defend the Vault
summary: You're a gun at a bank in front of a vault. There are robbers approaching to destroy the vault. You must shoot the enemies to defend the bank vault to prevent the robbers from getting in. Keep it going.

name: Demonophobia Company
summary: 'Angel of glory, Gloria' joined the 'Demonophobia Company' with disguising herself as 'Demon of vanity, Burbary.' Could Burbary finish her mission and go back to her home?

name: Der Fachinformatiker Trainer
summary: Computer Sciene Training Program.

name: Descenso
summary: A very short adventure in which you will explore a futuristic world and a handsome deck.

name: Desktop Siege
summary: 《Desktop Siege》 is a free tower defense idle game you can play on your desktop. Upgrade your base and defense towers to protect against endless waves of monsters!

name: Destroyer Burger
summary: DESTROYER BURGER is the 4th best independent fast food simulator game of 2025! Featuring frenetic multi-tasking madness where you assemble burgers in the Kitchen and serve them up in the Front Desk, DESTROYER BURGER is a game of chaos management.

name: Desu Vult
summary: A new power is rising on Flat Earth! Figure out who the villain is in this old-school turn-based strategy game and save its mostly innocent denizens with the help of the world's most unhelpful sidekick. Explore secrets, fight bizarre enemies and test your wits in this fantasy adventure!

name: Deva's Neverland: SideStory
summary: The game portrays a magical world with three distinctive classes: warriors, mages, and sages. Warriors harness their martial energy for courage; mages wield magic power through their Magic Crystal Ball; and sages utilize the "Book of the Sage" to control the force of rules.

name: DevilReversi
summary: "Devil Reversi" is a groundbreaking battle game that redefines Reversi. Two demon kings battle using humanity as their playthings. Utilize special abilities and magic in strategic matches with stunning graphics and immersive sound. Enjoy robust online multiplayer to compete with players worldwide.

name: Deep Space Bellhop
summary: A cute turn-based-action game where your job is to transport strange and unfamiliar characters between floors in the galaxy's largest space hotel.

name: Decomposition
summary: Decomposition is a psychological horror and survival game in which you will face a deadly cult, solve challenging puzzles and explore claustrophobic environments as you fight to save your life and stop the Decomposition of the world.

name: Death Pit Explorer
summary: Fly through a deadly pit to see what horrible secret lay at its deepest depth.

name: Desktop Destroy 2
summary: Desktop Destroy II: Chicken Carnage allows the player to destroy his desktop and shoot chickens at the same time. The game takes place on the player's desktop, where he can place chickens. Shooting the chickens in creative ways earns the player points. More creative deaths (such as covering them in blood first) earn more points. The game features various weapons such as a shot gun, rocket launcher, flame thrower and canon ball with which chickens can be killed. Weapons will leave bullet holes and blood splatters on your desktop until the game is quit. The goal is to score as much points within the time limit.

name: Dead Format
summary: Dead Format is a survival horror game set in iconic film eras. It's 1990s Scotland, and your brother has gone missing after becoming obsessed with a mysterious new VHS format. Follow his trail through the tapes and uncover why the government wants to ban "Video Ghastlies".

name: Desperate Escape
summary: Your character wakes up in a warehouse, armed with a torch. Navigate through the complex to find car parts to fix up a truck to escape, but watch out for the monsters around every corner.

name: Detective Penguin
summary: A detective-based penguin game

name: Destination Kepler!
summary: Time to leave Earth! Launch your ship into space and travel to Kepler, the closest hospitable planet in the galaxy!

name: Deadside: Supporter Edition
summary: Includes Deadside base game and Supporter Pack DLC.

name: Devil Spire Falls
summary: The role-playing experience, where you can do anything, of your dreams... as if it came out 30 years ago!

name: Defender of Diosa
summary: Defender of Diosa is a real-time tower defense game where you command different unit types to protect the goddess from enemy waves, upgrading skills and progressing through 70 levels across multiple modes.

name: Demon of the Time
summary: Demon Of The Time is a fast-paced FPS arcade shooter packed with intense, cinematic battles across vast, meticulously crafted locations inspired by ancient Japan.

name: Dead as Disco
summary: Martial arts meets music video in Dead as Disco, a neon-drenched Beat ‘Em Up where every punch, kick, and combo syncs to the music. Join Charlie Disco on a quest to confront the villainous Idols and reunite the band.

name: Dead by Skill Check
summary: A skill check trainer for Dead by Daylight - to hone your skills or just warm up for the day.

name: Demon Turf: Queen's Edition
summary:
By royal decree, Demon Turf has been upgraded to the Queen's Edition!

What does this mean we hear you ask? It means we've packaged our previously standalone game Demon Turf: Neon Splash with Demon Turf's DLC Demon Turf: Tower and the Level Editor into the ultimate package of demon-y goodness.

name: Deadly Reunion
summary: A reunion party — a place filled with old memories shared among friends. But what if, on that very night, all of your friends were murdered right before your eyes? What would you do? Run away? Find the killer? Or die with them?

name: Dead or Alive 6: Nyotengu
summary: Download this to use Nyotengu in DEAD OR ALIVE 6 and DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters.

name: Demon Demon
summary: Silene has been searching for a long time for a certain love from her youth, after certain events she has found him again, but... Can they be together this time?

name: Destroy All Humans!: Jumbo Pack
summary:
"Can't get enough of your invasion, babe!
This extra-large magnum Jumbo Pack includes:
- Destroy All Humans! 2 – Reprobed
- Destroy All Humans! 2 – Reprobed: Challenge Accepted DLC
- Destroy All Humans! 2 – Reprobed: Skin Pack
- Destroy All Humans!
- Destroy All Humans! – Skin Pack
- Destroy All Humans! – Clone Carnage

Picked for your pleasure. Why settle for less?"

name: Deep Sea Adventure: Kaitei Kyuu Panthalassa no Nazo
summary: Your father has mysteriously disappeared while carrying out his ocean studies. You, a young boy named Chris, must venture forth in your minisub and search for poppy. Explore underwater wreckage in a submarine which may be upgraded with better equipment in your search for sunken treasure. Equipment and exploration budgets may be filled to capacity if the coffers are enriched with newfound treasure. Encounter undersea cities, denizens and battle enemy pirates in this 3-D adventure.

name: Deeper and Darker
summary:
Deeper and Darker adds an entire new dimension — the Otherside — with much content to explore. Here's a list with some of the features!

Biomes: explore the deeplands, echoing forest, overcast columns, and blooming caverns.
Structure: find an ancient temple, the home of the warden! Just be cautious when breaking the ancient vases to avoid awakening an ancient lurker.
Blocks: over a hundred new blocks to build, including gloomslate, sculk stone, and a new wood type!
Items: a brand-new warden set of armor and tools, an upgrade to elytra and the awesome sculk transmitter!
Mobs: 8 new mobs, including a miniboss!
To enter the Otherside, kill the warden and use its heart. Play the mod to find more content and explore hidden mysteries!

name: Detachment Crew
summary: A sci-fi dungeon crawling game with handmade visuals, real time combat and unique exploration options. Build your path through the wilderness, meet the crew, don’t let anyone starve.

name: Demon Bluff
summary: The cards lie! In this single-player social deduction game, you've gathered all the villagers to partake in a ritual to find out who is Evil. They will all state their case, but some will lie. Will you see through their bluff?

name: Dead Hourz
summary: "Dead Hourz" is a thrilling survival adventure set in a post-apocalyptic world. In a land ravaged by zombies, bandits, and scarcity, you must protect your family by gathering resources and making tough choices.

name: Deedlee Doo! Carkour!
summary:
A game where you do parkour with a car using explosions.
Everything in the game is made out of clay in real life.
The sound effects and music are all mouth sounds.
If you screw up a jump, children laugh and make fun of you. (Just like real life!)
Can you reach the top of the Meowtain?

name: Detective Club: Missing in the Fog - Collector's Edition
summary: Join Thomas and George, two young detectives, as they solve mysteries and find hidden objects in the foggy streets of Victorian London.

name: Demining
summary: Demining is a 1-4 player semi open-world horror experience where every step could be your last. Work together or by yourself as you disarm deadly mines, delve into bountiful ruins, and fight to see another day.

name: Defenders of Etheria
summary: Defenders of Etheria is a cooperative, RPG-inspired bullet-heaven where you'll lead crusades to reclaim territory against the Old One's Army. Recruit new heroes and pet companions, forge mighty gear, and hone your hero's abilities to preserve the sanctity of the kingdom!

name: Deadly Quiet
summary: Deadly Quiet is a 4-player co-op asymmetrical horror game set in the eerie Hoia Baciu forest. Featuring a bodycam perspective, your fate depends on your actions and the cooperation of your entire team. But remember to STAY QUIET.

name: Deus Mantle
summary: Craft, build, fight monsters, discover new technologies and explore an infinite procedurally generated world! Delve into unknown worlds to uncover ancient secrets and return home.

name: Dead Mall
summary:
Christmas is tomorrow, and what better place to do your holiday shopping than the town's abandoned mall? Collect as many gift boxes as you can, bring them to the getaway car, and make your escape!

Explore an ever-changing/procedurally-generated mall, watch out for power outages, and if you're lucky, you may even catch a meet-and-greet with Frosty the snowman...

name: Deckline
summary: Deckline is an atmospheric war-horror card game. Out of ammo and encircled, you play one last game of Durak to distract from the inevitable. Experience the grit and dread of modern combat through the lens of a board game.

name: Destiny 2: The Edge of Fate
summary: The first chapter of a new Destiny saga is here. Guardians will venture into the unknown, where the mysteries of the cosmos – and The Nine – await.

name: Dead by Daylight: Steady Pulse
summary: Dead by Daylight’s Steady Pulse includes a new Survivor, Orela Rose onto the scene. Purchasing this add-on unlocks an exclusive Cosmetic: Black and White Blazer.

name: Depression Presented Ludically in the Style of a Videogame
summary: Depression Presented Ludically in the Style of a Videogame isn't a hopeful game, but there's something positive to be found in it: if the cognitive distortions that depression brings with it can be so effectively portrayed in such a tiny game, then clearly none of us are alone in those thoughts.

name: Delivery & Beyond
summary: No packages? No problem! Break in, scrap, deliver... A chaotic online co-op game for up to 5 players!

name: Deluge: Threnody of Crashing Waves - Ina After Story
summary: A year after the events of Deluge: Threnody of Crashing Waves, Abe and Ina have both graduated High School. While Abe struggles to come to terms with his new aimless existence, Ina is plagued by cyclical thought patterns that set her spiraling into dark depths.

name: Destiny 2: Renegades
summary: Dive into the criminal underworld and take down an evil empire. Venture into a lawless frontier and reveal deeper mysteries about a new Dredgen in Sol. Build your power, credits, and notoriety.

name: Defender's Dynasty
summary: A 2D Strategic Base Defender game set in Medieval times. As relentless Waves of enemy forces threaten your Stronghold, you must gather Resources, Fortify your Defenses and lead your Rebellion. Prepare to strengthen your Base and manage your Resources. But beaware of the Storms!

name: Deep Dark
summary: Deep Dark is a linear story game about being stranded alone in deep space, at the end of time. you find yourself isolated, where no one hears you cry.

name: Demon Quest
summary: A Puzzle-Metroidvania set in an intriguing alien world. Face ruthless bosses, master the art of stealth combat, upgrade your multi-tool set, and use it ingeniously to escape a malevolent spirit holding you captive. One way out: escape.

name: Delectatio Morosa: A Conclave Visual Novel
summary:
The conclave is over: you are still a manager.

Play as Dean Thomas Cardinal Lawrence as he prepares for All Saints' Day. After the conclave, the Vatican only has one week to prepare for the upcoming celebrations, and the responsibility for managing his Curia members, and his growing feelings for them, falls upon you.

name: Deeper
summary: Go on expeditions with your friends to explore the depths in search of treasures, upgrade your gear, and dive back in deeper.

name: Deadly Kiss
summary: Deadly Kiss is an unreleased expansion for Shadow Warrior Classic by Simply Silly Software (Who also made Duke: Nuclear Winter for Duke Nukem 3D). The add-on was to focus on Tensi Yoka (AKA No Wang), the baby sister of Lo Wang and Hung Lo. screenshtos and promotional material would release online in 1998 but nothing would become of it and the company would become inactive in the following years. An version alpha of the game would leak in 2010. Tensi Yoka would later appear in promotional artwork for Shadow Warrior: Classic Redux.

name: Dew
summary: Dew is a 1-2 player Co-op Adventure with classic 2D Platformer mechanics set in a stunningly beautiful realistic micro-environment. Play as two tiny unlikely heroes, Myric and Dewey and stop the evil forces that is spreading a creeping mold that is infecting all living in their world.

name: Death Knight
summary: BRANDISH your WEAPON, UPGRADE it, and step onto the BATTLEFIELD!

name: Death Park: 4k Remaster
summary: Try to escape the furieous deadly clown in this scary horror game!

name: Depth Complaint
summary:
Depth Complaint (The Unfinished RPG) is a game created by Zero Dollar Gift Card AKA ZeDoGiCa/ZeDo, in RPGMaker VX Ace.

You play as ADAM, a slime, who throughout the game will meet and absorb other party members into himself.
Its visuals are comprised almost entirely out of rough sketches and found images, arranged in surreal collages, and its soundtrack is an eclectic mix of experimental music, hip-hop, jazz, and vaporwave, all laden with samples.

The game was made with the intention of being abandoned partly through its own development, and much of the dialogue reflects this. It explores themes of artist's block, creative struggle, and self-doubt.

The estimated playtime is 0.5-2 hours.

name: Deserted Island
summary: stranded on a island with friends, what will be your adventure?

name: DevilDark: The Fallen Kingdom
summary: An old king's greed has unleashed a plague of evil upon the land, and destiny has chosen you to banish the monsters. The time has come to take up arms and deliver your people from darkness! But beware! As you grow stronger, so will your foes. You'll need every skill and weapon in your arsenal to prevail. Do you have what it takes?

name: Desecration
summary: Who have you become? All that matters is that you keep your "brother" fed. In this narrative Horror Game drag your newest victim through the subterranean cavity where your brother now resides, but tread lightly as you explore. The flesh of victims' past claws out from the walls for retribution.

name: Desecration
summary: Who have you become? All that matters is that you keep your "brother" fed. In this narrative Horror Game drag your newest victim through the subterranean cavity where your brother now resides, but tread lightly as you explore. The flesh of victims' past claws out from the walls for retribution.

name: Devil May Cry 3 Crimson
summary: The mod, which is only compatible with the HD Collection version and can be downloaded from Nexus Mods and GitHub, allows players to enjoy the third entry in the series with plenty of new features and enhancements, including a new HUB based on the Devil May Cry 5 interface, updated lock-on and camera options that provide a much better view of the action, local co-op with plenty of options for an optimal experience, on-the-fly style switching, which is only available officially in the Nintendo Switch release of the HD remaster and more.

name: Defender II
summary: The Atari ST port features different graphics.

name: Deadly Delivery
summary: An online VR co-op horror game about delivering parcels into haunted mines. Avoid monsters, drop off packages, and pray you reach the quota! Team up with up to 3 other delivery goblins, survive your shift and pay back your student loans.

name: Dead Tapes: Fading Father
summary: Fading father is a man consumed by addiction and memories

name: Death Dome
summary: Death Dome is a post-apocalyptic action game developed by Griptonite Games and published by Glu Mobile, released for iOS and Android on October 10, 2012. Set in a quarantined city ravaged by a deadly virus, players take control of Phoenix, a genetically enhanced warrior, battling monstrous Behemoths in brutal one-on-one combat. The game features swipe-based fighting mechanics, upgradeable weapons, and a gritty sci-fi atmosphere reminiscent of Infinity Blade.

name: Deja View: A Spot the Difference Game
summary: Dive into surreal worlds in Deja View, a relaxing yet challenging spot-the-difference puzzle game. Explore 16 hand-drawn, mind-bending illustrations, each split into two intricate halves. Earn hints, unlock achievements, and immerse yourself in an enchanting soundtrack along your journey.

name: Demon's Souls: Red-Eye Knight Armor
summary:
Red-Eye Knight Set Armor Set Pieces includes:
Red-Eye Knight Helmet
Red-Eye Knight Cuirass
Red-Eye Knight Gauntlets
Red-Eye Knight Greaves

Digital Deluxe Edition Bonus
You WILL NEED to start a new character AND TURN ON the digital deluxe bundle at the starting gift section to optain this set if you have the game / started a character / save file before you purchase the Digital Deluxe Edition, other wise you WILL NOT BE ABLE to recieve this armor set.
Starting another game cycle on existing character pre/ deluxe bundle DOES NOT grant another set of armor, meaning its only 1 set per new character.

name: Demon's Souls: Boletarian Royalty Armor
summary:
Boletarian Royalty Set Armor Set Includes:
Boletarian Royalty Clothes
Boletarian Royalty Armbands
Boletarian Royalty Leggings

Digital Deluxe Edition Bonus
