You WILL NEED to start a new character AND TURN ON the digital deluxe bundle at the starting gift section to optain this set if you have the game / started a character / save file before you purchase the Digital Deluxe Edition, other wise you WILL NOT BE ABLE to recieve this armor set.
Starting another game cycle on existing character pre/ deluxe bundle DOES NOT grant another set of armor, meaning its only 1 set per new character.

name: Deep Sea Arena
summary: Dive into Deep Sea Arena, an intense underwater arena shooter where deadly creatures emerge from the abyss. Battle relentless waves of deep-sea horrors, dodge ambushes, and fight to stay alive. How long can you survive the depths?

name: Decaying Memories
summary: Spot the difference in the 3 given photos and survive for six minutes! Take too long to spot enough discrepancies and you lose to the fear meter!

name: Despicable Boss
summary: Rise from the depths of hell in Despicable Boss, a third-person action game filled with intense combat, strategic choices, and dark humor. Defeat powerful bosses, navigate treacherous contracts, and climb the infernal hierarchy. Will you outwit the chaos and seize control?

name: Desktop Fishing
summary: Desktop Fishing is a cozy idle game that sits in the corner of your screen. Go about your usual desk work (or don't) while your frog buddy catches fish, discovers new outfits, and unlocks fishing spots.

name: Demonfo
summary: A girl at the bottom of the ladder with bad luck finds a cleaning job, but she mistakenly enters a cleaning company that is in the business of exorcising ghosts. As the story develops, the girl realizes that there is a reason for her constant bad luck, and gradually her divine power awakens ......

name: Dear Mirror Flower
summary: I am here, in this world... A Japanese-style fantasy adventure by Kogado Studio. In this town, strange incidents never cease. Join Satoree Mizuki, a girl who can read others' minds, and uncover the truth behind these supernatural cases.

name: Decorum
summary: A retro-futuristic stealth adventure set in a grand 19th-century exhibition. Play as a decommissioned worker robot fighting for freedom. Blend in, avoid detection, and uncover the secrets hidden within the mechanical wonders around you…

name: Deadwalk: The Last War
summary:
Battle against zombies to survive, or be torn apart by the walking dead. Harness the powers of Ancient Gods and SURVIVE THE APOCALYPSE!

Dead walk: The Last War is a unique action strategy game set in the post-apocalyptic world. Forced to retreat from zombie-infested land, the humans used a forbidden Clone Technology to create genetically modified “Champions.” The player deploys these Champions in a battle against the non-stop horde of zombies and attempt to impose order in this chaotic world. Only the fittest will survive here.

name: Defe the Defender
summary: There’s no escape, only battle. On a mysterious island, an ancestral refuge withstands an endless attack. Defe must explore, build natural fortifications, and grow stronger to face the danger – with or without allies.

name: Dead Engine
summary: Fight to survive against zombies hunting in coordinated hordes through a pixel-art post-apocalyptic city. Loot the abandoned city, merge items to enhance your power, and expand your backpack. Each run tests your tactical skills while trading uncovers haunting survivor stories.

name: Death by Scrolling
summary: Welcome to Purgatory, now under new management! Death by Scrolling is a rogue-like vertically scrolling RPG where you kill enemies, collect gold, and avoid the Grim Reaper long enough to pay the Ferrymanʼs exorbitant river-crossing fee to the afterlife.

name: Death Infection
summary: This is a post-apocalyptic virtual world filled with zombies. Each city can accommodate up to 10,000 virtual avatars from around the globe simultaneously. Here, virtual avatars’ genitalia and sexual interactions are restored for every logged-in player. There are no shops, no top-up points.

name: Dead on Your Lawn
summary: Prepare for intense action, heart-pounding combat, and a fight for survival where every corner of the dungeon could be your last. Will you have what it takes to reclaim your lawn from the clutches of these parasitic fiends? The challenge is set, and the lawn is yours to protect!

name: Den-Den: Tokyo Horror
summary: Den-Den: Tokyo Horror is an open world, survival horror experience where you play as a caregiver for the elderly. Navigate the dark streets of Tokyo, choosing where to go and whom to care for. Not everyone can be saved. How many deaths will be on your watch this week?

name: DeadCore Redux
summary: DeadCore Redux is a challenging FPS-platformer set in a futuristic universe. Chain precise jumps, manipulate mechanisms with your SwitchGun, hunt hidden collectibles and new shortcuts, and push your skills to the limit as you climb a colossal Tower born from the void. Will you reach the Summit?

name: Detra
summary: DETRA is a story-rich supernatural horror game where you follow the story of Vir and Druxy, a scientist couple who delve into an abandoned laboratory, in search of a cure for an illness that Druxy has got. Follow along as the trip ends up revealing more about their relationship than was intended.

name: Deadlike
summary: Slash enemies with katanas, unload your guns and unleash gore-filled finishers as you fight through an advanced military facility in a brutal, action-filled Roguelike. Upgrade your skills, face deadly bosses and hunt down Chronos - the power-hungry maniac behind your sufferings.

name: Dead Freight
summary: Nova JET is a Synthwave survivor-like auto shooter! Pilot your JET (Juice Extraction Transport), Slice, Blast, Shoot and Explode enemies, collect Juice, Mine for power-ups, and Upgrade your JET by playing Plinko. All this for your malevolent employer, Nova Cola drinks company.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles 2: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Deluxe Edition Content:
- Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 Main Game
- Character Unlock Keys: Tengen Uzui, Obanai Iguro, Sanemi Shinazugawa, and Gyomei Himejima
- Battle Attire: Tanjiro's Kimono (Entertainment District), Inosuke's Kimono (Entertainment District), and Uzui's Shinobi Attire
- VS Mode System Voice: Upper Rank Demons Set (Akaza, Daki, Gyutaro, Gyokko, Zohakuten)
- Character Unlock Key: Academy Rengoku and Academy Uzui

name: Death Ring: Second Impact
summary: Death Ring: Second Impact is a turn-based Roguelite strategy game. As the commander of the "Griffin" squadron, you must lead your Mechas and Pilots to resist the threat of mutated monsters and approaching to the secrets hidden behind the Death Ring.

name: Debris 2x1 Hentai
summary: Debris is an indie survival pixelart game with arcade, rpg and horror elements. AND A HENTAI MODE! Set in a 2D post-apocalyptic lovecraft space scenario.

name: Death of a Dungslinger
summary: Abruptly reincarnated as a dung beetle, you’ll battle a colorful cast of the neighborhood’s baddest bugs as you scoot, scuttle, and shoot your way through charming 3D worlds. Ball up whatever material you can find, then sling it at your foes—or hop on and ride it around to outmaneuver them!

name: Dead Reset
summary: Trapped in a terrifying death-loop, surgeon Cole Mason is kidnapped and brought to an underwater facility, forced to operate on a patient to extract an evolving parasitic horror. Dead Reset is a blood-soaked interactive horror, where each death brings you closer to the truth.

name: Deadly Chance
summary: Deadly Chance is a psychological horror where you play as a prisoner in an aristocratic mansion. Explore, find clues, and face tough choices as hidden horrors test your sanity. Every decision matters—survival demands more than strength, but the courage to face the unknown.

name: Descendant of Night
summary: Descendant of Night is a love letter to the 00s era of survival horror. Play as Blake Cage, a sharp-tongued operative of Vector Six - humanity’s last hope against the darkness. Unravel a gripping, lore-rich mystery of ancient immortals, bloodthirsty vampires, and the desperate struggle of mankind.

name: Dead Man's Drive
summary: Blast through hellish landscapes in Dead Man’s Drive, a high-speed vehicular combat game where survival is the only goal. Arm your ride with deadly weapons, face relentless supernatural foes, and conquer brutal environments. Drive, shoot, and escape—if you can.

name: Den Pain
summary: My name is Dan. I lost my job, my money, and my silver spoons.Betrayed, robbed, cast aside.But at night, the city whispers: it's time to take it back.Everything will be Quiet and Standard.

name: Deep Space Exploitation
summary: Deep Space Exploitation is a space mining game featuring 2D physics, fully destructible asteroids, and a story of survival under an exploitative corporation. Use your equipment wisely, upgrade your ship, and make difficult decisions to secure your future!

name: Dead Oil
summary: Defend your armored rig against ruthless raiders in this intense roguelike survival driller. Extract precious Oil, scavenge resources, and upgrade your rig. Is there enough time to drill a little deeper and reinforce your rig before the raiders launch their next attack?

name: Decadence
summary: Decadence, a psychological horror game, is an immersive experience full of nerve-racking events that will make you question reality itself. As you look forward to your wedding anniversary with your wife, what is this unnerving presence that keeps chasing you around?

name: Dead Pixels
summary: 5,000 years into the future... All of humanity is wiped out. It is up to you to guide the robot through what is left of the earth, before her battery drains.

name: Deck of Destiny: Battleforge
summary: "Deck of Destiny: Battleforge calls you to write your own legend in an endless battle! In this game that combines strategy, action, and roguelike deck-building elements, survive on the thin line between chance and strategy, shape your destiny, and become a legendary warrior!"

name: Deck of Stabs
summary: Every card is a weapon. Every decision matters. Battle through strange worlds and dangerous dungeons. Discover exotic weapons, powerful gear, and deadly skills. Burn, curse, explode, and smash your way to victory. Every run is different—just bring your best blades.

name: Deeper You Go
summary: You control a camera that goes down into a deep hole. More horrors you'll face, the deeper you go.

name: Desk Garden
summary: Relax and grow! A laid-back idle game where you nurture mysterious plants (some even human-like!), watch them flourish, then sell them to expand your magical garden. Design your own unique oasis at your own pace.

name: Deadly Swag
summary: A co-op horror shooter set in the Zone. Explore dangerous locations, collect artifacts, fight mutants, and avoid deadly anomalies. Survive together, sell your loot, and return for more challenges. In the Zone, every step is a fight for survival.

name: Demonic Mahjong
summary: Demonic Mahjong is a Roguelike deckbuilding game inspired by the timeless mechanics of Mahjong. Masterfully use the tiles in your hand to craft powerful combinations, reach staggering high scores, and develop strategies that are uniquely your own!

name: Dead Finger Dice: A Billionaire Killing Game
summary: Play a sinister game of poker dice against blood-thirsty demon billionaires who’ve trapped you on their mega yacht in this rogue-like dice builder.

name: Demeo x Dungeons & Dragons: Battlemarked
summary: A cooperative tactical RPG set in the D&D universe. Embark on a fantasy tabletop adventure. Your quest, on your schedule.

name: Deadline Savior
summary: This idle RPG adventure is based on the "Pomodoro Technique." Complete focused work sessions to advance your character's exploration. To reclaim the Goddess's Hourglass and restore peace, the hero must defeat the evil dragon "Procrastination" and its minions. The world’s fate is in your hands!

name: Destroy Spongebob
summary:
In attempt to bring some good ol' assassin into the portal, I present to you Spongebob Squarepants Assassin, where you get to kill Spongebob and Gary the Snail.

If you haven't gotten inside the pineapple house, you haven't gone far enough.

name: Dead Take
summary: Find your missing friend. Uncover the secrets within. Brave a luxurious and haunting mansion in Dead Take, a first-person psychological horror crafted by Surgent Studios.

name: Deus Ex: The Conspiracy
summary: The year is 2052 and the world is a dangerous and chaotic place. Terrorists operate openly - killing thousands; drugs, disease and pollution kill even more. The world's economies are close to collapse and the gap between the insanely wealthy and the desperately poor grows ever wider. Worst of all, an ages old conspiracy bent on world domination has decided that the time is right to emerge from the shadows and take control.

name: Deep Pixel Melancholy
summary: Deep Pixel Melancholy is a visual novel about being stuck in a time loop inside a gray, soulless city. Unravel the mystery, and decide whether escaping is really worth it.

name: Demonk
summary:
Demonk is a cooperative horror experience for 1–4 players, where you take on the sacred role of Slavic monks — trained in the forgotten art of dealing with the dead.

Your mission: communicate with ancient spirits, uncover their stories, and choose whether to banish them... or negotiate for peace.

Set in a world deeply rooted in Slavic mythology, every encounter is a test of faith, logic, and trust between players.

Success brings reward — money, relics, and reputation. But failure? That may cost your soul.

Will you find harmony with the beyond… or will the darkness consume you?

name: Deltarune Sakuya Battle
summary: This is a demo of the a Deltarune and Touhou fan game. Kris finds himself a new enemy that can control time! The Scarlet Devil Mansion chief maid Sakuya Izayoi.

name: Deep Room
summary: An anti escape room game where you explore the depths of a mysterious room.

name: Departure of Darkness
summary: This is a throwback to the golden age of survival-horror games. Set in a parasite-infected airport, the player is tasked with finding their brother by solving puzzles, sneaking past threats, and not making a sound… they’re always listening.

name: Detective Jake Hunter: Episode No. 01 - The Petty Murder of a Fragile Heart
Detective Jake Hunter: Episode No. 02 - Seaside City Conspiracy
Detective Jake Hunter: Episode No. 03 - Crash and Burn
Detective Jake Hunter: Episode No. 04 - As Time Goes By
Detective Jake Hunter: Episode No. 05 - The Red-Eyed Tiger
Deckbane
summary: Embark on a strategic roguelike quest to save the World in Deckbane, a tactical blend of turn-based deckbuilding and poker-powered combat. Collect cards, forge explosive bonds with pets, and play winning hands to unleash devastating attacks!

name: Dead Watch
summary: You're stuck in a time loop. Whenever you find a dead body, you go back to the past. The only way to escape the loop is to cheat destiny & change the future. Explore the castle and uncover its dark secrets to prevent the next killing

name: Deadswitch Combat
summary: Deadswitch Combat is a fast-paced 2D multiplayer shooter. Experience action-packed combat with hundreds of weapons, vehicle combat, and plenty of team-based game modes.

name: Destiny Isle
summary: "Destiny Isle" is a visual novel that combines survival horror, multiplayer combat, and puzzle-solving elements. Set in a mysterious isolated academy, players take on the role of newcomer Xu Fan, uncovering the academy's chilling secrets while navigating between darkness and hope.

name: Detective Firefly
summary: In Detective Firefly, your job is to solve cases by meticulously filling in the report with the locations and actions of all suspects at the time of the murder. Interrogate all witnesses, search for evidence, and form hypotheses to uncover the identity of the criminal and bring them to justice.

name: Deriva
summary: Pilot a submarine through a world swallowed by the ocean and explore what remains of civilization. Catch unique creatures, trade across floating cities, and upgrade your vessel in a narrative adventure with exploration, resource management, and meaningful encounters.

name: Deck of Memories
summary: Deck of Memories is a deckbuilding roguelite where you delve into the life of the last lighthouse keeper through immersive card dioramas. Customize your deck with a unique card crafting mechanic, explore fragmented memories, and uncover the secrets of the lighthouse.

name: Desert Angels
summary: A story-driven exploration game set in a desert scrapyard. Search for memories in the trash, speak to its ghosts, and blast new paths with the weapons you find. Seek the generator to save your oasis village, and make your choices: What gets to be remembered, and what gets to be forgotten?

name: Delfini
summary: Delfini is a gentle and delicate two-player cooperative ocean exploration game, it is about a moving journey where two dolphins bravely save the polluted coral reef island.

name: Deskeroes
summary: Deskeroes is a desktop idle game allows you to build and dispatch heroes to battle monsters, farm resources, mine, manage stores, and engage in other interesting activities within a fantasy world.

name: Dead by Backrooms Anomaly
summary: A story-driven psychological horror game filled with puzzles and comedic moments. Follow the thrilling, love-filled adventure of a woman as she navigates a mysterious and captivating atmosphere.

name: Dead Target
summary: Would you rather hide like a coward, or follow the call of duty, don your armor, and shoot for your survival in the ENDLESS ZOMBIES APOCALYPSE WAR? Equip yourself with DEADLY WEAPONS and essential SURVIVAL SKILLS to embark on the shooting journey through the undawn world of EVIL ZOMBIE FORCES in this spine-chilling First Person Shooter (FPS) game!

name: Dead Station Files
summary: Hardcore tactical roguelike puzzle about survival during a perfect storm of disasters aboard the space station. Explore, adapt, and plan your escape to uncover the truth behind the catastrophe. Or die.

name: Denovo
summary: Become the ultimate Guild Master in a pixel art world! Manage your guild, craft epic gear, uncover a vast bestiary, and recruiting a diverse team of adventurers and workers. Prepare your heroes for battle and unravel the mystery surrounding your missing king!

name: Deadly Deals
summary: You're a merchant in an antique shop. Buy, sell, develop. Easy as that. Just don't die. One little detail of a profitable location that realtors don't usually tell you...

name: Death Row Escape
summary: What started as a routine repair job becomes a fight for survival. Trapped in an abandoned prison controlled by a powerful AI, mercenaries, and deadly experiments, you must solve puzzles, break time loops, and escape!

name: Demonbyte
summary: fast-paced, retro-inspired boomer shooter where you blast through hordes of cyber-demons using outrageous weapons — including a husky puppy handgun. Inspired by classics from the 90's, every level drips with pixelated carnage, over-the-top firepower, and secrets to uncover.

name: Derailed
summary:
Embark on an epic journey through a world shattered by the apocalypse, where your decisions shape the fate of humanity.

In this pulse-pounding adventure game, you take control as a fearless train driver, navigating a wilderness teeming with danger. Survival is the only rule, and every choice you make could spell the difference between life and death.

As a global explorer, you'll gather vital resources, undertake daring quests, and battle monstrous enemies in your mission to become the hero this ravaged planet needs. Your railway odyssey is a race against time, but you can’t do this alone! It’s up to you to assemble a crew of skilled companions along the way to aid you in your fight for survival. Together, you’ll discover new locations, forge your path, and search for ways to save the final remains of this desperate world.

Navigate through treacherous terrain, defend against relentless threats, and uncover the secrets buried within this destroyed planet. Will you rise as the savior of your world, or will you let it fall to destruction? The choice is yours in this ultimate train adventure!

name: Dem Tanks
summary: Blast your way to victory in this fast-paced top-down shooter party game! Pilot futuristic hover tanks, unleash incredible turrets and get ready to wreak havoc in chaotic destructible local multiplayer arenas. But most importantly - destroy DEM TANKS!

name: Desktop Fisher
summary: "Work too exhausting? Go fishing instead!" This is a desktop idle fishing game made just for office warriors, letting you enjoy the joy of "paid fishing" right at your desk!

name: Desktop Aquarium
summary: Run a relaxing aquarium right on your taskbar! Feed fish, upgrade your tank, and discover rare species through an idle fishing system. *Desktop Aquarium* is the perfect soothing companion while you work, play, or browse.

name: Desk Paws
summary: Collect over 100 stylish little pets on your desktop! They can freely move along the bottom of your screen, or live in the little houses you've carefully decorated for them. Hmm... or perhaps send them on adventures to earn treats?

name: Delivery Pals
summary: Put on your thermos bags and head outside with your friends. You will have to deliver food to the aliens and make sure that the last company on Earth does not close down.

name: Destinia
summary: Destinia is an action/adventure RPG created by Aqua. It is the first in a long series of games, followed by Destinia Two, Destinia Three, and Destinia Strategy.

name: DepthLess
summary: A surreal first-person platformer horror game where you descend into nightmarish architecture, solve spatial puzzles, and survive grotesque creatures.

name: Detective Lawrence
summary:
A dark mystery. A strange machine. A detective’s most unusual case.
Detective Lawrence and the Cosmic Machine is a story-rich adventure game that blends classic adventure gameplay with cosmic horror and mind-bending puzzles.

You play as Detective Lawrence, summoned by an old friend—Edward, a brilliant but eccentric scientist—to a remote Victorian manor. He claims to have completed a revolutionary machine… but when you arrive, the mansion is abandoned, the staff are gone, and a disturbing silence hangs in the air. What happened here? And what did the machine truly do?

Explore atmospheric environments in beautifully crafted pixel art. Investigate, collect items, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover hidden mini-games scattered throughout the house. The deeper you go, the stranger, and more dangerous, the mystery becomes.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: War on Hoxxes
summary: WAR ON HOXXES is a fangame based on the critically acclaimed indie game "Deep Rock Galactic" by Ghost Ship Games. It is a hybrid between the insanity of Deep Rock's swarms, with the arcade themed structure and gameplay style of Mario Bros.

name: Destined Corp: Awakening
summary: Destined Corp, once a pioneer in AI-driven robotics, sees its creations evolve into self-aware beings who come to believe that humanity is "obsolete." These robots begin developing plans to create a new generation of humans—genetically engineered to be fully under their control.

name: Delving The Depths
summary: Escape imprisonment by delving into the caverns below your cell and exploring until your group reaches the surface in this first-person grid-based dungeon crawler.

name: Deep Space Corridor
summary: In a mysterious space station, you, as a tester, will inspect designated areas to determine if everything is normal. If you detect any anomalies, do your utmost to reach the correct door.

name: Dead by Daylight: Five Nights at Freddy's
summary: Dead by Daylight's Five Nights at Freddy's includes a new Killer, Springtrap. Purchasing this add-on unlocks an exclusive Stack of Pizzas badge and the Vent Crawl banner.

name: Desire For Power: Council Intrigues
summary: A text-based, choice-driven adventure. Intrigue, trust, loyalty, luck, reflex... How high a position can you achieve in this medieval world?

name: Deep Hell
summary: Immerse yourself in a dark dense forest in which terrible inexplicable things happen. You will have to find the missing people's belongings by following the coordinates left in the notes of the missing brother. Someone or something lives in the forest and changes everyone who goes there.

name: Desktop Wooden Fish
summary: Desktop electronic wooden fish, a unique casual decompression game. In the game, by tapping on the wooden fish and listening to realistic sound effects, it feels like being in a serene and elegant environment. It supports automatic tapping and has customization options, allowing users to set words.

name: Decklings
summary: Start your own pirate crew and tame Decklings as you explore the uncharted islands in this card management deck-building game. Collect resources, craft recipes, and train your Decklings to engage in challenging card-based battles to become the Pirate Champion!

name: Deal With the Devil Chapter: 2 - From Tuonela to Hell
summary: Point-and-click adventure featuring eerie scenes

name: Desktop Clicker
summary: Desktop Clicker is an idle clicker game that runs in a small window, letting you click monsters while working or gaming. Battle 90+ unique pixel creatures, upgrade passive damage, and unlock powerful prestige rewards. Enjoy incremental progression without interrupting your workflow!

name: Deltarune: Wilter's Wonderland
summary:
This is a Deltarune fangame about the character, Wilter

A secret boss interpretation for Deltarune Chapter 3, based off of the flowers in Toriel's trashcan.

Wilter is a funny little flower clown, who loves to play games with his best friend, you!

Doesn’t that sound Wonderfull?

This fangame contains both the battle and Wilter’s sidequest!

name: Death Stranding 2: On The Beach - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Death Stranding 2: On The Beach full game for PS5.
48h early access
Machine Gun [MP] (Lv.1) early unlock
Patch 70: Quokka
Patch 71: Chiral Cat
Patch 72: Why Me?
Battle Skeleton: Gold (Lv.1)(Lv.2)(Lv.3)
Boost Skeleton: Gold (Lv.1)(Lv.2)(Lv.3)
Bokka Skeleton: Gold (Lv.1)(Lv.2)(Lv.3)

name: Desktop Waifu
summary: A Desktop pet, idle clicker game in which you collect accessories and clothing for your waifu in exchange for clicks and taps.

name: Derail: Sacrifice
summary: Derail is a story-driven puzzle game similar to Rusty Lake. The once peaceful town was thrown into chaos when a coffin falls from the sky. The villagers vanished all of sudden. Only things left are embryos scattered on the empty streets. When you opened the coffin, a living person walked out.

name: Depths Of Apollyon
summary: A dark fantasy third-person action RPG with fast-paced melee and ranged combat, fluid parkour traversal, and customizable gear. Explore a vibrant world, master challenging encounters, and uncover the secrets of what lies in the depths.

name: Delivery Hot
summary: In this delivery-themed, 2D pixel action adventure, you play as a delivery man doing food runs and completing extra missions. Meet women and enjoy some "benefits" that make this a man's dream job!

name: Debugging Hero
summary: As the Debugging Hero chosen by the Legendary Sword, you have gained the ability to manipulate character variables! Use this powerful ability to overcome the dungeons blocking your path and defeat the Demon Lord!

name: Dear me, I was…
summary:
Dear me, I was… is an interactive adventure that lets you enjoy a story woven with beautiful visuals, fusing the vibrant watercolor style of Taisuke Kanasaki with rotoscoping technology.

In this story, you will relive the life of a certain woman. Experience joy, sorrow, and growth through her ordinary and humble life. Witness the story she weaves in a life interconnected with others.

name: Demons' Night Fever
summary:
Misdeed, Theft, Abduction, Plunder. This is a tale of “Evil,” where anything goes.
Where the hero is a dull boy named Kyoshiro, who hates the world. And a self-proclaimed evil god having lost his powers appears to him. Team up with the evil god and go beyond the limits of evil! Steal! Abduct! Terminate! Let your evil show!

name: Dead Cells+
summary: A port of Dead Cells exclusive to Apple Arcade, with all the game’s main DLC expansions excluding the Everyone is Here! expansion.

name: Devastablance Mountain Brotherhood
summary: A dynamic sci-fi adventure, the events of which unfold in a post-apocalypse setting, the catalyst of which is a terrifying nuclear war.

name: Deltascention
summary: Deltascention is a fast-paced action roguelike with a ton of upgrades and a whole collection of editable arena's, and not to mention the weapons! Fight your way through all 50 waves to take out the final boss and save the world outside!

name: DeathBall
summary: You And An Adversarial Wizard Do Battle to the Death with Arcade Soccer Platforming Action for the Magical Implement Known Only As The DeathBall.

name: Deltarules
summary: Deltarules is a Deltarune Hard mode with internet humor, new bosses and new bullet patterns

name: Decodence
summary: Decodence is an ultra fast paced first person movement shooter set in a Deco-Punk universe. It brings a highly advanced, open ended movement system together with hard to learn, skill based combat mechanics.

name: Deluge
summary: Deluge is a brooding, story-driven RPG where you play as the resurrected antihero Hudson, a corpse tasked with infiltrating a battered community. Bound to a tyrant’s will but haunted by your past, you must battle monsters and make choices that shape your path toward redemption... or lead it to ruin.

name: Deltarune: Reimagined - Angelic Altercation
summary:
Deltarune:Reimagined - ANGELIC ALTERCATION is the first small fangame of Deltarune:Reimagined created by ZET, an Alternate Universe of Toby Fox's Deltarune— showing the first battle you have with Chapter 4's Secret Boss.

In it, you play as Kris, who, after falling from a very high place while trying to escape from the Faith Enforcer, has lost their friends and must traverse a Crystalline Forest, when all of the sudden, they find a strange path...

name: Depth:Origin
summary: Depth:Origin is a rhythm game that takes the approach of a shooting game. ・Shoot the enemies that attack you in time with the rhythm ・Avoid the boss's attacks in time with the music Use these two actions to save energy for your ship and defeat the boss.

name: Demon Raiders: Bloody Gems of Blood
summary: A vulgar, cute & competitive party game! Stab your friends (2~4 players) and splatter their blood across loads of levels! Pools of blood will spawn rotten-blood monsters and power-up chests! Get stabbed! Get eaten! Never die! Even if you become poop! Single player co-op campaign also in development!

name: Delve Survivors
summary: An old-school roguelike game with modern survivors-like action! Delve into multiple retro pixelated dungeons where you control the pace with fast, reactive turn based movement and ever expanding skills which enable you to plow through hordes of enemies before escaping with the loot

name: Descension
summary: Descend into the Alternate Realm to save your lost friend and face The Ultimate Entity. Customize your party, master unique Soul Shards, and grow stronger—physically, mentally, and emotionally—in this stat-driven sandbox RPG.

name: Deathgasm
summary: Slice through legions of hellspawn, and rock out in Deathgasm, a blood-drenched retro action-horror platformer inspired by Jason Howden’s cult horror-comedy masterpiece!

name: Death and Tactics
summary: A post apocalyptic turn-based strategy game. Permanent death is a primary mechanic, with unique events and items being unlocked based on how you play the game. Your choices matter and each loss reveals new strategic opportunity, cutting down on time wasted spent grinding or resetting.

name: Destructo Truck
summary: A action flash game in which the player controls a large truck and upgrades the truck to make the truck land as far as possable.

name: DeviLevel: Try Again
summary: Precision Platforming Meets Demonic Challenge

name: Death Frame
summary: Explore a haunted mansion, uncover a killers madness, and enter surreal paintings to relive the twisted mind of a killer. Danger and mystery are lurking behind the screaming walls of this fascinating and frightening horror adventure.

name: Dear Leader
summary: A political leadership simulation game inspired by Papers Please, developed during the 2014 Double Fine Amnesia Fortnight Gamejam.

name: Descentarium
summary: Play as Kero, a determined frog trapped in a strange, enclosed world with no clear way out. This 2D roguelike platformer takes you deep into dark, shifting caves filled with hidden dangers, valuable resources, and secrets waiting to be uncovered.

name: Desktop Cat
summary: Here's a black cat and a door—sometimes the cat will chase your mouse cursor around. The door leads to different places. Open it to check today's weather, invite idle friends to hang out on your screen, or go play some pinball and collect a few paintings.

name: Death Kitchen
summary: Death Kitchen is an immersive fast-paced co-op cooking horror game. You must coordinate with your friends to serve alien customers who can kill you in many situations. You can morph into a variety of characters! Embrace the chaos and deliver quality with your new intergalactic restaurant chain.

name: DeTails
summary: DeTails is a narrative adventure starring Cami, a bass player and color slinging chameleon as she travels with her band The Hexes. Explore a vibrant world bursting with a colorful cast of characters. Master mini-games, fight the man, and learn what it means to grow up without losing your edge!

name: Deductum
summary: Minimalistic puzzle game where you build formal logical proofs.

name: Deck of Anubis
summary: Descend into the Egyptian underworld in this roguelike deck-builder. Guided by Anubis, draw sacred blessings from the Book of the Dead and forge divine synergies. Face ancient trials and forgotten spirits as you journey through the Duat toward judgment, balance, and rebirth.

name: Deliverance
summary:
You are a nameless messenger, tasked with bringing a sealed letter to the top of a cursed tower. The recipient waits, cursed to remain in the tower. The message must never be read.

But countless messengers came before you… and all failed to resist the temptation.

name: Derpy Fish
summary: Derpy Fish is a casual puzzle/adventure game where you guide a small school of fish with different abilities.

name: Delta 78
summary: A crew member wakes up alone on a silent ship. Something is wrong. Something is watching. Delta 78: The Passenger is a dark sci-fi experience with interactive storytelling and stealth gameplay.

name: Dead Sea Scrolls
summary: Dead Sea Scrolls is a vanilla compatible (comp -3) episode replacement for Ultimate Doom. The "story" is a schlocky adventure with the real life mystery of the Dead Sea Scrolls and Abrahamic mythology sprinkled on top. Emphasis is on varied, approachable gameplay with anything from puzzle, stealth, horror, to light slaughter.﻿﻿

name: Deemo: Reborn - Taiko no Tatsujin Collaboration Collection
summary: The DEEMO -Reborn- Taiko no Tatsujin Collaboration Collection contains 5 songs and 25 charts.

name: Decorative Plants
summary: More plants to decorate with, because as it is, there ain't near enough.

name: Deathtouch
summary: An open-world horror survival game where exploration leads to hidden secrets—and lurking nightmares. Uncover mysterious locations, navigate eerie environments, and survive terrifying encounters in a world that feels truly alive.

name: Deemo: Reborn - M2U X Nicode Collection
Deemo: Reborn - Classic Song Packs Season Pass
summary: This season pass includes 12 music packs, for a total of 60 songs and 300 charts.

name: Deemo: Reborn - Eshen Chen Collection Vol.1: Transmission
DeadShore
summary: Deadshore is an VR wave based Island survival filled with the undead. The strategy you pick will be the deciding factor in how long you survive. Pick your weapon of chose and see how long you can survive.

name: Deadline Escape
summary: Deadline Escape is a Low Poly Extraction Looter Shooter that throws you into a Post-Apocalyptic World. Scavenge for valuable resources, face deadly enemies and fight for your survival as the clock ticks down toward the deadline.

name: Destiny Spire
summary: Destiny Spire is a party-based RPG inspired by the classics. Form your party by choosing from 8 different classes then set off on your quest. A real-time twist on classic turn-based combat lets characters and enemies attack as soon as their speed bars fill...you'll need your wits and your reflexes!

name: Delivered on Time
summary: Delivered on Time is a first-person horror game themed around food delivery. As an elite delivery pro, nothing—not ghosts, hauntings, or even supernatural battles—will stop you from getting the food to the customer's door… on time!

name: Detective Mane
summary: When items go missing and mysterious occurrences disrupt every day life, Detective Leonardo Mane is on the scene. Investigate, interrogate, accuse and solve the case.

name: Devil Hunter: Raider
summary: Live Your True Self, Change Class Anytime, Anywhere, Experience a New Open World Adventure!

name: Desafio Quiz
summary: Desafio Quiz is a game packed with thousands of challenges for you to have fun and learn. With it, you can create rooms for group battles and stimulate your thinking while learning through play! In Desafio Quiz, you can track your performance statistics, unlock achievements, and have fun while challenging your mind! You can also follow your ranking compared to other players on the global, monthly, and daily leaderboards, and study for exams using a special module with real questions from previous tests.

name: Dead Exhale
summary: Make a sound on your mic, and something will hear you. This isn’t your typical monster. He won’t just hunt you, he’ll toy with you. And as you get better, he adapts, evolving to match your skill in this tentacle-infested nightmare.

name: Deckstination
summary: Deckstination is a real-time combat and deck-building hybrid. In this action roguelike, players use customized skill decks to overcome enemies in battles. Combine randomly drawn skills to survive intense encounters and take control of the battlefield with your own actions and strategy.

name: Deadzone: Rogue: Operative Pack
summary: Deadzone: Rogue is a roguelite FPS set in space. Blast through hordes of enemies with devastating weapons. Define your combat style with powerful augments and upgrades. Grow stronger with each death, solo or in co-op. Fight. Die. Revive. Repeat.

name: Death Trash: Perished City
summary: Perished City is a major update for Death Trash (version 0.14) that expands the main campaign with new locations, quests, characters, enemies, and items. The update introduces a story centered around a mysterious woman who transforms into a revered figure within a decaying city. It also includes UI improvements, bug fixes, co-op sync updates, and performance optimizations.

name: Death Trial
summary: This is a casual game with platform jumping!

name: Deepest Well
summary: Deepest Well is a game where you fight off waves of enemies in a descending well with destructible terrain. Get upgrades after each wave and make insane builds to break the game!

name: Deadline
summary: Step into the future with Deadline, a VR corridor shooter that pits you against relentless robotic enemies. Arm yourself with a variety of weapons, master lethal combos, and navigate through challenging levels. Can you survive the robotic onslaught and unlock the secrets of the future?

name: Deep Down
summary: Embark on an epic mining adventure in "Deep Down," an Action RPG with procedurally generated caves, real-time mining, crafting, and combat. Upgrade your tools, manage resources, and uncover hidden secrets as you delve deeper into the earth.

name: Dentist Hour: Escape Room
summary: Afraid of the dentist? You should be...Welcome to Dentist Hour, the escape room where your worst nightmares take shape. Enter a peculiar dental clinic where each room hides secrets, riddles... and horrors. Do you dare to sit in the chair?

name: Dead Soul Tower Defense: Shadow Labyrinth
summary: This is a pixel-style classic tower defense game. You need to summon souls to fend off enemy attacks, and each type of soul has its unique skill tree. You can also build your own maze in the game to prevent enemy invasions.

name: Delicious: Emily's Road Trip - Collector's Edition
summary: Try to master the challenges of being a chef, wife, mother and vlogging celebrity. Use your time management skills while cooking all the delicious dishes and serving your customers their food in time. This collector's edition contains 30 bonus challenge levels.

name: Detective: Scene Crime
summary: Step into the role of a detective in DETECTIVE Scene Crime, a challenging mystery game where you’ll investigate five gripping crime scenes. Each level presents clues, testimonies, and puzzles to analyze carefully in your quest for the truth. Do you have what it takes to solve them all?

name: Dewazma
summary: Dewazma is a psychological horror experience that draws from generational trauma, spiritual mystery, and the darkness we carry within. Step into Rameen's world, where silence speaks, time loops, and the truth waits in the shadows. Face what was lost. Or be consumed by it.

name: Destiny Code
summary: A card battle RPG woven with bishojo! In a clash over the relics of a lost civilization, what choices will they make? A dramatic chronicle where strategy and decisions shape fate.

name: Desert Thunder
summary:
Strap into the cockpit of a high-tech helicopter and soar through a vast desert in this thrilling VR adventure. Your mission: navigate treacherous terrain to rescue prisoners of war, destroy enemy radar stations, and dominate the skies. But the action doesn’t stop in the air—step out of your heli to engage in intense ground combat, clearing enemy outposts or securing objectives on foot. For sharpshooters, test your skills at the shooting range and compete to set the ultimate high score.

In this alpha release, experience dynamic, objective-based gameplay that challenges your piloting precision, combat prowess, and strategic thinking. Fly through canyons, evade enemy fire, and execute daring POW extractions under pressure, all while battling the desert’s shifting sands. On the ground, face off against hostile forces in immersive firefights, adding a new layer of intensity to your missions.

As an early access title, this is just the start. Look forward to a growing roster of missions, expanded environments, and exciting new features in future updates. Whether you’re raining destruction from above, fighting on foot, or aiming for the top of the shooting range leaderboards, this VR helicopter game delivers an adrenaline-pumping experience that puts you in the heart of the action!

name: Dead by Daylight: The Walking Dead
summary: Dead by Daylight's The Walking Dead includes 2 new Survivors, Rick Grimes and Michonne. Purchasing this add-on unlocks an exclusive Sheriff's Hat badge and Tank in Ruins banner.

name: Dead by Daylight: The Walking Dead - Daryl Dixon
summary: This is a cosmetic outfit for Rick Grimes available in the in-game store. Daryl Dixon is a totally new character minus the unique Perks. Designed after Norman Reedus’ likeness and featuring original voice lines from Reedus himself, this Outfit will allow you to don the wing-backed vest and channel your innermost bike-riding outdoorsman. Theres only one catch: the Entity’s Realm is a crossbow-free zone.

name: Dead by Daylight: Stranger Things - Jonathan Byers
summary: This is a cosmetic outfit for Steve Harrington in the in-game store that allows you to play as Jonathan Byers, who doesn't have any unique gameplay perks.

name: Dead by Daylight: Silent Hill - Lisa Garland
summary: This is a cosmetic outfit for Cheryl Mason in the in-game store that allows you to play as Lisa Garland, who doesn't have any unique gameplay perks.

name: Dead by Daylight: Silent Hill - Cybil Bennett
summary: This is a cosmetic outfit for Cheryl Mason in the in-game store that allows you to play as Cybil Bennett, who doesn't have any unique gameplay perks.

name: Dead by Daylight: Silent Hill - James Sunderland
summary: This is a cosmetic outfit for Cheryl Mason in the in-game store that allows you to play as James Sunderland, who doesn't have any unique gameplay perks.

name: Dead by Daylight: Resident Evil - Claire Redfield
summary: This is a cosmetic outfit for Jill Valentine in the in-game store that allows you to play as Claire Redfield, who doesn't have any unique gameplay perks.

name: Dead by Daylight: Resident Evil - Sheva Alomar
summary: This is a cosmetic outfit for Jill Valentine in the in-game store that allows you to play as Sheva Alomar, who doesn't have any unique gameplay perks.

name: Dead by Daylight: Resident Evil - Chris Redfield
summary: This is a cosmetic outfit for Leon Scott Kennedy in the in-game store that allows you to play as Chris Redfield, who doesn't have any unique gameplay perks.

name: Dead by Daylight: Resident Evil - Carlos Oliveira
summary: This is a cosmetic outfit for Leon Scott Kennedy in the in-game store that allows you to play as Carlos Oliveira, who doesn't have any unique gameplay perks.

name: Dead by Daylight: Resident Evil - Hunk
summary: This is a cosmetic outfit for the Legion killer in the in-game store that allows you to play as HUNK, who doesn't have any unique gameplay perks.

name: Death Mountain
summary: Trapped in a snowbound medical camp, battlefield nurse May clings to a mysterious letter—a final hope. Uncover hidden truths, test fragile bonds, and navigate a path toward a distant sanatorium. Will you find salvation, or something far darker?

name: Death Kid + There's a Gun in the Office Bundle
summary: Escape the shadows or embrace the fight - two thrilling journeys, one unmissable bundle.

name: Detective Worden
summary: As a private detective, you’ll crack word clues left by a mysterious informant, gather evidence, and uncover the truth hidden in the shadows.

name: DeepBubbles
summary: A dreamy idle aquarium game set in the deep sea, where players collect, feed, and evolve a variety of fish to build their own underwater paradise. Tap bubbles to release food, attract fish, complete tasks, and relax in a soothing aquatic world.

name: Dead in Your TrackZ
summary: Dead In Your TrackZ is a VR Zombie Shooter where you defend your train from hordes of zombies while you fuel up. Shoot up zombies, get cool upgrades, and above all, survive. Coming soon!

name: Dermapis
summary: In Dermapis, a point-and-click adventure set (mostly) in an apartment, you take on the role of its resident: Yvette. Meet interesting characters, solve puzzles, and make decisions that can influence the plot.

name: Deep Saturation
summary: Deep Saturation is a short analog horror game inspired by real limnic disasters. Navigate a fog-choked lake, deploy failing equipment, and document the depths with single-use cameras. What you capture may reveal more than you ever wanted to know.

name: Decon Protocol
summary: Dive into sci-fi alien worlds where you wipe out Alien scourge by deconstructing them into parts to upgrade your base and your DECON unit, allowing you to produce higher outputs, more damage, more gains, and JUST MORE. DECON PROTOCOL is an incremental game with idle and clicker mechanics.

name: Deadline Delivery
summary: Strap in, floor it, and deliver the goods — before the bomb goes off. Play as Carl, a monkey driving a mail truck rigged with explosives on a tight deadline. Play solo or with friends in this chaotic, explosive monkey mayhem!

name: Deep Within the Mist
summary: "Deep Within the Mist" is a 2D narrative-driven RPG. In a distant past, a sudden “Calamity” nearly destroyed Earth. Thick mists erupted across the world. Gazing upon the desolate land, a determined girl named Ruo Xi steps into the mist, seeking a way to end the Calamity.

name: Deadly Metropolis
summary: Deadly Metropolis is an intense, fast paced beat 'em up that takes the genre to brutal new heights. The deadliest era is here, a battle rages in the depths of Neo Babylos! Are you ready?!

name: Devils Due
summary: DEVIL'S DUE - A hellish slot machine RPG! Face demonic bosses in slot-based combat, collect Lucky Charms, and manage your debt to the Devil. Win big to deal damage, but demons turn your victories against you. Three phases of challenge await. Will you pay the Devil's Due?

name: Death Stairwell 99F
summary: You are trapped in a stairwell, and as you delve deeper, the stairwell becomes increasingly abnormal and dangerous. Abnormal event, unknown monster, can you escape alive.

name: Death Mask
summary: A series of murders follows a mysterious ritual dance in rural China.

name: Deadboot
summary: DEADBOOT is a fast-paced retro roguelike FPS. Blast through randomized levels, scavenge weapons and upgrades along the way, and see how far you can make it in this neon death zone.

name: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster: Costume & BGM - Chris Redfield
summary: This contains a costume for Frank, and BGM that can be played in the shopping mall.

name: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster: Costume & BGM - Tron Bonne
summary: This contains a costume for Frank, and BGM that can be played in the shopping mall.

name: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster: Costume & BGM - Sheriff
summary: This contains a costume for Frank, and BGM that can be played in the shopping mall.

name: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster: Costume & BGM - Chainsaw Villager
summary: This contains a costume for Frank, and BGM that can be played in the shopping mall.

name: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster: Costume & BGM - Licker
summary: This contains a costume for Frank, and BGM that can be played in the shopping mall.

name: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster: Costume & BGM - Ashley Graham
summary: This contains a costume for Frank, and BGM that can be played in the shopping mall.

name: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster: Costume & BGM - Rikuo
summary: This contains a costume for Frank, and BGM that can be played in the shopping mall.

name: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster: Costume & BGM - Leon S. Kennedy
summary: This contains a costume for Frank, and BGM that can be played in the shopping mall.

name: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster: Costume & BGM - Nemesis
summary: This contains a costume for Frank, and BGM that can be played in the shopping mall.

name: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster: Costume & BGM - Lan Hikari
summary: This contains a costume for Frank, and BGM that can be played in the shopping mall.

name: Decline's Drops: Shoes & Mirrors
summary:
The second major free content update of Decline's Drops is available right now!

It adds:

QUE SERA, the Third Puppet, is now playable! She's a slender, elegant yet fierce fighter! You'll need to find how to unlock her before you can test her moveset.

THE MIROIRS MENSONGERS, A brand new world which adds 4 stages and a unique boss. Unlocked once specific conditions are met.

BONUS STAGES: Race to the finish in this top down racer! Winning the race shall unlock

COLOR ALTS : There are now many alt. colors available for Globule AND Que Sera! I had a lot of fun making these!

name: Devose
summary: DEVOSE is a cooperative horror game for 1 to 4 players. Explore, survive, and be the hunter or be hunted. Every corridor is a trap. Every noise can betray you. Coordinate or die alone.

name: Descent
summary: An unexpected disaster traps you inside a research station. With the main exit blocked, you must make your way through the darkest and most twisted pits of the complex and survive against all odds while uncovering the secrets that were never meant to see the light of day...

name: Deadliest Deep Sea Catch Fishing Simulator
summary: Gear up and survive the deadliest fishing grounds.

name: Delirium: Echoes of the Domino
summary: Delirium: Echoes of the Domino is a supernatural roguelike where each placed domino alters a cursed board and unleashes echoes of ancient curses. Confront time-warped entities and break the cycle... or become part of it.

name: Desktop Pasture
summary: A Low Poly stylized idle-pasture simulator designed to sit at the bottom of your screen allowing you to work on other tasks while caring for your pasture and animals!

name: Deodar
summary: A short, non-violent, retro-inspired platformer

name: Detective VR
summary: Step into a thrilling narrative investigation in Virtual Reality! In DETECTIVE VR, you control time, collect crucial clues, and interview witnesses to unravel the plot.

name: D.E.A.T.H.
summary: Abducted by an alien civilization, you are given the chance to prove humanity is ready to join the intergalactic community. All you need to do is escape!

name: Death Metal Derby
summary: Missiles, machine guns, and total vehicular destruction. Welcome to Death Metal Derby, the most brutal car combat tournament ever! Choose from a wild cast of 20+ combatants, each with their own deadly ride and special weapon. Battle through chaotic, destruction-filled madness in over 25 arenas.

name: Deathrun
summary: Deathrun is a multiplayer game where you race through thrilling obstacle courses. Overcome traps, outrun opponents, and be the last one standing. Enjoy vibrant cartoonish graphics, character customization, and dynamic levels!

name: Delivery Up
summary: Delivery Up is a chaotic vertical platformer about a stunt courier who must climb 10,000 meters to deliver every order on time. Lose your footing — but don’t lose your backpack!

name: Desktop Heroes
summary: Desktop Heroes is a unique idle RPG designed to be your faithful companion while you work. Set just above your taskbar, this game runs in the background, letting you build a team of courageous heroes, battle monstrous foes, and collect loot; all without disrupting your productivity.

name: Dead to Rights: Retribution - GAC Pack
summary:
Campaign expansion - "Assault on the 87th Precinct" is a new mission that reveals a flip side to the story, allowing players to experience the action from the GAC (Grant City Anti-Crime) enemy's side of the battle. Players step into the boots of the GAC Sniper, Brawler and Tank characters as they converge upon the GCPD (Grant City Police Department) stronghold under orders to contain all police officers so they can secure a tactical advantage.

In "Riot Control Mode," Jack and Shadow fend off increasingly difficult waves of GAC forces to earn points and achievements based on speed and style, with high score bragging rights on international leaderboards. In addition, the previously exclusive "Jack Pack" and "Shadow Pack" are also included in the "GAC Pack" allowing players to access armor for Jack, stealth camouflage for Shadow, an "action mode" with explosive rounds gunplay, and a "noir mode" with a black, white and red graphic filter.

name: Deck & Conn
summary: Take command of a nuclear-powered space corvette in a Cold War-flavored sci-fi campaign. Balance tactics, crew, and limited resources in a dynamic forever-war. Retro pixel art meets deep strategy fifteen minutes into the future of 1989.

name: Delve
summary: Delve is a multiplayer puzzle-platformer where players control adorable creatures as they dig through underground caverns in search of treasure.

name: DeMon Researcher
summary: DeMon Researcher is a sci-fi survival horror where rogue AIs rule and humanity hides. When a leader’s daughter is taken by the terrifying DeMon, one man must uncover the truth—if he survives. Face off against deadly AI across 4 intense stages using guns, grenades, and grit.

name: Deep Line
summary: Deep beneath the abandoned subway, an unknown threat awaits. Collect gold and find a way out.

name: Denshattack!
summary: Flip, trick and grind your train in a fast-paced, off-the-rails ride through a colourful Japanese dystopia. Outmatch rival gangs, wreck a shady megacorp, and take back the tracks with nothing but skill, speed, and style.

name: Death Wish
summary: Death Wish is a multiplayer game where you fight for your existence. Try your best in different game modes and become the last one "alive". Sit down at the table, outsmart your opponents and watch them tremble as the barrels turn...

name: Demons Are Coming!: Forged in Battle
Death Train!!! Samara – Voronezh.
summary: An exhilarating visual novel blending thriller and dark comedy. A tale of a train, money, greedy people, and bears.

name: Deep Snake
summary: Non-Euclidean snake where you can go forever deeper and deeper into the void... ...and if you're good enough, into the daily leaderboards

name: Detective Club: Gallery of Shadows - Collector's Edition
summary: A forged Renaissance painting leads three young detectives on a thrilling chase to uncover a centuries-old secret. Solve puzzles, crack codes, and unravel the mystery in this exciting hidden-object adventure!

name: Depression Level 50
summary: A day in the life of a hardcore gamer with a serious problem.

name: Death Comes Skiing
summary: When a retired cross-country ski team meets to celebrate their past victories, the past soon catches up to them. It's up to you to make sense of the slaughter that follows in this comedic point-and-click murder mystery.

name: Detecti Meow
summary: This game is a cat personification reasoning game. Players will play as "Detective Cat" talking with cats to obtain evidence, unlock new locations and obtain clues and testimonies to solve various mysteries. Including three cases:

name: Demon with a Pickaxe
summary: A small incremental game with a twisted tale. You are a demon, trapped behind immense layers of ice in an ancient cave. Your only tools? A mysterious pickaxe, a pathetic fire spell, and a magic crystal to upgrade them to absurd power levels. Oh, and you keep finding messages from an old... 'friend'.

name: Death Sees Twice: Spot the Difference
summary: The world's most evil spot the difference game. When you see the last mistake, you will know the truth of this world.

name: Deck vs. Doom
summary: Deck Vs Doom is a deckbuilding tower defense game where you use cards to deploy towers, traps, and spells to stop relentless waves of enemies. Between battles, you visit different shops to expand and upgrade your deck, collect powerful artifacts, and shape unique strategies. The game features wave-based progression, endless build possibilities, and evolving synergies that grow stronger with every run.

name: Desktop Fishes
summary: A cozy idle aquarium overlay that brings your desktop to life with pixel-art fish you can hatch, breed, and collect in thousands of genetic combinations. Dress them up with accessories, watch them grow from eggs to adults, and unlock playful upgrades through a quirky skill tree.

name: Deathmoon
summary: A brutal first-person roguelike shooter with fluid combat, responsive movement, and endless build possibilities.

name: Denrei Survivors
summary: This is a survivor-style game. Fight off waves of enemies—middle-aged men turned into Denrei (electric spirits)—while choosing weapons and items to power up your own unique build. Dive into randomly generated dungeons and experience the addictive gameplay set in a one-of-a-kind world!

name: Defense Collapse
summary: Defense Collapse is a strategy game set in a medieval fantasy world. Pioneer the unexplored dark forest, build your town and defenses, and hold out against the massive hordes of enemies. How long can you survive?

name: Der Räuber Hotzenplotz
summary: "The Robber Hotzenplotz" is a faithful multimedia implementation of the children's book classic by Otfried Preußler. The game is very closely oriented to the original and transforms the book template into a fun and child-friendly adventure game. Various tricky tasks, puzzles and games are to be tackled.

name: Death Burger
summary: A cheerful man excitedly arrives at a popular burger shop in town. However, it turns out to be a terrifying facility controlled by the evil Emperor "Pattypatine"! Ravenous, rampaging burgers are everywhere... Fight back with the shining fries, the "Potato Saber"!

name: Deep Inside: Amore Sola MI Fa Remirare
summary: An old fashioned RPG Horror Game. Venture into the mansion, investigate the truth behind the fire. The deeper you delve into the mistery, the more choices you will have when everything will unravel.

name: Deserter: Prologue
summary: Deserter: Prologue is a free stealth-RPG game. Use stealth, cunning, and thieving skills to escape from a military camp in the heart of a dystopian war.

name: Deliver This!
summary: DELIVER THIS! is a FAST-PACED-ACTION SHOOTER dropping you into a cyberpunk fusion of firepower and parkour-driven package delivery carnage! Dash, wall-run, and obliterate rogue drones to achieve perfect delivery efficiency or run it again. The city demands speed, DELIVER OR DIE!

name: Depths Unseen
summary: Fall into the ruins of the long abandoned Mariana Corp Lab that now sits vacant just below the surface. Can you survive this unforgiving world?

name: Deadcave
summary: DEADCAVE is a fast-paced 2D pixel-art endless shooter where you slash enemies with your sword, deflect bullets, collect weapons, and survive against relentless waves in dark underground caves.

name: Dead Charge
summary: DEAD CHARGE is a fast paced 2D Action Platformer where your battery is your health bar, and it’s always draining. Shoot, Melee, and dash through enemies to stay alive and keep the momentum going.

name: Desomnia
summary: You participate in an experiment with your memory lost. You have to determine if you are dreaming or if you are back to reality. The only way to wake up from your dream is to take the given medicine and collapse. Complete the experiment successfully.

name: Dewdrop
summary: Play as a raindrop that has accidentally ended up in the sewers, and now needs your help to get back home. Jump, climb, and overcome challenges as you attempt to escape. Be careful of green moss!

name: Desert Sky Rider
summary: In this heart-pounding adventure, you must overcome ancient ruins, deadly traps and tricky obstacles to find the hidden treasure of Anubis. One wrong step could send you back to the start.

name: Delve Down Under
summary: Delve Down Under is a bullet hell rogue-lite set in wartime Australia, 1941. Play as mutated Aussie heroes battling Nazi occult forces and Dreamtime horrors. Dodge, shoot, and slash through chaotic combat, collect powerful relics, and strategize your way through procedurally generated dungeon runs.

name: Delive' R Us
summary: Delivery Driver Job simulator, that blends fast-paced gameplay with life management mechanics. Accept or decline jobs through your in-game phone, then hop on your moped to navigate the city streets, collect grocery items, and race to make timely deliveries.

name: Defense X
summary: Build a defense strategy to protect the peace.

name: Dead Above
summary: The world above is filled with countless walking corpses, You can only live in the dark world underground. However, they still want to destroy your only way up——The abandoned mine elevator, protect it, and also protect yourself. Wait for someone to fight alongside you.

name: Defeat the Goblin King
summary: Gear up and leave on a Roguelike RPG expedition to the unknown, strategize your way to victory against impossible odds in turn-based combat. It's time for the tyrannical rule of the GOBLIN KING to end!

name: Decaying Salvage
summary: Inspired by 90s and 2000s survival horror, Decaying Salvage is a sci-fi, fixed camera horror game. Explore derelict spaceships, scavenge parts by solving puzzles, encounter a variety of unique enemies, and find a way to return home to Earth.

name: Demand Dial Exorcist
summary: In Demand-Dial Exorcist, you play a demon hunter solving eerie puzzles. Investigate clues, place ritual items on the pentagram, and banish demons before they claim you as their next victim.

name: Dead Estate: Home Theater
summary: Home Theater is the first update in the six part update series for Dead Estate. Featuring brand-new cutscenes available for every single unlockable character, new bosses, new enemies, new items and more.

name: Dead Estate: Bombs Away
summary: Bombs Away is the second update in the six part update series for Dead Estate. Featuring a new character: BOSS! A highly-combustible criminal who uses sticky bombs as her main method of attack. Also featuring five new bonus "subfloors", new level variants, new items and more.

name: Dead Estate: Heaven & Hell
summary: Heaven & Hell is the third update in the six part update series for Dead Estate. Featuring curses and blessings, a new cross-run currency in the form of chunks medallions, two new shops, a brand new batch of costumes available for every single character in the game, and more.

name: Dead Estate: Axe to Grind
summary: Axe to Grind is the fourth update in the six part update series for Dead Estate. Featuring a new character: Axel! A hatchet-wielding hunk with some cool shades and a god complex. Also featuring various balance changes, adjustments and bug fixes.

name: Dead Estate: Good Night
summary: Good Night is the sixth and final update in the six part update series for Dead Estate. Featuring a new ending route with several new floors, new challenges, new costumes, new medals, dozens of new items and weapons, and more.

name: Devoid
summary: Devoid is an immersive journey into the medieval world of vampires who feed on human souls. You will have to put an end to their power with the help of sword and magic. Use an arsenal of tools and magical abilities on your way to defeat the most ancient evil.

name: Decker
summary: Thwart heartless mega-corporations as a downtrodden coder-turned-hacker in this original, futuristic take on hacking. Use your wits and every program at your disposal to outwit, outmaneuver, or flat out overpower the relentless virtual guardians of the megacorps' most closely guarded secrets.

name: Dead Island 2: Kingdom Come - Deliverance II Weapon Pack
summary:
Unleash medieval mayhem with the Kingdom Come: Deliverance II inspired arsenal, featuring two new weapons that embody the brutal, no-nonsense style of knightly warfare.

Includes:
Sir Radzig's Sword
Zizka's Mace

name: Desire Den
summary: Step into a fantasy unlike any other and interact with unique creatures all looking for one thing. A good time.

name: Demonborg Mining Co
summary: Demonborg Mining Co is a unique rogue-lite about mining the insides of giant demon cyborgs with your auto-firing turret loaded drill drone.

name: Desktop Pet Project
summary: Elevate your PC experience with charming desktop pets. Inspired by such a wonderful invention as Shimeji, Desktop Pet Project has tried to collect the most interesting and curious mechanics. You can summon up to two pets that will have slight personalities in behavior.

name: Deadliest Pigeon
summary: Equip weapons against physics-based enemies, swing through chaos with grappling hook and destroy everything in your path to avenge the little chick!

name: Deadly Runner
summary: Help the Girl to overcome her fears and get out of the world of nightmares. Jump over obstacles, spikes, traps and beware of monsters!

name: Dead Garden Zero
summary: Find as many of your friends as possible before the monster gets you. Save all you can, as the amount of friends you have is endless! You can't save them all but find the best strategy and do your best sweetie! I hope everything's ok and hope you'll enjoy this mini game I finished for you.

name: Desktop Farm Remastered
summary: A remastered version of our bestseller DESKTOP FARM working as a normal game, it's not 3D live wallpaper. Build your farm in voxel style and make money to expand.

name: Demon Contract Warrior
summary: This is a "time management" game that includes love simulation and turn based strategy battle puzzle solving, with dual development. Each girl you can meet has her own story and personality, and players can freely choose who to ultimately establish a romantic relationship with, or choose Single.

name: Demon's Wrath
summary: Demon's Wrath is a 3D open-world role-playing game. The player explores a vast fantasy world called Crementia and can interact with non-player characters (NPCs) and fight enemies. The game focuses on fighting, exploring, completing quests, building, and talking to NPCs.

name: Devil Land RPG
summary: In the year 1400 of the Devil Land, you're a middle-aged man at the bottom of the social ladder, living like a slave, muddled and unarmed. Want to change everything around you? The four Lords of the Magic Realm won't oblige. Come and try.

name: Deborg Desolation
summary: Deborg Desolation is a first-person indie game intended for the survival of mankind. Train to be a soldier capable of containing any injurious entity to achieve the survival of your own race, seek to plan strategies that allow your advancement without stopping.

name: Dependency Psychological Test
summary: A narrative-driven point-and-click game that explores dependent personality through interactive psychological testing. Make choices, build relationships, and discover how your behavior shapes your mental assessment.

name: Defendrion
summary: Top-down action RPG. Battle through levels filled with enemies, earn XP, and level up to unlock or evolve powerful spells and boost attributes. Defeat foes, clear each stage, and push forward to more challenging adventures with greater rewards.

name: Detective Hindsight
summary: Solve a variety of perplexing cases in the sleuthing shoes of Detective Hindsight - who gets help from Phoebe: a young orphaned girl with dreams of being a storyteller and powers to look into the past. Uncover the truth with her sketches done in crayon. The catch? She can't draw very well.

name: Decayed Evil
summary: Decayed Evil is a semi realistic first person horror adventure puzzle game. Kill, his grandson seeks to unravel the mystery, only to discover that behind this dark and gloomy ancient mansion lies an unknown and terrifying truth.

name: Destiny Is Dice
summary: The knight ‘Ail’ awoke in a dungeon where everything is decided by dice. Right beside ‘Grin’, witch who can manipulate every die. With this witch's help, ‘Ail’ heads toward the dungeon. To rescue someone trapped within it. Roll, manipulate, and change fate in turn-based roguelike. ‘Destiny Is Dice’.

name: Death at Fleming Manor
summary: "Your job is to write the death certificate." Investigate a mysterious death in a grand British manor, 1959. Explore eerie scenes and complete forensic documents like death certificates and medical reports. Stylish 1960s detective comic art. Perfect for fans of vintage whodunits.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor - After Hours Pack
summary: What do the dwarves get up to in their time off, besides hanging out at the Abyss Bar, of course? The After Hours pack will give you an exclusive peek at the secret lives of the dwarves.

name: Desktop Blocks
summary: Desktop Blocks is a relaxing desktop game that combines match and idle mechanics. Play in the corner of your screen and aim for a high score. Even when you're busy, the game will passively generate resources over time, which you can use to upgrade your gameplay or unlock custom skins.

name: Desktop Cube-Man
summary: This is a free multiplayer PC desktop game, you can simply place on the desktop or enter challenge mode. In challenge mode, you can just idle casually, or try to challenge higher difficulties with friends. You can gain experience through idle time and unlocks more behavior modes.

name: Deadly Trick
summary: Survive the death game unfolding at school under the name "Special Class." You are not given any special role at the beginning. Depending on the situation or your own choices, you could become the White or the Shadow! Cooperate… or betray.

name: Deck Combo
summary: Deck Combo - An overhead view game where the player on a card board arranges his squad in the form of cards that advance, fighting enemy squads, trying to storm the enemy castle and get the victory.

name: Death By Tomato
summary: Death By Tomato is an arcade style slicing game. In it the player must use bladed weapons to slice on coming food that is thrown at you. This game is for fast passed rhythm fun.

name: De-coding Armageddon
summary: Fast paste, fast typing, arcade, die and retry game. De-coding Armageddon is a game to practice your speed and reflexes.

name: Deep West
summary: Deep West is a platformer shooter inspired by pixel's Cave Story and Kero Blaster. You play as Brine, a framed sheriff trying to clear his name. Follow him through his quest to find the gang leader who put a price on his head! You can also play as Flint or make your own custom character!

name: Delivery Issues
summary: Delivery Issues is a side-scrolling package-throwing time-attack action-platformer that tests your package delivery skills against a zany world of characters and events that just happen to make an easy job... difficult.

name: Detective Agency: Murder at the Manor
summary: The owner of the Golden Rose Manor died mysteriously in the secret room. Everyone in the manor has an alibi, but their speech is full of loopholes... You will go to the crime scene, search for clues, analyze the suspect's statement, make reasonable inferences, reveal the truth of the case!

name: Delta Squared
summary: Delta Squared is an abstract Shoot'em up game made in retro 8-bit style in modern times. Has 4 stages, 2 game campaign modes and a local coop mode. Also has unlockable color palettes.

name: Delvin: Origins
summary: A horror turn-based RPG in hell.

name: DescTop
summary: DescTop is a cozy typing game where you can type at your own pace, in your own speed, how ever you like. You can type the target word given to you or you can type your essay in the ingame notepad; whatever you type you will be rewarded for it.

name: Deluxe Invaders
summary: Space Invaders Clone by Roklan

name: Detritus
summary: A chaotic Local & Online Multiplayer 2D Shooter featuring 4 game modes, 10+ maps, dozens of weapons, customisation options and more. Play Online with up to 8 players in a lobby, prove your strength by being the last man standing in this relentless shooter.

name: Deep Space Solitude
summary: "Deep Space Solitude" is a first-person horror game. As a journalist, you investigate the disappearance of a scientist in a remote cabin, tackling puzzles, challenges, and fear to survive.

name: Deck Of The Damned
summary:
How unlucky can one be?
Trapped in a graveyard with a peculiar deck of cards, and an even more peculiar cat. You must find some way to escape this cursed place before monsters drawn to your bad luck get you.
WIth the deck of cards you can channel your unlucky energy to slash, curse, and defend yourself . But watch out as your unlucky energy can be used against you as well.
Made for GBJam 13

name: Dead by Daylight: Sinister Grace
summary: Play as The Krasue, a gruesome Killer with two terrifying forms, or Vee Boonyasak, an electrifying survivor from the rising punk band Axekick. Experience a terrifying take on Thai Folklore rooted in visceral body-horror....in Dead by Daylight: Sinister Grace.

name: Demi and the Fractured Dream
summary: In this action adventure, play as Demi and venture through the wondrous world of Somnus. Tasked by a mysterious voice, you must destroy the legendary Accursed Beasts to save the world. Use your attacks and abilities to slay enemies, solve puzzles, and uncover the truth behind an ancient history.

name: Deus Ex Remastered
summary: This is Deus Ex Remastered the definitive version of Ion Storms legendary cyberpunk immersive sim, modernized with visual upgrades, modern enhancements, and quality-of-life improvements for a new generation of operatives.

name: Despa
summary: DESPA is a fast-paced multiplayer arena shooter built for after-work warriors with more bills than free hours. Neon kill-boxes, railguns, and carbon katanas meet a five-second respawn loop, so every death flips into revenge before your coffee cools.

name: Demon Itself
summary: A short, fast-paced roguelike boss-rush game. Step into hell as a superhuman on a mission to defy death and break humanity's limitations.

name: Destroy the Demon Army
summary: A casual idle clicker about raising an army to defeat the demon forces.

name: Deal With Nyarlathotep
summary: Naia's Contract is a survival game with elements of Texas Hold'em and mowing. You play as a gambler who has signed a soul pact with an ancient god in a Cthulhu setting. Using poker as a medium, you harness the power of the ancient god to defeat waves of enemies. Each card corresponds to a unique skill, and combining Texas Hold'em cards grants powerful powers. Ultimately, you must rely on your own wits and strength to escape from your confinement!

name: Demondemon Demon Tamer
summary: Demondemon Demon Tamer combines swarm-survivor and monster raising. Manage, take care, and train your demons during the day. Survive the swarm of attacking demons at night. Raise your reputation among three factions of demon tamers, and unravel their hidden motives in this doomed city, Laknakarta.

name: Desktop Kitten Girl
summary: Wanna make your desktop more interesting? Here comes the cute little witch! She will keep your company all the time on the desktop! And you can add different events to the little witch's routine! Every event has abundant collection elements. The game supports the steam workshop!

name: Dear Diary
summary: Dear Diary is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This story is about a guy who liked to pick mushrooms in the forest. On one of the most ordinary days, he met a girl. This girl changed his life once and for all!

name: Death & Taxes
summary: Become a trader, a hero, a legend...even a god. In Death & Taxes you can pursue anything...but only two things are certain.

name: Devil May Cry 5: Mega Buster
summary: A weapon that recreates Mega Man's legendary Mega Buster. Boasting a unique silhouette, it's designed for long-range attacks. Equipping it activates special variations on the side roll and jump moves.

name: Devil May Cry 5: Monkey Business
summary:
Originally only available as a download code from Amazon.co.jp, where it was stated that the validity period of the product code was until March 8, 2021, with no scheduled delivery at a later date. Some codes were also given out for free for random users on Xbox One.

On May 7, 2019 the Monkey Business became available as a free DLC for all regions and platforms for the original game.

name: Deep Siren
summary: Deep Siren is a Lovecraftian WWII horror fairytale. When the lone survivor of the USS Siren discovers a mermaid while adrift at sea, he finds himself plunged into a world of supernatural horror fathoms beneath the surface. Utilize unique gameplay mechanics as Alex battles to hold on to his sanity.

name: Deliverance Protocol: Ironrot
summary: Atmospheric first-person retro horror. You are a courier — a disposable tool of the System. Sort, deliver, collect archives. Obey… or uncover what lies inside.

name: Demeter
summary: An arcade twin stick shooter that tests reaction times and decision making. Designed for short sessions on the train with your Deck, or waiting for the next queue to pop, Demeter is all about action, skill and high scores.

name: Deeper Underground
