summary: Trapped underground after a nuclear apocalypse, a fake survival expert must face the fallout of his lies. Build, scavenge, and lead your community in this darkly comedic survival game where every choice matters.

name: Death Delivery
summary: Death Delivery is satisfying, fast-paced First Person Shooter with stylized slow motion,music, action and old-school trial-and-error difficulty.

name: Deskape
summary: 'dEskape' is a base-building game which sits across the bottom of your desktop allowing you to work, browse, or watch something else while you play. It's idle when you like and active when you want.

name: Deiity
summary: Deiity is a tactical first-person combat game where you carefully choose weapons & spells to bring to the dungeon floor. Combine your abilities in unique ways to approach any challenge from many angles. Inspired by classic FPS games like Halo, but with all the modern tech of games like ULTRAKILL

name: Demonic Kiss
summary: Piece together sultry demon girls in this devilishly charming puzzle game full of temptation and teasing beauty.

name: Deck the Halls, Gieves
summary:
Fans of P. G. Wodehouse might find the character of Bartie Worster familiar. He's a wealthy bachelor about town with far too much free time on his hands, and he often seems to find himself or his friends in a variety of sticky situations. It's lucky for Bartie, then, that he's also the employer of Gieves, who is quite possibly the most brilliant gentleman's gentleman (or valet) in the entire British Empire of the deliberately vague 1920s or 1930s.

The goal of the game is to survive a Christmas spent at Penrose Hall at the behest of Aunt Allison: she whose disappointed lecturing is sure to send an icy chill down the spine of one Bartholomew Worster. Bartie's lifelong pal "Checkers" Small is, by coincidence, also staying at the Hall during Christmas. But almost before the pair have a moment to catch up, trouble strikes in the form of a femme fatale who threatens to cause a rift between the two quite by accident. Or is it an accident...?

name: Dead Space Collection
summary: A bundle of the original Dead Space trilogy.

name: Deltarune: Plugged Dream
summary:
After completing the Mantle minigames in the S-Rank room, Susie shows up and pulls you out of them, leaving you with... A LOT of questions.
But… what if things didn’t go quite the same?

What if something was... weirder?

That's where the idea is coming from:

Now, after completing these minigames, Ramb comes in to ask you some questions of games and how fun they were. But after that, he tells that there are lots, lots of unfinished Mantle prototypes exist on discarded cartridges, but, as Ramb knows, none will boot on the console. With jealousy that Kris won't be able play the games, Ramb decides to tell a backup plan, and...

Well, something surely happens!

name: Descend With Caution
summary: A silly platformer about exploring the depths of a mountain.

name: Desktop Defender
summary: An idle auto-battler that sits in the corner of your screen while you do other things.

name: Detour
summary: DETOUR is a single-player driving adventure through a mysterious sci-fi landscape. Upgrade your truck, manage your resources, and chart your own path across quiet rural backroads. Scavenge materials, adapt to the unknown and uncover the secrets of a world quietly ruled by an artificial intelligence.

name: Deep
summary: Deep is about the protagonist's deep inner world, solving the mystery and leaving here.

name: DeliverwarTH
summary: You are a food delivery worker in Asia. There are two companies. Green food delivery company. and orange food delivery company The two companies have long been at odds of interest. And the conflict cannot be resolved by the company. therefore decided to fight for space

name: Dead Iron
summary: Dead Iron is a Western-themed, wave-based horde survival FPS. Fend off endless packs of werewolves. Earn blood money from every kill. Unlock haunted parts of the town as you fight your way uphill toward the final boss waiting in the church under the full moon.

name: Depth of Mind
summary: In this turn-based strategy game, you must assemble the strongest team of mental operatives to overcome mental illnesses inside a person.

name: Debris
summary: A science based builder with event-driven story set in Mars' orbit. Extract scarce resources from debris and build your drone and station to survive. Space isn't against you it is just brutal. Build your drone, clean the orbit, save Mars.

name: Desktop Colony
summary: A cosy incremental semi-idle space colony management game that sits on your desktop while you do other things. Mine asteroids, build ships, expand the colony, research technology, uncover mysteries and explore the universe.

name: Deep Loop
summary: Find your way to master the seven deadly sins in a constantly looping world that will force you to experience different realities.

name: Devil's Menu
summary: This fast-food restaurant in the underworld needs your management! Upgrade the diner, serve monsters, fulfill orders, and collect their treasures. They might even get you a real-world treat!

name: Deepstone Rift
summary: Fight big battles in the mines, get to mining and collecting gold and minerals. build and upgrade your towers, power up with treasure chests. Defend your base from looting goblins! using variety of weapons and tower, from RPG, ak47, canons towers, to sawblade towers and more!

name: Desktop Town
summary: Desktop Town is a relaxing idle city builder that runs directly on your desktop. Build and decorate your own tiny town, or watch your little citizens go about their day, while doing your usual tasks on the PC.

name: Dead Beyond
summary: Dead Beyond is an action packed survival game where you are trapped in a house full of zombies and challenging traps to overcome.

name: Deep Sheol
summary: In a dystopian future, Agent Seth investigates a corporate geological facility where a biological gas turned people into bloodthirsty monsters. Fight through enemy hordes, uncover a dark corporate conspiracy, and face Lovecraftian nightmares in this tense retro FPS with survival horror!

name: Deep Space Diesel
summary: Welcome to your new career as a gas station attendant in the deepest, darkest corner of space! Serve adorable ships, count your cash, and expand your diesel empire. It's a simple, satisfying job. Just... ignore the whispers in the vents. Everything is fine. Probably.

name: Deathplane
summary: Deathplane is a 2D puzzle-platformer game about moving the actual deathplane below the level up and down to kill enemies and find solutions and secrets.

name: Depths of Insanity 3
summary: A Cartoony 3D Adventure played in 3rd/1st Person! Explore a wide variety of places. Meet cool characters. Gather to build. And full of Action! Follow a weird story of an Alien Slug trying to survive Planet Earth! It's all about the FUN, WEIRD & COZY things in life!

name: Desserted
summary: Hello, Friend, welcome to Desserted. Together we'll answer the Universe's most important question: "What's for dinner?" 6-player co-op survival adventure; Eat, stealth, fight, sacrifice; Explore lost planets within time limits; Survive. Get stronger. Explore worlds

name: Decision Point
summary: Plans meet friction in Decision Point, a wargame where you issue NATO-standard orders, observe AI execution in real time, and adapt as the battlefield evolves. At key Decision Points, the action pauses—giving you time to reassess, redirect your forces, and outmanoeuvre the enemy.

name: Deep Down Below
summary: Deep Down Below is a dungeon-crawling strategy roguelike where you choose your class and fight your way home, leveling up your character and looting items along the way to progress deeper and deeper!

name: Deckanism: Singularity Island
summary: A roguelike deckbuilder meets auto-battler where every fight is a puzzle. Build mechanisms, counter enemies and unleash your perfect combo!

name: Dead Frequency
summary: A mysterious frequency is being transmitted from the Radio Tower. You the Technician, must repair the tower, and uncover what happened to the previous engineer.

name: Deadcam
summary: Sealed shut inside a rural, abandoned house for a paranormal hunting TV show.. Something is VERY wrong with Margo. Her live headcam is still rolling.. and you can see the whole thing. Run, hide, and escape the house in this first-person survival horror. And remember: the raccoon knows everything.

name: Desktown
summary: A minimalist city-builder that sits on the bottom of your screen! Gather resources, set timers, and decorate your town while you do other activities.

name: Destiny 2: Year of Prophecy
summary: The Destiny 2: Year of Prophecy Edition includes two expansions: The Edge of Fate and Renegades. Experience new adventures, new weapons and armor to collect, a new raid and dungeon, four Rewards Passes, and much more.

name: Destiny 2: Year of Prophecy Ultimate Edition
summary: The Destiny 2: Year of Prophecy Ultimate Edition includes two expansions: The Edge of Fate and Renegades. Experience new adventures, new weapons and armor to collect, a new raid and dungeon, four Rewards Passes, and much more.

name: Destiny 2: Reclamation Silver Bundle
summary: Purchase the Destiny 2: Reclamation Silver Bundle and receive the Lullaby Legendary emote along with 1,700 Silver (1,000 + 700 bonus Silver) which you can use to purchase Reclamation, cosmetics, and more!

name: Delicious Winter Edition
summary: Christmas themed version of the original Delicious game. The game is the same, serve all customers within the time limit, but with a winter theme.

name: Deepfried in Deepspace
summary: Take orders from alien customers & make some food! First you gotta get the ingredients, & they seem to be a bit more sentient than they are on earth. Once you have your order, go to the back & find the ingredients stored in coolers and beat the crap out of them! Be careful, the food fights back.

name: Dead by Headshot
summary: A first-person survival shooter with apocalyptic simulation elements, focused on precision and headshot mechanics. Every shadow hides a deadly threat. Survive the night, manage your ammo, and fight off ever-increasing waves. Do you have what it takes to resist?

name: Deckout
summary: Deckout is a fast, competitive card game for 2–4 players. Secretly pick your cards, reveal in order, play by a random round rule, and survive the hammer—each hit costs a heart. Quick rounds, big laughs, sharp decisions.

name: Defense & Making
summary: Defense & Making is a tile-based strategy game. Become a Demon Lord design enemy paths using randomly drawn tiles and cards place traps and monsters and experience a unique dungeon defense that changes every time you play.

name: Decay of Worlds
summary: A tactical fantasy defense game with RPG elements: Deploy powerful units, wield magic, and lead a band of heroes through dark missions filled with meaningful choices.

name: Defectant
summary: Defectant is a modular action-RPG where you build your fighter from any parts you find, even from enemies. Survive the Pit’s brutal arena, forge alliances, climb the ranks, or find another way to escape.

name: Dead Engine Day Zero
summary: Dead Engine Day Zero delivers a survival challenge in a pixel-art post-apocalyptic city swarming with intelligent zombies. Scavenge the ruins, combine items to grow stronger, upgrade your backpack, and uncover the tragic stories of the survivors.

name: Devil's Terminal
summary: Troubled teen simulator. Build a deck of dice and roll against fear.

name: DeAnima
summary: DeAnima is a brutal yet rewarding dungeon crawler steeped in classic roguelike tradition. Set in a sprawling, medieval dungeon, you embody a lone wanderer seeking the fabled Crown of Nivek.

name: Desktop Purrfect
summary: Your purr-fect desktop companion is here! Get adorable cats that chill at the bottom of your screen, keeping you company while you work, study, play, or relax. Collect toys & furniture to build them a cozy home. Pet, feed, play, or simply enjoy their presence.

name: Deltarune Paraphrase: Steamton Edition
summary: Deltarune: PARAPHRASE is an alternate universe, where the world and the characters inhabiting it get new looks and stories based on already existing ones, but with less influence from the original while keeping their personalities true to the canon.

name: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided - Assault Pack
summary: Prepare to advance and assault the enemy with a custom skinned Battle Rifle, two packs of regular Battle Rifle ammo, one pack of armor piercing Battle Rifle ammo, 2 Frag Grenades, 2 EMP Grenades, 500 Weapon Parts, and 1 Praxis Kit, using the included Chaff Augmentation to give you a few extra seconds to escape the proximity of nearby explosives. Strike quickly and with aplomb, eliminating the enemy before they even know what hit them.

name: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided - Tactical Pack
summary: Using distance to your advantage, eliminate your targets silently with a custom skinned Tranquilizer Rifle, one pack of tranquilizer ammo, 3 Smoke Grenades, 2 Gas Grenades, 500 Weapon Parts, and 1 Praxis Kit, with the included Micro Assembler Augmentation working to decrease the cost of your weapon upgrades. Close the gap quickly, and get to your objective without stirring the hornets nest.

name: Death Flags
summary: Death Flags: The Beginning of the End is a rail shooter in VR packed with action and an epic story. Survive relentless waves of cursed pirates, upgrade your weapons with special ammo, and uncover the hidden secrets within this incredible shooter.

name: Dead Ringer
summary:
It begins with a phone plugged into a faulty socket and an electric malfunction, it ends with seven dead and one missing...

Detective Maxwell is called to investigate what seems to be, by all accounts, an impossible murder. In all of his years, he has never seen a crime this gruesome perpetrated in such a puzzling way. All he has are the testimonies of three known survivors — socialite and lobbyist Meredith Eloise, her stoic butler Richard Torres, and the one surviving guest, Alexander Florence. There's also the matter of the missing person, Felix McCain, Meredith's good-for-nothing and embittered employee... He must solve the case under a deadline; if he cannot catch the culprit by dawn, the place will be swarming with reporters, ruining his client's dear reputation. And Meredith values her good name more than her own life.

What's already an impossible crime gets dialed up when Maxwell finds an unexplainable oddity: a telephone that did not belong to any of the people at the party. Perhaps it was waiting for its next owner...

name: Detective Bloodphobia
summary: Detective Bloodphobia is a black-and-white noir visual novel with point-and-click investigations and deduction gameplay.

name: Deadland Outlaws
summary: Deadland Outlaws is a merciless Western-style co-op and PVP shooter based on the book of the same name. Try to survive as an outlaw in this deadly environment. Play with your friends in co-op or tower defense mode against hordes of zombies and other nightmares.

name: Detritus
summary:
Lost in deep space, your cargo vessel has suffered a catastrophic hull failure. The engines are offline, the AI is silent, and there’s no sign of the crew …and that’s just the start of your problems.

Explore the remains of the derelict ship. From fragmented memories, discover what became of the crew and piece together the events that led to the disaster. Find codes, hack keypads, and make your way past biometric locks in order to get the engines back online.

The ship is filled with debris; make use of it to help you survive. Perhaps you'll find the truth you’re searching for among the detritus.

name: Dear Poe
summary:
You have received a mysterious email! After the death of an underworld citizen caused by a strange letter, Poe and Arthur are called in to investigate the case and prevent further tragedies. But what appears to be a simple crime soon reveals something much bigger, involving wandering demons and a much more complex dark plot.

Dear Poe is a spin-off of Dark Light, set 6 months before the main events of the game.

name: Delta
summary: Delta is a first-person movement-heavy platformer game focused on physics-based traversal, speedrunning, and mechanical mastery. And somewhere ahead, the one you lost is still waiting.

name: Death Park 2: Remaster
summary: Be the first to survive this action-packed horror game in stunning graphics and uncover the dark secret behind the murderous clown!

name: Deadlivery Night
summary: Deadlivery Night mixes a frenetic arcade gameplay with survival horror elements. Explore the city of Santa Monica while completing deliveries, escape the killer, meet colorful characters and unravel the truth in a world of conspiracies!

name: Death in the Manor
summary: Death in the Manor is a casual isometric point and click murder mystery game. You have 1 hour to discover the killer and weapon before the police arrives. Every game is procedurally generated: rooms change place, suspects are never the same, and there are 22 potential murder weapons.

name: Defiant Ascent
summary:
In this post-apocalyptic survival game, you wake up deep inside a bunker devastated by catastrophe. The rooms are shrouded in darkness, resources are scarce, and the horrors lurking behind every door won't give you a break.

Explore the bunker room by room in a procedurally generated world where every run is different. Scavenge supplies, find or craft improvised weapons, and face off against enemies in a turn-based combat system where every decision could mean the difference between life and death.

name: Descent Of Lunaris
summary: Investigate a signal emanating from deep within the moon and fight through a dark reflection of human nature. Are you being tested, or punished for the actions of humanity? Descent of Lunaris is a classic dungeon-crawling turn-based RPG inspired by Wizardry and Shin Megami Tensei.

name: Deep Fog Signals
summary: Stuck in an outpost deep in a sea of toxic fog, your crew has been decimated, you're cut off from the outside world, and oxygen is running out. Use limited bandwidth to coordinate unstable crewmates, conduct esoteric research that could change the world, and interpret strange signals from the deep.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles 2 - Kaigaku Character Pack
summary: The playable character "Kaigaku" will become available for use in battles in "Versus Mode." Additionally, items such as Profile Photos and Quotes are included.

name: Dead Sight
summary:
A short Horror game that tries to emulate mid 2000s dual screen handheld gaming.

In the game you hold the imaginary device sideways and have two screens right next to each other. The left one is the main one, while the right one is your peripheral vision, that shows you ghostly things hiding from your main view.

name: Devestor
summary: Across 10 haunted levels… You'll face Jumpscares, Puzzles, Parkour, Mini-Games, and a Roaming Monster that truly hates you. Your only hope lies in the notes left by some clueless idiot who came here just like you… and never made it back.

name: Delivery Dash: Battle Couriers
summary: Step into the world of Delivery Dash Co., where every package counts and every second matters! With randomized delivery locations, hazards around every corner, and arcade-style bonuses, every run is a fresh adventure—whether you’re competing against rivals or shaping your own courier story.

name: Dead Impact
summary: Co-op Survival Rpg

name: Delivery Mystery
summary: You play as a delivery man in a really really normal city of Deskadia.

name: Demon Stick
summary: You are a demon trapped in a stick. A challenging game about crossing different levels of hell, inspired by the paintings of Hieronymus Bosch. Simple controls, endless falls, and no mercy.

name: Death Drive
summary: Death Drive is a road trip visual novel inspired by classic American Gothic fiction.

name: Deorum
summary: You're being watched. Gather materials and craft nightmarish coins to satisfy your oppressor. Earn resources, upgrade your skills, and discover the secret of your dark fate.

name: DeadZone: Survival Ops Zombie Shooter
summary: The city falls, the dead rise—your survival is all that matters.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Zenitsu Agatsuma (Infinity Castle) Character Pack
summary: The playable character "Zenitsu Agatsuma (Infinity Castle)" will become available for use in battles in "Versus Mode." Additionally, items such as Profile Photos and Quotes are included.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Tanjiro Kamado (Infinity Castle) Character Pack
Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Shinobu Kocho (Infinity Castle) Character Pack
Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Giyu Tomioka (Infinity Castle) Character Pack
Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Doma Character Pack
Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Akaza (Infinity Castle) Character Pack
Decrepit
summary: Take control of an urban explorer content creator as you explore and abandoned underground genetics lab. Find items and unlock secrets to escape. Tread carefully however, the horrors of the past still lurk in the shadows here.

name: Desktop Golf
summary: A cozy, relaxing mini golf game that floats right on your desktop. No fullscreen, no distractions - just peaceful putting whenever you want. Perfect for breaks, background play, and stress-free fun.

name: Derelict Star
summary: A precise momentum-based platformer that emphasizes exploration and navigation puzzles. Run and jump your way through a wide variety of obstacles and challenges as you explore an abandoned derelict freighter.

name: Demon Positive
summary: Demon Positive is a blast 'em up shooter where you run from the Devil and his demons. Gain crazy powerups that make you feel like a demon! Collect all three items, awaken the Sleeping Imps, and complete the Ritual.

name: Desert War: Military Combat Shooter
summary: Desert War: Military Combat Shooter throws you into the chaos of a war-torn desert city. As an elite soldier, you’ll battle through explosive missions, adapt to shifting combat zones, and outsmart enemies that react to your every move.

name: Deadline
summary: Deadline plunges you into the heart of indie horror with a spine-chilling themes. Explore three haunting levels—a sterile Lab, The Creepy Carnival, and a haunting school—each dragging you deeper. Outlast and extend your DEADLINE. Struggle for a high score, but can you survive long enough to escape?

name: Deathloop 4 You
summary: A college student, Hayato Ichijo, is imprisoned. This is an infinitely enduring prison of death.

name: Detective Girl: The Case of Immortality
summary: Return to Renaissance Florence and uncover an ancient secret of immortality.

name: Defuse
summary: Defuse is a tactical shooter where strategy and precision make all the difference. Team up, plan your moves, and take out enemies while completing critical objectives. Every match demands coordination, quick reflexes, and smart decisions. Do you have what it takes to dominate the battlefield?

name: Deliverance
summary: Explore an abandoned town as a postman delivering letters to dead residents. Make choices, find clues, and uncover the truth about yourself. Every house tells a new story, and every letter changes the world around you.

name: Deep in the Dread
summary: A First-person horror, mystery genre. A group of librarians is working in the old Hoverfield Mansion decide to hang out at a nearby pub, but one of them refuses and wants to stay inside. as the story unfolds, she begins to notice paranormal activities inside the library.

name: Dead Samurai
summary: Dead Samurai is an intense and action-packed online fighting game that puts you in the shoes of a skilled samurai warrior. Set in a feudal Japanese backdrop, your mission is to engage in deadly combat against various adversaries, including other skilled warriors and fearsome creatures. Grab your blade and get ready to walk the path of the Dead Samurai in this intense hack 'n' slash game. Your objective is to win all duels to become the best swordsman.

name: Devoid
summary: Enemies swarm. Energy drains. One wrong move and its game over. Master movement. Manage your shots. Survive station to station. Brace yourself because this twin-stick shooter punches back with fast paced action and visuals that pop.

name: Desktop Waifu
summary: This is an idle game. By idling in the game, you can unlock new outfits—and once unlocked, you can switch to them anytime.

name: Dead Inside
summary: A touching story about two sisters separated by fate, psychological disorders and why it's important not to trust your reflection.

name: Delusional
summary: Delusional is a chaotic top-down roguelike shooter where you battle absurd enemies with hundreds of ridiculous weapons, all in a desperate bid to defeat the eccentric artiste who created you.

name: Delivery to Graveyard Manor
summary: Gather the disguises and collect all the deliveries!

name: Desktop Garden
summary:
"Type and watch your garden grow! Every keystroke and mouse click lets your plants grow. Decorate your screen, or store them away to keep your screen clear. Place stickers on your plants and give them a name! Can you collect all types of plants?"

Desktop Garden is a productivity tool where you can collect and grow you're own plants while working on your computer.

name: Destroyed Base
summary: Destroyed Base is a 2D platformer adventure where your main task is to survive, find resources to strengthen your shelter and defeat the enemies inhabiting these gloomy corners of the forest. Various bandits have escaped into this forest, who, like you, are hunting for various resources.

name: Deep Extraction Inc.
summary: You are part of a three-person recovery crew sent to retrieve black boxes from the ocean floor using an old submarine. Teamwork and communication are essential to navigate tight caves, survive system failures, and uncover the dark truth behind the mission.

name: Detective Malinowski The Truth Will Be Revealed
summary: A body discovered. Two people missing. You – a detective who hears more than others want to see.  Narrative noir game – sound guides you, sketches tell the story.

name: Dead World Tales
summary: A narrative roguelite puzzle game inspired by tic‑tac‑toe, where you explore self‑contained stories and make decisions that uncover the mystery of the world's end.

name: Defcon Zero: Frontlines of Tomorrow
summary: Defcon Zero is a classic real-time strategy game set on planet Eros, where you dive into the story of ERA, the last beacon of civilization. Build your base, gather resources, engage your enemies and make strategic choices to prevail in combat. Are you ready to command the frontlines of tomorrow?

name: Deviation Game
summary: A co-op party game where you draw things humans can understand, but an image recognition AI can't! Play with 2-6 players using your mobile browser as your controller.

name: Death Imminent
summary: Explore a planetary station lost in the far reaches of the Universe as crew members awakened from cryosleep. Work together to uncover the causes of what is happening and, if you’re lucky, survive and escape from the depths of this man-made hell.

name: Dewdrop
summary: A physics-based generative music sandbox where droplets collide with hand-drawn vines to create evolving, melodic soundscapes. Create music easily with no prior experience in a calming and ethereal atmosphere.

name: Death Forest Abyss
summary: Escape from the Forest of Fear by searching for the broken bike parts while running away from the creatures that are the remains of the massacre victims!

name: Deck of Harvest
summary: Within a seasonal journey of harvest, plan limited fields, plant diverse seeds, reap bountiful crops, and amass wealth. Don't forget to manage your warehouse, select powerful treasures to build your deck, and become the ultimate farmer. Are you ready for this strategic challenge?

name: DeckWrecking Pirates
summary: A tactical roguelike deckbuilder where you roll dice, command your pirate crew, and even control your enemies. Build your deck… and wreck theirs!

name: Dead Feed
summary: Dead Feed is a psychological ghost-hunting horror game where you control two friends investigating a haunted house. One explores the darkness while the other monitors the feeds, as something unseen and paranormal slowly turns their investigation into a quiet, creeping nightmare.

name: Dead Exposure
summary: Explore a foreclosed home where every Polaroid uncovers ghosts, distortions, and shifting realities.

name: Debuff Party
summary: A chaotic multiplayer party game where players compete in fast-paced mini-games, only to receive hilarious debuffs chosen by other players at the end of each round. Victory has never been so humiliating!

name: Defender of the Kingdom
summary: "Indie wave-based defense game with exploration and resource management. Protect the castle, face hordes, and complete missions as the weather and day/night cycle change with each challenge."

name: Deep Strike
summary: You’re operating a drill machine beneath an abandoned chemical lab. You’ll feel the ground tremble, hear faint whispers in the dark, and glimpse shadows just beyond your lights. Stay focused—ignore what you see and hear—and keep drilling until your tasks are done.

name: Debugger 3.16: Recoded - Despair of the Developer Edition
summary: The developer messed it up, his games are full of errors and bugs and he lost all hope that somebody will buy it! Take control of Debugger 3.16 and try to delete all the bugs the developer produced in this 2D-Platformer for up to four players.

name: Detective Inna Duke
summary: A noir story-driven visual novel where you team up with lieutenant Inna Duke and her partner corporal Fernal to investigate the mysterious abduction of the popular streamer Oleh Hamston. But will you manage to track down the poor hamster in rainy city?

name: Dead Air
summary: Isolated in a forgotten Canadian forest, you must unravel the truth behind E.C.H.O. Track down lost cassettes, solve cryptic puzzles, and evade the creatures lurking in the fog. Piece together the secrets of a defunct organization.

name: Dead Air
summary: A horror adventure game following Rosanna, a thief tasked with breaking into Ravens Rest state park and retrieving and experiment. Things quickly take a turn however, as she discovers what the true nature of the experiment had in store.

name: Deadhold
summary: Deadhold is a roguelite zombie survival/strategy game where your choices impact who lives and who dies. Rescue survivors, scavenge resources, fortify your base, and protect your community against stress, infection, and zombies! Can you find a sense of normalcy in this cruel new world?

name: Dead Hand
summary: Dead Hand is a retro-styled, high-tension Blackjack game focused on quick matches, smart decisions, and duels that can flip in an instant. The rules are simple, but every round hits hard, one card can make you a legend or wipe you out instantly.

name: Dead End
summary: This is a very boring driving game where players need to adjust the direction using the left and right arrows and control the brakes with the spacebar. The goal is to choose the right path to keep moving forward and avoid reaching a dead end. Can you make it to the end?

name: Dead On Arrival
summary: Dead On Arrival is a gritty hybrid top-down / first-person zombie survival shooter. Build barricades, scavenge weapons, resources and hold your ground against relentless undead waves—solo or with friends.

name: Deep
summary: Deep is a fast-paced underwater exploration game where you manage your oxygen while diving to rescue the crew of a sunken sub. Avoid deadly fish, dodge traps, and survive ocean whirlpools! Play solo or team up with friends in chaotic co-op dives to the depths!

name: Deep Breath
summary: Deep Breath is a third-person PvPvE extraction shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Team up or play solo, scavenge, fight, and escape in 25-minute missions filled with AI threats, tactical decisions, and fast-paced action.

name: Deep Dive
summary: A man trapped in his own mind must face powerful beings shaped by fear, guilt, and memory. A minimalist action game focused on precision, atmosphere, and emotional storytelling through symbolic boss encounters.

name: Deep Six
summary: A post-WW1 stealth action game where tech is analog, equipment is scarce, and light, sound or movement will betray your position. Avoid, distract or kill enemy sentries as you traverse unique locations, sabotage war machines, save your comrades, and take down elite soldiers.

name: Deep Snow Delivery
summary: Navigate the frozen wastes in an ancient WW2 tank fitted with a storage bucket and claw arm. Collect and sell junk, make deliveries between settlements, cross mountainous terrain, and buy upgrades. Thousands like you have tried and failed to undo humanity's mistakes. Will your story be different?

name: Defense of the Earth
summary: A【Pixel style, rouge、type horizontal、 shooting、 defense 】 game

name: Deliria
summary: Fight, build, and conquer wonders in a thrilling infinite 3D sandbox. An adventure without cubes! Play solo or with friends in PvP, co-op, or creative mode—backed by 20+ original soundtracks.

name: Delete
summary: Defy gravity and test your reflexes. Delete delivers a stylized parkour experience where speed meets skill.

name: Defrag
summary: Defrag is a game about cleansing corrupted sectors and refining them through optimization to build a stronger system. Collect resources, adjust configurations, and complete your build as you progress.

name: Delivery Point Simulator
summary: Business simulator with strategy elements, where you manage a network of order delivery points in the conditions of severe competition, gray schemes and unexpected risks. Develop your business, improve points, defend against competitors' attacks, conduct risky transactions in the gray market.

name: Delivery Simulator
summary: Manage your own delivery business in a bustling city. Drive, deliver, upgrade your warehouse, and navigate traffic in this detailed and immersive courier simulator. Coming Soon – Add to Wishlist on Steam

name: Departure
summary: You find yourself at the controls of an regional Air Traffic Control Tower on a very normal night shift

name: Desperation
summary: Desperation is a tactical and challenging RPG in a dark fantasy setting with extraction game and roguelike elements. Gather your party of companions to aid you in runs and slay vast varieties of enemies to complete your journey. Can you and your companions conquer your, Desperation?

name: Descent
summary: Descent is a multiplayer co-op survival horror game (4 players) where players must make use of stealth to complete objectives and escape enemies and progress through levels to advance their story.

name: Defense Legend 5: Survivor TD
summary: Build a defense strategy to protect the peace.

name: Default Unreal Physics and Assets AKA DUPA Project
summary: Physics based FPP puzzler (with a short lesson of Polish).

name: Delivery of Us
summary:
In Delivery of Us, you guide a clever carrier pigeon on a mission to deliver every letter across the city’s rooftops. Plan each route carefully, because every move counts. Once the counter hits zero, the delivery fails.

This relaxing logic and movement-based puzzle game combines smooth mechanics, strategic planning, and calm visuals. Each level challenges you to find the most efficient path to every mailbox while avoiding walls, hazards, and obstacles along the way.

Discover different rooftop settings, from cozy neighborhoods to corporate towers, and enjoy the peaceful yet clever atmosphere as you test your reasoning skills.

name: .Decluster & .Decluster Zero
summary: The vertical scrolling shooter game '.Decluster' and its sequel '.Decluster Zero' are now available in one package.

name: DEX : Speed Run - Level Maker - World Records
summary: Play together with the leader, take the first places, create levels in this action platformer! New levels every day

name: Deadbus
summary: DEADBUS is a first-person post-apocalyptic shooter where you’re part of a cleanup unit sent to clear infected zones and rescue survivors. Manage limited ammo, hit your kill quota, and make it back to the bus before time runs out. Efficiency is survival, and the DEADBUS waits for no one.

name: Delivery Driver Massacre
summary: Your final delivery leads straight into a nightmare.

name: Dead Trash: Operation - Yellow Snow
summary: Operation Yellow Snow is a short, grindhouse-style holiday mini-campaign set in the Dead Trash universe. This standalone DLC brings the retro horror shooter to the season of gibbing.

name: Delete
summary:
A Memory.

You works at a life deletion agence, tasked with erasing digital traces of people's lives.

name: Demiurge Sacrifice
summary: You got unchained. Between the Apostolorum Country and the Shapeless Dimension, your goal will be to travel between worlds and interrupt the Festival of Abundance. For this you should improve in combat and agriculture including managing a farm and exploring a religious medieval world.

name: Deep Sleep
summary: Deep Sleep is a science fiction choose-your-own-adventure VR game. Play as your future self, making choices for your distant future after a climate crisis. Join the Agency of Postliminary Affairs to sleep for millennia to reach your preferred future on a recovered earth or a planet far away.

name: Deaths Dawn
summary: An immersive zombie survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Players scavenge for resources, craft weapons, and fortify shelters.

name: Derealization
summary: A visual novel about a girl who escaped from a psychiatric hospital. She is pursued by a strange being from another world — and it seems she’s not the only one who can see visitors from beyond.

name: Deified
summary: Forge your strategy around powerful relics in this turn-based tactical roguelite. Choose your slots, manage their constraints, and face formidable bosses.

name: Decrepit
summary: Decrepit is a first-person action game with souls-like combat where every death drags you back into the depths. Learn the dungeon, master the combat, and find your way out of the forsaken castle.

name: Death On Holly Ridge
summary: Christmas Eve, a delivery driver turns onto Holly Ridge & becomes trapped inside a decaying house of death. Reality fractures as something hunts her through rooms that shouldn’t exist. Survive the night, uncover the truth behind the house, & escape the snowy nightmare, if escape is even possible.

name: Desert Revenant 2: The Reawakening
summary: A tactical roguelike deckbuilder built for massive combos. Cast spells, summon minions, and stack effects that cascade into devastating turns as you face brutal enemies with diverse abilities across escalating, curse-driven runs.

name: Developer Daily
summary: You can start a studio with your friends and manage your dream game company together, or compete against each other. You can take over companies honestly or deceitfully, or dominate the market with your own game distribution platform.

name: Death Upon an Austrian Sonata: A Dana Knightstone Novel - Collector's Edition
Demon Castle Story
summary: A Demon Castle Building Management Simulation game by Kairosoft.

name: Demonspire
summary: Climb the cursed Demonspire! Slay demons, collect souls, and fight to escape—if you can.

name: Defend the Castle
summary: Defend the Castle is a day-by-day tower defense roguelike where you face 5 enemy waves per day, upgrade between battles, and struggle to survive as enemies grow stronger. Make the right choices or fall. Some days bring... something else.

name: Death in a Party
summary: You begin in a theme park forgotten to the world for over a decade. What you uncover will take you further down, below the surface, to man-made horrors you can comprehend. Point and click horror game about nostalgia.

name: Deep Fry
summary: 'Deep Fry' is a simple and relaxing cooking game, where you make delicious tempura for customers! Be careful, the deeper you go, the wilder their requests get!

name: Deimos Hotel
summary: Explore rooms in the ever-expanding deimos hotel.

name: Dead Circuit
summary: You are brought to another dimension, to help a weak faction fight their aggressive enemy. You will need to upgrade your arsenal and abilities, to take on this task and become victorious.

name: Devive
summary: Devive is an action-adventure game where your life is constantly decreasing. Run into a race against death to bring your child back to life, drain the energy of your enemies to survive, forge your fighting style, and solve a variety of puzzles to harvest the power of a fallen entity.

name: Deep Sea Puzzle
summary: "Deep Sea Puzzle" is a relaxing physics-based match-3 puzzle game set in a mysterious underwater world. Aim and launch cute marine creatures from the seabed and watch them float upwards like bubbles!

name: Deadrock Salvation
summary: The frontier of Deadrock Salvation is an immersive Open World RPG on the edge of a gun barrel and temptation hides behind every saloon door. In DR2, you step into the boots of Colt Dawson, a weary gunslinger searching for a second chance in a land that's forgotten the meaning of mercy.

name: Devora
summary: You become a bird living in the sewers, killing and eating other inhabitants to fill your stomach. Of course, as an adventurer, you can choose to explore the underground world to obtain new weapons, new delicacies, discover the stories here, and even the secrets of the gods.

name: Dead Dog
summary: Dead Dog is a stealth puzzle-platformer where you control an undead assassin. Master teleportation, invisibility, and shadow clones to infiltrate enemy bases, outsmart patrols, and uncover a hidden past.

name: Defend Your Castle
summary: Defend Your Castle is a simple yet addictive Flash-era action game where players use the mouse to grab and hurl waves of stick-figure enemies to protect their castle. By defeating invaders, players earn points to upgrade defenses, recruit specialized units such as wizards or bombers, and repair castle walls between levels. The game combines frantic physics-based combat with light strategic progression through upgrades and unit management

name: Devins Play
summary: Devins Play is a survival first person shooter horror game created by BlueEnhanced it is a game with Sci FI horror and base building. The game allows you to grind resources to survive.

name: Deepest Blue
summary: A futuristic space combat simulation set in deep space featuring 1st person combat, exploration of new warp paths and sectors, prospecting resource, shipping freight, base building or munitions deployment. Up to 9 player ships can be flown or assigned to co-pilots and grouped into squads.

name: Detektiv
summary: A short horror experience centered on a strange murder, in which you play Detective Fyodor Mikhailovich, investigating the crime and looking for clues to unravel the mystery.

name: Dead Trust
summary: Dead Trust is a short PSX-style horror game where a mysterious explosion in your neighbourhood turns a cozy night into something terrifying.

name: Desktop Aquarium
summary: A relaxing mini aquarium that stays on your desktop corner while you do other stuff — collect fish, upgrade tanks, and enjoy a cozy idle experience.

name: Death Jump
summary: Death Jump is a precision platformer game, where if you hold the space bar, the higher you will jump, and your goal is to reach the top in the fastest time possible.

name: Defentrix
summary: Defentrix is ​​a tower defense game with 31 handcrafted levels. Capture the towers and defend our solar system.

name: Dead Rush
summary: Dead Rush is an FPS arcade shooter that combines fast-paced action, stylized visuals, and relentless waves of zombies. Choose your weapon, fight with friends, and see how long you can survive.

name: Deda
summary: Old crazy grandfather trapped you in his house... You have 3 difficulties to choose. Try to escape DEDA's house...

name: Deer
summary: This is a casual puzzle game, where the position of each game image is random and can be repeated.At first, it may be very chaotic,Then gradually place the image in the corresponding position,The image gradually becomes complete,Come and give it a try!

name: Delver Quest
summary:
Whimsical Fantasy: Action Platformer Puzzle

Built for speed-running from the ground up with a built-in game cycle timer.
Unlock items which grant new abilities, opening the possibility for alternate routing!
Collect all of the Crystal Bubble items to discover the bonus quest — a truly “Nintendo hard” experience!
Run, jump, and dive across four exciting worlds with over 150 levels and challenging bosses!

name: Dear Lighthouse
summary: You are hired to restore a silent lighthouse. What starts as routine maintenance turns into unraveling a dark history. Bring the machinery back to life and discover that these malfunctions were no accident, and that the light doesn't just guide ships.

name: Deco Online Origins
summary: Deco Online Origins is a free-to-play 3D MMORPG that put players deep into the fantastic story of two warring nations, "Millena" and "Rain". As a legendary swordsman, a fierce archer, or a master of wizardry, players were constantly challenged by the opposing nation and by monsters that lurked around every corner. Notable features included a combo system with hundreds of potential skills, and guardian pets that buffed entire guilds.

name: Delete the World
summary: A genre-bending love letter to visual novels where kids with guns perform an impossible project to reach immortality. How far into depravity will you fall for the one you love—will you kill your friends? Will you Delete the World?

name: Deep Space Exodus
summary: Deep Space Exodus is a sci-fi narrative simulation with multiple endings. You manage The Noah, an immigrant starship searching for a new home. Face unprecedented cosmic events, allocate energy, supplies, and population, and decide the fate of an entire civilization.

name: Deltamount
summary: Our new innovation: grid lines!!

name: Deckum Demonium
summary: Craft demonic essences and brew powerful potions in this diabolical roguelike deckbuilder. In Deckum Demonium, you'll be able to summon 150+ demons and discover why Heavenly creatures are coming to destroy your world.

name: DeGen Rivals
summary: The ultimate 8-player vehicle battle royale that transforms the arena into a demolition party. Smash, crash, and bash your friends in solo or team based physics-fueled chaos. Risk it all for the mid-match jackpot, survive the onslaught, and prove you're the top Rival.

name: Devinica: Clip
summary: Bite sized AI simulation.

name: Denpa Nightmares
summary: No matter how long you’re gone, there will always be a girl waiting for you in the same place. This is a story about forgetting, and about waiting. After countless restarts and countless memories lost… how long will you stay with her this time?

name: Death Forest Remake
summary: The Forest of Fear Returns— The terror of being hunted by that massive face, "Yoshie," arrives on Nintendo Switch!

name: Deadwood Drive
summary: Deadwood Drive - a low-poly adventure game with a dark twist. In the beautiful and secluded town of Deadwood, you will discover the tale of Thomas Sterling, the Luminex Factory, and the land's hidden powers. Are you just running a logging business, or is the town's destiny tied to you?

name: DepotDash
summary: Fast-paced top-down construction yard simulator where you manage deliveries, move materials with heavy machines, and keep suppliers happy before your depot overflows.

name: Dead Apples Dare
summary: A VHS cassette was found showing someone playing the "Dead Apples Dare". Watch the video to the end to discover what happened. And remember: if offered pie, refuse. This is a short (20-30 minutes) walking simulator with creepy elements.

name: Deadhikers
summary: Deadhikers is a co-op survival horror game set in a remote, isolated wilderness cut off from the outside world. With no base building, players rely on hiking gear, keep moving, explore, and search for a way out together. Something is watching you - survival means escaping this hell.

name: Desktop Friend
summary: A cozy desktop pet that lives on your monitor. Care for it, play with it, and watch it grow over time. Inspired by the virtual pets of the '90s (e.g., Tamagotchi*), now designed for your everyday PC life.

name: DeeSicks
summary: Crawl out of your hole: destiny beckons. Out-spam the spammers and out-summon the swarms as you scale beyond the limits of space and time. Begin as an insect in bullet-slop misery and use the power of physics-based dice rolls to ascend as your very own bullet hell boss.

name: Demra: Rifts of War
summary: Use powerful light magic to fight back the invading demon hordes in this lite-RPG/ RTS mix. Build a base, gather resources, research and command your army.

name: Deep Sea Bubble Shooter: Reflex Challenge
summary: Deep Sea Bubble Shooter is a fast-paced reflex aim trainer! Pop the bubbles with precision and speed, master 150 levels, earn stars, unlock upgrades, and find the fastest ways to clear each stage for maximum points and thrilling bubble-blasting action.

name: Deep Combat
summary: Dive into the depths of a massive underground military facility in Deep Combat, a high-intensity 2D action platformer packed with danger and futuristic warfare. Play as an elite soldier sent far below the surface to eliminate advanced threats, survive brutal ambushes, and push through increasingly hostile sectors.

name: Defense of Wancotte
summary: Build-a-Tower Defense. Combine modular units to forge custom towers, experiment with thousands of synergies, and save Wancotte from the encroaching shadow!

name: Derby Champion Club
summary: Hop onto your steed and take first place!

name: Death Stranding: Higgs Variant
summary:
Exclusive variant sleeve featuring the Man in the Golden Mask, Higgs, played by Troy Baker.

Sam bridges must brave a world utterly transformed by the death stranding. Carrying the disconnected remnants of our future in his hands, he embarks on a journey to reconnect the shattered world one step at a time. With spectral creatures plaguing the landscape, and humanity on the verge of a Mass extinction, it's up to Sam to journey across the ravaged continent and save mankind from impending annihilation. What is the mystery of the death stranding? What will Sam discover on the road ahead? An unprecedented gameplay experience holds these answers and more.

name: Deadly Project
summary: You wake up in a dark room, the first thing you see is a bomb in front of you and your only way out is to answer a Quiz of questions and thus save your life. Can you come out alive and prove that you were the smartest?

name: Dead Zombie
summary: Dead Zombie is a top-down survival shooter set in a dark city at night. Fight zombies and mutated monsters using a pistol, SMG, and flamethrower, explore the environment with a flashlight, rescue survivors, collect ammo, destroy obstacles with bombs, and escape by reaching the evacuation helicopter.

name: Detective Dunkadoo
summary: "Detective Dunkadoo" is a serious detective game. A blackmail has thrust the Well-Done supermarket into the spotlight. This crisis shatters the store and forces the employee Dunkadoo out of his passive routine. Can this bird see through the case and avert disaster before the impending doom strikes?

name: Deathlust
summary: Demon sisters Lyra and Lorelei are out for vengeance with a lust for death. Harvest the souls of the Angels and ascend the Overworld before your time runs out. Slay your way to ending the Deathlust curse in this Third-person Movement Shooter / Bullet Hell Hybrid.

name: Deceived of Joy
summary: Step into a Psychological Horror Experience where you live in an apartment complex where the walls between reality and nightmares are crumbling. Run for your life, solve small puzzles and use items to help you survive.

name: Deathmark
summary: An occult social‑deduction card game for up to 12 players. Play your cards in secret, find and eliminate the opposing team and avoid the Deathmark!

name: Deadlist
summary: A psychological survival horror game where you explore a shifting, haunted forest, uncover rituals, and fight to escape before madness consumes you.

name: Deskworm
summary: A tiny desktop worm pet that moves when you type, click, or play. Dress it up with hats and skins, park it in a pocket where its gaze follows your mouse, and let its Anti-Shrimp reminders nudge you to sit up and stretch.

name: Demon Street
summary: Fast-paced VR roguelite bullet-hell set in a neon-drenched demon city. Master five unique weapon types, stack over 40 perks, and cleanse the streets from twelve demon bosses, four mega bosses, and one ultimate embodiment of sin.

name: Depth Overload
summary: Make your way to the top of the scoreboard by descending the mysterious megastructure with speed and precision, while avoiding deadly obstacles and serious injury from landing too hard.

name: DeckLand
summary: DeckLand is a rogue-lite combining deck-building with the Korean traditional Yutnori game. You are a guru returning to the kingdom of morning calm. Use various cards and tools to break through obstacles, defeat strong enemies, and approach the source of the catastrophe plaguing the kingdom!
